Dictionary Search

bantudulu

fu'ivla
x_1 is the language with ISO 639-3 code ''tdl'' (Sur).
See also {bangu}

banvoksle

lujvo
s_1 (phone/speech sounds; specifically is linguistic and vocal) is a phoneme in/of segment of utterance/speech stream s_2=v_1 in language b_1 of speaker v_2=b_2 in order to communicate/express b_3 (si'o/du'u; not quote(?)), produced with body-parts/tools x_6 at loci/in position/manner (of articulation) x_7
Must be vocal. x2 is a recognized/represented by (belongs to equivalence class of) phoneme x1. Contrast with: {bancocysle} (which is nonvocal). Recognition of a phoneme as linguistically distinct is language-dependent; b1 is a language which includes/recognizes said phoneme (and which realizes/recognizes/categorizes/divides phones s2 into the equivalence class of that phoneme). x6 and x7 are not predictable from the veljvo.

banvokyvelganzu

lujvo
x_1 is a phonotactic rule pertaining to/organizing sound(s) x_2 into x_3 in/pertaining to language x_4 proposed/applied by x_5

banxa

gismu
-bax-
x_1 is a bank owned by/in banking system x_2 for banking function(s) x_3 (event).
See also {sorcu}, {zarci}, {canja}, {kagni}.

banzu

gismu
-baz-
x_1 (object) suffices/is enough/sufficient for purpose x_2 under conditions x_3.
See also {dukse}, {claxu}, {nitcu}, {ricfu}, {curmi}.

fu'ivla

banzuka

fu'ivla
x_1 (object) is sufficiently/enough of x_2 (ka) for x_3 to happen
See {banzu}, {banzuni}, {rau} {va'e}

banzukuku

fu'ivla

fu'ivla
x_1 is a property satisfied by a number/amount high enough for x_2 to happen

banzunu

fu'ivla

ba'o

cmavo
ZAhO
interval event contour: in the aftermath of ...; since ...; retrospective/perfect | |----.

ba'oi

experimental cmavo
ROI
Converts PA into tense; in [number (usually nonspecific)] possible futures where [sumti (du'u)] is true
Possible futures, given the actual past and present; what might happen. Cf. {mu'ei}.

ba'orzu'e

lujvo
z_1 grows b_1 for purpose/goal z_3 to size/form b_2 from b_3.
Cf. {tsiju}, {spati}, {cange}.

ba'ostu

lujvo
s_1 is a nursery where b_1 grows to size/form b_2 from b_3.
Cf. {ba'orzu'e}, {cange}, {spati}, {tsiju}.

baple'i

lujvo
p_1 pays bribe p_2 to p_3 for favor/services p_4=b_2.
Not necessarily with a negative connotation.

bapli

gismu
-bap-
-bai-
x_1 [force] (ka) forces/compels event x_2 to occur; x_1 determines property x_2 to manifest.
Also constrains; requires success, unlike the physics term (better expressed by {danre}). See also {fanta}, {rinju}, {jimte}, {jitro}, {rinka}, {krinu}, {zukte}, {randa}, {danre}, cmavo list {bai}, {marxa}, {tinsa}, {xarnu}.

bapse'u

lujvo
b_2=s_1 is a slave to b_1=s_2 in manner/service s_3.
Synonymous to {selbaise'u}. See {bapli}, {selfu}.

bapu

cmavo-compound
PU*
time tense: will have been; (tense/modal).

barbei

lujvo
x_1 exports x_2 to x_3 from x_4 via x_5.

barda

gismu
-bra-
x_1 is big/large in property/dimension(s) x_2 (ka) as compared with standard/norm x_3.
See also {banli}, {clani}, {ganra}, {condi}, {plana}, {cmalu}, {rotsu}, {banro}, {xanto}.

barduku

fu'ivla
x_1 is Baduk/Go/Weiqi/Igo

barfa'e

lujvo
f_1 is inside-out, with part(s) b_1 currently on the outside.

barfle

lujvo
x_1 is a stream of x_2 flowing out of x_3.

bargu

gismu
-bag-
x_1 arches/curves over/around x_2 and is made of x_3; x_1 is an arch over/around x_2 of material x_3.
Also arc; x_2 need not be an object, but may be a point or volume. See also {cripu}, {kruvi}, {korcu}, {condi}.

barja

gismu
x_1 is a tavern/bar/pub serving x_2 to audience/patrons x_3.
See also {gusta}, {birje}, {jikru}, {sanmi}, {vanju}, {xotli}, {ckafi}, {se} {pinxe}.

barjygu'a

lujvo
g_1 is a bartender at bar b_1, serving b_2 to audience/patrons b_3.
Cf. {barjyse'u}.

barjyja'a

lujvo
j_1 is a bar/café manager/owner of bar/café j_2=b_1.
Cf. {barjyse'u}, {barjygu'a}.

barjyse'u

lujvo
s_1 is a bartender at bar b_1, serving b_2 to audience/patrons b_3=s_2.
Cf. {barjygu'a}, {djabeipre}.

barkalri

lujvo
x_1 is an exit/outlet/way out of x_2 for x_3.
Cf. {li'avro}.

barkalyle'o

lujvo
l_1=b_1 is a monocle/pair of (eye)glasses/spectacles allowing the clear sight of l_2 (light) by k_2 (wearer).
Cf. {lenjo}, {kanla}, {bartu}, {le'otci}, {vistci}.

barkla

lujvo
x_1=k_1 exits/goes out/outside from x_2=k_2=b_1 with route x_3=k_3 with transportation method x_4.
Omitted: x5 = klama2 (destination) = bartu1 (something external). Cf. {bartu}, {klama}, {zevykla}.

barklagau

lujvo
g_1 ejects k_1 from b_2=k_3 via k_4 using means k_5.
Cf. {bartu}, {klama}, {gasnu}.

barku'e

lujvo
x_1 projects/extends out of x_2.
Cf. {bartu}, {kuspe}.

barli'a

lujvo
x_1=c_1 leaves/exits/goes outside of x_2=c_2=b_2 via route x_3=c_3.
Cf. {barkla}.

barna

gismu
-ba'a-
x_1(s) is a/are mark(s)/spot(s) on x_2 of material x_3.
{ba'armo'a} for a pattern of marks. See also {sinxa}, {pixra}, {se} {ciska}, {se} {prina}.

barselonas

cmevla
Barcelona

barterzga

lujvo
x_1 is a sense organ used to observe x_2 which is outside the observer x_3 under conditions x_4.

bartu

gismu
-bar-
x_1 is on the outside of x_2; x_1 is exterior to x_2.
See also {jibni}, {nenri}, {sruri}, {lamji}, {korbi}, {calku}, {vasru}.

basfa

experimental gismu
x_1 is an omnibus for carrying x_2 in medium x_3 propelled by x_4.
Cf. {sorprekarce}; {pavloibasfa} for single-decker, {relyloibasfa} for double-decker {jonbasfa} for articulated, {clajonbasfa} for bi-articulated, {dizbasfa} for low-floor, {drucaubasfa} for open top, {kumbasfa} for coach, {dicybasfa} for trolleybus.

basme'e

lujvo
b_1=c_1 is a pseudonym of c_2 to/used-by namer/name-user c_3 (person).
Cf. {cmebasti}.

basna

gismu
x_1 emphasizes/accentuates/gives emphasis/stress/accent to x_2 by (action) x_3.
Also: say forcefully. See also {pandi}.

basti

gismu
-bas-
x_1 replaces/substitutes for/instead of x_2 in circumstance x_3; x_1 is a replacement/substitute.
See also cmavo list {ba'i}, {binra}.

basxarfri

lujvo
x_1 vicariously experiences x_2 (ka/nu/li'i), imagining themself in place of x_3
See {basti}, {xanri}, {lifri}

basygau

lujvo
g_1 (agent) replaces/substitutes b_1 for/instead of b_2 in circumstance b_3.

basysi'u

lujvo
x_1 (plurality/set) replace/trade places with one another in circumstance x_2.
Cf. {basti}, {simxu}. Similar in meaning to {simbasti}, but merges basti_1 and basti_2 together.

basyvla

lujvo
v_1=b_1 is an anaphora/pronoun/pro-word in language v_2 replacing word b_2 under conditions b_3.

batci

gismu
-bat-
x_1 bites/pinches x_2 on/at specific locus x_3 with x_4.
Bite through (= {ka'arbatci}, {batygre}); pinch (= {cinzybatci}). See also {denci}, {jgalu}, {guska}, {citka}.

batfendi

lujvo
b_1=f_1 (agent) bites apart b_2=f_2 into sections/partitions f_3 with bite locus b_3.

batkakpa

lujvo
x_1=b_1=k_1 takes bite x_2=b_3=k_2 out of x_3=b_2=k_3 using teeth/implement x_4=b_4=k_4

batke

gismu
x_1 is a button/knob/[handle] on/for item x_2, with purpose x_3, made of material x_4.
See also {jadni}, {balji}, {punji}, {jgari}, {lasna}.

batke zei uidje

zei-lujvo
b_1=u_1 is a button in user interface b_2=u_2 with purpose b_3.
Cf. {uidje}

batkyci'a

lujvo
c_1 writes c_2 on medium c_3 with keyboard c_4.
Cf. {lercu'aca'a}.

batkyfoi

lujvo
x1=b2=f1 is a keyboard for purpose x2=b3 of material x3=b4

batkyuidje

lujvo
b_1=u_1 is a button in user interface b_2=u_2 with purpose b_3.
From {batke} + {uidje}. Synonymous to {batke zei uidje}.

batmai

lujvo
m_1=b_1 is chewing gum of type/composition m_2 in shape/form m_3.
Cf. {batci}, {marji}.

bau

cmavo
BAI
bangu modal, 1st place in language ...

ba'u

cmavo
UI3
discursive: exaggeration - accuracy - understatement.
See also {satci}, {dukse}.

baucmu

lujvo
c_1 is the basis of language c_2=b_1 used by b_2 to express/communicate b_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).

baucre

lujvo
c_1 is a language expert of language c_2=b_1.
Cf. {sorbaucre}.

ba'ucu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*3
discursive: exaggeration - accuracy - understatement.

baukle

lujvo
k_1 is a language type/category/subgroup/subset (linguistic taxon) within languages b_1=k_2, with typological features k_3.

ba'unai

cmavo-compound
UI*3
discursive: exaggeration - accuracy - understatement.

baupli

lujvo
x_1 uses language x_2 for purpose x_3.
Cf. {bangu}, {pilno}.

ba'urdu'u

lujvo
d_1=b_1 whines/bitches about d_2 by uttering b_2.
Cf. {fengu}, {krixa}, {klaku}, {pante}.

baurgu'a'a

fu'ivla
x_1 is the language with ISO 639-3 code ''gaa'' (Ga).
See also {bangu}

See also {bangu}

ba'urnoi

lujvo
n_1=b_2 is a spoken/uttered message about subject n_2 uttered by n_3=b_1 to intended audience n_4.

baurnu'a'a

fu'ivla
x_1 is the language with ISO 639-3 code ''naa'' (Namla).
See also {bangu}

baurnu'abu

fu'ivla
x_1 is the language with ISO 639-3 code ''nab'' (Southern Nambikuára).
See also {bangu}

fu'ivla
x_1 is the language with ISO 639-3 code ''nac'' (Narak).
See also {bangu}

fu'ivla
x_1 is the language with ISO 639-3 code ''nad'' (Nijadali).

baurnubu'a

fu'ivla

x_1 is the language with ISO 639-3 code ''nsv'' (Southwestern Nisu).
See also {bangu}

ba'urslefrica

lujvo
x_1 (sound) is phonemically distinguished from x_2 (sound) in language x_3
From {ba'urvlasle} and {frica}

ba'urtadji

lujvo
t_1 is b_1's pronunciation of utterance b_2 under conditions t_3.

ba'urvlasle

lujvo
s_1=b_2 is a phoneme/most basic phonological subunit of word, meaning/causing v_2 in language v_3.
See also phone (={ba'usle}) and morpheme (={genvlasle}).

ba'urxausku

lujvo
b_1=c_1 (agent) eloquently speaks/verbally expresses x_1=c_2 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience c_3, good/beneficial/nice for x_2 by standard x_3.

ba'urxauskuske

lujvo
s_1 is a rhetoric [formal study] of rhetorical matter s_2 based on methodology s_3.

bauske

lujvo
s_1 is linguistics based on methodology s_2.
Cf. {banpliske}, {banjikske}, {banmenske}.

ba'usku

lujvo
s_1=b_1 (agent) says s_2=b_2 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience s_3 through expressive medium s_4.
Unlike {cusku}, which can refer to other forms of expression, ba'usku refers only to talking. Cf. {tavla}.

ba'usle

lujvo
s_1 (phone/speech sounds) is a segment of utterance/speech stream s_2=b_2.
Cf. {tavla}, {lerpoi}.

bausmu

lujvo
x_1 is the meaning of linguistic expression x_2 in language x_3 according to interpreter x_4
See also {smuni}, {bangu}.

bauspi

lujvo
s_1 is a split piece of language b_1=s_2.
Poetic compound.

bavgaupei

lujvo
g_1=p_1 thinks about/considers/ponders/reflects upon doing b_1=g_2=p_2 (nu) after b_2 (nu)
I found that there was no good, single word for "thinking about doing ... after ...". (See {balvi}, {gasnu}, and {pensi})

bavla'i

lujvo
b_1=l_1 is next after b_2=l_2 in sequence l_3.
Cf. {prula'i}.

bavla'ima'i

lujvo
m_1=b_1=l_1 is the next month; m_1=b_1=l_1 is the month following b_2=l_2, month standard m_3.
Cf. {prula'ima'i}, {cabma'i}.

bavlamcerni

lujvo
c_1=l_1=b_1 is tomorrow morning; c_1=l_1=b_1 is the morning after b_2=l_2 at location c_3.
Morning (={cerni}), this morning (={cabdeicerni}), yesterday morning (={prulamcerni}).

bavlamcte

lujvo
n_1=l_1=b_1 is the night after b_2=l_2 at location n_3.
{cabycte} is tonight, whether or not it is currently night yet. {bavlamcte} is tomorrow night, even if {cabycte} is still in the future. Cf. {nicte}, {prulamcte}, {bavlamdei}.

bavlamdei

lujvo
d_1=b_1=l_1 is tomorrow; d_1=b_1=l_1 is the day following b_2=l_2, day standard d_3.
Cf. {prulamdei}, {bavlamcte}.

bavlamjeftu

lujvo
j_1=b_1 is the week directly after b_2 by standard j_3.
Cf. {prulamjeftu}, {cabjeftu}.

bavlamke'u

lujvo
x_1 is the next/following time that x_2 happens.
Cf. {balvi}, {lamji}, {krefu}, {bavlamdei}.

bavlamna'a

lujvo
n_1=b_1=l_1 is next year; n_1=b_1=l_1 is the year following b_2=l_2 by year standard n_3.
Cf. {prulamna'a}, {cabna'a}.

bavlamvanci

lujvo
v_1=l_1=b_1 is tomorrow evening; v_1=l_1=b_1 is the evening after b_2=l_2 at location v_3.
Evening (={vanci}), this evening (={cabvanci}), yesterday evening (={prulamvanci}).

bavmi

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of barley [grain] of species/strain x_2.
See also {gurni}.

bavyfarvi

lujvo
f_1 ages / passes through time into future form f_2 = b_1 from current / past / earlier form f_3 = b_2 through stages f_4.
Made from {balvi} + {farvi}. Cf. {citno}, {nilnalci'o}.

bavykri

lujvo
x_1 expects/anticipates x_2 to happen.
Cf. {balvi}, {krici}, {ba'a}.

bavypunji

lujvo
p_1 delays p_2 until after b_2.
Cf. {balvi}, {punji}, {prupu'i}.

bavyske

lujvo
s_1 is futurology/future studies of/about ideas of the future b_1=s_2 based on methodology s_3.
Science about the future, not to be confused with science in the future.

bavyspe

lujvo
s_1 is the fiancé(e)/betrothed of s_2 under law/custom/tradition/system/convention s_3.
Cf. {pruspe}.

bavyxusra

lujvo
x_1 asserts/prophesies that x_2=b_1 is true about the future of b_2

baxseljibri

lujvo
x_1=s_1 is a bank clerk of a bank x_2=b_1=s_2 owned by/in banking system x_3=b_2 for banking function(s) x_4=b_3 (event).
{banxa} {se} {jibri}

baxso

gismu
x_1 reflects Malay-Indonesian common language/culture in aspect x_2.
See also {meljo}, {bindo}.

baxydinkarda

lujvo
x_1=k_1 is a debit/bank/check card with balance x_2=j_1 at bank/financial institution x_3=b_1=b_2
Necessarily coupled to bank account(s) with withdrawable (positive) balance. See payment card ({lejykarda}), credit/charge card ({jitseldejykarda}/{detseldejykarda}) and stored-value card ({vamveile'ikarda}). Cf. {maksriveikarda}, {lejykardymi'i}, {banxa}, {pleji}, {jdini}.

baze'e

cmavo-compound
ZEhA*
time tense: forever after / forevermore

bazroi

lujvo
x_1 happens often enough during interval x_2 for x_3 to occur

bazyjvesa'u

lujvo
x_1 is a necessary and sufficient condition for x_2 to happen
Synonymous with {bazysa'u}. See also {banzu}, {sarcu}.

bazysa'u

lujvo
x_1 is a necessary and sufficient condition for x_2 to happen
Synonymous with {bazyjvesa'u}. See also {banzu}, {sarcu}. Properties: bazysa'u(X,Y) ↔ bazysa'u(¬X,¬Y); bazysa'u(X,Y) ↔ [banzu(X,Y) ∧ sarcu(X,Y)]…

be

cmavo
BE
sumti link to attach sumti (default x_2) to a selbri; used in descriptions.

be'a

cmavo
FAhA1
location tense relation/direction; north of.

be'arna

fu'ivla
x_1 is to the north of x_2 according to frame of reference x_3.
Synonymous to {berti}. See {be'a}. Set: {be'arna} {du'arna} {ne'urna} {vu'arna}. This set is invented for those who prefer the sumtcita over the gismu, due to all starting with different letters.

be'aspe

lujvo
x_1 is a daughter-in-law (son's wife) of x_2 according to law/custom x_3.
Cf. {ti'uspe}, {spemamta}, {spepa'u}, {me'ispe}, {bunspe}.

bebgei

lujvo
g_1 is giddy about g_2.

bebna

gismu
-beb-
x_1 is foolish/silly in event/action/property [folly] (ka) x_2; x_1 is a boob.
See also {fenki}, {xajmi}, {prije}, {fliba}.

bebzunpre

lujvo
b_1=z_1=p_1 is a troll on z_2 with inflammatory message z_3.
x2 is usually an internet bulletin board or newsgroup. Cf. {zunti}, {prenu}, {malzunpre}.

be'e

cmavo
COI
vocative: request to send/speak.

be'ei

experimental cmavo
BAI
benre modal, 1st place for beneficiary...
See {benre}, {seva'u}, {tezu'e}, {ko'au}

be'ei'oi

experimental cmavo
VUhU
ternary mekso operator: x_1th Bergelson multiplicative interval with exponents bounded from above by function x_2 and with sequence of shifts x_3, where exponents belong to set x_4
x1 must be a positive integer. x2 must be a strictly monotonic increasing function mapping from all of the positive integers to a subset (not necessarily proper) thereof. x3 must be a sequence of natural numbers. x2 without context will default to the same value as x1 (it is simple linear on the set of positive integers), x3 without context will be a sequence all and only of 1's, x4 without context defaults to the set of all non-negative integers. Let p_i be a prime for all i, with p_1 = 2 and the ith prime (in the normal monotonic increasing order) being p_i. Let all other symbols match the aforementioned conditions. Represent the nth term of the sequence x3 by x3_n; represent the function in x2 being applied to the number m by x2(m). Then x1 be'ei'oi x2 boi x3 boi x4 produces the set of all numbers of the form x3_(x1) * (p_1)^(e_1) *...* (p_(x1))^(e_(x1)), where e_j belongs to the intersection of the interval [0, x2(x1)] with x4.

befcaucreka

lujvo
cr_1=cl_1=b_2 is a crop top t-shirt / blouse of material cr_2.
The lower portion is cut off, resulting in the exposure of some of the wearer's abdomen. Suggested shortest fu'ivla form: efcrka. Cf. {creka}.

befcro

lujvo
x_1 has a bellyache.

befkafke

lujvo
k_1=b_2 burps.

befke'a

lujvo
k_1 is the abdominal cavity of k_2.

befru'e

lujvo
p_1 is the digestion of p_2 with output p_3 passing through stage p_4 of person/animal/plant b_2.
Cf. {djaruntygau}, {djaruntyrango}, {citka}, {tunlo}, {xelbefru'e}.

befsfeke'a

lujvo
k_1 is the navel of k_2.
Cf. {befyba'a}, {befke'a}.

befsri

lujvo
d_1 is a belt of material d_2.

befti'e

lujvo
t_1 is the lower back [body-part] of b_2.

befyba'a

lujvo
be_1=ba_1 is the navel / belly button (umbilicus) of be_2=ba_2.
In humans, the navel can appear as a depression (kevna) or as a protrusion (punli). Cf. {befsfeke'a}, {betfu}, {barna}.

befyba'u

lujvo
x_1 ventriloquizes/ventriloquises x_2; x_1 is a ventriloquist

befyfomsle

lujvo
s1 is the abdominal cavity of b2
Refers to the lower part of the ventral cavity in animals

begbau

lujvo
be_1=ba_1 is the Bengali language used by ba_2 to communicate ba_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).
Cf. {bengo}, {bangu}, {banbu'enu}.

begru'u

lujvo
r_1 is measured in bangladeshi taka (৳) as r_2 (quantity), in the Bangladesh monetary system r_3.

begygu'e

lujvo
b_1=g_1 is Bangladesh.
Cf. {bengo}, {gugde}, {gugdebudu}.

bei

cmavo
BEI
separates multiple linked sumti within a selbri; used in descriptions.

be'i

cmavo
BAI
benji modal, 1st place (sender) sent by ...

beiblo

lujvo
b_1 is a cargo ship for carrying b_2, propelled by b_3.
Cf. {bevri}, {bloti}, {preblo}, {ni'ablo}.

beiDJIN

cmevla
Beijing.
Cf. {jungo}, {tcadu}.

bei'e

experimental cmavo
BEIhE
Multiple sumti link
Terminated by {be'o}. Until terminated, all following sumti are considered to successively fill the terbri (in order) of the selbri which immediately precedes this word, filling in accord with the order presented (overridden by FA), starting at x2 by default. In a sense, this word delves into the world of the selbri, treating it (temporarily/until terminated) as the selbri of a bridi. (This word reduces the number of {be}'s and {be'o}'s required, as well as reduces the amount of jumping around in an utterance/the thinking required.)

bei'oi

experimental cmavo
BEIhOI
Tag linkarge 2
"fi'o broda fe'u be'oi ko'a bei'oi ko'e" = "fi'o broda be ko'a bei ko'e"

beipre

lujvo
p_1=b_1 is a carrier/porter/waiter, carrying b_2 to b_3 from b_4 over path b_5.
Cf. {barjyse'u}.

beircarce

lujvo
c_1 is a cart/carriage/wagon (wheeled vehicle) for carrying c_2=b_2 to b_3 from b_4, propelled by c_3.
Cf. {beipre}, {bevma'e}.

beitlaxum

cmevla
Bethlehem.
Cf. {xriso}, {lijda}.

bekpi

experimental gismu
x_1 is the 'back', dorsum of body x_2
Opposite of ventral part of the body. Not necessarily should be a posterior part of the body. Determined by bilateral symmetry of the body. See also {vente}, {trixe}, {cutne}.

bemboijvi

lujvo
j_1 plays American/Canadian football against j_2 in competition j_3 for prize/title j_4.
See {bemro}, {bolci}, {jivna}, {bemboiterjvi}. For soccer see {boltipyjvi}

bemboiterjvi

lujvo
j_3 is an American/Canadian football match/game with j_1 playing/competing against j_2 for prize/title j_4.
Cf. {bemro}, {bolci}, {jivna}, {bemboijvi}. For soccer match/game see {boltipterjvi}.

bemcinfo

lujvo
z_1=c_1 is an American lion [Panthera leo atrox] of breed c_2.
P. l. atrox, known as the American lion or American cave lion, was abundant in the Americas from Canada to Peru in the Pleistocene Epoch until about 10,000 years ago.

bemjoitco

lujvo
b_1=k_1 is North America and South America; b_1=k_1 is Pan-American.
Cf. {bemro}, {ketco}, {merko}, {braplu}

x_1 reflects North American culture/nationality/geography in aspect x_2.

bencra

lujvo
c_1 is a/the forebrain of brain b_1=c_2.

bende

gismu
-bed-
-be'e-
x_1 is a crew/team/gang/squad/band of persons x_2 directed/led by x_3 organized for purpose x_4.
(x_1 is a mass; x_2 is a set completely specified); Also orchestra (= {zgibe'e}, {balzgibe'e}), outfit; x_3 conductor; business, not necessarily incorporated (= {cajbe'e}, {venbe'e}). See also {gunma}, {girzu}, {dansu}, {jatna}, {jitro}, {kagni}, {kamni}, {minde}, {ralju}, {cecmu}, {gidva}.

bendicfancyxra

lujvo

benji

gismu
-bej-
-be'i-
x_1 transfers/sends/transmits x_2 to receiver x_3 from transmitter/origin x_4 via means/medium x_5.
Also possibly "sharing"; no (complete) alienation from origin is implied. x5 carrier. See also {muvdu}, {dunda}, {mrilu}, {nirna}, {xruti}, {cradi}, {tivni}, {preja}, cmavo list {be'i}, {bevri}, {mrilu}, {tcana}.

benmro

lujvo
m_1=b_2 is brain-dead.

benpi'a

lujvo
x_1 is a meninx/mater of x_2.

benre

experimental gismu
x_1 is the "beneficiary"/intended-recipient of x_2 (event/action), as intended by x_3 // x_2 is done for x_1
A "beneficiary" here is someone or something for which something is done, and this relation may be either beneficial or disadvantageous. Consider "I poisoned the cake for him" vs "I baked a cake for him" ("for him to eat" would be a purpose/goal). See also {be'ei}, {kosmu}, {terzu'e}, {selxau}

benske

lujvo
s_1 is (cerebral) neurology/neuroscience with methodology s_2.
Cf. {benpi'a}.

benstani

lujvo
s_1 is the brainstem (truncus encephali) of brain b_1=s_2.
The brain stem consists of pons and medulla.

benti'e

lujvo
t_1 is a/the hindbrain (the posterior portion of the brain including cerebellum and pons and medulla oblongata) of brain b_1=t_2.

benvau

lujvo
v_1 is the braincase (part of cranium) of organism b_2.
Cf. {benpi'a}, {stedu}.

benvaubo'u

lujvo
bo_1=v_1 is a neurocranium/braincase/brainpan containing brain bo_2=v_2=be_1 of bo_3=be_2.

benxadba

benzo

be'o

cmavo
BEhO
elidable terminator: end linked sumti in specified description.

be'oi

experimental cmavo
BEhOI
Tag linkarge
"fi'o broda fe'u be'oi ko'a" = "fi'o broda be ko'a fe'u"

be'omronzdo

fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to the Laurasian supercontinent/large subcontinent in aspect x_2, more specifically associated with time period or arrangement x_3
Not to be confused with Laurentia. x3 is a property of Laurasia itself (at the time in question, as determined by x1 and x2). This word could be used along the lines of other cultural gismu: x1 reflect Laurasian culture/lifestyle/"nationality" in aspect/nature x2. Confer: {pangaio}, {gonduana}, {bemro}, {ropno}, {xazdo}

besto

experimental gismu
x_1 dons metaphorical asbestos suit x_2 to guard against flames x_3 on topic x_4 from x_5, who disagrees with post x_6 for reason x_7, not realizing that the post was meant to be sent to x_8 rather than all of mailing list x_9 (default jboste) where it was posted in response to email x_10, whose author wishes selma'o x_11 (default SE) were extended to concisely express place x_12 of brivla x_13 (default besto) which has place structure x_14 and too many places because of sadistic whim x_15 of brivla-maker x_16, who also created brivla x_17 which has place structure x_18, and so winds up using too many of cmavo x_19 (default zi'o) in order to make the brivla ( x_13) more usable by standard x_20 and wishes they had never heard of the word besto for reason x_21, not realizing for reason x_22 that it was suggested sarcastically due to boredom x_23 of person x_24, who is proposing it against better judgement x_25 because it is fun by standard x_26, but still wishes it had as many places as x_27 (default du) for reason x_28, and feels like throwing in epistemology sumti x_29, because he/she knows both that gismu x_30 (default besto) has its place structure defined by run-on sentence x_31 and that epistemology sumti are used in gismu x_32 by epistemology x_33, notwithstanding the fact that x_34 actually has a use for besto places x_35 (default 1) through x_36 (default x7) and wishes this weren't an extremely long and stupid joke, longer than joke x_37 and stupider than joke x_38 but still appreciated by x_39 - a fact which says x_40 about them in the opinion of x_41 - but not seen as even remotely amusing by x_42, who is aware that x_43 has a use for the gismu besto because of x_45
A joke gismu from http://mw.lojban.org/index.php?title=besto . Place x_44 is absent for some reason

bilga

gismu
-big-
x_1 is bound/obliged to/has the duty to do/be x_2 in/by standard/agreement x_3; x_1 must do x_2.
Also x_3 frame of reference. See also {zifre}, {fuzme}.

bilma

gismu
-bi'a-
x_1 is ill/sick/diseased with symptoms x_2 from disease x_3.
See also {kanro}, {mikce}, {spita}, {senci}, {kafke}, {binra}.

bilmrtuberkulosi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tuberculosis.

bilni

gismu
-bil-
x_1 is military/regimented/is strongly organized/prepared by system x_2 for purpose x_3.
Also paramilitary; soldier in its broadest sense - not limited to those trained/organized as part of an army to defend a state (= {bilpre}). See also {jenmi} for a military force, {sonci}, {ganzu}, {pulji}.

fu'ivla

bimei

cmavo-compound
MOI*
quantifier selbri: convert 8 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the octet of members x_2.

bimkemnipyple

lujvo
p_1=s_1 is a wallpaper from source p_2, sticking on wall s_2=b_1.
For wallpaper without a "wall" sumti place, see {bimple}.

bimoi

cmavo-compound
MOI*
quantified selbri: convert 8 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is eighth among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

bimple

lujvo
p_1 is a wallpaper from source p_2.
If you want to express that the wallpaper also sticks to a certain wall, use {bimkemnipyple}.

bimselsru

lujvo
x_1 is a yard surrounded by x_2

binpre

lujvo
j_1=p_1 is a middleman/mediator/contact/go-between/intercessor between parties j_2.

binra

gismu
x_1 insures/indemnifies x_2 (person) against peril x_3 (event) providing benefit(s) x_4 (event).
Also x_3 loss; sell/purchase insurance (= {binryve'u}), premium (= {binrydi'a}, or {binryvelve'u}). See also {bandu}, {cirko}, {betri}, {basti}, {bilma}.

binrydi'a

lujvo
j_1 is an insurance premium providing coverage against peril j_2=b_3 for insured j_3=b_2 (person), offered by insurer j_4=b_1.

binryvelve'u

lujvo
v_1 is an insurance premium for an insurance sold from v_2=b_1 to b_2=v_4, which is v_3.
v_2=b_1 and b_2=v_4 do not neccessarily need to be human, these could also refer to abstract entities, like companies. See also: {binra}, {vecnu} and {ve}.

binryve'u

lujvo
v_1 sells insurance v_2=b_1 to client v_3=b_2 for cost v_4, insurance against peril b_3 (event) providing benefit(s) b_4 (event).

binxo

gismu
-bix-
-bi'o-
x_1 becomes/changes/converts/transforms into x_2 under conditions x_3.
Resultative, not-necessarily causal, change. (cf. {cenba} for non-resultative, {galfi} for causal, {stika} for non-resultative, non-causal change; {zasni})

bi'o

cmavo
BIhI
non-logical interval connective: ordered from ... to ...

biorka

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a birch of species x_2
See {tricu}. Synonym: {ricrbetula}.

birjanke'a

x_1 is an armpit of x_2

birje

gismu
x_1 is made of/contains/is a amount of beer/ale/brew brewed from x_2.

birjinskami

lujvo
s1 is an arm-ring computer for purpose s2; s1 is a smartwatch.

birjrsasafra

fu'ivla
x_1 is made of/contains/is a amount of root beer with flavor/ingredients including x_2.
Root beer is a carbonated, sweetened beverage, originally made using the root of a sassafras plant. Although roots are used as the source of many soft drinks throughout the world, often different names are used.

birjybarja

lujvo
ba_1 is a bar/pub serving beer ba_2=bi_1 to audience/patrons ba_3.

birka

gismu
-bir-
x_1 is a/the arm [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: branch with strength].
Also elbow (= {bircidni}), wrist (= {xanterjo'e}), appendage (but jimca, rebla preferred). See also {jimca}, {janco}, {xance}, {rebla}.

birkoku

fu'ivla
x_1 is an apricot of variety x_2.
see also {flaume}, {ricrceraso}, {ricrprunu}

birlxatere

fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to Aterian technological industry/culture/know-how of period and location (specifics) x_2 in properties x_3

birstizu

lujvo
s_1 is an armchair.
Cf. {birka}, {stizu}, {sfofa}.

birtafpau

lujvo
p_1 is a sleeve of garment p_2=t_1 for wearing by t_2 (gender/species).
Cf. {birtu'u}, {birtu'ucau}.

birti

gismu
-bit-
x_1 is certain/sure/positive/convinced that x_2 is true.
See also {jetnu}, {jinvi}, {krici}, {djuno}, {senpi}, {sruma}.

birtu'u

lujvo
t_1 is a sleeve of material t_2 for the arm of b_2.
Cf. {birtafpau}, {birtu'ucau}.

birtu'ucau

lujvo
c_1 (garment) is sleeveless.
Cf. {birtu'u}, {birtafpau}.

lujvo

See also {birtu'ucau} and {creka}

birvrajvi

lujvo
j_1 arm-wrestles with j_2 for prize j_4.

bisli

gismu
-bis-
x_1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains ice [frozen crystal] of composition/material x_2.
Composition including x_2, which need not be a complete composition. See also {kunra}, {runme}, {lenku}, {krili}, {bratu}, {snime}, {carvi}.

bislunsa

lujvo
x_1 is frost condensed on x_2 at temperature x_3, pressure x_4.

bisma'a

lujvo
x_1 is an iceberg in ocean x_2.
Cf. {bisri'e}.

bisri'e

lujvo
x_1 is a glacier of land mass x_2, draining snowshed x_3 into x_4.
Cf. {bisma'a}.

bisycmaplini

lujvo
b_1=c_1=p_1 is a comet revolving around p_2 with planetary characteristics p_3, orbital parameters p_4, with ice composition b_2.
Cf. {plini}, {cmaplini}

bisyladru

lujvo
x_1=b_1=l_1 is ice cream/frozen yoghurt made from milk of source x_2=l_2.

bitcan

cmevla
name: 8chan (website)
Often written as "8tcan".

bitkoine

fu'ivla
x_1 is measured in Bitcoin (currency) as x_2 (li)

bitmu

gismu
-bim-
-bi'u-
x_1 is a wall/fence separating x_2 and x_3 (unordered) of/in structure x_4.
See also {jbini}, {sepli}, {fendi}, {canko}, {drudi}, {kumfa}, {loldi}, {senta}, {snuji}, {pagre}, {gacri}, {kuspe}, {marbi}, {vorme}.

bitni

experimental gismu
x_1 is measured in x_2 (number, default 1) bits/shannons (unit of data/information) of logarithmic base x_3 (default 2)
See {skami}, {datni}, {bitnymei}, {baitni} // Decimal prefixed forms (powers of 1000): {ki'orbitni} {megbitni} {gigbitni} {tetybitni} {petybitni} {xexybitni} {zepybitni} {gotybitni} // Binary prefixed forms (powers of 1024): {kirbibitni} {merbibitni} {girbibitni} {terbibitni} {perbibitni} {xerbibitni} {zerbibitni} {gorbibitni} // x_3 is for defining units with bases other than 2, e.g. trits ({bitnrci}), nats ({bitnrte'o}), dits/bans/hartleys ({bitnrdau})

bitnrkrati

fu'ivla
x_1 (object, event, string, etc.; anything toggleable with x_2-many states) represents a bit/shannon/trit/nat (information unit) of logarithmic base x_2 (default: 2) where states x_3 (ordered list) respectively represent bit states x_4 (ordered list; same length as x_3)
Examples for binary bits (x1 when x2 = 2): a 0-xor-1 string of length one, a coin flip, the toggleable states of an electrical switch, the direction that a car drives down a road, etc.

bitnymei

lujvo
x_1 is measured in x_2 (default 1) bit-groups, each consisting of x_3 bits of logarithmic base x_4
See {bitni}, {baitni}. // x_4 = bitni_3

bitybi'o

lujvo
x_1=bin_1=bir_1 becomes certain that x_2=bir_2 under conditions x_3=bin_3.
See also {birti}, {binxo}, {sezybitygau}.

bitygau

lujvo
g_1 convinces/persuades b_1 that b_2 is true.
from {birti} {gasnu}. See {termu'igau} for another sense of "convince/persuade". c.f. {madysku} {dragau}

bi'u

cmavo
UI3a
discursive: newly introduced information - previously introduced information.
See also {nindatni}, {saurdatni}.

bi'umra

lujvo
m_1=b_1 is a rampart/bulwark/wall/fence protecting m_2 from danger/threat m_3, physically separating/partitioning b_2 from b_3 (unordered), of/in structure b_4.
The method by which x_1 protects x_2 is unspecified. It may, for example, physically block x_3 from reaching x_2, or it may simply give x_2 the high ground it needs to protect itself.

bi'unai

cmavo-compound
UI*3
discursive: newly introduced information - previously introduced information.

bivjetka'u

lujvo
k_1 is a byte/octet.

bivmast

cmevla
August.
Cf. {cinfyma'i}, {bivmasti}.

bivmasti

lujvo
x_1 is August/the eighth month of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Duration. For date, use {masnbi}. Cf. {pavmasti}, {nanca}.

bivmoija'a

lujvo
j_1 has the rank of Lieutenant General/Vice Admiral/Air Marshal (equivalent of NATO OF-8) in military unit /organization j_2.
Cf. {bi}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {sozmoija'a}, {zelmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

bivyplin

cmevla
Neptune.
Cf. {bivyplini}.

bivyplini

lujvo
p_1 is the eighth closest planet (default is Neptune if p2 is the Sun) revolving around p_2 (default is the Sun), with planetary characteristics p_3, orbital parameters p_4.
Cf. {pavyplini}, {relplini} etc., {terdi}, {solri}, {mluni}, {lunra}, {plinycma}, {tarci'e}.

bixma'u

lujvo
b_1=m_1 is adolescent / pubescent / maturing in development-quality m_2 (ka) by standard x_3.
Cf. {binxo}, {makcu}, {xadbixma'u}, {bavyfarvi}, {citnau}.

c_1 is a calculus of type/describing c_2
See also {cmaci}, {binxo}, {ra'irsumji} and {cneparbi}

bixygau

lujvo
x_1=b_3=g_1 makes/turns x_2=b_1 into x_3=b_2

blabi

gismu
-lab-
x_1 is white/very-light colored [color adjective].
Pale forms of other colors are a compound of white; e.g. pink (= {labyxu'e}, {xunblabi}) (whereas kandi is used for pale = dimness, lack of intensity). See also {skari}, {xekri}, {grusi}, {kandi}, {manku}, {carmi}, {bakri}, {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {crino}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xunre}, {zirpu}.

Belarus.

lujvo
b_1=c_1 is a glass/drinking glass/glass mug/[glass container] with contents c_2.

Synonyms: {jimdei}, {mumdei}. See also {cicnydei}, {zirdei}.

This word is in Jbovlaste based on its use in CLL

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of blandissory [food] of composition x_2

blanketi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a blanket
A heavy, loosely woven fabric, usually large and woollen, used for warmth while sleeping or resting.

gismu

Cf. {smela}

blazilska

lujvo
x_1 is the abstract color blue
The gismu {blanu} refers to objects which are blue, but not the color blue itself. This lujvo serves the latter purpose. See also {skari} {zilska}

blazone

fu'ivla

lujvo

bliiardo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a billiard/pool/cue sport game characterized by x_2

bliku

gismu
-bli-
x_1 is a block [3-dimensional shape/form] of material x_2, surfaces/sides x_3.
x_3 sides/surfaces should include number, size, and shape; also polyhedron (= {pitybli} having flat/planar sides/surfaces). regular polyhedron (= {kubybli}, {blikubli}), brick (= {kitybli}); See also {tapla}, {kubli}, {tanbo}, {canlu}, {kojna}, {sefta}, {bolci}, {kurfa}, {tarmi}.

blikubli

lujvo
k_1=b_1 is a regular polyhedron [3 dimensional] with sides/surfaces k_3=b_3.
k_3=b_3 sides/surfaces should include number, size, and shape. See also: {kubybli}, {bliku}, {kubli}.

blixra

lujvo
p_1 is a relief/embossment representing/showing p_2, made by artist p_3, on material b_2.
Cf. {bliku}, {pixra}, {laryrakpra}, {kacmyxra}.

blobonjacta'o

lujvo
t_1=d_1=bo_1=bl_2 is a wakeboard of material/property t_2.
From {tanbo}, {djacu}, {boxna}, {bloti} (bo2-bo5,bl2, bl3 subsumed). See also sufingboard (={bonjacta'o}), windsurfingboard (={fanjacta'o}), kitesurfingboard (={volfanjacta'o}), wakesurfingboard (={blobonjacta'o}).

bloca'ega'a

Cf. {bloti}, {catke}, {grana}, {blocpuga'a}, {blofanga'a}, {blopinfanga'a}, {blomatryga'a}, {blofarga'a}.

Cf. {grebe'i}, {greblo}.

lujvo
g_1 is an oar/paddle of boat/ship/vessel b_1, of material g_3, boat for carrying b_2.

blondino

fu'ivla
x_1 is blond, fair-haired
Blond is a color special to mammal and human hair.

blopinfanga'a

lujvo

Cf. {bloti}, {pinta}, {falnu}, {grana}, {bloca'ega'a}, {blofanga'a}, {blocpuga'a}, {blomatryga'a}, {blofarga'a}.

blopofre'i

lujvo
x_1 is a survivor/castaway (one sense) of shipwreck (event) x_2
"Castaway" in this sense does not necessarily imply being lost or stranded. See also: {nunblopo'u}.

blopre

lujvo
p_1 is a sailor of boat b_1 of type/that carries b_2.
Cf. {bloti}, {prenu}, {blosazri}, {bloja'a}.

blorkaiaka

fu'ivla
x_1 is a kayak [small, human-propelled boat/ship/vessel vehicle] for carrying x_2, propelled by x_3.

Cf. {bloti}, {tcana}, {ni'ablo}, {brablo}, {greblo}, {xamsi}, {korbi}.

-lot-
-blo-
-lo'i-

lujvo

bluble

lujvo

Cf. {ciblu}, {cirko}, {rinci}, {vikmi}, {sputu}, {xrani}, {cortu}

bluda'emre

lujvo
m_1 is a blood pressure measurer measuring the blood pressure m_2 of subject b_2 as m_3 units on scale m_4 with accuracy m_5

bluda'emretci

lujvo
t_1 is a sphygmomanometer measuring the blood pressure m_2 of subject b_2 as m_3 units on scale m_4 with accuracy m_5

blufle

lujvo
f_1 is blood flow/circulation of vital fluid f_2=c_1 of organism c_2, flowing in direction to/towards f_3 from direction f_4.
Cf. {risna}, {blucri}, {blutu'u}, {labyblu}, {spablu}.

blupinxe

lujvo
p_1 is a vampire / drinks blood of organism p_3=c_2.
p2 and c1 subsumed. Cf. {ciblu}, {pinxe}, {crida}.

blurdrakono

fu'ivla
c_1 is dragon's blood [bright red resin] of plant species c_2 (genus Croton/Dracaena/Daemonorops/Calamus rotang/Pterocarpus).
The red resin was used in ancient times as varnish, medicine, incense, and dye. It continues to be employed for the aforementioned purposes by some. Not to be confused with blood from a dragon which is "lo ciblu be lo ranmrdrakono".

blusfani

lujvo
x_1 is a mosquito/blood-sucking diptera of genus/species x_2.
Cf. {marlari}, {civla}.

blutu'u

lujvo
t_1 is a vessel with blood/vital fluid c_1 of organism c_2.
Cf. {risna}, {blucri}, {blufle}, {labyblu}.

bo

cmavo
-bor-
BO
short scope joiner; joins various constructs with shortest scope and right grouping.
Cf. {ke}, {ke'e}.

bo'a

experimental cmavo
KOhA8
pro-sumti: definitional terbri variable 1; x_1
May be used to define words with {cei'e}, or to talk about definitions of existing or proposed words. Series: {bo'a} {bo'e} {bo'i} {bo'o} {bo'u}

bo'ai

experimental cmavo
LI2
convert number into pro-sumti: definitional terbri variable with associated number; x_n
Extends {bo'a} series indefinitely.

bodga,ias

cmevla
Bodhgaya.

bo'e

experimental cmavo
KOhA8
pro-sumti: definitional terbri variable 2; x_2
May be used to define words with {cei'e}, or to talk about definitions of existing or proposed words. Series: {bo'a} {bo'e} {bo'i} {bo'o} {bo'u}

bo'ei

experimental cmavo
GOhOI
single Lojban-word name quote, turns to selbri-unit: "x_1 is that which has this name"
Similar to {ze'oi}, but specifically used for names. Convenient for tanru with {brivycme} and grammars with brivla-cmevla merge, to avoid having to wrap a single word up in "{me} {la} ... {ku}".

bofkosta

lujvo
k_1=b_1 is a cloak/cape of material k_2=b_2
An essentially flat piece of fabric worn fastened or tied around the neck, and reaching down the back.

bofsnipa

lujvo
b_1=s_1 is a sticky patch which sticks to s_2, and consists of material b_2.
Cf. {blucri}.

bogda'u

lujvo
x_1 is a vertebrate animal of species x_2

Cf. {bogjinme}, {rokci}.

Cf. {bongu}, {jinme}, {bakri}.

lujvo
b_1=g_1 is a skeleton with function b_2.

boi

cmavo
BOI
elidable terminator: terminate numeral or letteral string.

bo'i

experimental cmavo
KOhA8
pro-sumti: definitional terbri variable 3; x_3
May be used to define words with {cei'e}, or to talk about definitions of existing or proposed words. Series: {bo'a} {bo'e} {bo'i} {bo'o} {bo'u}

boi'ai

experimental cmavo
VUhU
immediately convert number into a single digit
See: http://mw.lojban.org/papri/Proposal:_distinguishing_digits_from_numbers#Clean-Up

boi'au

experimental cmavo
JOIhI
immediately convert symbolic string to number (explicit)
See: http://mw.lojban.org/papri/Proposal:_distinguishing_digits_from_numbers#Clean-Up

boijme

lujvo
j_1=b_1 is a pearl/ball-shaped gem from gemstone/material/source j_3=b_2.
Cf. {tercakyjme}, {cakyjmepi'a}.

boi'oi

experimental cmavo
BOIhOI
preserve formal interpretation of mekso subexpression with no substitutions made
In a sense, "converts" an expression from one that has been tampered with in any way to exactly what was uttered in the first place. See: http://mw.lojban.org/papri/Proposal:_distinguishing_digits_from_numbers#Avoiding_the_.22.22D.22_Equals_.229.22.22_hole

boirlokra

lujvo
x_1 is a pillbug of genus/species x_2
see also {onskide}

bolbi'o

lujvo
bi_1 rolls up under condition bi_3.
Cf. {bolci}, {binxo}, {krosa'i}, {krobi'o}.

bolci

gismu
-bol-
-boi-
x_1 is a ball/sphere/orb/globe [shape/form] of material x_2; x_1 is a spherical object [made of x_2].
Also round. See also {bliku}, {cukla}, {bidju}, {gunro}.

boldi'u

lujvo
d_1 is a dome/cupola for purpose d_2.
Cf. {drudi}, {malsi}, {si'erdi'u}, {zdani}.

x_1 is Bulgarian in aspect x_2.

lujvo
j_1=g_1 (team) competes in a ball game tournament with j_2 (team) in contest/competition j_3 (event) for gain j_4.

bolgu'o

lujvo
g_1 plays bowling/boules.

boljbatamca

lujvo
t_1 is a cherry tomato of variety/strain t_2.
See also grape tomato (={clajbatamca}).

bolji'openbi

lujvo
x_1 is a ballpoint pen/ball-tipped pen for applying ink x_2, applied by process x_3 which includes the ball of material x_4

fu'ivla

Short zi'evla based on {bolji'openbi}. See also {penbi}, {bolci}, {penbi}, {pinsi}, {ciska}, {cinta}, {pixra}, {jipno}.

boltabno

lujvo
b_1=t_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of spherical fullerene/buckyball (default: buckministerfullerene C60).
See also: fullerene (={tabrbaki}).

boltipterjvi

lujvo
j_3 is a soccer match/game with j_1=t_1 playing/competing against j_2 for prize/title j_4.
Cf. {bolci}, {tikpa}, {jivna}, {boltipyjvi}, {boltipyboi}. For American/Canadian football match/game see {bemboiterjvi}.

boltipyboi

lujvo
x_1 is a soccer ball made from material x_2.
Cf. {bolci}, {tikpa}, {boltipyjvi}, {boltipyterjvi}.

boltipyjvi

lujvo
j_1=t_1 plays soccer against j_2 in competition j_3 for prize/title j_4.
Cf. {bolci}, {tikpa}, {jivna}, {boltipyboi}, {boltipterjvi}. For American/Canadian football see {bemboijvi}.

boltsemaku

fu'ivla
x_1 is the Boltzmann k_B constant linking energy with temperature [approximately equal to: 1.380 6488(13)×10^{−23} J/K], expressed in units x_2 (default: unitless/dimensionless and equal to 1) in paradigm/system/metaphysics/universe x_3 (default: this, our actual, physical universe)
Introduced by Planck (along with "h", his own eponymous constant); named after Boltzmann who nonetheless laid the foundation for research into such affairs. See also: {stefanboltsemasi} (sigma_{SB}), {plankexu}, {tcelerita}, {gravnutnoia}, {avgadro}, {ocnerta}, {nejni}, {kelvo}, {nilgla}.

bolxadba

lujvo
xa_1 is a hemisphere of sphere b_1=xa_2, of material b_2, halfness standard xa_3.
Cf. {bolci}, {xadba}, {plinyxadba}.

bolxa'e

lujvo
xa_1=b_1 is the fist of xa_2.
Cf. {fegboixa'e}, {demxa'e}, {jairxa'e}, {xanse'agle}.

bombiksia

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a member of insect genus Bombyx [silkworms] of subtaxon/type/species/breed x_2
For a looser/layperson term, see {siktoldi}.

bombila

fu'ivla
x_1 is a light bulb
light bulb is an evacuated glass bulb producing light

bongretmoida

fu'ivla
x_1 is a ethmoid bone (os ethmoidale) performing function x_2 in body of b_3.

bongrlakrima

fu'ivla
b_1 is a/the lacrimal bone (os lacrimale) performing function b_2 in body of b_3.

bongrpalati

fu'ivla
b_1 is a/the palate bone performing function b_2 in body of b_3.

bongu

gismu
-bog-
-bo'u-
x_1 is a/the bone/ivory [body-part], performing function x_2 in body of x_3; [metaphor: calcium].
x_2 is likely an abstract: may be structure/support for some body part, but others as well such as the eardrum bones; the former can be expressed as (tu'a le <body-part>); cartilage/gristle (= {ranbo'u}), skeleton (= {bogygreku}). See also {greku}, {denci}, {jirna}, {sarji}.

bonjacta'o

lujvo
t_1=d_1=b_1 is a surfingboard of material/property t_2.
From {tanbo}, {djacu}, {boxna} (b2-b5 subsumed). See also {jacta'o}, windsurfingboard (={fanjacta'o}), kitesurfingboard (={volfanjacta'o}), wakesurfingboard (={blobonjacta'o}).

bonjarple

lujvo
p_1=j_1 is corrugated cardboard from source p_2.
Cf. {jarple}, {tanxe}.

bonmaksi

lujvo
m_1 is an antenna emitting/receiving wave b_2=m_2 with wave-form b_3, wave-length b_4 and frequency b_5.

bonsfe

lujvo
x_1 is uneven surface of object x_2
{boxna} {sefta}

bo'o

experimental cmavo
KOhA8
pro-sumti: definitional terbri variable 4; x_4
May be used to define words with {cei'e}, or to talk about definitions of existing or proposed words. Series: {bo'a} {bo'e} {bo'i} {bo'o} {bo'u}

bo'oi

experimental cmavo
UI5
attitudinal: silliness - maturity
Expresses silliness, similar to one sense of ":P" (another sense being "zo'o"). What the speaker said is intended to be interpreted as being silly (not necessarily the same as humorous). Based on bebna and zo'o. See also {zo'o}, {bebna}

boske

experimental gismu
x_1 is a forest of components x_2

bosnan

cmevla
Bosnia.

Cf. {botpi}, {klani}.

botpi

-bo'i-

braketi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a bra or ket (mathematical object/notation) meaning/denoting/representing (object/information) x_2 with properties x_3
The definition treats bras and kets on equal footing, without distinction (except possibly by x3).

brakruca

lujvo

Cf. {barda}, {cmana}, {cmama'a}.

bramau

lujvo

brame'a

lujvo

Cf. {barda}, {mleca}, {cmamau}, {bramau}, {brarai}, {mecybrarai}, {tolba'o}.

bramlatu

lujvo
x_1 is a big cat of Family Felidae of species x_2
Genus {pantera} - 'Panthera (roaring or great cats)': {tigra} - 'Tiger, Panthera tigris Asia', {cinfo} - 'Lion, Panthera leo (Africa, Gir Forest in India)', {djagu'ara} - 'Jaguar, Panthera onca (the Americas)', {pardu} - 'Leopard, Panthera pardus (Asia and Africa)'. Genus Acinonyx: {ingulule} - 'Cheetah, Acinonyx jubatus (Africa and Iran)'. Genus Puma: {parpuma} - 'Cougar, Puma concolor (North and South America)'. Genus {unki} - 'Uncia': {irbisa} - 'Snow Leopard, Uncia uncia (mountains of central and south Asia)'. Genus Neofelis: {iunbau} - 'Clouded Leopard, Neofelis nebulosa (southeast and south Asia)', {di'ardi} - 'Sunda Clouded Leopard, Neofelis diardi (Borneo and Sumatra)'

bramuclai

lujvo
k_1 is measured as k_2=s_1=b_1 (quantifier) tablespoon(s).

branagycindu

lujvo
c_1 is a bur/burr/mossycup oak (Quercus macrocarpa) of species/strain c_2 with acorns g_3.

branimre

lujvo
x_1 is a grapefruit/shaddock/pomelo of variety x_2.
Cf. {nimre}, {barda}, {pelnimre}, {najnimre}, {ri'ornimre}.

brano

experimental gismu
x_1 is bleen, associated with time x_2
Grue and bleen are predicates coined by Nelson Goodman in /Fact, Fiction, and Forecast/ to illustrate "the new riddle of induction". These predicates are unusual because their application to things is time dependent. See also: {clinu}.

brapatxu

lujvo
p_1 is a cauldron/big pot for contents p_2, of material/properties p_3, big as compared with standard/norm b_3.
Cf. {bravau}.

braplu

lujvo
d_1=b_1 is a continent in ocean/on planet d_3.

brarai

lujvo
t_1=b_1 is the biggest among set/range t_4 in property/dimension b_2 (ka).
Cf. {barda}, {traji}, {bramau}, {mecybrarai}, {brame'a}, {mecycmarai}.

braro'i

lujvo

Cf. {cmana}, {derxi}.

braronvoimabru

brato'a

bratu

gismu
x_1 is hail/sleet/freezing rain/solid precipitation of material/composition including x_2.
This is the substance, not the act or manner of its falling, which is carvi. See also {carvi}, {snime}, {bisli}, {tcima}.

bratuca

fu'ivla

zi'evla from {bratu} {carvi}.

brazgu

lujvo
r_1=b_1 is a rose (Rosa gigantea) of species/strain r_2.

brazilias

obsolete cmevla
Brasilia.
Cf. {brazo}, {tcadu}.

brazo

gismu
-raz-
x_1 reflects Brazilian culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2.
See also {porto}, {ketco}.

bredi

gismu
-red-
-bre-
x_1 is ready/prepared for x_2 (event).
See also {spaji}, {jukpa}.

bregau

lujvo
g_1 prepares/readies b_1 for b_2.

brejbi

lujvo
j_1=b_1 is almost ready for b_2 (event).
Cf. {bredi}, {jibni}.

bre'one

fu'ivla
x_1 is Breton in aspect x_2.
Syn. {fasko'o}.

breveto

fu'ivla
x_1 is a patent on invention x_2 by inventor x_3 valid in jurisdiction x_4 for time interval x_5.

breviia

fu'ivla
x_1 (text) is an abbreviation, short form of word or phrase x_2 (text)
Newer version of the obsolete form {brevia}.

bridi

gismu
-bri-
x_1 (du'u) is a predicate relationship with relation x_2 among arguments (sequence/set) x_3.
Also: x_3 are related by relation x_2 (= {terbri} for reordered places). (x_3 is a set completely specified); See also {sumti}, {fancu}.

brife

gismu
-bif-
-bi'e-
x_1 is a breeze/wind/gale from direction x_2 with speed x_3; x_1 blows from x_2.
See also {tcima}.

briii

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of Brie cheese of variety x_2.
Pronunciation: BRI,ĭi . See {cirla}, {fraso}

brije'u

lujvo
x_1 (predicate) is true when applied to argument list x_2 (sequence)
Synonymous to {zilbri}. The x1 slot can be filled with a property/relation (ka) whose number of free slots match the length of the sequence x2. It can also be filled with a bridi abstraction (du'u) —nullary predicate—, in which case the x2 should be the empty set or possibly {zi'o}. See also {bridi}.

brije'uju'o

lujvo
x_1 knows what sumti satisfies the predicate x_2
See also {brije'u}, {kucli}.

briju

gismu
-bij-
x_1 is an office/bureau/work-place of worker x_2 at location x_3.
See also {jibri}, {gunka}.

brika'i

lujvo
x_1 is a pro-bridi representing predicate relationship x_2 with relation x_3 among arguments x_4.
Cf. {bridi}, {krati}, {sumka'i}, {cei}.

brili'e

lujvo
x_1 is a prenex of bridi/predicate relationship x_2 with relation x_3 among arguments x_4.
Cf. {zo'u}.

brilogji

lujvo
l_1 [rules/methods] is a predicate logic for deducing/concluding/inferring/reasoning to/about l_2 (du'u) with predicate relationships b_1.

bripre

lujvo
x_1 is a person who has a body that expresses predicate relationships.
{bridi} {prenu}

brirebla

lujvo
x_1 is a bridi-tail of predicate relationship x_2 with relation x_3 among arguments (sequence/set) x_4.
Cf. {bridi}, {rebla}.

brirei

lujvo
c_1 is a question asking for a predicate, asked by c_3 to c_4.
In Lojban, this is a question using the word “{mo}”.

brireisku

lujvo
x_1 asks x_3 what arguments satisfy the predicate x_2
See also {brije'u}, {ju'odji}, {brije'uju'o}.

briretsku

lujvo
x_1 asks x_2 what sumti satisfies the predicate x_3
See also {brije'u}, {ju'odji}, {brije'uju'o}.

brito

gismu
-rit-
x_1 reflects British/United Kingdom culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
See also {glico}, {skoto}, {merko}, {ropno}.

brivla

lujvo
v_1 is a morphologically defined predicate word signifying relation b_2 in language v_3.
Derived from {bridi} and {valsi}, deleting b_3, as we are speaking of the relationship independent of particular arguments. In Lojban, such words must end in a vowel and contain a consonant cluster within the first five letters (not counting y). Not all words that can be used as a selbri (for instance members of GOhA) are brivla.

brivlacme

lujvo
c_1 (quoted word(s)) is a name of c_2 used by c_3 that morphologically [strict] is brivla bv_1 in language x_5
The name must strictly be a (sequence of) brivla (according to rules for language x5); as such, in Lojban, the word(s) c1 must end with vowels and in fact must exactly follow the morphology of brivla. See also: {brivlasmicme} (a specialization); {jvocme} (a different specialization that is analogous but restricted to Lojbanic lujvo). Language is specified to be x5 rather than bv_n because the definition for {brivla} has not yet gained consensus and this particular terbri is dependent thereupon.

brivlasmicme

lujvo
c_1=s_1 (quoted word(s)) is a name of c_2 used by c_3 that morphologically [loose] evokes/is similar to/is a brivla bv_1=s_2 (text; may be multiple words), similar in property/quality[/amount?] s_3 (ka/ni), in language x_6
s3 will likely just be morphological structure. Strict brivlacme are a subclass of brivlasmicme. The name must "look like" a (sequence of) brivla (according to rules for language x6), but need not exactly follow the morphological requirements thereof (in particular, c1 may end with a consonant in Lojban). See also: {brivlacme} (a specialization); {jvosmicme} (a different specialization that is analogous but restricted to Lojbanic lujvo). Language is specified to be x6 rather than bv_n because the definition for {brivla} has not yet gained consensus and this particular terbri is dependent thereupon.

brivo

experimental gismu
x_1 is a predicate word defined as such by its word shape, signifying relation x_2 (n-ary property) in language x_3
In Lojban, this encompasses {gismu} + {lujvo} + {zi'evla}, but excludes pro-bridi, which are {cmavo}.

brivycme

lujvo
x_1 is a brivla-based name for x_2 used by namer x_3
{brivo} + {cmene}; see {brivla}. Syn. {brivlacme}. List of common brivycme: http://mw.lojban.org/papri/brivycme

broda

gismu
-rod-
1st assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).
See also cmavo list {bu'a}.

-bo'e-
2nd assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).

gismu
3rd assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).

brodo

gismu
4th assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).

brodu

gismu
5th assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).

lujvo

x_1 is a broccoli of variety x_2

lujvo
x_1 is broccoli of variety x_2

lujvo
