Cf. {denburcu}.

bruna

gismu
-bun-
-bu'a-
x_1 is brother of/fraternal to x_2 by bond/tie/standard/parent(s) x_3; [not necess. biological].
See also {mensi}, {tunba}, {tamne}, {famti}, {bersa}.

bruNAIS

cmevla
Brunei.
full name is .bruNAIS.{darusLAM}. See {xrabo}, {gugde}.

bruneleskia

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 exhibits spina di pesce/Brunelleschi herringbone (zigzag) pattern/design with features x_2
Something as simple as the alternating count or specification of the spines can be described in x2 (in other words, the description need not be complete). See also: {zigzagi}.

brupu'i

lujvo
x_1 applies/brushes x_2 on surface x_3
{burcu} {punji}

bryklyn

cmevla
Brooklyn, New York: a borough of New York City, at the western tip of Long Island.
Cf. {merko}, {tcadu}.

bu

cmavo
-bus-
-bu'i-
BU
convert any single word to BY.

bu'a

cmavo
-bul-
GOhA
logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 1.

bu'a'a

experimental cmavo
UI1b
naturalistic interjection: used to express a fit of overwhelming or uncontrollable laughter; the stereotypical 'evil laugh'
Additional -'a syllables may be added as desired. See {u'i}, {le'o}, {xa'a}, {cmila}, {palci}

bu'ai

experimental cmavo
NU
abstractor: abstractor to create logically quantified selbri variable to be used in predicate logic of third or higher order.
{zo'e} and {da} are a constant and a bound variable of predicate logic of first order respectively; {co'e} and {bu'a} are a selbri constant and a bound selbri variable of predicate logic of second order respectively; in order to express predicate logic of third or higher order, it is essential to have selbri that treat selbri variables in the domain of all selbri of second order. {su'u} and {bu'ai} in selma'o NU can compose respectively a selbri constant and a bound selbri variable in the domain of all selbri of second order. In the case that {bu'ai} takes plural number of selbri variables, connect them with {ju'e} or something. Higher order is also possible by nesting {bu'ai}. Example: su'o bu'ai xe'u kei su'o bu'a ro da zo'u bu'ai da bu'a (This {xe'u} is an abstraction-variable-indicator-{selbrisle} used in order to put a word of selma'o NU in prenex.) See also {su'u}, {bu'a}; {xe'u}.

budjo

gismu
-buj-
-bu'o-
x_1 pertains to the Buddhist culture/religion/ethos in aspect x_2.
See also {latna}, {lijda}.

bu'e

cmavo
GOhA
logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 2.

buenosaires

obsolete cmevla
Buenos Aires.
Cf. {gento}, {tcadu}.

bu'i

cmavo
GOhA
logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 3.

bu'ivla

lujvo
x_1 (quoted text) is a “bu letteral” of character x_2 (zoi quote).
This term is specific to Lojban. A “bu letteral” is defined as one word which has been made to a letteral with “{bu}”. x_1 is a quote (eg. with {lu}…{li'u}) containing the “bu letteral” (including “bu”), x_2 quotes the character which the “bu letteral” stands for verbatim, which requires to use a {zoi} quote. See also: {lerfu}.

bujyjbenunsla

lujvo
n_1 is the Vesak celebrated by s_1 with activities s_3.
Cf. {budjo}, {jbena}, {nu}, {salci}.

bukcilta

lujvo
c_1 is a thread of fabric material c_2=b_2.
Cf. {skori}, {silka}, {marna}, {mapni}, {sunla}, {fenso}.

bukfa'u

lujvo
f_1 parachutes to f_2 from f_3 using parachute of type/material b_2.
Cf. {falbu'u}, {santa}, {vofli}, {bukyvoi}.

bukfe'a

lujvo
f_1 is a tear in cloth f_2=b_1 of type/material x_3=b_2.
Cf. {tafyfe'a}.

buklolgai

lujvo
g_1=b_1 is a carpet/rug for covering floor g_2=l_1 of x_3=l_2, of type/material x_4=b_2.
Cf. {lolgai}.

bukmra

lujvo
m_1 is a tent sheltering m_2 from m_3, made of cloth b_2.
Cf. {bu'uzda}.

bukmu'a

lujvo
m_1 is a curtain/drape for covering m_2 and are made of cloth m_3=b_1.
Cf. {bukpu}, {murta}.

bukprgingamu

fu'ivla
x_1 is an amount of gingham

bukpu

gismu
-buk-
-bu'u-
x_1 is an amount of cloth/fabric of type/material x_2.
See also {mapni}, {matli}, {sunla}, {slasi}, {silka}.

bukrgingamu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity/is made of gingham.
Longer form of “{gingamu}”.

bukydi'u

lujvo
z_1 is a tent for purpose z_2, made of b_2.
Cf. {bukmra}, {bu'uzda}.

bukyvoi

lujvo
v_1 paraglides, using paraglider of type/material b_2.
Cf. {bukyvoikla}, {bukfa'u}, {falbu'u}.

bulvara

fu'ivla
x_1 is a boulevard

bumgapci

lujvo
x_1 is fog/mist of liquid/composition x_2 covering x_3.
Cf. {bumru}, {gapci}.

bumru

gismu
-bum-
x_1 is foggy/misty/covered by a fog/mist/vapor of liquid x_2.
See also {djacu}, {carvi}, {danmo}, {lunsa}, {tcima}, {gapci}.

bun

cmevla
Brother
Cf. {bruna}, {mes}, {mam}, {paf}, {bes}, {tix}.

bunda

gismu
-bud-
x_1 is x_2 (def. 1) local weight unit(s) [non-metric], standard x_3, subunits [e.g. ounces] x_4.
(additional subunit places may be added as x_5, x_6, ...); See also {grake}, {junta}, {tilju}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {kramu}.

bunre

gismu
-bur-
-bu'e-
x_1 is brown/tan [color adjective].
See also {skari}, {blabi}, {xekri}, {kandi}, {carmi}.

bunspe

lujvo
s_1 is a brother's spouse of m_2 under law/custom/tradition/system/convention sp_3.
Omit x_4=s_2=m_1. Cf. {speni}, {me'ispe}, {tubyspe}.

bu'o

cmavo
UI7
attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion.

bu'ocu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*7
attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion.

bu'o'e

experimental cmavo
BY
elliptical/unspecified/vague letteral/symbol
Has use in mekso at the least; in this context, it might subsume {xo'e} (but see: {xo'e'o'e}). It also may be useful in spelling, initialisms, etc. If used as a pro-sumti (as other letters are), it means {zo'e} but only for reasonable or previously specified letterals assignments.

bu'oi

experimental cmavo
COI
Interjection: Boo!
A way to shock people analogous to yelling "BOO!" at someone.

bu'onai

cmavo-compound
UI*7
attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion.

burcu

gismu
-bru-
x_1 is a brush for purpose x_2 (event) with bristles x_3.
See also {komcu}, {pinsi}.

burgalu

fu'ivla
x_1 is the boogaloo, danced by x_2 to music x_3
Place structure based on {dansytai}. See {dansu}

burgere

fu'ivla
x_1 is a burger/hamburger.
See also: {cirla zei burgere}.

burjuia

fu'ivla
x_1 is a bourgeois, a capitalist who engages in industrial commercial enterprise x_2

burna

gismu
x_1 is embarrassed/disconcerted/flustered/ill-at-ease about/under conditions x_2 (abstraction).
See also {cinmo}.

burnanba

lujvo
n_1 is brown bread made from grains n_2.
Cf. {labnanba}.

burnygau

lujvo
g_1 (agent) embarrasses/disconcerts b_1 about/under conditions b_2 (abstraction).

burseldamri

lujvo
b_1=d_2 is a drum brush for playing on drum/cymbal/gong [percussion musical instrument] d_1 with bristles b_3.

burzilska

lujvo
x_1 is the abstract color brown
The gismu {burna} refers to objects which are brown, but not the color brown itself. This lujvo serves the latter purpose. See also {skari} {zilska}

bu'u

cmavo
FAhA3
location tense relation/direction; coincident with/at the same place as; space equivalent of ca.

bu'udru

lujvo
z_1 is an awning over z_2, made of b_2.

bu'uzda

lujvo
z_1 is a tent inhabited by z_2, made of b_2.
Cf. {bukmra}, {bukydi'u}, {bu'udru}.

by

cmavo
BY2
letteral for b.

ca

cmavo
PU
time tense relation/direction: is [selbri]; during/simultaneous with [sumti]; present tense.

ca'a

cmavo
-caz-
CAhA
modal aspect: actuality/ongoing event.

ca'abna

fu'ivla
x_1 happens now
Absolute time reference. See also {cabna}.

ca'arcadgau

lujvo
g_1 (agent) turns device/apparatus g_2=cab_1=can_1 off.
See also: turn on (={narca'acadgau}), turned off (={ca'arcando}).

ca'arcando

lujvo
cab_1=can_1 (device/apparatus) is off / not operational.
Cf. {narca'acando}, {cando}.

ca'arcau

lujvo
cl_1 is unaided by/without apparatus/mechanism/device/equipment ca_1=cl_2 for function ca_2 controlled/triggered by ca_3 (agent).

ca'arxe

fu'ivla
x_1 is modern in aspect x_2
See also {cabna}, {sarxe}, {cedra}, {cnino}.

ca'au

experimental cmavo
KOhA7
Refers to what is usually assumed to be the argument of tense tags when no explicit argument is given
Usually, {pu} {ca'au} means the same as {pu} {ku}. What {ca'au} refers to depends on the bridi operators before it.

caba'o

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
time tense: has been, is now in the aftermath of; (tense/modal).

cabda'o

lujvo
x_1 (nu) happens far away in time from x_2 (nu).

cabdei

lujvo
d_1=c_1 is today; d_1=c_1 is the day occuring at the same time as c_2, day standard d_3.
Cf. {prulamdei}, {bavlamdei}.

cabdeicerni

lujvo
x_1=ce_1=ca_1 is this morning; x_1=ce_1=ca_1 is the morning occuring at the same time as day x_2=ce_2=d_1 at location x_3=ce_3.
Morning (={cerni}), tomorrow morning (={bavlamcerni}), yesterday morning (={prulamcerni}).

cabjbi

lujvo
x_1 (nu) happens nearby in time from x_2 (nu).

cabjeftu

lujvo
j_1=c_1 is this week; j_1=c_1 is the week occuring at the same time as c_2, week standard j_3.
Cf. {prulamjeftu}, {bavlamjeftu}.

cabjvezva

lujvo
x_1 overlaps in time and space with x_2
See also {cabna}, {zvati}, {mokca}.

cabma'i

lujvo
m_1=c_1 is the current month by month standard m_3, simultaneous with c_2 in time.
Cf. {cabna}, {pavmasti}.

cabna

gismu
-cab-
x_1 is current at/in the present of/during/concurrent/simultaneous with x_2 in time.
(default x_2 is the present resulting in:) x_1 is now; time relationship only, 'aorist' claiming simultaneity does not mean one event does not extend into the past or future of the other. See also {zvati}, {balvi}, {purci}, cmavo list {ca}, cmavo list {ca'a}.

cabna'a

lujvo
n_1 is the current year by standard n_3, simultaneous with c_2 in time.
Cf. {cabma'i}, {cabdei}.

cabnalza'i

lujvo
x_1 is extinct/no longer existent.

cabra

gismu
-ca'a-
x_1 is apparatus/mechanism/device/equipment for function x_2 controlled/[triggered] by x_3 (agent).
Form determined by/from function; does not imply automated/automatic action - requires an external agent/trigger (a minji may be a zmiku cabra if it requires an external agent to trigger or control the functions that it performs automatically). (cf. {tutci}, {minji}, {finti}; {girzu}, {ganzu} for organizational apparatus, {pilno})

cabrspreso

fu'ivla
c_1 is an espresso machine controlled/[triggered] by c_3 (agent).
See also: espresso (={kafrspreso}), barista (={crekafpra}).

cabrxe

fu'ivla
x_1 is modern in aspect x_2
See {sarxe}, {cabna}, {cedra}

cabvanci

lujvo
x_1=v_1=c_1 is this evening; x_1=v_1=c_1 is the evening occuring at the same time as x_2=v_2 at location x_3=v_3.
Evening (={vanci}), tomorrow evening (={bavlamvanci}), yesterday evening (={prulamvanci}).

cabycedra

lujvo
ce_1 is the modern era.
Cf. {citri}.

cabycte

lujvo
n_1=c_1 is the night of c_2 at location n_3.
{cabycte} is tonight, whether or not it is currently night yet. {bavlamcte} is tomorrow night, even if {cabycte} is still in the future. See also {nicte}, {bavlamcte}, {prulamcte}, {cabdei}.

cabyfau

lujvo
c_1=f_1 is live (experienced as it happens) to experiencer c_2.
Cf. {cabna}, {fasnu}, {tivni}.

cabyku'e

lujvo
k_1=c_1 ranges through time/has duration k_2=c_2.
x_2 is the complete duration as the amount of time or an interval specification and is non-aorist. Cf. {temci}.

caca'a

cmavo-compound
PU*
time tense: present actuality; modal aspect.

caca'o

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
time tense: is now/simultaneously, is now in the middle of; (tense/modal).

cacklu

lujvo
k_1=t_1 is a tradition/practice/custom of traditional culture t_2=k_2 under conditions t_3
This is similar to {ritli}, but the emphasis is not necessarily on particular rituals, but customs (ex. wearing of a particular type of clothing or hairstyle) associated with a group.

cacra

gismu
x_1 is x_2 hours in duration (default is 1 hour) by standard x_3.
See also {junla}, {mentu}, {snidu}, {tcika}, {temci}.

cacryme'utcika

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the minute/minute notation of the hour, of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{cacra} zei {mentu} zei {tcika}. As default, the number x_1 is counted from the first minute of the hour. See {ti'u'e} for BAI. ex.) li cino cu cacryme'utcika lo nu mi ti xrukla kei py sy ty (I will be back at thirty minutes past the hour PST.)

cacryminli

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 long local distance units/miles per hour (mph) in speed/velocity.

cacryra'o

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 hours in angular measure of right ascension RA (default is 1).
Cf. {cacra}, {radno}, {julra'o}, {sostartai}. {pi'e} used in x2 indicates a base of 60.

cacyjva

lujvo
j_1=t_1 is a convention prescribing j_2 (event/state) within community j_3=t_2.
Cf. {ritli}, {lijda}, {malsi}.

cacysku

lujvo
c_1=t_2 customarily expresses c_2 to c_3 via medium c_4 under conditions t_3.
Cf. {tcaci}, {cusku}, {ritli}.

cadga

experimental gismu
x_1 (abstraction) should/(of right) ought to be true/happening under conditions/in the case of x_2 being true/happening, as believed by/by standard/under consideration of x_3. If the world were proper/correct/just/ruled perfectly and strictly according to x_3 and if x_2 were true, then x_1 would be true as well.
Moral judgment goes in x_3. x_3 can also be assumed by expectation under hypothesized laws of physics, by the true situation of the world, etc. Synonymous with {zgadi}.

cadnfroide

fu'ivla
x_1 feels schadenfreude/pleasure derived from unfortunate/luckless event x_2.
See also {funca}, {gleki}, {zdile}

cadycta

lujvo
cat_1=can_1 is a lurker/inactively watches cat_2
See also: {bebzunpre}, {irci}

cadykei

lujvo
k_1=c_1 (agent) idly plays with plaything/toy k_2.
Cf. {lazni}.

cadysti

lujvo
s_1=c_1 (agent) ceases and rests from activity/process/state s_2 (not necessarily completing it).
Cf. {lazni}.

cadzu

gismu
-dzu-
x_1 walks/strides/paces on surface x_2 using limbs x_3.
See also {stapa}, {bajra}, {klama}, {litru}.

ca'e

cmavo
UI2
evidential: I define.
See also {mitcu'a}, {mitsmu}.

ca'edai

cmavo-compound
UI*2
discursive / expression: "If you say so"
See {ca'e}, {dai}, {vi'o}

ca'enai

cmavo-compound
UI2
evidential: I don't define

ca'engau

fu'ivla
x_1 defines x_2 (nu/du'u) to be true / to happen // x_2 is true because x_1 says so or thinks so.
Based on {ca'e}, {gasnu}. Near-synonym with {jetrinsku}

ca'erbi'e

lujvo
b_1=c_2 is a wind from direction b_2 with speed b_3, shoving/pushing c_2 at locus c_3.
Cf. {bloti}.

ca'ercarce

lujvo
car_1=cat_2 is a pushcart/wheelbarrow for carrying car_2.
Cf. {catke}, {carce}.

ca'ermuvgau

lujvo
g_1=c_1 pushes m_1=c_2 to destination m_2 from origin m_3 over path/route m_4.
Cf. {catke}, {muvgau}, {danre}.

ca'erslanu

lujvo
s_1 is a valve/piston of material s_2, shoving/pushing c_2 at locus c_3.
Cf. {matra}, {karce}.

caflitki

lujvo
l_1 is liquid at room temperature/at standard temperature and pressure, and consists of composition/material l_2.
Cf. {cafygapci}, {cafsligu}, {djacu}, {margu}, {xalka}, {sligu}, {kelvo}.

cafne

gismu
-caf-
x_1 (event) often/frequently/commonly/customarily occurs/recurs by standard x_2.
See also {rirci}, {fadni}, {kampu}, {rapli}, {krefu}, {lakne}, cmavo list {piso'iroi} and similar compounds.

cafraina'o

lujvo
ca_1=t_1=cn_1 is a/the mode [value that appears most often] in property/amount cn_2 (ka/ni) among cn_3(s) (set) by standard cn_4.

cafrei

lujvo
r_1 is a frequently-asked question about subject r_2

cafsligu

lujvo
x_1 is a solid of x_2 at room temperature/STP.
STP = standard temperature and pressure. See also {caflitki}, {cafygapci}

cafygapci

lujvo
x_1 is a gas of x_2 at room temperature/STP.
STP = standard temperature and pressure. See also {caflitki}, {cafsligu}.

cagdaidi'u

lujvo
di_1 is a barn for storing/sheltering grains/livestock/tools/machinery da_1.
Cf. {grutersro}, {xirzda}, {cange}, {sorcu}.

cagdalsasfoi

lujvo
n_1 is a pasture with vegetation s_1 (mainly consisting of grasses) grazed by animal(s) d_1 belonging to farm/ranch c_1.

cagda'u

lujvo
x_1 is a livestock/farm-animal kept by x_2 of species x_3
See {cange}, {danlu}, {dalcange}

cagna

experimental gismu
x_1 is an open/closed wound on locus x_2 caused by x_3.
Unlike {velxai}, it's specific to physical injuries pertaining to the surface of an organic body such as skin. Open wounds include {ka'arcagna} for "incision / incised wound", {fercagna} for "laceration", {gukcagna} for "abrasion", {tuncagna} for "puncture wound", {grecagna} for "penetration wound", {batcagna} for "bite wound", {dancagna} for "gunshot wound", {jelcagna} for "burn", {da'ercagna} for "bedsore", {furcagna} for "necrosis"; closed wounds include {daxcagna} for "contusion/bruise", {camdaxcagna} for "hematoma", {ra'ircagna} for "chronic wound". The victim (the whole of the injured body) may be specified by joining it to the x2 with "po" or putting it directly on x2 with "tu'a".

cagnybo'o

lujvo
b_1 is a bandage, plaster or compress over wound c_1.

cagyce'u

lujvo
x_1 is a farming community with members x_2.

cagygundi

lujvo
g_1 is a/the agricultural industry/sector producing g_2=c_4 from farms c_1 located in c_2 farmed by c_3.
Omit g_3. Cf. {cange}, {gundi}.

cagypre

lujvo
p_1 is a farmer associated with farm c_1 producing c_4.
Cf. {te}, {cange}, {tercange}, {pudykurji}.

cagzai

lujvo
z_1 is a farmer's market selling z_2, operated by farmers z_3=c_3.
Cf. {nurma}, {grute}, {spati}, {xarju}, {bakni}, {ladru}, {sovda}.

cai

cmavo
CAI
attitudinal: strong intensity attitude modifier.

ca'i

cmavo
BAI
catni modal, 1st place by authority of ...

caibra

lujvo
b_1=c_1 is huge/enormous/colossal in property b_2=c_2 to observer b_3=c_3.
Cf. {carmi}, {barda}, {brabra}, {tcebra}, {selte'abra}, {dukse}, {cimni}, {camganra}; antonym: {cmacai}.

caicni

lujvo
ci1=ca3 feels passionate/is emotional about/feels strongly emotion ci2=ca2 about subject/event ci3=ca1

ca'icpe

lujvo
cp_1=ca_2 demands cp_2=ca_2 from cp_3.
Cf. {catni}, {cpedu}, {e'o}, {camcpe}, {mi'ecpe}.

ca'icru

lujvo
cu_1=ca_1 (agent) permits/lets/allows cu_2 (event) under conditions cu_3, derived from authority on basis ca_3.

caicta

lujvo
cat_1 stares at cat_2 as received by observer car_3.
Cf. {zgana}.

caidji

lujvo
d_1 craves/intensely wishes d_2 (event/state) for purpose d_3.
Cf. {toldji}, {caitcu}.

cai'e

experimental cmavo
NAhE
strong scalar intensifier: extremely...
{rei'e}:{ru'e}:{milxe} ; {noi'e}:{na'oi}:{cnano} ; {sai'e}:{sai}:{mutce} ; {cai'e}:{cai}:{tcetce}. See http://mw.lojban.org/papri/zipcpi:_scalar_modifiers

ca'irdi'a

lujvo
j_1 is a charge of service j_2 to consumer j_3=c_2 set and levied by authority j_4=c_1.
Cf. {jdima}, {catni}, {selfu}, {pleji}.

ca'irpai

lujvo
x_1 officially/authoritatively judges x_2 (event/abstract)
See {catni}, {pajni}

ca'irselzau

lujvo
z_2 is official, approved by authority z_1=c_1 over sphere/people c_2.
Cf. {zanru}, {catni}, {jdice}, {curmi}.

ca'irvei

lujvo
x_1=v_1 is an authoritative document of x_2=v_2 (data/facts/du'u) about x_3=v_3 (object/event) preserved in medium x_4=v_4, by authority x_5=c_1 over matter/sphere/persons x_6=c_2 derived on basis x_7=c_3.
Cf. {ca'icru} {catni} {vreji}.

caitcu

lujvo
n_1 desperately needs/is desperate for n_2 for purpose/action/stage of process n_3.
Cf. {djica}, {caidji}.

caivru

lujvo
s_1=c_1 is roaring/blinding to s_2 via sensory channel s_2=c_3.

cajeba

cmavo-compound
PU*
time tense: during and after; (tense/modal).

cajgundi

lujvo
g_1 is a/the wholesale/retail industry sector in which c_1 trades/barters c_2 for c_3 by process g_3.
Omit c4, g2. Cf. {canja}, {gundi}.

cajypinfu

lujvo
x_1 is a hostage of / is held hostage by x_2
Other sumti slots may be needed. See also {pinfu}.

cajysi'u

lujvo
s_1 (set) mutually exchange/trade/barter commodity c_2 for c_3 with c_4.
Cf. {canja}, {simxu}.

cakcinki

lujvo
x_1 is a beetle of species x_2.
Not to be confused with {ckacinki}; Cf. {kokcinela}, {kurkuli}, {gusycinki}.

cakcurnu

lujvo
x_1 is a mollusk/clam/mussel/snail of species x_2.
Cf. {skargolu}, {sedjmacurnu}, {ostra}.

cakcurske

lujvo
x_1 is malacology based on methodology x_2.
Cf. {cakcurnu}, {dalske}, {ji'eske}, {xamsi}.

cakla

gismu
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of chocolate/cocoa.
See also {ckafi}.

caklyfomjdu

lujvo
f_1=j_1 is a quantity of chocolate mousse of composition including f_2=c_1=j_2.

caklyjdu

lujvo
j_1 is a quantity of chocolate pudding of composition including c_1=j_2.
See also chocolate mousse (={caklyfomjdu}).

caklyladru

lujvo
l_1 is a chocolate drink/drinking chocolate/ is made of/contains/is a quantity of milk with added chocolate c_1.

caklylitki

lujvo
c_1=l_1 is chocolate liquor, of composition including x2, under conditions x3.

caklymatne

lujvo
m_1 is a quantity of/contains cocoa butter from cacao beans m_2.

caklypu'o

lujvo
p_1 is a cacao/cocoa powder/solids of cacao beans p_2.

caklytsi

lujvo
t_1 is/are (a) cacao bean(s) of plant sp_1=t_2 (genus Theobroma; default T. cacao).

caksova

fu'ivla
x_1 is a bird/reptile egg (not simply the gamete) consisting of yolk x_2, white x_3 and shell x_4 of species x_5 (default chicken).
Used particularly to refer to eggs that humans tend to eat, particularly chicken eggs, which is why the species place comes so late. Places for the major parts of the egg are included to make terms for "egg yolk" "egg white" and "egg shell".

caku

cmavo-compound
PU*
Now. At the present time.
The terminator {ku} is used to close the tense {ca}.

cakyjmepi'a

lujvo
p_1=j_3=c_3 is mother of pearl from source p_2=c_2.
Cf. {boijme}, {tercakyjme}.

cakyjukni

lujvo
j_1 is a crustacean of species/class j_2.
Cf. {calku}, {jukni}, {braxiura}, {nerfopi}.

cakykarce

lujvo
k_1=c_2 is a tank/armored combat vehicle for carrying k_2, propelled by k_3, with armor-plating c_1.

cakyrespa

lujvo
x_1 is a turtle of species x_2.

cakyzme

lujvo
x_1 is a calabash (hard-shelled gourd) of species or variety x_2
See also {kurbita}, {guzme}.

caldectre

lujvo
c_1=d_1=m_1 (space/volume/region/room) is d_2=m_2 cubic decimetres/decimeters (m^3) measured in perpendicular directions (triple)/defined by set of points (set)/occupied by c_2=m_3 by standard m_4.
Synonym: litre (={litce}).

caljvetei

lujvo
c_1=t_1 is space-time occupied by c_2.
Cf. {canlu}, {temci}, {tarske}, {mu'eske}.

calku

gismu
-cak-
x_1 is a shell/husk [hard, protective covering] around x_2 composed of x_3.
See also {pilka}, {skapi}, {gacri}, {bartu}.

calse

experimental gismu
x_1 (event) is spacelike-separated from x_2 (event) under signal means/in universe/by information channel (parametrization) x_3
Includes lightlike-separation. See also: {temse}, {tcese}.

calsle

lujvo
x_1 is a voxel of model/object x_2
See {canlu}, {selci}, {vidnysle}

caltai

lujvo
x_1 is the geometric shape of x_2
See {canlu}, {tarmi}, {caltaicmaci}

caltaicmaci

lujvo
cm_1 is a geometry describing cm_2=ca_1=t_1 geometric object.
Cf. {canlu}, {tarmi}, {cmaci}, {cukyxratci}, {cukla}, {kubli}, {cibjgatai}, {cibjgacmaci}.

caltaismi

lujvo
x_1 is shaped (physically/geometrically) like x_2, with shape x_3
See {caltai}, {simsa}, {tamsmi}

caltre

lujvo
c_1=m_1 (space/volume/region/room) is m_2 cubic metres/meters (m^3) measured in perpendicular directions (triple)/defined by set of points (set)/occupied by c_2=m_3 by standard m_4.

ca ma

cmavo-compound
PU*
sumti question asking for a time/date/event; simultaneous with what?.

camcpe

lujvo
cp_1=ca_1 demands cp_2 from cp_3.
Cf. {cpedu}, {nitcu}, {ca'icpe}, {mi'ecpe}.

camganra

lujvo
g_1=c_1 is vast/very wide in (2nd most significant) dimension g_2=c_2 with observer g_3=c_3.
Cf. {carmi}, {ganra}, {brabra}, {caibra}, {tcebra}, {selte'abra}, {dukse}, {cimni}.

camgei

lujvo
g_1 is intensely happy about g_2.
Cf. {carmi}, {gleki}, {mansygei}, {nalra'ugei}.

camgubri'a

lujvo
r_1 hypes r_2=g_1=c_1.
Cf. {gubni}, {misno}, {casnu}, {notci}.

camgusmis

cmevla
Robin Lee Powell.
Name Lojbanized according to its meaning.

camki'a

lujvo
k_1=c_1 screams/howls sound k_2.
Cf. {carmi}, {krixa}, {lausku}.

campania

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a champagne made from grapes x_2.
Cf. {vanju}, {fomvanju}, {risyvanju}, {xalka}, {koinka}. For sparkling wines without an AOC designation, use {fomvanju}.

camselci'i

lujvo
ci_1 is a fan of/intensely interested in ci_2 as received/measured by observer ca_3.
Cf. {camselci'igri}, {crexalbo}.

camselci'igri

lujvo
g_1 is a fanclub for g_2=ci_2.
Cf. {camselci'i}, {crexalbo}.

camskamolcpi

lujvo
ci_1=m_2 is toucan/toucanet of species/type ci_1 with bill m_1=s_1 of typically intense color or colors s_2=ca_1
Family Ramphastidae

camte'a

lujvo
t_1 feels horror/is intensely frightened of t_2 (event/tu'a object).
Cf. {ii}.

camtoi

lujvo
c_1 effortfully tries to do t_2 by method t_3, as perceived by c_3.

camxu'e

lujvo
x_1 is scarlet

canci

gismu
x_1 vanishes/disappears from location x_2; x_1 ceases to be observed at x_2 using senses/sensor x_3.
Also leaves, goes away (one sense). See also {cliva}, {ganse}, {zgana}, {lebna}, {vimcu}.

cancmu

lujvo
x_1 is silicon.

cancydji

lujvo
d1 desires/wants/wishes vanishing/disappearance of d2 (event/state) for purpose d3.

candakli

lujvo
d_1 is a sandbag with sand d_2=c_1, made of material d_3.

cando

gismu
-cad-
x_1 is idle/at rest/inactive.
“in motion”, not implying a change in location, is negation of this: {narcando}. See also {surla}.

cangan

cmevla
Hong Kong.
From Mandarin pronunciation. Cf. {xyngon}, {xonkon}, {jungo}, {tcadu}.

cange

gismu
-cag-
x_1 is a farm/ranch at x_2, farmed by x_3, raising/producing x_4; (adjective:) x_1 is agrarian.
Also grange; farming is any organized agrarian activity, not limited to plant crops. See also {purdi}, {nurma}, {ferti}, {foldi}, {xarju}.

canja

gismu
-caj-
x_1 exchanges/trades/barters commodity x_2 for x_3 with x_4; x_1, x_4 is a trader/merchant/businessman.
Also (adjective:) x_1, x_2, x_4 is/are commercial (better expressed as ka canja, {kamcanja}). x_2/x_3 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event (possibly service), or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posycanja} for unambiguous semantics); (cf. {dunda}, {friti}, {vecnu}, {zarci}, {jdini}, {pleji}, {jdima}, {jerna}, {kargu}; see note at {jdima} on cost/price/value distinction, {banxa}, {cirko}, {dunda}, {janta}, {kargu}, {prali}, {sfasa}, {zivle})

canko

gismu
-ca'o-
x_1 is a window/portal/opening [portal] in wall/building/structure x_2.
See also {vorme}, {bitmu}, {ganlo}, {murta}, {pagre}, {kevna}, {jvinu}, {kalri}, {kuspe}.

cankyuidje

lujvo
c_1=u_1 is a window of user interface u_2.
See {uidje}. Synonymous with {pevyca'o zei uidje}

canlu

gismu
-cal-
-ca'u-
x_1 is space/volume/region/room [at-least-3-dimensional area] occupied by x_2.
Also occupy (= selca'u). See also {kensa}, {bliku}, {kumfa}, {kevna}, {kunti}, {tubnu}, {dekpu}.

canlu bu

bu-letteral
BY*
space (character)
Unicode code point U+20.

canpa

gismu
-cna-
x_1 is a shovel/spade [bladed digging implement] for digging x_2.
See also {kakpa}, {guska}, {tutci}.

canratni

lujvo
x_1 is silicon (Si)

canre

gismu
-can-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of sand/grit from source x_2 of composition including x_3.
Also abrasive (= {gukcanre}). See also {bidju}, {rokci}, {zalvi}, {boxna}.

canro'i

lujvo
r_1=c_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of sandstone of type/composition r_2=c_3 from location/source r_3=c_2.
Cf. {canre}, {rokci}

cantaje

fu'ivla
x_1 blackmails x_2 with activity x_3.

canti

gismu
x_1 is a/the gut(s)/entrails/intestines/viscera/innards/digestive system [body-part] of x_2.
Metaphor: process hub. See also {betfu}.

cantu'a

lujvo
x_1 is a sand desert

cantybargau

lujvo
g_1 disembowels c_2=b_2.

canxais

cmevla
Shanghai.
Cf. {jungo}, {tcunCIN}, {xyngon}, {cangan}, {xonkon}, {tcadu}.

ca'o

cmavo
ZAhO
interval event contour: during ...; continuative |-----|.

ca'orgreku

lujvo
g_1 is a window frame of window g_2=c_1.

capcni

lujvo
x_1 feels insecurity / feels threatened by threat x_2
See also {nurcni} (antonym), {ckape}.

capli'u

lujvo
l_1 is an adventurer traveling via route l_2 using means/vehicle x_3.
Cf. {renvi}.

capnu'e

lujvo
x_1 threatens x_2 with x_3 (danger, peril).

capsidba'u

lujvo
b_1 snarls/growls/roars the threat (utterance) of idea/action s_2 at audience s_3.
Cf. {ckape}, {stidi}, {bacru}, {capti'i}, {fegba'u}, {fe'ucmo}.

capti'i

lujvo
s_1 (agent) threatens/menaces idea/action s_2 to audience s_3.
Cf. {baple'i}, {terpa}, {jamna}.

capu'o

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
time tense: is going to, is now just about to, is now anticipating; (tense/modal).

capyju'i

lujvo
j_1 is careful of j_2=c_1, which is dangerous to c_2 under conditions c_3

carbi'e

lujvo
b_1=c_1 is a tornado/waterspout moving from direction b_2 at speed b_3 rotating around centre /eye c_2 with rotational direction c_3.
Cf. {carna}, {brife}, {taifnu}, {vilti'a}.

carce

gismu
x_1 is a cart/carriage/wagon [wheeled vehicle] for carrying x_2, propelled by x_3.
See also {karce}, {xislu}, {marce}, {matra}.

carcna

lujvo
ca_1=cn_1 is a drill [rotating, bladed digging tool] for digging cn_2
See also {carna}, {canpa}, {carka'a}

carcpu

lujvo
l_1 reels in l_2=c_1 by handle/at locus l_3 by rotating it around axis c_2.
Cf. {bloti}, {fipkalte}, {curnu}.

carcra

lujvo
cr_1=ca_1 turns to face cr_2.
Cf. {crane}, {carna}.

carcycutci

lujvo
cu_1 is a roller skate/ice skate for feet cu_2, of material cu_3, for carrying x_4=ca_2.
Cf. {cucyxelkla}, {xilcutci}, {xilcucli'u}, {cucma'e}.

carcylai

lujvo
k_1 is k_2 (quantifier, default: one) cartloads/wagonloads in quantity.
Cf. {carce}, {klani}.

carfu

experimental gismu
x_1 is a (true) shrew (sorichomorph eutherian mammals) of subtaxon/type/genus/species/variety/breed x_2
Does not include elephant shrews, rabbits/pikas, or any rodents (such as rats and mice). See also: {sengi}, {ratcu}, {smacu}, {ractu}.

cargau

lujvo
x_1 turns x_2 around axis x_3 in direction x_4.
Cf. {carcpu}.

carka'a

lujvo
k_1 is a rotary saw [rotating cutting tool] cutting/splitting/dividing k_2 (object) into pieces k_3
See also {carna}, {katna}, {komka'a}, {carcna}

carlimcinki

lujvo
x_1 is a whirligig beetle of species x_2.
Cf. {cakcinki}.

carmi

gismu
-cam-
-cai-
x_1 is intense/bright/saturated/brilliant in property (ka) x_2 as received/measured by observer x_3.
Also lustrous, gleaming, sparkling, shining (all probably better metaphorically combined with gusni: gusycai or camgu'i); in colors, refers principally to increased saturation (with opposite kandi). See also {denmi}, {gusni}, {kandi}, {ruble}, {skari}, {tilju}, {tsali}, {mutce}, {blabi}, {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {crino}, {grusi}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xekri}, {xunre}, {zirpu}.

carna

gismu
-car-
x_1 turns about vector x_2 towards direction x_3, turning angular distance / to face point x_4
Also revolve (= {jincarna}). See also {gunro}, {jendu}. New definition of {carna} originally proposed by Robin Lee Powell and backward-compatible with the old one. Official definition: x_1 turns/rotates/revolves around axis x_2 in direction x_3.

carna'ivinji

lujvo
x_1 is a helicopter for carrying x_2, propelled by x_3.
Cf. {vofli}.

carnensroxi'u

lujvo
x_1 is a flywheel storing energy x_2.
A flywheel stores energy by rotating.

carpacib

cmevla
Rot-13.
Cf. {mifra}, {mipri}, {vlali'i}, {lerpoi}.

cartu

gismu
-cat-
x_1 is a chart/diagram/map of/about x_2 showing formation/data-points x_3.
See also {platu}.

carvi

gismu
-cav-
x_1 rains/showers/[precipitates] to x_2 from x_3; x_1 is precipitation [not limited to 'rain'].
See also {bratu}, {dilnu}, {santa}, {snime}, {tcima}, {bisli}, {bumru}.

carvrama'e

lujvo
m_1 is a bike/bicycle/tricycle/pedal vehicle carrying m_2 in/on surface/medium m_3, propelled by force m_4 transmitted via pedal(s) c_1=v_1.
Also include hydrocycle (={jaurcarvrama'e} or x3= "lo djacu"), handcycle (x4= "lo xance"), electric bicycle (= "lo carvrama'e be fo si'u lo dicymatra"; not to be confused with motorcycles), cycles with different numbers of wheels and different numbers of riders, etc.

carvrama'ecarce

lujvo
c_1 is a bike/cycle trailer for carrying c_2, propelled by bike/(moped) l_1=c_3.

carvyrictu'a

lujvo
x_1 is a rainforest
See also {carvi}, {rictu'a}.

casnu

gismu
-snu-
x_1(s) (mass normally, but 1 individual/jo'u possible) discuss(es)/talk(s) about topic/subject x_2.
Also chat, converse. See also {bacru}, {cusku}, {darlu}, {tavla}.

catke

gismu
-ca'e-
x_1 [agent] shoves/pushes x_2 at locus x_3.
Move by pushing/shoving (= {ca'ermuvgau}). (cf. danre for non-agentive force, lacpu)

catke zei uidje

zei-lujvo
u_1 is a slider in user interface u_2.
See {uidje}.

catlpero

fu'ivla
x1 pertains to Châtelperronian technological industry/culture/know-how of period and location (specifics) x2 in properties x3

catlu

gismu
-cta-
x_1 looks at/examines/views/inspects/regards/watches/gazes at x_2.
Also look through (= {grecta}, {ravycta}, {bacycta}); note that English "look" often means a more generic "observe". See also {jvinu}, {minra}, {simlu}, {viska}, {lanli}, {zgana}, {setca}, {viska}.

catni

gismu
-ca'i-
x_1 has authority/is an official in/on/over matter/sphere/persons x_2 derived on basis x_3.
See also {turni}, {tutra}, {krati}, cmavo list {ca'i}, {jaspu}, {pulji}.

catnrpepiskopo

fu'ivla
j_1 is the bishop/archbishop of j_2 of religion l_1.
Cf. {catni}, {jdatro}.

catra

gismu
x_1 (agent) kills/slaughters/murders x_2 by action/method x_3.
See also {morsi}, {xarci}. Non-agentive variant: {mrori'a}

catrymi'e

lujvo
m_1 orders m_2 to have c_2 excecuted by action/method c_3.
Cf. {catra}, {minde}.

catryseljibri

lujvo
x_1 is a hitman.
Cf. {zekri}, {bakcatra}, {sonci}.

cau

cmavo
BAI
claxu modal, 1st place lacked by ...

ca'u

cmavo
FAhA2
location tense relation/direction; forwards/to the front of ...

cau'a

experimental cmavo
NA
elliptical/unspecified truth value; "maybe, maybe not"
{cau'i}, but in NA. Indicates unspecificity or uncertainty between {ja'a} and {na}. See {cau'e}.

caucni

lujvo
cl_1=ci_1 (misses / emotionally feels the lack of) cl_2=ci_3.
Cf. {seicni}.

caudri

lujvo
x_1 is sad that they lack x_2 (ka); x_1 misses x_2.
See also {claxu}, {badri}

cau'e

experimental cmavo
NAhE
elliptical/unspecified scalar modifier: "maybe, maybe not", modifies next selbri-unit or tag
{cau'i}, but in NAhE. Shortened from {cau'o'e}. See {cau'a}.

cau'i

experimental cmavo
CAI
modifier / discursive: elliptical affirmative; "maybe, maybe not"
Elliptical NAI/CAI. "Maybe yes, maybe no, maybe somewhere in between". Can also modify attitudinals: {uicau'i} = "Maybe I'm happy, maybe I'm sad". See {ju'ocu'i}, {ju'acu'i}, {ju'oinai}, {cau'a}, {cau'e}, {na'i}, {ge'e}

cauncani

fu'ivla
x1 pertains to/reflects Seanchan culture/nationality/geography in aspect x2

cau'o'e

experimental cmavo
NAhE
elliptical/vague/indecisive scalar affirmer/negator; true neutral/non-committed/uninvolved scalar truthfulness/assertion
Useful for when the truthfulness or falseness of a bridi is undesirable (the speaker makes no firm stance or assumption on the matter). Different from {no'e} in that it does not necessarily select a neutral value on a scale; it merely acknowledges that some value on the scale could be chosen/that the scale exists, but does not choose one (it is hands-off). If one does not want to accuse someone of being or doing something, but wants to talk about it, this word would be used; often can be used for "are or are not".

caurgau

lujvo
g_1 (person/agent) deprives c_1 of c_2.
Cf. {caucni}, {seicni}, {nonkansa}, {pavysei}, {xagji}, {nitcu}, {djica}.

caurma

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of shawarma containing x_2
See also {nanba}, {titnanba}, {pitnanba}

cavgauri'i

lujvo
r_1=g_1 is a rainmaking/ ritual intended to invoke rain r_2=g_2, by custom/in communityr_3, with form/rulesr_4.
Rainmaking is an ethnographic term for rituals intended to invoke rain. Raindancing (=lo nu cavgari'i dansu).

cavlu'i

lujvo
l_1 (agent) showers l_2.
Cf. {cavysezlu'i}, {lumci}, {carvi}, {jinsa}, {zbabu}.

cavricfoi

lujvo
f_1 is a rain forest with trees t_1.

cavyfle

lujvo
f_1=c_1, consisting of f_2, pours into f_3=c_2 from f_4=c_3.

cavykosta

lujvo
k_1 is a raincoat of material k_2, protecting from rain c_1.
Cf. {tcima}, {bandu}.

cavysezlu'i

lujvo
l_1=s_1 (agent) showers itself of soil/contaminant l_3 with cleaning material(s) l_4.
Cf. {cavlu'i}.

caxmati

fu'ivla
x_1 is a game of chess between x_2 (white) and x_3 (black).

caxno

gismu
-cax-
x_1 is shallow in extent in direction/property x_2 away from reference point x_3 by standard x_4.
See also {condi}, {tordu}, {jarki}, {cinla}, {cmalu}, {jarki}, {jmifa}.

cazgau

lujvo
x_1 actualizes x_2 (nu); x_1 makes x_2 actually happen; x_1 makes x_2 a reality
See {ca'a}, {gasnu}, {cazyfau}, {placazgau}

cazi

cmavo-compound
PU*
right now
Narrows the scope/meaning of "now" to be relatively more immediate (but it still may encompass a small interval that extends into the objective/physical past and/or future).

cazu

cmavo-compound
PU*
nowadays, wide sense of "now"
The interval that is considered to be "now" by the speaker is relatively large(r).

cazyfau

lujvo
f_1 is actual (existing in act or reality, not just potentially).
See also {ca'a}, {fasnu}, {jetnu}, {pusfau}, {faurnu'o}.

cazyfusra

lujvo
f_1 is rotten/decayed/fermented with decay/fermentation agent f_2.
Cf. {kukfusra}.

ce

cmavo
-cec-
JOI
non-logical connective: set link, unordered; "and also", but forming a set.

ce'a

cmavo
LAU
2-word letteral/shift: the word following indicates a new font (e.g. italics, manuscript).

ce'ai

experimental cmavo
ZOhU
lambda variable prenex; marks the end of introduction of lambda-scope variables.
Cf. {zo'u}. In effect this word is used as a shortcut around verbose repeated assignment in a {ka} prenex: lo ka ce'u goi ko'a ce'u goi ko'e ... zo'u ... is the same as lo ka ko'a ko'e ... ce'ai ... In either form this style can be used to avoid subscripting and to disambiguate nested {ka}, {ni}, etc.

ce'a zei ciste

zei-lujvo
x_1 is a font with components x_2 (full set) and showing property x_3 (property of x_1)
See also {ce'a}, {ciste}, {lerfu}

cecla

gismu
-cel-
-ce'a-
x_1 launches/fires/shoots projectile/missile x_2, propelled by x_3 [propellant/propulsion].
Also: x_1 is a gun/launcher/cannon; x_1 hurls/throws/casts (more general than renro in that propulsion need not be internal to x_1). See also {renro}, {danti}, {jakne}, {jbama}, {spoja}.

cecmu

gismu
-cem-
-ce'u-
x_1 is a community/colony of organisms x_2.
See also {bende}, {kulnu}, {natmi}, {tcadu}, {jecta}, {girzu}.

cedra

gismu
x_1 is an era/epoch/age characterized by x_2 (event/property/interval/idea).
(x_2 interval should be the defining boundaries; if merely a characterizing period, the nature of the interval should be expressed in an abstract bridi, or the interval should be marked with tu'a; x_2 may also be characteristic object(s) or practices of the era, if marked with tu'a); See also {ranji}, {temci}, {citsi}.

cedrymi'u

lujvo
m_1=c_1 is contemporary with/in the same epoch/era as m_2 by standard m_3 (m_1=c_1 and m_2 interchangeable).

cedyske

lujvo
x_1 is genetics (the science of heredity) based on methodology x_2 (proposition)
See also {ginske}

ce'e

cmavo
CEhE
links terms into an afterthought termset.

cei

cmavo
CEI
selbri variable assignment; assigns broda series pro-bridi to a selbri.
Note: Directionality of assignment may be ambiguous. {ca'e} on the "toward" side may be used to disambiguate.

ce'i

cmavo
-cez-
PA3
digit/number: % percentage symbol, hundredths.

cei'e

experimental cmavo
SEI
define following selbri with sentence or tu'e...tu'u clause
Usage: The selbri after {cei'e} is defined by the associated sentence or {tu'e}...{tu'u} clause. {bo'a}, {bo'e}, {bo'i}, {bo'o}, and {bo'u} represent places x_1 through x_5 within its place structure. (Use {bo'ai} for more places if needed, or {ce'u} for "next place"). // {cei'e} is meant to be used to define new words (implicit {ca'e}) but may be modified by evidentials to express an assertion ({ju'a}) or opinion ({pe'i}) on a meaning instead. Alternatively, {smuni} and {ka'ei} may be used. // See {cei}, {goi}, {goi'e}

cei'i

experimental cmavo
GOhA
pro-bridi: the universal predicate
See also: {zai'o} (pro-sumti; empty), {gai'o} (pro-bridi; empty), {mai'i} (pro-sumti; universal), {ctaipe}.

ceikri

lujvo
k_1 believes (without evidence/proof) that the god/deity c_1 exists.
Cf. {seljda}, {nalceikri}, {ceirsenpi}.

cein

cmevla
Shane

ceirka'i

lujvo
x_1 is the incarnation/avatar of god x_2 of religion x_3
See {cevni}, {krati}, {mutmaika'i}, {kibyka'i}

ceirnalju'o

lujvo
d1 does not know if a god(s) exist; d1 is agnostic.

ceirselxa'u

lujvo
x_1 is a/the habitation/dwelling/house of god x_2.
Cf. {ceizda}, {lijda}.

ceirsenpi

lujvo
s1 has doubts about the existence of a deity/deities.
Cf. {cevni}, {senpi}, {nalceikri}, {lijda} {nalceiju'o}.

ceiske

lujvo
s_1 is theology/science of/about gods/concepts of god c_1=s_2 based on methodology s_3.

ceizda

lujvo
z_1 is the Heaven of religious community c_2.
Cf. {ceirselxa'u}, {lijda}.

cekrpolo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a polo shirt of material x_2.
A T-shaped shirt with a collar, typically a two- or three-button placket, and an optional pocket. Cf. {creka}.

cekrti

fu'ivla
x_1 is a T-shirt made from material x_2.
See also: {creka}.

cektola

fu'ivla
x_1 is x_2 shekels/tolas in mass by standard x_3
Both are about 11.7 g (the shekel being more variable), and both are derived from a word meaning "weigh".

celga'a

lujvo
g_1=c_2 is an arrow made of g_2 fired/launched by c_1.
Cf. {cecla}, {grana}, {bagyce'a}.

celgunta

lujvo
g_1 (person/mass) attacks with a projectile weapon/shoots victim g_2 with goal/objective g_3 using launcher/gun c_1 which launches/fires/shoots projectile/missle c_2 propelled by propellant/propulsion c_3.
Cf. {cecla}, {gunta}.

celguntas

cmevla
x_1 is Sagittarius [astronomical constellation/astrological sign].
From shooter (={celgunta}). The Babylonians identified Sagittarius as the god Pabilsaĝ, a strange centaur-like creature firing an arrow from a bow.The sumerian name may be translated as the 'Forefather' or 'Chief Ancestor' (=barda dzena?). In Greek mythology, Sagittarius is identified as a centaur: half human, half horse.

celma'i

lujvo
x_1 is December of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Cf. {pavrelmasti}, {kanbyma'i}, {nanca}.

celxa'i

lujvo
xa_1=c_1 is a gun/cannon/firearm for use against xa_2 by xa_3, launching projectile c_2 propelled by c_3.
jvajvo; Gismu deep structure is "cecla gi'e xarci".

cemci'e

lujvo
x_1 is the society / community system of x_2 (society members, exhaustive)
See also {cecmu}, {ciste}, {kluce'u}

cemlanzu

lujvo
l_1=c_1 is a tribe with members including l_1 according standard l_3.

cemra'a

lujvo
s1 pertains to community s2=c2
Cultural gismu replacement lujvo for communities: From gismu {cecmu} and {srana}

cenba

gismu
-cne-
x_1 varies/changes in property/quantity x_2 (ka/ni) in amount/degree x_3 under conditions x_4.
Non-resultative, not-necessarily causal change. (cf. cenba which is non-resultative, galfi which is resultative and causal, stika which is non-resultative and causal; stodi, zasni, binxo)

cenlai

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 percent of x_3 in dimension/aspect x_3.
Cf. {ce'i}.

cenlitce

lujvo
l1=c1 is l2 centiliter(s)/centilitre(s) [metric unit] in volume (default is 1) by standard l3

cenmildje

lujvo
d1 is d2 full (centi)milidays (hundred-thousandth of a day unit) in duration (default is 1 (centi)miliday) by standard d3; d1 is a metric second.
For use with metric time system. (It is not proper in the standard metric system to combine prefixes, but lojban's grouping rules allow for it.)

cenrini

fu'ivla
x_1 is a/the kidney [body-part] of x_2
Cf. {livga}, {fepri}, {risna}, {xadni}

censa

gismu
-ces-
x_1 is holy/sacred to person/people/culture/religion/cult/group x_2.
See also {cevni}, {krici}, {latna}, {pruxi}, {lijda}, {sinma}.

centaureia

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cornflower of type x_2

centero

fu'ivla
x_1 is in the center of x_2
A central subset (of a set or territory). Use {midju} for center point, {kernelo} for nucleus.

centi

gismu
-cen-
x_1 is a hundredth [1/100; 10^{-2}] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).
See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

centre

lujvo
m_1=c_1 is m_2=c_2 centimeter(s) / hundredth(s) of a meter [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction m_3=c_3 by standard x_4=m_3.
Cf. {navytre}, {centi}, {mitre}.

centrifuga

fu'ivla
x_1 is a centrifuge/centrifugal machine

cenydje

lujvo
d1 is d2 full centidays (hundredth of a day unit) in duration (default is 1 centiday) by standard d3
For use with metric time system.

ce'o

cmavo
-ce'o-
JOI
non-logical connective: ordered sequence link; "and then", forming a sequence.

ce'oi

experimental cmavo
JOI
argument list separator: acts as a comma between arguments in an argument list supplied to a function.
"ce'oi" is the word of choice to separate the arguments in bridi_3. Using {ce'o} there has obvious limitations when the selbri actually calls for a sequence. Obviously, ce'oi has issues too if the selbri can accept an argument list, but this can be circumvented more readily with {ke}...{ke'e} brackets than it can with {ce'o}. Consider ".i lo ka broda cu selbri fi ko'a ce'o ko'e". Without inspecting the type requirements of {broda} and the respective types of {ko'a} and {ko'e}, one cannot determine the meaning of the {bridi}. Furthermore, if one accepts non-static typing of {sumti} places, multiple correct answers can be given for a question asking what is the bridi_1. This would create ambiguity that is otherwise resolved by "ce'oi". See also {ka}, {du'u}, {me'au}

ce'ol

cmevla
Sheol

cerda

gismu
-ced-
x_1 is an heir to/is to inherit x_2 (object/quality) from x_3 according to rule x_4.
Pedantically, inheriting an object should be a sumti-raising (tu'a if non-abstract in x_2) of inheriting loka ponse the object - the ownership of the object (= {posycerda}, {posyselcerda} for unambiguous semantics). See also {jgina}.

cermurse

lujvo
m_1=c_1 is the dawn of day m_2=c_2 at location m_3=c_3.
Cf. {vacmurse}.

cermursynalcando

lujvo
ca_1 is matutinal/active during the pre-dawn/early morning ce_1=m_1.
See also crepuscular (={mursynalcando}).

cerni

gismu
-cer-
x_1 is a morning [dawn until after typical start-of-work for locale] of day x_2 at location x_3.
This morning (= {cabdeicerni}); tomorrow morning (= {bavlamcerni}); yesterday morning (= {prulamcerni}, {prulamdeicerni}) See also {vanci}, {murse}, {tcika}.

cersai

lujvo
s_1 (mass) is a breakfast composed of dishes including s_2.
Cf. {dormijysai}, {vacysai}, {cerni}, {sanmi}.

certu

gismu
-cre-
x_1 is an expert/pro/has prowess in/is skilled at x_2 (event/activity) by standard x_3.
Also competent, skilled. See also {djuno}, {stati}, {kakne}.

cesri'a

lujvo
r_1 blesses/sanctifies c_1 in the name of person/people/culture/religion/cult/group c_2 under conditions r_3.
Cf. {ruxyzau}, {dapma}, {lijda}, {cevni}, {makfa}, {xamgu}, {vrude}.

cesri'isi'a

lujvo
s_1 worships s_2=c_1, which is holy/sacred to c_2=r_3, with ritual r_1 having form/rules r_4.
Cf. {cesri'a}.

cesycku

lujvo
cu_1=ce_1 is a holy book containing work cu_2 by (presumed) author cu_3 for audience cu_4=ce_2 preserved in medium cu_5.
Cf. {lijda}, {xebro}, {xriso}, {muslo}, {jegvo}.

cesyjvedotla'okemsorgugject

cmevla
Holy Roman Empire (of the German Nation)
The name can be split into multiple parts such as: la censa je dotco latmo sorgugje'a. An easier endonymic fu'ivla is: {dotrxailigesromicraixe}

cesyske

lujvo
s_1 is hieralogy/science of/about sacreds/sacredness c_1=s_2 based on methodology s_3.

cesystu

lujvo
s_1=c_1 is a holy site to person/people/culture/religion/cult/group c_2.
Cf. {ritli}, {cesri'a}, {cesri'isi'a}, {lijda}.

cesyvu'e

lujvo
x_1 is saintly/holy by moral standard/religion x_2
See {censa}, {vrude}

ce'u

cmavo
KOhA8
pseudo-quantifier binding a variable within an abstraction that represents an open place.

ce'ulno

fu'ivla
x1 pertains to Acheulean technological industry/culture/know-how of period and location (specifics) x2 in properties x3.
The Acheulean industry spanned so much time and was organized by successive waves of human migrations into various geographical regions, each group introducing its own unique small variations on common Acheulean stone technology themes, that x2 is of particular importance.

cev

cmevla
God.
Cf. {cevni}, {jegvon}, {jegvo}, {muslo}, {xebro}, {xriso}.

cevni

gismu
-cev-
-cei-
x_1 is a/the god/deity of people(s)/religion x_2 with dominion over x_3 [sphere]; x_1 is divine.
Also divinity; x_2 religion refers to the religious community as a mass. See also {censa}, {krici}, {lijda}, {malsi}.

cfabalvi

lujvo
b_1 is entirely in the future of b_2; b_1 begins after b_2.
Cf. {cfari}, {balvi}.

cfaga'e

lujvo
g_1 notices g_2 by means g_3 under condition g_4=c_1.
Cf. {ganse}, {facki}, {sanji}.

cfagau

lujvo
x_1=g_1 (person/agent) initiates/begins/starts/causes the beginning of x_2=c_1 (state/event/process).
Cf. {cfari}, {krasi}, {sisti}, {cfari'i}, {co'arbi'o}.

cfale

experimental gismu
x_1 [dimensionful number] is the (relative) phase (difference) in oscillatory system x_2 relative to zero mark x_3 under conditions/by standard x_4
Can be used for waves, pendula, track races, etc.

cfapru

lujvo
p_1 is preliminary to c_1=p_2's beginning.

cfari

gismu
-cfa-
x_1 [state/event/process] commences/initiates/starts/begins to occur; (intransitive verb).
See also {sisti}, {krasi}, {fanmo}, {co'acfa}.

cfari'i

lujvo
r_1 is/are the ritual/proceedings for starting/commencing c_1[event/state/process] by community r_2 with rules c_4.
Cf. {cfari}, {ritli}, {cfagau}.

cfasanji

lujvo
s_1 realizes s_2 under condition c_1.
Cf. {sanji}, {cfaga'e}.

cfasazri

lujvo
s_1 powers up s_2 for function s_3=c_1.

cfaselsku

lujvo
x_1 is the preamble/introduction to x_2

cfatse

lujvo
x_1 sits down on x_2.
Cf. {co'a}, {cfari}, {zutse}, {nitytse}, {tsebi'o}. Simple {zutse} refers to the act of sitting, whereas cfatse means the act of beginning to sit.

cfifa'i

lujvo
x_1 finds fault/flaw x_2 in x_3 (object/action), of which the flaw causes x_4
See {cfila}, {facki}

cfika

gismu
-fik-
-fi'a-
x_1 is a work of fiction about plot/theme/subject x_2/under convention x_2 by author x_3.
Also story, lie, untrue. See also {cukta}, {lisri}, {prosa}, {fatci}, {jitfa}, {jetnu}, {xanri}.

cfikalte

lujvo
x_1 debugs x_2
See also {samcfi}

cfila

gismu
-cfi-
x_1 (property - ka) is a flaw/fault/defect in x_2 causing x_3.
See also {cikre}, {srera}, {fenra}, {fliba}, {prane}.

cfilyfacki

lujvo
x_1 finds fault/flaw x_2 in actions x_3 causing x_4; x_1 criticizes with critics x_2 action x_3
See {cfila}, {facki}

cfine

gismu
x_1 is a wedge [shape/form/tool] of material x_2.
See also {tutci}.

cfinytci

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is a wedge (tool) of material c_2.
Cf. {cfine}, {tutci}.

cfinyvra

lujvo
v_1 is a crowbar/nutpick for doing v_2, with fulcrum v_3, arm v_4, and pointed end c_1
Any tool with a wedge on the end of a lever, normally with the fulcrum close to the wedge.

cfipu

gismu
-fi'u-
x_1 (event/state) confuses/baffles x_2 [observer] due to [confusing] property x_3 (ka).
See also {pluja}, {cfipu}, {zunti}.

cfisisku

lujvo
s_1 diagnoses/proof-reads/searches/tests/debugs for flaw/property c_1=s_2 in c_2=s_3 causing c_3

cfiste

lujvo
x_1 is a "bug-list" / list of discovered flaws in x_2
See {cfila}, {liste}, {samcfi}

ci

cmavo
-cib-
PA1
digit/number: 3 (digit) [three].

ci'ai

experimental cmavo
UI
discursive: marks an utterance as using something that is experimental/not official, especially experimental grammar
In some sense, functions as an error marker or an error quote (but without the quote).

ci'ai'u

experimental cmavo
VUhU
unary mex operator: n-set; maps a nonnegative integer 'a' to the set \{1, \dots ,a\} (the intersection of the set of all natural numbers with the closed ordered interval [1,a] such that a \geq1)
0 maps to the empty set.

ci'ajbu

lujvo
j_1 is a writing desk of material j_2, supported by legs/base/pedestal j_3, used by writer c_1.
Cf. {bijyjbu}.

ci'anti

fu'ivla
x_1 is blank/has no writing on it

cia'o'e

obsolete cmavo
VUhU
mekso 4-nary operator: spherical harmonics on colatitudinal/polar angle a and azimuthal/longitudinal angle b of unassociated order c and associated order d.
Usually denoted Y^m_l (\theta, \phi). The Condon-Shortley phase must be prepended to the definition. The normalization is chosen so that the integral over all (solid) angles of Y^m_l(\Omega) conj(Y^n_k(\Omega) = \delta(m,n) \delta(l,k).

ci'arfi'i

lujvo
f_1=c_1 writes/authors f_2=c_2 for purpose f_3 from existing elements/ideas f_4.
Cf. {cfika}, {cukta}.

ci'arse'u

lujvo
s_1=c_2 is a secretary to s_2.
Cf. {briju}, {bijyjbu}, {ci'ajbu}.

ci'asku

lujvo
cu_1=ci_1 expresses in writing cu_2=ci_2 for audience cu_3 using display/storage medium ci_3 with writing implement ci_4.
Cf. {ci'arfi'i}, {cukta}, {karni}, {notci}.

ci'asre

lujvo
x_1 commits typo/writing error x_2
From {ciska} {srera}

ci'au'u'au'i

experimental cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: pride about having just invented a new attitudinal - shame about having just invented a new attitudinal

cibdei

lujvo
x_1 is a Wednesday of week x_2 on calendar x_3.
Duration. For date, use {jednci}.

cibjgacmaci

lujvo
c_1 is trigonometry of triangle j_1.
Cf. {ci}, {jganu}, {cmaci}, {cibjgatai}.

cibjgatai

lujvo
t_1 is a triangle.
Cf. {cibjgacmaci}, {cibjgataidamri}.

cibjgataidamri

lujvo
d_1 is a triangle (musical instrument).
Cf. {cibjgatai}, {balzgibe'e}, {bikydamri}.

cibjmagutci

lujvo
g_1 is g_2 yard/yards (length unit).
Cf. {ci}, {jamfu}, {gutci}, {degygutci}, {jmagutci}, {birgutci}, {minli}.

ciblrmoru

fu'ivla
x_1 is myrrh from tree species x_2.
Cf. {ciblu}.

ciblu

gismu
-blu-
x_1 is blood/vital fluid of organism x_2.
See also {risna}, {flecu}.

cibmast

cmevla
March.
Cf. {fipma'i}, {cibmasti}.

cibmasti

lujvo
x_1 is March/the third month of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Duration. For date, use {masnci}. Cf. {pavmasti}, {nanca}.

cibmoija'a

lujvo
j_1 has the rank of Major/Lieutenant Commander/Squadron Leader (equivalent of NATO OF-3) in military unit /organization j_2.
Cf. {ci}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {vonmoija'a}, {relmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

cibmoixandegji

lujvo
xa_1=d_1 is the middle finger of hand xa_2=d_2 attached to body d_3.
See also: {xantamji}, {relmoixandegji}, {vonmoixandegji}, {mumymoixandegji}.

cibnacmei

lujvo
x_1 is a 3-dimensional vector with coordinates x_2, x_3 and x_4.
Cf. {nacmei}, {relnacmei}.

cibrfiorso

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a/the triforce/Power of the Gods/Golden Triangle consisting of magic triangles x_2.

cibyca'u

lujvo
x_1 is the volume (3-dimensional space) occupied by x_2
See {ci}, {canlu}, {cimde}, {relca'u}, {te'ai}

cibyfu'ivla

lujvo
x_1=v_1=f_1 is a stage 3 fu'ivla meaning x_2=v_2, based on word x_3=f_2 in language x_4.
'stage 3 fu'ivla' is a term specific to Lojban and described in 'The Complete Lojban Language', chapter 4, section 7. The definition is similar to that of {fu'ivla}, but with the x3 place of {fu'ivla} omitted. x1 is assumed to be a word in Lojban as the concept doesn't make much sense for other languages. See also {pavyfu'ivla} - 'stage 1 fu'ivla', {relfu'ivla} - 'stage 2 fu'ivla' and {vonfu'ivla} - 'stage 4 fu'ivla'

cibylajyterkruca

lujvo
x_1=kr_3 is a three-way intersection of roads x_2=kr_1=kl_1.

cibyplini

lujvo
p_1 is the third closest planet revolving around p_2, with planetary characteristics p_3, orbital parameters p_4.
Cf. {pavyplini}, {relplini} etc., {terdi}, {solri}, {mluni}, {lunra}, {plinycma}, {tarci'e}.

cibyseltu'e

lujvo
t_2 is three-legged with legs t_1.
Cf. {ci}, {tuple}.

cibyslakyvla

lujvo
v_1 is a three-syllable word meaning v_2 in language v_3=s_2 with syllables s_1.
Cf. {relslakyvla}, {pavyslakyvla}.

cibytu'e

lujvo
x_1 is three-legged.

cibyxilma'e

lujvo
m_1 is a tricycle (propelled, three-wheeled vehicle) carrying m_2 on surface m_3, propelled by m_4
Explicitly implies a propelled vehicle. Parallels {relxilma'e}. {cibyselxi'u} merely refers to a "device".

cicfoi

lujvo
f_1 is an uncultivated field of material f_2.
Cf. {ricfoi}, {ricyci'e}.

cicmlatu

lujvo
x_1 is a wildcat

cicna

gismu
x_1 is cyan/turquoise/greenish-blue [color adjective].
See also {skari}, {blabi}, {xekri}, {kandi}, {carmi}, {crino}, {blanu}.

cicnybla

lujvo
x_1 is sky-blue [color adjective].
Color between cyan (={cicna}) and blue (={blanu}).

cicnydei

lujvo
x_1 is Thursday of week x_2 on calendar x_3.
Synonyms: {mudydei}, {vondei}. See also {ri'odje}, {bladei}.

cicnyjme

lujvo
j_1 is a turquoise (gem/polished stone) of type j_2 from source material j_3.
See also {cicnykunra} (mineral), {cicna} (color), {jemna}.

cicnykunra

lujvo
k_1 is/contains/is made from turquoise of type k_2, mined from location/lode/mine k_3.
See also {cicnyjme} (gem), {cicna} (the color turquoise), {kunra}.

cicnyri'o

lujvo
x_1 is aqua [color adjective].
Color between green (={crino}) and cyan (={cicna}).

cicnyzilska

lujvo
x_1 is the abstract color cyan
The gismu {cicna} refers to objects which are cyan, but not the color cyan itself. This lujvo serves the latter purpose. See also {skari} {zilska}

cicplise

lujvo
x_1 is a wild apple/crab apple of species/strain/cultivar x_2
Not Malus domestica

cicpre

lujvo
c_1=p_1 is a savage/wild person.
Cf. {cicre'a}.

cicre'a

lujvo
c_1=r_1 is a savage/wild human.
Cf. {cicpre}.

cicricfoi

lujvo
f_1 is a jungle

cicycrepu

lujvo
cr_1 wildcrafts cr_2 from cr_3=ci_1.
Cf. {rarvelcange}.

cicyractu

lujvo
r_1 is a hare of species r_2.

cicyrismi

lujvo
x_1 is wild rice of species/variety x_2.
Cf. {dzizani}, {gurni}.

cicyspa

lujvo
s_1=c_1 is a weed of species s_2.
Cf. {cicyspavi'u}.

cicyspavi'u

lujvo
v_1 weeds out plants s_1=c_1 of species s_2 from v_3 with/leaving result/remnant/remainder v_4.
Cf. {cilce}, {spati}, {vimcu}, {cicfoi}, {cicyspa}, {cicyspafoi}, {cicycrepu}.

cidja

gismu
-dja-
x_1 is food/feed/nutriment for x_2; x_1 is edible/gives nutrition to x_2.
See also {citka}, {nitcu}, {pinxe}, {xagji}, {cpina}.

cidjrburito

fu'ivla
x_1 is a burrito/Mexican dish of ingredients wrapped in a tortilla including ingredients x_2.

cidjrkusku

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of couscous of ingredients including x_2

cidjrpitsa

fu'ivla
x_1 is a pizza with topping/ingredients x_2.
Cf. {cidja}, {iptsa}, {pitnanba}, {nabypalne}.

cidjrspageti

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of spaghetti (long, thin cylindrical pasta)
Synonyms: {djarspageti}, {spageti}. This word is in Jbovlaste based on its use in CLL.

cidjrsuci

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of sushi consisting of rice x_2 and ingredients x_3

cidjrsurstrmi

obsolete fu'ivla
c_1 is surströmming (fermented Baltic herring).
See also: surströmmingskiva (={sairsurstrmi}), surströmmingsklämma (={nujrsurstrmi}).

cidjrtako

fu'ivla
x_1 is a taco.

cidjrtcilekonkarne

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of chili con carne.

cidjrxametsa

fu'ivla
x_1 is chometz.
see also {fomymledi}, {nanbrmatsa}

cidni

gismu
-cid-
x_1 is a/the knee/elbow/knuckle [hinged joint, body-part] of limb x_2 of body x_3.
Metaphor: a sharp bend/curve. See also {korcu}, {jarco}, {jganu}.

cidro

gismu
-dro-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of hydrogen (H); [metaphor: light, flammable].
See also {gapci}, {xukmi}.

cidydzu

lujvo
ca_1=ci_3 crawls on surface ca_2.
Cf. {cidni}, {cadzu}, {cidydzu}, {cidykla}, {reskla}. Similar to walking but without standing on feet.

cidytse

lujvo
t_1 kneels on surface t_2 on limb c_2=x_3 of body c_3=x_4.

ci'e

cmavo
BAI
ciste modal, 1st place used in scalar negation in system/context ...

ci'erkei

lujvo
k_1 plays game k_2=c_1 governed by rules c_2 interrelating game parts (physical or conceptual) c_3.
Cf. {kelci'e}, {ciste}, {kelci}, {nunkei}, {terjvi}.

ci'erkeilai

lujvo
ke_1=kl_1 has score kl_2 in game ke_2=c_1 governed by rules c_2 interrelating game parts (physical or conceptual) c_3.
klani3 (the scale of the score) is implicit in the rules of the game.

ci'ernunbi'o

lujvo
x_1=n_1 is a revolution that a system x_2=b_1=c_1 becomes another system x_3=b_2=c_1 under conditions x_3=b_3.
{ciste} {nu} {binxo}

cifku'ita'a

lujvo
k_1=t_1 is/are using baby talk/caretaker speech/infant-directed speech (IDS)/child-directed speech (CDS)/parentese to c_1=k_2=t_2 (default: infant/baby) about subject t_3 in language t_4.

cifnu

gismu
-cif-
x_1 is an infant/baby [helpless through youth/incomplete development] of species x_2.
Also infantile. See also {makcu}, {verba}.

ciftoldi

lujvo
x_1 is a caterpillar (larva of butterfly or moth - not sawfly) of species x_2.
Cf. {toldi}, {cinki}, {sfani}.

ciftricu

lujvo

cifxrula

lujvo

cifybakni

lujvo
b_1=c_1 is/are (a) calf/calves [infant cattle/beef-producer/bovine] of species/breed b_2=c_2.
Young cattle of both sexes are called calves until they are weaned.

cifydatka

lujvo
d_1=c_1 is a duckling of species/breed d_2=c_2.
Cf. {cipni}, {gunse}, {sovda}.

cifylisri

lujvo
l_1 is a children's story about plot/subject/moral l_2 by storyteller l_3 to audience l_4.
Cf. {ranmi}, {pemci}, {crida}.

cigla

gismu
-cig-
x_1 is a/the gland [body-part] secreting x_2, of body x_3; x_2 is a secretion of x_1.
Secretion (= {selcigla}). See also {vikmi}, {xasne}.

ci'i

cmavo
PA5
digit/number: infinity; followed by digits => aleph cardinality.

ci'iroi

cmavo-compound
ROI*
tense interval modifier: occurs infinite times, eternally; objective tense; defaults as time.

ci'irpa'i

lujvo
x_1 [loves/takes great, passionate interest in] x_2
e.g. he *loves* football, I *love* Lojban. From {cinri} + {prami}. See {entuzi}

ci'izma

lujvo
c_1=z_1 is more interesting than z_2 to c_2 in amount z_4.
Cf. {ci'irme'a}.

cikagos

cmevla
name: Chicago
See {tcadu}, {mergu'e}, {gugde'usu}

ciki'o

cmavo-compound
PA*
number/quantity: 3,000 expressed with comma.

cikna

gismu
-cik-
(adjective:) x_1 is awake/alert/conscious.
See also {sanji}, {sipna}, {tatpi}.

cikre

gismu
x_1 repairs/mends/fixes x_2 for use x_3.
A repair may be incomplete, fixing only one of the possible uses of x_2, hence x_3. See also {cfila}, {spofu}.

ciksi

gismu
-cki-
x_1 (person) explains x_2 (event/state/property) to x_3 with explanation x_4 (du'u).
Explanation x_4 is an underlying mechanism/details/purpose/method for x_2 (= velcki for reordered places), generally assumed to be non-obvious; metaphorical usage with the various causal relations (i.e. jalge, mukti, krinu, rinka, nibli, zukte) is possible, but the non-obviousness, and the existence of an explainer with a point of view makes this word not a simple expression of cause. See also {cipra}, {danfu}, {jalge}, {jinvi}, {krinu}, {mukti}, {nabmi}, {preti}, {rinka}, {sidbo}, {zukte}, {tavla}.

ciksne

lujvo
s_1=c_1 daydreams about s_2; s_2 is a daydream of s_1=c_1.
Cf. {nunxumsne}.

cikybi'o

lujvo
b_1=c_1 awakens/becomes awake under conditions b_3.
Cf. {cikygau}.

cikygau

lujvo
g_1 (person/agent) wakes up c_1.
Cf. {cikybi'o}.

cikyjunla

lujvo
x_1 is an alarm clock measuring time units x_2 to precision x_3 with timing mechanism/method x_4.
{cikna}, {junla}, {jdesna}

cilce

gismu
-cic-
(adjective:) x_1 is wild/untamed.
Tame (= {tolcilce}). See also {pinfu}, {panpi}, {tarti}.

cilfu

experimental gismu
x_1 is the ISO-named script/writing system of people x_2 with ISO-name x_1, according to rule/specification x_3
See also: {jviso}, {ciska}, {lerfu}, {ciste}

lujvo
g_1 ties j_1 to j_2 with c_1.

cimcitsi

See also {sudycitsi}.

cimde

gismu

lujvo

cimdilnu

lujvo

cimdylai

lujvo
x_1 has x_2 (li) number of dimensions

cimei

cmavo-compound
MOI*
quantifier selbri: convert 3 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the trio of members x_2.

cimjirta'u

lujvo
t_1 is a wet suit for wearing by t_2=j_1=c_1 in liquid j_2=c_2.

cimjvo

lujvo
l_1 is an implicitly metaphorical lujvo with meaning l_2 and arguments l_3 built from metaphor l_4.
Used to refer to metaphorical lujvo that do not contain any -pev- rafsi (for “{pe'a}”). The word “{cimjvo}” is itself an example of cimjvo. Synonym of “cimjvo” with explicit metaphor: “{pevycimjvo}”.

cimni

gismu
x_1 is infinite/unending/eternal in property/dimension x_2, to degree x_3 (quantity)/of type x_3.
Also everlasting, eternity, (= {cimnytei}), eternal (= {cimnyteikai} or {temcimni}). See also {vitno}, {renvi}, {munje}, {fanmo}, {sisti}.

cimny'efku

lujvo
x_1 is infinitely recursively related to x_2 by applying infinite levels of recursion to predicate relation x_3 (ka with two ce'u)
{cimni} + {efku}. Cf. {ci'i}, {cimny'efku}.

cimnyselcmi

lujvo
c_2 is an infinite set with members c_1 (incomplete specification).
See also: {tolcimnyselcmi}.

cimnytei

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is an eternity.
Cf. {cedra}, {ze'e}

cimoi

cmavo-compound
MOI*
quantified selbri: convert 3 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is third among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

cimri'a

lujvo
r_1 (event/state) moistens c_1 with liquid c_2 under conditions r_3.
Cf. {djacu}, {carvi}, {litki}.

cimsna

lujvo
s_1 is a liquid consonant with place of articulation x_2 and phonation x_3.
cf. {zunsna}, {ra'isna}, {arsna}, {elsna}

cimtu'a

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is a swamp/marsh/wetland at location t_2 with liquid c_2

cinba

gismu
x_1 (agent) kisses/busses x_2 at locus x_3.
See also {ctebi}.

cincizra

lujvo
n_1=z_1=x_1 is sexually deviant/perverted in activity/state n_2=x_2 in property z_3=n_3=x_3 to person/by reference point z_2=n_4=x_4; x1 is sexually perverted
cf. {cinse}, {cizra}

cinctu

lujvo
ci_1=ct_1 teaches audience ct_2 ideas/methods/lore ct_3 (du'u) about sexual activity/state ci_2=ct_4 by method ct_5 (event).
Mentioned in CLL 1.1 §4.14.

cindrlanata

fu'ivla
x_1 is a woolly-leaved oak (Quercus lanata) of species/strain x_2.

gismu

cindynarge

lujvo
n_1 is an acorn/oak nut from tree n_2=c_1 (genera Quercus or Lithocampus) with shell n_3 and kernel n_4.

cinfo

gismu
x_1 is a lion/[lioness] of species/breed x_2.
See also {mlatu}.

cinfos

cmevla
x_1 is Leo [constellation/astrological sign].
From cinfo (=lion; lojban); leo (=lion; latin). Many civilizations over thousands of years have portrayed the constellation of Leo as a lion.

cinfycinfyjvetirxu

lujvo
c_1=t_1 is a liliger of breed/variety c_2=t_2.
The liliger is a hybrid cross between a male lion (Panthera leo) and a ligress (Panthera leo × Panthera tigris).

cinfyjvetirxu

lujvo
c_1=t_1 is is a liger of breed/variety c_2=t_2.
A liger is a hybrid cross between a male lion (Panthera leo) and a tigress (Panthera tigris).

cinfyma'i

lujvo
x_1 is August of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Cf. {bivmasti}, {kanbyma'i}, {nanca}.

cinfyta'udansu

lujvo
d_1 (individual, mass) dances lion dance to accompaniment/music/rhythm d_2 wearing lion costume t_1=c_1.

cingafpre

lujvo
p_1 is a transsexual person.
Cf. {datcinselta'u}.

cinlysko

lujvo
s_1 is a string of s_2 material.

cinlyze'a

Cf. {cinla}, {zenba}.

cinmle

lujvo
m_1=c_1 is sexy/hot/attractive to m_2 in aspect m_3 by standard m_4=c_4.

cinmo

Also mood/humor (= {nuncni}). See also cmavo list {ci'o}, {cumla}, {jilra}, {nelci}, {xendo}, {ckeji}, {cortu}, {jgira}, {kecti}, {kufra}, {manci}, {prami}, {steba}, {zungi}, {badri}, {burna}, {gleki}.

cinpa'i

lujvo
x_1 feels romantic/intimate/sexual love [eros] toward x_2

cinpampe'o

lujvo

x_1 and x_2 are symmetrical. See {cinse}, {prami}, {pendo}, {cinpa'i}

cinri

gismu
-ci'i-
x_1 (abstraction) interests/is interesting to x_2; x_2 is interested in x_1.
Use x_1 tu'a for non-specific interest in an object; interested in (= {selci'i}). See also {zdile}, {kucli}, {manci}, {kurji}.

cinse

gismu
-cin-
x_1 in activity/state x_2 exhibits sexuality/gender/sexual orientation x_3 (ka) by standard x_4.
Also: x_1 courts/flirts; x_3 could be a ka <gender or role>, ka <attraction to a gender>, or ka <type of activity>, etc.; (adjective:) x_1 is sexual/sexy; x_1 is flirted with/courted by x_2 (= {cinfriti}, {cinjikca}). See also {gletu}, {pinji}, {plibu}, {vibna}, {vlagi}.

cinta

gismu
x_1 [material] is a paint of pigment/active substance x_2, in a base of x_3.
See also {pixra}, {skari}.

cinterfradansu

lujvo
d_1=f_3 (individual, mass) dances erotic dance which sexually stimulates f_1, to accompaniment/music/rhythm d_2.

cintypu'i

lujvo
p_1 paints surface p_3 with paint p_2=c_1.
Cf. {cinta}, {punji}, {pirlarfi'i}.

cinza

gismu
x_1 is a/are tong(s)/chopsticks/pincers/tweezers/pliers [tool/body-part] for x_2 to pinch x_3.
See also {tutci}.

cinzyxadji

lujvo
x_1 is a pincer/mandible/jaw/grasping body part of x_2 which is primarily comprised of two major parts which move relative to one another via scissor actions but which otherwise has little dexterity or mobility
Uses experimental gismu: {xadji}. Possibly could refer to (especially metaphorically or whn not referencing biological body parts): tweezers, tongs, etc.

ci'o

cmavo
BAI
cinmo modal, 1st place emotionally felt by ...

ci'o'au

experimental cmavo
VUhU
mekso operator (binary): projection function; the Bth term/entry ("element") of tuple A
A must be a tuple. Let L = length(A); then L is a positive integer, 0, or infinity (countable), and A = (A_1, A_2, ..., A_L), and B must be a natural number and belong to the ordered interval [1, L]. If L = 0, the output is a placeholder "blank element"; else, if B does not satisfy the aforementioned condition, then the function is undefined. Using the aforementioned notation, and letting Proj represent the projection function, Proj(A, B) = A_B; note that B = 1 will cause the output of the first entry in the tuple, which is A_1. For any i, there is no restriction on the typing/value of A_i so long as it is defined; the type of A_i need not even match the type of A_j for i =/= j. See also: {bai'ei}, {no'au'au}, {pi'ei}. Notice that the input is a single tuple and an integer, it does not rely on anyou underlying stucture; this is markedly different from a the dot product of vectors, although by establishing a basis and an underlying field, they can look quite similar.

ci'oi

experimental cmavo
COI2
Converts following cmevla or zoi-quote into psychomime.
Narrower term than {tai'i}. See also {ci'o}, {cinmo}, {sa'ei}, {ki'ai}. Examples in some languages. jpn: そわそわ (sowasowa): restlessly. nep: सुखदुख (sukhadukha): lit. happiness-sorrow; the human condition. eng: "zing", "yoink"

ci'omle

lujvo
x_1 is cute to x_2 in aspect x_3.

cionmau

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a panda of genus/species x_2.
Cf. {latcribe}, {cribe}, {jungo}, {mabru}.

x_1 is a giant panda (Ailuropoda melanoleuca) of breed x_2.
Cf. {latcribe}, {cribe}, {jungo}, {mabru}, {ci'onme'a}

ci'onme'a

fu'ivla
x_1 is a red panda / lesser panda (Ailurus fulgens) of breed x_2.
See {ci'onmau}, {jungo}, {mabru}, {arxokuna}

x_1 checks/investigates/examines/inspects x_2 for property x_3.

cipra

gismu
-cip-
x_1 (process/event) is a test for/proof of property/state x_2 in subject x_3 (individ./set/mass).
Also examination, proxy measure, validation; (a set in x_3 must be completely specified). See also {ciksi}, {troci}, {jarco}, {pajni}, {saske}.

cipsadytcica

lujvo
x1 is a false positive/deceiver in passing test x2 which tests for x3 as a result of effort/under conditions x4; x1 is falsely found to have property x3 by test x2 under conditions x4

lujvo
p_1 is a test-paper from source p_2 for/proof of property/state c_3 in subject c_4.
Cf. {cipra}, {pelji}, {lanli}.

cipyzu'e

lujvo
x_1 tests/tries out/checks/examines x_2 for property x_3

circre

lujvo
ce_1 is an historian of the history of ci_2 according to standard ce_3.
Cf. {balcu'e}, {balkulctu}.

circtu

lujvo
ct_1 teaches history ci_1 to audience ct_2 by method ct_5 (event).
Cf. {balcu'e}.

cirko

gismu
-cri-
x_1 loses person/thing x_2 at/near x_3; x_1 loses property/feature x_2 in conditions/situation x_3.
x_2 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event (rare for cirko), or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {po'ecri}, {posyselcri} for unambiguous semantics). See also {facki}, {ralte}, {sisku}, {claxu}, {jinga}, {pleji}, {canja}, {sfasa}, {dapma}, {binra}, {mipri}.

cirla
