ciska

gismu
-ci'a-
x_1 inscribes/writes x_2 on display/storage medium x_3 with writing implement x_4; x_1 is a scribe.
Also x_3 writing surface. See also {papri}, {penbi}, {pinsi}, {tcidu}, {xatra}, {pixra}, {prina}, {finti} for 'author' or specific authorial works, {barna}, {pinka}.

ciska zei uidje

zei-lujvo
c_3=u_1 is a text field with text c_2 in user interface u_2.
May be a single-line text field or a multiple-line text field. See {pejypoici'a zei uidje}, {uidje}.

cisma

gismu
x_1 smiles/grins (facial expression).
Smile/grin at something (= {cismyfra}). See also {xajmi}, {cmila}, {frumu}.

cismyfra

lujvo
c_1=f_1 smiles at f_3 under conditions f_4.

cismytai

lujvo
x_1 is a smile (facial exression)
See {cisma}, {tarmi}, {cmila}

cisni

experimental gismu
x_1 is of size/measurement x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3

cistcika

lujvo
t_1 (hours, minutes, seconds) is the daylight saving time of state/event t_2 on day t_3 at location t_4=c_3.
Cf. {temci}.

ciste

gismu
-ci'e-
x_1 (mass) is a system interrelated by structure x_2 among components x_3 (set) displaying x_4 (ka).
x_1 (or x_3) is synergistic in x_4; also network; x_2 also relations, rules; x_3 also elements (set completely specified); x_4 systemic functions/properties. See also cmavo list {ci'e}, {cmima}, {girzu}, {gunma}, {stura}, {tadji}, {munje}, {farvi}, {ganzu}, {judri}, {julne}, {klesi}, {morna}, {tcana}.

cistrxaioliano

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is the minor key of tonic x_2 of/with type/notes x_3.
Cf. {cistrxioniano}, {zgike}.

cistrxioniano

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is the major key of tonic x_2 of/with type/notes x_3.
Cf. {cistrxaioliano}, {zgike}, {zgika'u}.

cistrxrudu

fu'ivla
x_1 (system) is a deterministic dynamic system displaying chaotic/extreme input-sensitivity in property/aspect x_2 with characteristics (parts, relations, manner, output, etc.) x_3
Some definitions of "Chaos" require that the system must be deterministic and dynamic, sensitive to initial conditions, display/develop topologically mixing (in some subset of its phase space), have dense periodic orbits.

citfe'ibakni

lujvo
b_1=f_1=c_1 is a heifer [young female bovine/cow] of species/breed b_2=f_2 by standard f_3=c_2.

citka

gismu
-cti-
x_1 eats/ingests/consumes (transitive verb) x_2.
See also {cidja}, {pinxe}, {tunlo}, {xagji}, {xaksu}, {batci}, {gusta}, {kabri}.

citkanba

lujvo
k_1 is a kid of goat species k_2.
Cf. {mabru}, {lanme}.

citmau

lujvo
z_1=c_1 is younger than z_2 by amount z_4.
Cf. {nilnalci'o}, {zatra'i}, {citme'a}, {citmle}.

citmlatu

lujvo
m1 is a young cat/kitten [feline animal] of species/breed m2; (adjective:) m1 is a young feline.

citmle

lujvo
m_1 is cute to m_2 in aspect m_3.
Cf. {citno}, {melbi}, {cinmle}, {au'u}. Synonym to {dibmle}

citnau

lujvo
n_1=c_1 is a youth/young man by standard c_2.
Cf. {citno}, {nanmu}, {bixma'u}, {xadbixma'u}, {verba}.

citno

gismu
-cit-
-ci'o-
x_1 is young/youthful [relatively short in elapsed duration] by standard x_2.
Also age (= {nilnalci'o}); (adjective:) x_1 is junior. See also {laldo}, {cnino}, {slabu}, {verba}.

citpa'i

lujvo
p_1 has a crush on/is infatuated with p_2

citrai

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is youngest among t_4.
Cf. {citmau}, {nilnalci'o}, {zatra'i}, {jbena}.

citri

gismu
-cir-
x_1 is a history of x_2 according to x_3 (person)/from point-of-view x_3.
Also historic/historical (= {cirtermo'i}, {cirvai}). See also {muzga}.

citsi

gismu
x_1 is a season/is seasonal [cyclical interval], defined by interval/property x_2, of year(s) x_3.
Also anniversary (= {citsydei}, {na'arcitsydei}), jubilee (= {mumnoncitsi}); the period of time may be short or long as indicated by x_2, and may occur every year or every nth year as indicated by x_3 (default every year); (x_2 and/or x_3 may need metaphorical restriction: {djecitsi}, {pavdeicitsi}; also equinox, solstice, time of year. See also {cedra}, {crisa}, {critu}, {dunra}, {ranji}, {temci}, {vensa}, {jbena}.

citsluni

lujvo
x_1 is a scallion/green onions/spring onions/salad onions/green shallots/onions having hollow green leaves and lacking a fully developed root bulb (genus Allium) of species/variety x_2.

citsymu'u

lujvo
x_1 migrates to x_2 from x_3 over path/route x_4 in season x_5.

citybakre'u

lujvo
r_1 is a quantity of/contains veal/bovine meat/flesh from young bovine/cattle c_2=b_1=c_1.

cityge'u

lujvo
g1 is a young dog/canine/[bitch]/puppy of species/breed g2.

citytarbi

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is an embryo ( a multicellular diploid eukaryote in its earliest stage of development) with mother t_2 and father t_3.

ci'u

cmavo
BAI
ckilu modal, 1st place on the scale ...

civla

gismu
-civ-
x_1 is a louse/flea [blood-sucking arthropod] of species/breed x_2, parasitic on x_3.
See also {cinki}, {jalra}.

civysfani

lujvo
x_1 is a louse-fly of species x_2.

cizda'u

lujvo
x_1=c_1=d_1 is a monster/freak of species x_2=d_2, monstrous/freakish in property x_4=c_3 according to x_3=c_4.
Cf. {bi'amlu}.

ci zei karsna

zei-lujvo
x_1 (sound, text) is a triphthong
See also {zunsna}.

ci zei tuple

zei-lujvo
x_1 is tripedal. x_1 has three legs.

cizra

gismu
-ciz-
x_1 is strange/weird/deviant/bizarre/odd to x_2 in property x_3 (ka).
Also alien, mysterious, deviant, queer, unusual, exotic. See also {ranxi}, {rirci}, {fange}, {banli}.

cizrkafka

fu'ivla
x_1 is Kafkaesque to x_2 in property x_3 (ka).

ckabo'o

lujvo
b_1 is a bed sheet of material b_2.

ckabrceratonia

obsolete fu'ivla
c_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of carob gum/locust bean gum (LBG)/carobin/E410 from carob tree(s) c_2 of composition including c_3.

ckabrkacia

obsolete fu'ivla
c_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of gum arabic from akacia tree(s) c_2 of composition including c_3.

ckabu

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of rubber/latex from source x_2 of composition including x_3.
See also {pruni}.

ckabu'u

lujvo
b_1 is bedcloth of material b_2.
Cf. {kicne}, {matci}, {badgai}, {sipna}.

ckabycupsri

lujvo
d_1=cl_1=ck_1 is a rubber band.
Cf. {cupsri}.

ckacivla

lujvo
x_1 is a bedbug.
Cf. {ckacinki}.

ckafi

gismu
-kaf-
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of coffee from source/bean/grain x_2.
Brew based on a seed/bean/grain; e.g. also chicory coffee, decaf, postum. See also {tcati}, brewed from a leaf, {barja}, {cakla}.

ckafika

fu'ivla
x_1 is a coffey-break/Swedish fika with x_2 (sweets, candies, cookies, cakes etc.)

ckafre'ole

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of café au lait [coffee beverage] of composition/type x_2.
Original café au lait (x2=lo {fraso}), European variants (x2=lo {ropno}), American variants (x2=lo {bemro}), New Orleans variant (x2=la {nu,orlins}). For non-cultural specific usage: coffee with hot milk (={glaladyckafi}).

ckafruiski

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of Whisky coffee of composition x_2 (including whisky/whiskey/bourbon)..
See also: liqueur coffee (={jikryckafi}), Gaelic/Highland/Irish coffee (={kotyjikryckafi}).

ckagai

lujvo
x_1 is a blanket / quilt.

ckaji

gismu
-kai-
x_1 has/is characterized by property/feature/trait/aspect/dimension x_2 (ka); x_2 is manifest in x_1.
Manifested/property/quality/trait/feature/aspect (= {selkai}). See also: cmavo list {kai}, {ka}; {tcaci}, {tcini}. Need not be a defining property (which is what "characterize" means in English).

ckajrdinti

fu'ivla
x_1 is a non-binary-gendered/hermaphrodite/intersexed (probably also can include: asexual, nongendered, indeterminately gendered) individual of species x_2 evidencing non-binary-gender trait(s) x_3 (ka); x_1 is characterized by not following or fitting into some gender-binary.
Co-equal to {fetsi} and {nakni}. See also {fetsi}, {nakni}, {remrnunmu}.

ckakla

lujvo
k_1 goes to bed from k_3.
Omit x_3 = se {klama} (destination) = {ckana} (bed)

ckaku'a

lujvo
k_1 is a bedroom in structure k_2 surrounded by partitions/walls/ceiling/floor k_3 (mass/jo'u).
Cf. {ctiku'a}.

ckali'a

lujvo
cl_1 rises/gets up/leaves bed.

ckana

gismu
-cka-
x_1 is a bed/pallet of material x_2 for holding/supporting x_3 (person/object/event).
See also {kamju}, {kicne}, {nilce}, {palta}, {cpana}, {vreta}, {jubme}, {stizu}, {matci}, {zbepi}, {palne}, {sarji}.

ckape

gismu
-cap-
x_1 is perilous/dangerous/potentially harmful to x_2 under conditions x_3.
x_1 is a danger/peril to x_2. See also te {bandu}, te {kajde}, te {marbi}, se {snura}, se {xalni}.

ckasu

gismu
-cas-
x_1 ridicules/mocks/scoffs at x_2 about x_3 (property/event) by doing activity x_4 (event).
See also {cmila}.

ckeji

gismu
-kej-
-cke-
x_1 feels ashamed/mortified/humiliated under conditions x_2 before community/audience x_3.
See also {cinmo}.

ckemono

fu'ivla
x_1 is an anthropomorphic animal of type/species x_2
Syn. {kenmono}. See {danlu}

ckenderu

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Anatolian/Asia Minor/Asian Turkey nationality/culture/geography in aspect x_2
The exact definition of what constitutes this region is rather vague and changes with time and author of use. See also: {lusto}, {alcamacrike}, {latmrbizanto}

cketake

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cetacean of species/breed x_2
Superset of {balnema}, {delfinu}. Synonym: {tcetace}.

ckiipyris

obsolete cmevla
Albania.
Cf. {ropno}, {gugde}.

ckiku

gismu
-kik-
x_1 is a key fitting/releasing/opening/unlocking lock x_2, and having relevant properties x_3.
Also x_2 fastener, mechanism; code key (= {termifckiku}, {kiktermifra}); x_3 is dependent on the type of key, but are those form properties of the key that enable it to serve the function of opening the lock - in the case of a metal key to a padlock, for example, this would be the shaft and teeth. See also {stela}.

ckilu

gismu
-ci'u-
x_1 (si'o) is a scale of units for measuring/observing/determining x_2 (state).
See also cmavo list {ci'u}, {gradu}, {merli}, {cimde}, {manri}.

ckini

gismu
-ki'i-
x_1 is related to/associated with/akin to x_2 by relationship x_3.
See also cmavo list {ki'i}, {ponse}, {srana}, {steci}, {mapti}, {sarxe}, {fange}.

ckinoje

fu'ivla
x_1 is a muskellunge of species/breed x_2

ckiptare

fu'ivla
x_1 is Albanian (Balkan) in aspect x_2.
Cf. {ckiipyris}, {ropno}.

ckire

gismu
-kir-
x_1 is grateful/thankful to/appreciative of x_2 for x_3 (event/property).
Also gratitude (= {nunckire} or {kamckire}). See also {cinmo}, {friti}, {pluka}.

ckopalku

lujvo
p_1 is a diaper (absorbent garment) of material p_2.
Cf. {cifnu}, {mikce}.

ckufi'i

lujvo
x_1=f_1=c_3 authors/creates book x_2=c_1 about/containing work x_3=c_2 for audience x_4=c_4 preserved in medium x_5=c_5 for purpose x_6=f_3 from elements/ideas/inspiration x_7=f_4.
cf. {cukta}, {finti}.

ckukajna

lujvo
k_1 is a bookshelf attached to k_2.
Cf. {cukta}, {kajna}, {sorcu}, {ckusro}.

ckuke'u

lujvo
x_1 is the x_3'rd edition of book/publication x_2 about subject/theme/story x_4 by author x_5 for audience x_6 preserved in medium x_7 .
Cf. {ckupra}.

ckule

gismu
-kul-
-cu'e-
x_1 is school/institute/academy at x_2 teaching subject(s) x_3 to audien./commun. x_4 operated by x_5.
Also college, university. See also {cilre}, {ctuca}, {tadni}.

ckuliki

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mosquito of species/breed x_2
See also {blusfani}

ckunu

gismu
-ku'u-
x_1 is a conifer/pine/fir of species/strain x_2 with cones x_3.
See also {tricu}.

ckupau

lujvo
p_1 is a chapter of book c_1=p_2.
Indices, appendices and forwards are also ckupau. Cf. {ckupaupau}.

ckupaupau

lujvo
x_1 is a part of x_2, which is a part of a book . x_1 is a part of chapter x_2
x_2 is the name of the chapter, not the book. Cf. {ckupau}.

ckupoi

lujvo
x_1=p_1 is a series of books x_2=c_1=p_3.

ckupra

lujvo
cup_1 publishes cup_2=cuk_1 by process cup_3.
Cf. {terkarni}.

ckusro

lujvo
s_1 is a library of books c_1=s_2.
Cf. {ckuzai}.

ckuzai

lujvo
z_1 is a bookshop selling books z_2=c_1, operated by z_3.
Cf. {ckusro}.

ckuzdacre

lujvo
c_1 is a librarian by standard c_3.
Cf. {ckusro}, {ckuzai}, {ckuzda}.

ckuzdaske

lujvo
s_1 is library science with methodology s_3.
Cf. {ckuzdaske}, {ckuzda}, {ckusro}, {ckuzai}.

clabajykla

lujvo
k_1=b_1 runs a marathon/long distance to destination k_2 from origin k_3 via route k_4.

clabrato'a

lujvo
x1=c1=t1 is a squeal/[long high-pitched sound] from source x2=t3

clacelxa'i

lujvo
x_1=ce_1=cl_1 is a rifle for use against x_2 by x_3, launching projectile c_2 propelled by c_3.
Cf. {clani}, {cecla}, {xarci}, {xumjimcelxa'i}, {mi'ircelxa'i}, {celgunta}.

claco'a

lujvo
co_1 is a/the anterior (zootomy)/cranial/cephalic end (anatomy)/superior end (human anatomy) of body/object cl_1; co_1 (subevent) is at the starting point of long event/time-intervall cl_1.
Metaphor: A tree grows in its long direction, with the roots as its starting point ({co'a}) and the crown as its ending point ({co'u}). Standard anatomical term to avoid ambiguity. In vertebrate usually the head, in invertebrate the end with a mouth (or equivalent structure), or the end that usually points in the direction of the organism's locomotion. See also anterior/superior absolute position ({claco'uklo}), anterior/superior relative position ({claco'umau}), posterior/inferior end ({claco'u}), anteroposterior (A-P) axis ({selcla}), ventral/anterior end ({befco'u}), dorsal/posterior end ({tolbefco'u}).

claco'u

lujvo
co_1 is a/the anterior (zootomy)/cranial/cephalic end (anatomy)/superior end (human anatomy)/fore/bow (nautical)/nose (skateboard etc), of body/object cl_1; co_1 (subevent) is at the ending point of long event/time-intervall cl_1.
Metaphor: A tree grows in its long direction, with the roots as its starting point ({co'a}) and the crown as its ending point ({co'u}). Standard anatomical term to avoid ambiguity, but not restricted to anatomical objects. In vertebrate usually the head, in invertebrate the end with a mouth (or equivalent structure), or the end that usually points in the direction of the organism's locomotion. In most animals the same as the front (={craraipau}), but in humans the same as the top (={gapraipau}). See also anterior/superior absolute position ({claco'uklo}), anterior/superior relative position ({claco'umau}), posterior/inferior end ({claco'a}), anteroposterior (A-P) axis ({selcla}), ventral/anterior end ({befco'u}), dorsal/posterior end ({tolbefco'u}/{bekpyco'u}).

claco'uklo

lujvo
co_1=d_1 is/are anterior (zootomy)/cranial/cephalic (anatomy)/superior (human anatomy) with frame-of-reference body/object cl_1=d_3.
Standard anatomical term to avoid ambiguity, but not restricted to anatomical objects. In most animals the same as the front (={craraipau}), but in humans the same as the top (={gapraipau}). See also anterior/superior end ({claco'u}), anterior/superior relative position ({claco'umau}), posterior/inferior end ({claco'a}), anteroposterior (A-P) axis ({selcla}), ventral/anterior end ({befco'u}), dorsal/posterior end ({tolbefco'u}/{bekpyco'u}).

claco'umau

lujvo
co_1=z_1 is/are anterior (zootomy)/cranial/cephalic (anatomy)/superior (human anatomy) to z_2 by margin z_4, in body/object cl_1=d_3.
Standard anatomical term to avoid ambiguity, but not restricted to anatomical objects. In most animals the same as 'in front of' (={crane}), but in humans the same as 'above' (={gapru}). See also anterior/superior absolute position ({claco'uklo}), anterior/superior relative position ({claco'umau}), posterior/inferior end ({claco'a}), anteroposterior (A-P) axis ({selcla}), ventral/anterior end ({befco'u}), dorsal/posterior end ({tolbefco'u}/{bekpyco'u}).

cladakfu

lujvo
x_1 is a long knife
This word is in Jbovlaste based on its use in CLL

cladakyxa'i

lujvo
x_1=d_1=c_1 is a sword / long knife weapon for use against x_2=d_2 by x_3 with blade of material d_3 long by standard c_3.
May be shortened to {cladaxi}. Cf. {clani}, {dakfu}, {xarci}, {baldakyxa'i}.

cladaxi

fu'ivla
x_1=d_1=c_1 is a sword / long knife weapon for use against x_2=d_2 by x_3 with blade of material x_4=d_3
zi'evla-shortening of {cladakyxa'i}. Cf. {clani}, {dakfu}, {xarci}, {baldakyxa'i}.

cladu

gismu
-lau-
x_1 is loud/noisy at observation point x_2 by standard x_3.
See also {savru}.

clagaldi'u

lujvo
d_1=g_1=c_1 is a tower for pupose d_2.
See also: {clani}, {galtu}, {dinju}.

clajbatamca

lujvo
t_1 is a grape tomato of variety/strain t_2.
See also cherry tomato (={boljbatamca}).

clakarce

lujvo
k_1=c_1 is a limousine for k_2, propelled by k_3.
Cf. {clani}, {karce}, {marce}.

clakercrida

lujvo
cr_1=k_2 is an elf [long-eared mythical humanoid] of mythos/religion cr_2
Cf. {crida} {torcrida} {brabracrida} {cmacmacrida}

clakeryractu

lujvo
x1=r1=k2 is a hare of species x2=r2

clamau

lujvo
z_1 is longer/taller than z_2 in direction c_2 by margin z_4.
Cf. {bramau}, {clame'a}.

clame'a

lujvo
m_1 is shorter than m_2 in direction c_2 by margin m_4.
Cf. {clamau}.

clanebda'u

lujvo
d_1=cl_1=cn_2 is a giraffe of species/variety d_2.
Cf. {clani}, {cnebo}, {danlu}, {mabru}, {friko}.

clani

gismu
-cla-
x_1 is long in dimension/direction x_2 (default longest dimension) by measurement standard x_3.
See also {slabu}, {condi}, {ganra}, {rotsu}, {tordu}, {barda}, {ganra}, {gutci}, {minli}, {rotsu}.

clapezli

lujvo
p_1 is a leaf of p_2, long by standard c_3.

clapre

lujvo
p_1 is a tall person, by measurement standard c_3.
Cf. {claselxadni}, {torpre}, {brabracrida}.

claselxadni

lujvo
xa_2=c_1 is tall in stature by measurement standard c_3.
Cf. {clani}, {xadni}, {clapre}, {brabracrida}. Refers specifically to a body.

clasluni

lujvo
s_1 is a (garden) leek (Allium porrum/Allium ampeloprasum) of variety/strain s_2.

clatei

lujvo
t_1 is a long time/duration/interval/period/elapsed time from time/event t_2 to time/event t_3.
Cf. {tortei}, {cedra}.

clatre

lujvo
x_1=m_1=c_1 measures x_2=m_2 meters in its longest direction x_3=m_3=c_2 by measurement standard x_4=m_4.
x1 {clani} is not asserted, which is why clani3 is absent. Cf. {gantre}, {tsutre}.

clavaxsku

lujvo
x1=v1=c1 sighs x2=c2 (text) to x3=c3

claxu

gismu
-cau-
x_1 is without/lacking/free of/lacks x_2; x_1 is x_2-less.
See also cmavo list {cau}, {cirko}, {kunti}, {nitcu}, {pindi}, {banzu}.

clazme

lujvo
g_1 is a cucumber of cultivar g_2.
Cf. {clani}, {guzme}, {tityzme}, {guzmrkukurbita}.

cletckajiko

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mathematical set/structure/space/object (use appropriate gadri) such that its (set-/structure-/space-/object-theoretic) complement (in space x_3) has property x_2 (ka) in space x_3
Can express notions of "cocountability", "cofiniteness", "comeagreness", etc. Do not use for "covector", "cosine", "coordinate", etc.- the prefix "co-" has several meanings in mathematical jargon.

cletu

experimental gismu
x_1 is a mathematical set, containing members x_2
Syn. {setmima}. See {cmima}, {girzu}, {gunma}, {lu'i}, {ce}

clevalua

obsolete fu'ivla
x1 pertains to Levallois (Mousterian) technological industry/culture/know-how of period and location (specifics) x2 in properties x3; x1 exhibits Levallois (Mousterian) craft/technique/practice

clika

gismu
x_1 is a moss/lichen of species/strain x_2 growing on x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is mossy.
See also {mledi}.

clinei

lujvo
x_1=n_1=c_1 likes learning about x_2=n_2=c_3 from source x_3=c_4 by method x_4=c_5
Made from {cilre} and {nelci}.

clinoi

lujvo
n_1=c_4 is an instructional message about n_2=c_3 with contents c_2 intended for audience n_4=c_1.

clinu

experimental gismu
x_1 is grue, associated with time x_2.
Grue and bleen are predicates coined by Nelson Goodman in /Fact, Fiction, and Forecast/ to illustrate "the new riddle of induction". These predicates are unusual because their application to things is time dependent. See also: {brano}

clira

gismu
-lir-
x_1 (event) is early by standard x_2.
See also {lerci}.

clite

gismu
-lit-
x_1 is polite/courteous/civil in matter x_2 according to standard/custom x_3.
Also formal, ritual. See also {ritli}.

cliva

gismu
-liv-
-li'a-
x_1 leaves/goes away/departs/parts/separates from x_2 via route x_3.
Also: x_1 leaves behind/takes leave of x_2. See also {litru}, {canci}, {vimcu}, {lebna}, {muvdu}.

clugau

lujvo
g_1 (agent) fills c_1 with c_2.
Cf. {culno}, {gasnu}, {tisna}.

clupa

gismu
-cup-
x_1 is a loop/circuit of x_2 [material].
Also noose (= {skoclupa}, {saljgeclupa}; there is no indication of shape, but merely that the ends join/meet); closed curve defined by set of points (= {cuptai}). See also {djine}.

cmabatci

lujvo
b_1 nibbles b_2 at locus b_3 with b_4.
Cf. {cmalu}, {batci}.

cmabesna

lujvo
b_1 is a/the cerebellum [body-part] of b_2.

cmabi'o

lujvo
b_1=c_1 decreases in size/becomes small to b_2 under conditions b_3.
Cf. {cmalu}, {binxo}, {cmaze'a}, {brabi'o}.

cmacai

lujvo
ca_1=cm_1 is tiny/miniature/diminutive/very small in property ca_2=cm_2 to observer ca_3=cm_3.
Cf. {cmalu}, {carmi}, {cmacma}, {ruble}, {toltce}; antonym: {caibra}.

cmacelxa'i

lujvo
xa_1=ce_1 is a small arm/gun for use against xa_2 by xa_3, launching small projectile ce_2=cm_1, defined as small arms by standard cm_3, projectile propelled by ce_3.
The description is usually limited to revolvers, pistols, carbines, rifles, shotguns, submachine guns, assault rifles, sniper rifles etc. In the United States any firearm having a bore diameter of .50 caliber or less is normally considered a "small arm."

cmaci

gismu
x_1 is a mathematics of type/describing x_2.
See also {mekso}.

cmacistura

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mathematical structure defined on underlying structure/set/parts x_2 with properties/rules x_3 in mathematics x_4
Includes algebraic structures such as magmas, etc.

cmacku

lujvo
cu_1 is a booklet/brochure about cu_2, written by cu_3 for intended audience cu_4 in medium cu_5=cm_1.
Cf. {cukta}, {papri}, {karni}.

cmacma

lujvo
c_1 is tiny/miniature/diminutive/very small in property c_2 with criterion c_3.
Cf. {cmalu}, {cmalu}, {cmacai}, {ruble}, {toltce}; antonyms: {brabra}, {tcebra}.

cmacmacrida

lujvo
cr_1 is a fairy [tiny mythical humanoid] of mythos/religion cr_2
Cf. {crida} {torcrida} {brabracrida} {clakercrida}

cmacnrekursi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a recursive function with arguments x_2

cmactatci

lujvo
t_1 is a microscope used by t_2=ca_1 for looking at small things t_2=ca_2=cm_1 which are small in property/dimension(s) cm_2 (ka) as compared with standard/norm cm_3.
Cf. {cmalu}, {catlu}, {tutci}, {le'otci}, {darvistci}.

cmafi'a

lujvo
f1=c1 is a short story about plot/theme/subject c_2 by author c_3.
Cf. {cmalu}, {cfika}, {lisri}, {cukta}, {brafi'a}.

cmagdaleini

fu'ivla
x1 pertains to Magdalenian/L'âge du renne technological industry/culture/know-how of period and location (specifics) x2 in properties x3

cmagnitude

fu'ivla
x_1 is emitted/reflected light that measures to be x_2 magnitudes in luminous brightness, on scale (si'o)/using reference value/under system/according to definition x_3, in logarithmic base x_4 (default: decimal (10))
Wavelength is specified in x1; it is improper to submit an object as the sumti for x1. The type of magnitude (absolute, apparent, etc.) must be specified by tanru or lujvo. x2 must be a pure number (dimensionless). The system/scale being used (x3) must specify the reference emission and its reference value/magnitude (for example: the brightness of Vega measures to be 0 magnitudes in all wavelengths), the unit (the meaning of a change by 1 magnitude), and the direction of increasing brightness (traditionally: lesser magnitudes represent increased brightness); note that magnitude is defined for all real numbers. See also: {gu'irnilcarmrmagnitu}.

cmaiueiorze'aiuei

fu'ivla
x_1 must go to x_2 from x_3 via x_4 (default: speaker)'s way or highway x_5

cmajamblo

lujvo
b_1=c_1 is a destroyer of type/carrying b_2, propelled by b_3.
Cf. {cmalu}, {jamna}, {bloti}, {ni'ablo}, {brabrajamblo}, {brajamblo}, {badjamblo}, {vijblo}.

cmajdikygau

lujvo
g_1 causes j_1=c_1 to decrease in the smallness of property/dimension c_2 (ka) by amount j_3.
Cf. {cmalu}, {jdika}, {gasnu}, {brazengau}.

cmalu

gismu
-cma-
x_1 is small in property/dimension(s) x_2 (ka) as compared with standard/norm x_3.
See also {caxno}, {cinla}, {jarki}, {tordu}, {barda}.

cmama'a

lujvo
cman_1=cman_1is a hill in terrain cman_2, small by standard cmal_3.
Cf. {derxi}, {cmatcema'a}, {mantyzda}.

cmamalsi

lujvo
c_1=m_1 is a chapel of religion m_2 at location m_3.

cmamau

lujvo
z_1 is smaller than z_2 in dimension c_2 by margin z_4.
Cf. {cmalu}, {zmadu}, {brame'a}, {cmarai}, {mecycmarai}, {cmame'a}.

cmame'a

lujvo
m_1 is bigger/[less small] than m_2 in dimension c_2 by margin m_4.
Cf. {cmalu}, {mleca}, {bramau}, {cmarai}, {cmamau}, {mecycmarai}.

cmamuclai

lujvo
k_1 is measured as k_2=s_1=c_1 (quantifier) teaspoon(s).

cmamudyspi

lujvo
s_1=m_1=c_1 is a woodchip/splinter of wood type m_2, small as compared with standard/norm c_3.
Cf. {tricu}, {mudypu'o}.

cmana

gismu

x_1 is a mountain/hill/mound/[rise]/[peak]/[summit]/[highlands] projecting from land mass x_2.
See also {punli}, {derxi}.

x_1 is a Mandarin orange/tangerine/Citrus reticulata of species/variety/cultivar x_2

lujvo

cmapezyzgu

lujvo
r_1 is a small-leafed/Baja rose (Rosa minutifolia) of species/strain r_2.

cmaplini

lujvo
p_1 is an asteroid revolving around p_2 with planetary characteristics p_3, orbital parameters p_4.
Cf. {solri}, {terdi}, {lunra}, {mluni}, {bisycmaplini}, {rokcmaplini}, {plinycma}, {jdikyplini}.

cmarai

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is the smallest among set/range t_4 in property/dimension c_2 (ka).
Cf. {cmalu}, {traji}, {cmamau}, {mecycmarai}, {cmame'a}, {mecybrarai}.

lujvo

Cf. {cmalu}, {rirxe}.

lujvo
c_1=r_1 is a small rock of type r_2 from location r_3, small by standard c_3. c_1 is gravel.
Cf. {derxi}, {canre}.

cmastani

lujvo
c_1=s_1 is a/the sprout/shoot of plant/species s_2 by standard/norm c_3.
Cf. {stani}, {cmalu}, {stanycma}.

cmata'orskami

lujvo
s1 is a small tablet computer for purpose s2; s1 is a smartphone.

lujvo
x_1 is a village in administrative area x_3 serving hinterland x_4 small by standard x_5.

lujvo
x1=c1=m1 is tiny in property\dimension x2=c2 by standard x3=c3

lujvo
x_1 is a dwarf live oak (Quercus minima) of species/strain x_2.

cmatu'a

lujvo
x1=c1=t1 is a patch of land at x2=t2

cmavnra'o

fu'ivla
x_1 is the selma'o "RAhO".

cmavnroi

fu'ivla
x_1 is the selma'o "ROI".

cmavo

gismu
-ma'o-
x_1 is a structure word of grammatical class x_2, with meaning/function x_3 in usage (language) x_4.
x_4 may be a specific usage (with an embedded language place) or a massified language description; x_3 and x_4 may be merely an example of cmavo usage or refer to an actual expression; cmavo list, if physical object (= (loi) {ma'oste}); referring to the mental construct (e.g. propose adding a new cmavo to the cmavo list = {ma'orpoi}, {ma'orselcmi}, {ma'orselste}). See also {gismu}, {lujvo}, {gerna}, {smuni}, {valsi}.
