efmere

fu'ivla
x_1 is ephemeric, lasting for a short period of time x_2; x_1 is ephemeral, temporary, transitory, fleeting, evanescent, momentary, short-lived, short, volatile
See {zasni}

egna

fu'ivla
x_1 gnaws on x_2
See {batci}

egnome

fu'ivla
x_1 is a gnome of type x_2

egzema

fu'ivla
x_1 is eczema, suffered by x_2, caused by disease/condition x_3
Place structure based on {selbi'a}. See {pruri}, {rakcro}, {srebadbi'a}

ei

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: obligation - freedom.
See also {bilga}, {zifre}.

e'i

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: feeling constraint - independence - challenge/resistance against constraint.
See also {selri'u}, {seljimte}.

e'icu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: feeling constraint - independence - challenge/resistance against constraint.

ei'e

experimental cmavo
UI1
irrealis attitudinal: competence (ja'ai) - incompetence (nai)
Meaning identical to the old meaning of {e'e}

ei'i

experimental cmavo
UI1
irrealis attitudinal: constraint (ja'ai) - independence (cu'i) - resistance against constraint (nai)
Meaning identical to the old meaning of {e'i}

eilga

fu'ivla
x_1 (du'u/nu) should (moral obligation) be true/happen by standard x_2
Brivla form of {ei}: "ei broda" = "lo su'u broda cu eilga". Merges {bilga}_1 and {bilga}_2. See {einvi}, {zgadi}, {sarcu}

einai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: obligation - freedom.

e'inai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: feeling constraint - independence - challenge/resistance against constraint.

e'inde

fu'ivla
x_1 instructs/indicates to x_2 to do/be x_3
See also .{e'i}

einvi

fu'ivla
x_1 (agent) thinks x_2 (du'u/nu) should (moral obligation) be true/happen about subject/issue x_3 on grounds x_4
See {ei}, {jinvi}, {bilga}, {bigji'i}, {zgadi}

eiste

fu'ivla
x_1=l_1 is a to-do-list for x_2; x_1=l_1 is a list of things that x_2 needs/is obligated to do
From {ei} and {liste}. Compare {nitcu}, {bilga}, {zukte}, {aiste}

ekra

fu'ivla
x_1 is the informational viewing area of output device x_2

eksklave

fu'ivla
x_1 is an exclave of x_2
See {enklave}, {jecta} {tutra}

ekspekte

fu'ivla
x_1 expects x_2 (property of x3) from x_3
See also {djuno}, {jinvi}. Desire isn't implied

eksplicite

fu'ivla
x_1 is explicit, directly expressed, apparent, readily observable, leaving nothing implied

eksporte

fu'ivla
x_1 (entity) exports x_2 (entity) to x_3 (entity)
See also {importe}

eldicka'u

fu'ivla
x_1 is measures equal to/is an elementary negative electric charge [-e; negative of the charge of the proton, id est the charge of the electron] in electric charge, under signum convention x_2 (default: proton has positive charge)
The number is negative. Approximately equal to: -1.602176565(35)×10^{−19} coulombs. Attention: the standard English unit is positive (opposite of this Lojbanic version). See also {ocnerta}, {dikca}, {kuardicka'u}

elei'anor

cmevla
Eleanor, Eléanor, Éléonore, Aliénor (as of Aquitane)
At least one possible transliteration of the name above. Capitalization/stress may be variable.

elfe

fu'ivla
x_1 is an elf of type x_2

elkoptero

fu'ivla
x_1 is a helicopter

elsa'a

fu'ivla
x_1 is a song with music/melody x_2 and lyrics x_3
See {selsa'a}, {sanga}, {sagzgi}, {sagypemci}

elsna

fu'ivla
x_1 is a lateral (phonetic) sound
See {zunsna}, {ra'isna}, {cimsna}, {arsna}

Elynor

cmevla
Eleanor (such as Roosevelt)

emna

fu'ivla
x_1 (n-ary property) is applied to sumti x_2, x_3, ...
Can have infinite places (specifically n+1, if x_1 is an n-ary property). {brivla} parallel of {me'au}.

empati

fu'ivla
x_1 empathizes with x_2 in feeling x_3; x_1 has empathy

empidonaksi

fu'ivla
x_1 is an empid (bird of genus Empidonax) of species/variety/breed x_2

enai

cmavo-compound
A*
logical connective: sumti afterthought x but not y.

encere

fu'ivla
x_1 is a hippopotamus (Hippopotamus amphibius), hippo of variety x_2
See also {xanto}, {friko}

enfasnu

fu'ivla
x_1 happens in universe-of-discourse x_2
Proposed alternate definition of {fasnu}. See {munje}, {enzasti}, {li'i'e}. x_2 can be {lo} {fatci}, or a system, real or imagined, including a "story universe".

enfoka

fu'ivla
x_1 is in the focus of x_2; x_1 is the point where x_2 focuses, converges

enge

fu'ivla
x_1 is an architect/designer/engineer of x_2
See also {zbaske}, {skezu'e}

engranaje

fu'ivla
x_1 is a gear, gear wheel (toothed)
See {vraga}, {pulni}, {cabra}

enklave

fu'ivla
x_1 is an enclave of x_2
See {eksklave}, {jecta} {tutra}

enkopula

fu'ivla
x_1 is a copula, a verb-like word linking x_2 (ordered group)
In x_2 the first element is usually the subject of a clause, the second is a a subject complement or an adverbial that is united or associated with the subject.

enri

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 henry/henries of inductance (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {klanrxenri}, {klanrvolta}, {xampo}.

enriio

fu'ivla
x_1 has enryo (Japanese term) in actions x_2; x_1 acts egoistically to retain their own freedom, prevent their own embarassment and at the same time acts altruistically by avoiding social involvement without hurting others; x_1 socially restrains themselves under the pressure of group solidarity and conformity in order not to hurt other's feelings; x_1 is polite
See also {clite}, {tarti}, {jikca}, {cnikansa}, {dai}, {sevzi}, {zukte}

enromane

fu'ivla
x_1 is a letter written in roman, upright font
See also {kursive}, {enserife}

ensaio

fu'ivla
x_1 is an essay (literary composition) about x_2
See also {cukta}, {larseku}, {papri}

enserife

fu'ivla
x_1 is a letter having serifs x_2
Serif is a short line added to the top or bottom of letter. See also {sanserife}, {kursive}

ensiklopedi

fu'ivla
x_1 is an encyclopaedia with content x_2
See also {cukta}, {datni}, {saske}, {vricyjuncku}

entauru

fu'ivla
x_1 is a taur of type/species/mythology x_2
A generalized centaur. Typically, both halves are of the same animal and furred, but retains the shape of a centaur. See {kentauru}, {ckemono}

ente'atro

fu'ivla
x_1 is a theater showing plays x_2
See also {draci}

ente'ori

fu'ivla
x_1 (proposition) is a theory of x_2 (proposition); x_1 (proposition) is a system of explanations of structure, basic principles or behavior of x_2 (proposition)
See also {ciksi}, {ciste}

entropi

fu'ivla
x_1 (amount) is the entropy of system x_2 under conditions x_3
Any type of entropy is allowed, not just Boltzmann entropy; Boltzmann entropy should be named as such. x2 must be a system in the physical sense. See also: {boltsemaku}, {ciste}, {kalte}, {cunso}, {zildatni}.

entuzi

fu'ivla
x_1 is enthusiastic, excited about x_2 (event / property of x_1)
See also {gleki}, {cinmo}, {zdile}, {cmila}, {cisma}, {xanka} or {carmi} {akti} for the meaning 'excited (in high energy state)'

enzasti

fu'ivla
x_1 exists/is real in universe-of-discourse x_2
Proposed alternate definition of {zasti}. See {munje}, {enfasnu}, {li'i'e}. x_2 can be {lo} {fatci}, or a system, real or imagined, including a "story universe"; thus, e.g. unicorns (probably) don't exist with x_2={lo} {fatci}, but they'd exist in the stories where they exist.

enzebra

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mountain zebra (Equus zebra).
See also {xirma}. Syn. {xirnzebra}.

enzima

fu'ivla
x_1 in an enzyme that catalyzes chemical reactions x_2.
Cf. {selfusra}, {sutri'a}.

e'o

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: request - negative request.
See also {cpedu}, {pikci}.

e'onai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: request - negative request.

e'onde

fu'ivla
x_1 asks/requests x_2 to do/be x_3
See also .{e'o}, {cpedu}

eptula

fu'ivla
x_1 is a birch of species x_2

eris

cmevla
Eris
Cf. {jdikyplini}.

ermenefti

fu'ivla
x_1 does hermeneutics/exegesis analysis of x_2 (text); x_1 interprets x_2 as a given wisdom; x_1 is an exegete
See {lanli}, {lijda}

ermine

fu'ivla
x_1 is a stoat/ermine of subspecies x_2.
Cf. {mustlei}, {mabrnfuru}.

ernace

fu'ivla
x_1 is a hedgehog of species x_2.
see also {jesymabru}

erpi

fu'ivla
x_1 (abstraction) is the purpose of x_2 (object or event)
See {terpli}, {terzu'e}, {terfi'i}. Syn. {kosmu}. Note that this is not a mere short-form; this word is agent-less. (≈ te pilno be fi zi'o)

ersokso

fu'ivla
x_1 is a pike of species/breed x_2

ertso

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 hertz of frequency (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {klanrxertsi}.

erve

fu'ivla
x_1 buys x_2 from x_3 for price x_4
Short form of {terve'u}.

eskorta

fu'ivla
x_1 is an escort/bodyguard/chaperon of x_2

eskua

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 squats/bends deeply at the knees while resting on their feet

espelta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a spelt (a kind of wheat) of variety x_2

esperanton

cmevla
Esperanto
Cf. {spranto}, {bangepu'o}.

esperma

fu'ivla
x_1 is semen/sperm fluid/generative substance of male animal x_2
See {tsiselcigla}, {nakso'a}, {sovda}, {caksova}

esporte

fu'ivla
x_1 is a type of sports practiced by x_2; x_1 is related to sports; x_2 is a sportsman/sportswoman
For types of sports use {le'a}. See also {zajba}, {xadykelci'e}.

estorni

fu'ivla
x_1 is a starling/Sturnidae of species x_2.
See {cipni}

estraix

cmevla
Austria

estre

fu'ivla
x_1 is an ester derived from acid x_2 and alcohol x_3
c.f. {xumsle},{slami}, {xalka}.

estrema

fu'ivla
x_1 is x_2 dunams in area by standard x_3
1000 m², except for the Iraqi dunam and the former Turkish dönüm.

etkinu

fu'ivla
x_1 is/are Echinus/sea urchin of species x_2

etmoi

fu'ivla
x_1 is the value (sumti-object) associated with x_2 (label or description), from compound object x_3, in interpretation rules/system x_4
Generalization of {moi}. May be used as the brivla form of {moi}, but also may be used to extract values from compound objects, such as dates, addresses, sequences, or even passages of text. See {pormoi}, {momkai}

etxani

fu'ivla
x_1 is some ethane
See {metxani}, {gapci}

etxanoli

fu'ivla
x_1 is some ethanol, the common beverage alcohol
See {jikru}

e'u

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: suggestion - abandon suggest - warning.
See also {stidi}, {kajde}.

e'ucu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: suggestion - abandon suggest - warning.

e'unai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: suggestion - abandon suggest - warning.

e'unde

fu'ivla
x_1 suggests/advices x_2 to do/be x_3
See also .{e'u}, {stidi}

e'urfausiace'a

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is (a/some) krill [member of malacostracan crustacean order: Euphausiacea] of subtaxon/type/genus/species/variety/breed x_2
See also: {krilami}, {krilui}.

e'y

experimental cmavo
BY
letteral for e.
Synonymous with the original CLL definition of .{ebu}.

fa

cmavo
FA
sumti place tag: tag 1st sumti place.

fa'a

cmavo
FAhA4
location tense relation/direction; arriving at/directly towards ...

fa'ai

experimental cmavo
VUhU
mathematical ordered n-ary operator: (pointwise) functional left composition; °
Inputs must be appropriate functions; outputs a function; follow by {boi} in order to include arguments (producing a number). a_1 ° a_2 °…° a_n = a_1(a_2(…(a_n(•))…)). Replaces all of the inputs with a (possibly stripped, as appropriate) tuple; for replacing a single argument in a multivariate function with a function (either evaluated or not), use (partial) (e)valuation.

fa'au

experimental cmavo
VUhU
mathematical unary operator: map notation
Input is unary: a function f; the output is an ordered tuple: (the domain set of f, the codomain set of f, the image of f, the mapping rule of f (defined with a dummy variable which is taken to belong to the the domain set of f), the graph/plot (set of input-output pairs) of f). Might be useful for lambda calculus, etc. Equip the output with {ma'o} in order to use as a/the function. Extract a term in the tuple in order to use it directly.

facfau

lujvo
x_1 (nu) really happens / actually happens
See {fatci}, {fasnu}, {enfasnu}, {facmu'e}, {cazyfau}

facki

gismu
-fak-
-fa'i-
x_1 discovers/finds out x_2 (du'u) about subject/object x_3; x_1 finds (fi) x_3 (object).
See also {cirko}, {djuno}, {jijnu}, {smadi}, {sisku}.

facmu'e

lujvo
x_1 is reality / "the real world" ("this" world, the world the speaker and [presumably] listener reside in), containing/defining x_2 (objects and facts) defined by rules x_3
See {fatci} (= {jetnu} lo facmu'e), {facyza'i}, {facfau}, {munje}, {mu'ai}

facnarkri

lujvo
x_1 is delusional, suffering from delusions; x_1 has a false belief x_2 (du'u) that confrontas with actual facts
See {fatci} {na} {krici}, {fasnu}

facycku

lujvo
x_1 is a factbook, containing work x_2 by author x_3 for audience x_4 preserved in medium x_5
Use of this word does not assert anything about the veracity/factuality of the work (one may have a "factbook" about a fictional country, for example). See {fatci}, {cukta}, {ensiklopedi}

facyza'i

lujvo
x_1 is real / really exists in this universe
See {zasti}, {enzasti}, {facmu'e}, {fatci}

fadni

gismu
-fad-
x_1 [member] is ordinary/common/typical/usual in property x_2 (ka) among members of x_3 (set).
Also: x_2 is a normal/common/ordinary/typical property among set x_3 (= selterfadni for reordered places); also regular, (mabla forms:) banal, trite, vulgar; (x_3 is complete set). See also {cafne}, {rirci}, {kampu}, {lakne}, {tcaci}, {cnano}.

fadyku'u

lujvo
x_1 is a pine (genus Pinus) of species/strain x_2 with cones x_3.
See also {ku'urpinu}

fa'e

cmavo
BAI
fatne modal, 1st place backwards; reverse of ...

fa'ergau

lujvo
g_1 inverts/reverses/turns over f_1 into f_3.
Cf. {fatne}, {gasnu}.

fagdei

lujvo
x_1 is Tuesday of week x_2 on calendar x_3.

fagjesyspa

lujvo
x_1 is firethorn of species/variety x_2.

fagju'e

lujvo
j_1 is a fender/firescreen for a fireplace using fuel f_2 burning-in/reacting-with oxidizer f_3.
Cf. {fagri}, {julne}.

fagma'a

lujvo
f_1=c_1 is a volcano projecting from land mass c_2.
Cf. {je'erma'a}.

fagmakfa

lujvo
x_1=m_1 is fire magic as observed by x_2=m_2, performed by person/force/deity x_3=m_3.
cf. {fagri} {makfa}

fagri

gismu
-fag-
x_1 is a fire/flame in fuel x_2 burning-in/reacting-with oxidizer x_3 (default air/oxygen).
See also {jelca}, {sacki}.

fagri'a

lujvo
r_1 kindles f_2 in atmosphere f_3 under conditions r_3

fagycelxa'i

lujvo
xa_1 is a flamethrower for use against xa_2 by xa_3.

fagycfatci

lujvo
x_1 is a tool for starting fire x_2. x_1 is a lighter such as for cigarettes.
Cf. {sacki}.

fagycpi

lujvo
c_1 is a flamingo of species c_2.
Cf. {fagri}, {cipni}.

fagyfespalne

lujvo
p_1 is an ash tray with contents p_2, made from material p_3.
Cf. {fagyfesti}, {palne}.

fagyfesti

lujvo
x_1=fe_1 is the ashes of x_3=fa_2, combusted by fire x_2=fa_1.
Cf. {fagyfesyska}.

fagyfesyska

lujvo
s_1 is/appears to be of ash color/hue as perceived/seen by x_2=s_3 under conditions x_3=s_4.
Cf. {fagyfesti}.

fagyka'u

lujvo
k_1 is a spark of fire x_2=f_1.

fagystigau

lujvo
g_1 extinguishes/puts out fire x_2=s_1=f_1.
Cf. {fagysti}.

fagytabno

lujvo
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of charcoal from source x_2

fagytergu'i

lujvo
x_1=g_3 is a torch illuminating g_2 with fuel x_3=f_2 reacting with oxydizer x_4=f_3 (default air/oxygen).
Cf. {dictergu'i}, {laktergu'i}.

fagzda

lujvo
z_1 is a fireplace/hearth for fuel f_2 burning in/reacting with oxidizer f_3 (default air/oxygen).
Cf. {fagri}, {zdani}, {toknu}.

fai

cmavo
FA
sumti place tag: tag a sumti moved out of numbered place structure; used in modal conversions.

fa'i

cmavo
VUhU2
unary mathematical operator: reciprocal; multiplicative inverse; [1/a].

fai'a

experimental cmavo
UI
translation marker - original/native version: marks a construct as having been translated and therefore particularly (possibly, but not necessarily) susceptible to the errors or limitations associated with translation (especially if the translator is unsure of the best result/option)
Might be useful for translations of idioms, songs, poetry, wordplay, political speeches, nuanced phrasings, (in stories) prophecies, riddles, rhymes, etc. Followed by members of selma'o CAI, the marker indicates the corresponding level of uncertainty in the best possible choice of translation according to the opinion/expectation/judgment of the speaker/translator. Also may indicate a cultural or linguistic gap. For Lojban especially, it might be useful when various ambiguities arise in the original text and the translator is forced to pick interpretations from among them.

faidon

cmevla
Fido.

fai'e'ai

experimental cmavo
digit/number: the second Feigenbaum constant α = 2.502907875095892822283902873218...
See also: {fai'e'au}

fai'e'au

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: first Feigenbaum constant δ = 4.669 201 609 102 990 671 853 203 821 578(...).
See also: {fai'e'ai}

fairbei

lujvo
b_1 distributes b_2 to b_3 from b_4 over path b_5. b_1 is a distributor.
Cf. {benji}, {mrilu}, {xatra}, {tcana}.

faircu'u

lujvo
c_1 is/are a/the function/activities involving persons c_2 distributing f_1 among/to f_2; c_1 is distribution
C.f. {fatri}, {cuntu}, {selvensro}, {terzbasro}, {vencu'u}, {zbacu'u}, {dintrocu'u}, {dinveicu'u}. In a company, this may be referred to as logistics or channel management.

fairgau

lujvo
x_1 = g_1 [person/agent] distributes/allots/allocates/shares x_2 =f_1 among x_3 = f_2 with shares/portions x_4 =f_3.
Cf. {fatri}, {gasnu}.

fa'irgau

lujvo
g_1 reveals to f_1 f_2 (du'u) about subject/object f_3
from {facki} {gasnu} c.f. {jarco}

fairpaltrusi'o

lujvo
s_1 is a socialist ideology as applied by t_1 in/among people/territory/domain t_2=f_2 based on the works of thinker s_3
From {fatri}, {prali}, {turni}, {sidbo}. Cf. {sivypo'eci'e}, {ka'irtrusi'o}, {dzejdasratrusi'o}, {vricykricrutrusi'o}, {guntrusi'o}, {natpamtrusi'o}, {tsarainaitrusi'o}.

fairprali

lujvo
p_1=f1 is/are the profit/dividends shared/distributed from the earnings of company/corporation/firm p_2 among f_2 with shares/portions f_3.
Cf. {fatri}, {prali}, {ra'erprali}, {posyselfai}, {dejyterze'a}.

fai'u

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: phi, the "golden ratio" (approx. = 1.6180...); the ratio a/b such that it equals (a+b)/a

fai'u'a

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: the fine-structure constant α ≈ 7.2973525698(…)*10^{-3} ≈ 1/137.035999074

fakli'u

lujvo
x_1=l_1=f_1 explores fact x_3=f_2 about x_2=l_2=f_3 using instrument x_4=l_3

falbu'u

lujvo
b_1 is a parachute of type/material b_2.
Cf. {bukfa'u}, {bukyvoi}, {vofli}, {santa}.

falcru

lujvo
c_1 (agent) drops f_1 to f_2 from f_3.

falgau

lujvo
g_1 makes f_1 fall.
Cf. {farlu}, {gasnu}, {cirko}, {renro}

falkoni

fu'ivla
x_1 is a falcon (genus 'falco').
see {cipnrfalko}

falni'ajirkla

lujvo
k_1=j_1=c_1=f_1 drift dives to destination k_2=f_2 from origin k_3=f_3 in drifting frame of reference f_4, via route k_4 using means/vehicle k_5 in liquid j_2 beneath/under/down from c_2 (object/water surface) in downward frame of reference c_3.

falnu

gismu
-fan-
x_1 is a sail for gathering propelling material x_2 on vehicle/motor x_3.
Waterwheel (= {jacfanxi'u}). See also {bloti}.

falplini

lujvo
f_1=p_1 is a meteor which falls to planet p_2 from area/planet f_3 with composition p_3

falrenai

fu'ivla
x_1 is measured as x_2 (number) on the Fahrenheit scale
See {kelvrfarenxaito}, {kelvo}, {jacke'o}, {glare}, {lenku}.

falri'a

lujvo
r_1 (event/state) is the cause of that f_1 falls/drops to f_2 from f_3 in gravity well/frame of reference f_4; under conditions r_3.

famnalka'e

lujvo
k1 is not able to end k2 (event/state) under conditions k3 (event/state).

fampi'i

lujvo
x_1 is the factorial of x_2.
See also {ne'o}

famsku

lujvo
c_1 (agent) concludes by expressing/saying c_2=f_1 for/to audience c_3 via expressive medium c_4 concluding f_2.
From {fanmo}, {cusku}. Cf. {mulno}, {lojycpa}, {ni'i}, {ja'o}.

famstu

lujvo
x_1 is a place where x_2 (event) ends
See also {krastu}

famti

gismu
x_1 is an aunt/uncle of x_2 by bond/tie x_3; x_1 is an associated member of x_2's parent's generation.
Aunt (={fetfamti}), uncle (={nakfamti}). See also {bruna}, {mamta}, {mensi}, {patfu}, {rirni}, {tamne}.

famyma'o

lujvo
c_1 is a terminator of class/part-of-speech c_2 in language c_3.

fanbu'u

lujvo
b_1 is canvas of material b_2.
Cf. {falnu}, {bukpu}, {marnybu'u}

fancrfuri'ei

fu'ivla
x_1 is the Fourier transform of function x_2 where its x_3th argument (time-domain variable) is transformed into the corresponding fequency-domain variable x_4 (in the same position in the Fourier transformed function argument list) using conventions (especially mention normalization factors) x_5

fancu

gismu
x_1 is a function/single-valued mapping from domain x_2 to range x_3 defined by expression/rule x_4.
See also {mekso}, {bridi}.

fancu'alge

fu'ivla
x_1 is the result of applying mathematical function/operator x_2 to the terms of ordered list x_3 (inputs) in the order presented, according to system/definition x_4
See also: {fancufacki}, {jorlge}.

fancufacki

fu'ivla
x_1 (person/computer/agent) finds the result of applying mathematical function/operator x_2 to arguments x_3 (ordered list)
Useful for commanding some one to "add these numbers together", "find the sum of...", "take the conjugate of...", etc. In some sense, is equivalent to "calculate" or "compute" in reference to an operator being evaluated on an ordered list or inputs.

fancuka

fu'ivla
what satisfies property x_1 conditions what satisfies property x_2; what satisfies x_2 depends on what satisfies x_1

fancuvitno

fu'ivla
x_1 is a fixed point of function x_2
See also: mekso operator {vi'oi'au}.

fancysuksa

lujvo
function f_1 is discontinuous/abrupt/sharply changes locally (in output) on/at s_2 (set), with abruptness of type x_3 (default: 1)
s2 should be a set within some open subset of definition of f1, or a set on which f1 is not defined at all. For x3, an argument of n (number) corresponds to a differentiability class of order n to which f1 does NOT belong at points in set s2; notice that such an n makes no implications about the truth value of f1 belonging to any given differentiability classes of order m < n, but f1 cannot belong to differentiability classes of order m > n; n = 0 implies that the function is not continuous on that set (lack of definition there is sufficient for such a claim); a function that is discontinuous or which has a cusp or sharp "corner" in its graph/plot (meaning that its derivative is discontinuous) at points in s2 will have n ≤ 1. For now at least, n can be a nonnegative integer; generalizations may eventually be defined. This lujvo is not perfectly algorithmic/predictable.

fancyxra

lujvo
p_1 is a graph of function p_2=f_1 drawn by p_3 in medium p_4

fanduse

fu'ivla
the amount/intensity of event/state x_1 is too high for x_2 to happen; x_1 happens too much for x_2 to happen

fange

gismu
x_1 is foreign/alien/[exotic]/unfamiliar to x_2 in property x_3 (ka).
For the sense of alien (not from Earth), see {kesfange}. See also {cizra}, {jbena}, {ckini}.

fangynavni

lujvo
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of xenon (Xe).
See also {fange}, {navni}; {ratni}

fanjacta'o

lujvo
t_1=d_1=f_1 is a windsurfingboard of material/property t_2.
From {tanbo}, {djacu}, {falnu} (f2, f3 subsumed). See also sufingboard (={bonjacta'o}), kitesurfingboard (={volfanjacta'o}), wakesurfingboard (={blobonjacta'o}).

fankla

lujvo
k_1 sails to destination k_2 from origin k_3 via route k_4 on sailing vehicle k_5=f_3.
Cf. {voikla}.

fanmo

gismu
-fam-
-fa'o-
x_1 is an end/finish/termination of thing/process x_2; [not necessarily implying completeness].
x_1 is final/last/at the last; x_1 is a terminal/terminus of x_2; x_1 is the final/terminated state of terminated process x_2; x_2 terminates/ceases/stops/halts at x_1 (= {selfa'o} for reordered places). See also {krasi}, {cfari}, {mulno}, {sisti}, {denpa}, {jipno}, {kojna}, {traji}, {krasi}.

fanri

gismu
x_1 is a factory/foundry/industrial plant/mill producing x_2 from materials x_3.
See also {molki}, {gundi}.

fanrygundi

lujvo
g_1 is a/the manufacturing industry/sector, manufacturing/processing g_2=f_2 at factories/plants f_1 from materials f_3 using process g_3
From {fanri}, {gundi}.

fanrypanka

lujvo
p_1 is an industrial park managed by community/polity/company p_2 for factories/plants producing f_2.
Cf. {fanri}, {panka}, {zacpanka}, {zdipanka}, {gubypanka}, {kagnypanka}.

fanta

gismu
x_1 prevents/keeps/stops/restrains/constrains event x_2 from occurring.
See also {pinfu}, {bandu}, {zunti}, {rinju}, {jimte}, {bapli}, {rivbi}.

fantasi

fu'ivla
x_1 (entity) is fantastical, exhibiting x_2 (property of x_1), which is relevant to magic, myths or fictive medieval technology and thus extraordinary
See also {ranmi}, {cizra}, {xanri}

fantysna

lujvo
x_1 is an obstruent (phonetic) sound
Contains all consonants ({zunsna}) that are not sonorants ({ra'isna}). Includes fricatives ({mosysna}) and plosives ({ga'osna})

fanva

gismu
x_1 translates text/utterance x_2 to language x_3 from language x_4 with translation result x_5.
See also {cusku}, {bangu}. {traduki} is similar but has a different place structure.

fanvycukta

lujvo
c_1 is a translation of version that c_2=f_2(original/sourcetext) is translated by c_3=f_1(translator) from f_3(original language) into f_4(translation language)
f5,c4,c5 are deleted

fanza

gismu
-faz-
x_1 (event) annoys/irritates/bothers/distracts x_2.
Also: is disruptive to. See also {fengu}, {raktu}, {dicra}, {tunta}, {zunti}, {jicla}.

fa'o

cmavo
FAhO
unconditional end of text; outside regular grammar; used for computer input.

fapro

gismu
-fap-
-pro-
x_1 opposes/balances/contends against opponent(s) x_2 (person/force ind./mass) about x_3 (abstract).
Also resists. See also {bandu}, {bradi}, {darlu}, {damba}, {jivna}, {lanxe}, {rivbi}, {sarji}, {xarnu}.

farcri

lujvo
c_1 gets lost on the way to f_2 (object/event) in/near f_3=c_3
from {farna} {cirko}

fardukti

lujvo
x_1=d_1 is the opposite direction from x_3=f_3 that x_2=f_2 is.

fargau

lujvo
g_1=f_3 aims at f_1 with f_2 (object/event).
x_3 can be x_1 itself or an extra object/event such as "weapon", "effort", etc. Cf. {farna}.

farja'o

lujvo
j_1 shows the direction of f_2 (object/event) to audience j_3, that direction being f_1
f_3 defaults to the x_1, in other words the direction (i.e. x_4) is relative to the x_1 place. Cf. {farsni}, {degja'o}.

farka

experimental gismu
x_1 is an orientation of/on (base) object x_2 with features/characteristics/definition x_3; x_2 is an unoriented version of an object endowed with/given orientation/direction/face x_1.
Preferred to {fardu} because of gismu similarity-conflict and the fact that {ckaji} makes more etymological sense than {dunda} does. The "giving" is nonagentive. See also: {xansa}; equivalent zi'evla version: {farnadu}.

farlu

gismu
-fal-
-fa'u-
x_1 falls/drops to x_2 from x_3 in gravity well/frame of reference x_4.
Note: things can fall in spin, thrust, or tide as well as gravity; (agentive "drop" = one of two lujvo: {falcru} and {falri'a}). See also {lafti}, {cpare}, {klama}, {sfubu}.

farmako

fu'ivla
x_1 is a medicine (object) used to treat illness x_2

farmiju

fu'ivla
x_1 (event) is ongoing when x_2 happens
Predicate form of {ca'o}. See also {ca'o}, {faurmidju}.

farna

gismu
-far-
-fa'a-
x_1 is the direction of x_2 (object/event) from origin/in frame of reference x_3.
x_2 is towards x_1 from x_3 (= {selfa'a} for reordered places). See also {zunle}, {pritu}, {galtu}, {gapru}, {cnita}, {dizlo}, {berti}, {snanu}, {stuna}, {stici}, {purci}, {balvi}, {lidne}.

farnadu

fu'ivla
x_1 is an orientation of/on (base) object x_2 with features/characteristics/definition x_3; x_2 is an unoriented version of an object endowed with/given orientation/direction/face x_1.
The "giving" is nonagentive. See also: {xansa}; equivalent gismu version: {farka}.

farnxilbrti

fu'ivla
x1 is the direction of vector x2 in Hilbert space (with basis/in coordinates, including defined scales and origins) x3; x1 is the direction of x2 in a Hilbert sense
For example: quantum spin vectors are in terms of Hilbert space directions (components are oriented along directionals that are oriented in a Hilbert sense, rather than a physical/spatial sense). Such directions are a subset of the set of all directions. See also: {farna}

farsni

lujvo
s_1=f_3 non-agentively/inanimately points at/indicates the direction of s_2=f_2 to observer s_3 as being in the direction f_1.
f_3 defaults to the x_1, in other words the direction (i.e. x_4) is relative to the x_1 place. Cf. {farja'o}, {degja'o}.

fartra

lujvo
x_1 treats x_2 in way x_3 (ka)

farvi

gismu
-fav-
x_1 develops/evolves towards/into x_2 from x_3 through stages x_4.
See also {pruce}, {banro}, {makcu}, {ciste}, {cupra}, {ferti}.

fasko'o

lujvo
s_1=f_1 reflects Breton culture/language in aspect s_2=f_2.

fasnu

gismu
-fau-
x_1 (event) is an event that happens/occurs/takes place; x_1 is an incident/happening/occurrence.
See also {fau}, {krefu}, {lifri}, {fatci}, {rapli}, {banli}; if specifically agentive: {gasnu}, {zukte}

fasnyvla

lujvo
v_1 is a verb meaning v_2 in language v_3.
Cf. {fasnu}, {valsi}, {gasnu}

fasybau

lujvo
f_1=b_1 is the French language used by b_2 to express/communicate b_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).
Cf. {fraso}, {bangu}, {banfuru'a}.

fasygu'e

lujvo
g_1=f_1 is the country of France.
Cf. {fraso}, {gugde}, {gugdefuru}.

fasyzgu

lujvo
r_1=f_1 is a Gallic/French Rose/Rose of Provins (Rosa gallica) of species/strain r_2.

fatci

gismu
-fac-
x_1 (du'u) is a fact/reality/truth/actuality, in the absolute.
See also {datni}, {jitfa}, {sucta}, {xanri}, {jetnu}, {fasnu}, {zasti}, {cfika}, {saske}.

fatka'e

lujvo
f_1 = k_1 [sequence] is able to be / capable of being reversed from / into sequence f_2 by event k_2 under conditions k_3 (event / state).
From {fatne} + {kakne}.

fatkoce

fu'ivla
x_1 is a warthog (Phacochoerus africanus) of type x_2
See {xarju}, {mabru}, {danlu}

fatne

gismu
-fat-
-fa'e-
x_1 [sequence] is in reverse order from x_2 [sequence]; x_1 (object) is inverted from x_2 (object).
Also opposite (one sense). See also {fa'e}, {dukti}.

fatpo'a

lujvo
s_1 implodes into pieces/energy/fragments s_2.

fatri

gismu
-fai-
x_1 is distributed/allotted/allocated/shared among x_2 with shares/portions x_3; (x_2/x_3 fa'u).
Also spread, shared out, apportioned; agentive distribution (= {fairgau}, {fairzu'e}). See also {fa'u}, {fendi}, {preja}, {katna}, {tcana}.

fatysaclu

lujvo
x_1 (me'o) is the p-adic representation of number x_2 in base x_3.
can be infinitely long to the left but not the right; for repeating p-adics ({krefu} fatysaclu) use {ra'e} before {pi}

fau

cmavo
BAI
fasnu modal, 1st place (non-causal) in the event of ...

fa'u

cmavo
JOI
non-logical connective: respectively; unmixed ordered distributed association.

fa'u'ai

experimental cmavo
JOI
non-logical connective: antirespectively; unmixed but reverse ordered distributed association.
Works together with {fa'u}; given an ordering by {fa'u}, the terms connected by this word are (applied) in opposite order.

fau'arma

fu'ivla
x_1 is the result of evaluating formal expression x_2 (quote; extracts the contents therefrom in order) according to rules x_3

fau'au

experimental cmavo
JAhOI
two-tier function map/assignment writer notation: X1 (ordered list, no repetitious terms) maps termwise-respectively to X2 (ordered list; may be repetitious but must have exactly as many terms as X1)
So named because, in mathematical notation, the domain set of the function is written down in some order in its entirety and then, below it, the range of the function is written so that each image and preimage line up vertically with their appropriate/respective partner. Really useful when mapping from a countable set/object that is either human-small or in which the pattern is clear. Occasionally used for a more explicit form of notation for permutations (in which cycle decomposition is not necessarily as evident, but the structure as a how is, at least, explicit). The ith term of X1 is mapped to the ith term of X2; there is no knowledge of what happens to any value that is not term of list X1. Useful for lambda calculus.

faubganke

fu'ivla
x_1 happens, then if x_2 is true, x_1 repeatedly happens as long as x_2 is true
See {ifle}, {ganfauke}, {goilka'i}, {goilgau}, {goilbi'o}, {efku}

faucne

lujvo
x_1 (event) varies in intensity/amount
See also {cenba}

fau'e

experimental cmavo
iterated function left-composition with self: f∘f∘...∘f, n times.
First argument must be a function(al) or some object f that can be left-composed with itself; second argument is a real number (usually nonnegative integer) n for which n compositions of f makes sense; the result is f left-composed with itself n times. This word is a shortcut for longer expressions. See also: {fa'ai}, {se'au}, {te'a}, {fe'a}.

faumli

lujvo
x_1 (event) happens mildly/non-extremely/gently/somewhat
See also {milxe}

faumlu

lujvo
x_1 (event) seems to happen/take place to observer x_2

faunli

fu'ivla
x_1 (nu) happens together with x_2 (nu); x_1 happens while x_2 (one sense)
One proposed definition of {fau} {ko'a} is {xoi} {ko'a} {faunli} {ke'a}, i.e. {fau} is redefined to be the BAI of {faunli}. See {fasnu}.

faunxa'o

fu'ivla
x_1 is happening although it was expected to begin later
See also {xa'o}

faurbanzu

lujvo
x_1 (nu) is a sufficient condition/is enough for x_2 (nu) to happen
See {sarcu}

faurdu'e

lujvo
the amount/intensity of event/state x_1 is too high for x_2 to happen; x_1 happens too much for x_2 to happen
See {dukse}.

faurjdika

lujvo
x_1 (event) decreases in intensity/amount

faurnu'o

lujvo
x_1 can happen but has not happened yet (unrealized potential)
Synonymous with {nu'orfau}. See also {nu'o}, {pusfau}, {cazyfau}.

fauroda

cmavo-compound
any way, under any events

faursutra

lujvo
f_1=s_1 (event) happens swiftly/quickly/rapidly

faurtei

lujvo
f_1 is an event that has time/temporal duration t_1 ranging from starting time/event t_2 to ending time/event t_3.
Made from {fasnu} + {temci}.

faurza'o

lujvo
x_1 (event) is continuing beyond its expected duration/endpoint.
Synonymous to {za'orfau}. See also {za'o}.

faurze'a

lujvo
x_1 (event) increases in intensity/amount
See also {zenba}

fausno

lujvo
f_1=s_1 (event) happens slowly

fausto

lujvo
x_1 (event) is constant in intensity/amount
See also {stodi}

fautce

lujvo
x_1 (event) happens intensely/in a great degree
See also {mutce}

fau'u

experimental cmavo
COI
Forgive me!/I'm sorry!
cf. {fraxu}, {u'u}.

favgau

lujvo
g_1 develops f_1 into f_2 from f_3 through stages f_4.

favmapti

lujvo
f_1=m_1 is homologous to f_1=m_2 in property/aspect m_3

favytcinymupli

lujvo
m_1 is an example/instance of developmental/evolutionary stage/state m_2=t_1 of developing thing t_2=f_1 in its development towards/into f_2 from f_3 through stages f_4=m_3.
Someone causing the development is neither implied nor denied; hence this word can be used both for Darwinian evolution and software development. Made from {favytcini} + {mupli}.

faxycpe

lujvo
x_1 apologizes to x_2 / asks x_2 for forgiveness for action x_3 (property of x_1)
See also {fraxu}, {cpedu}, {pikci}.

fazgau

lujvo
g_1 [person/agent] annoys, by doing f_1 [event], f_2 [person].
The annoyance must not neccessarily be intentional. Cf. {fanza} (for an annoying event), {gasnu}.

fazyta'a

lujvo
t_1 chatters/gossips to t_2=f_2 about subject t_3 in language t_4.

fe

cmavo
FA
sumti place tag: tag 2nd sumti place.

fe'a

cmavo
VUhU3
binary mathematical operator: nth root of; inverse power [a to the 1/b power].

fe'au'u

experimental cmavo
VUhU3
mekso ternary operator: positive super-root; the bth super-root (inverse operator of hyper-operator with respect to base) of a of order c-2.
c must be nonnegative (and currently must also be an integer). See: {dei'au'o}, {te'au'u}, {de'au'u}

febgau

lujvo
g_1 (person/agent) boils x_2=f_1 at temperature x_3=f_2 and pressure x_4=f_3.
Note that this means simply to evaporate a liquid; to cook something by boiling is {febjukpa}. Also c.f. {jukpa}, {djacu}, {ladru}, {cidja}, {patxu}.

febjbijukpa

lujvo
x_1=ju_1 simmers/cooks/prepares food-for-eating x_2=j_2 by sitting it in simmering liquid x_3=ji_1=f_1 at temperature x_4=f_2 and pressure x_5=f_3.
See also: boil (={febjukpa}), poach (={febmlijukpa}), blanche (={juprblanca}), court bouillon (={likrkorbojo}/{febmliseljukpa}).

febjukpa

lujvo
x_1=j_1 cooks/prepares food-for-eating x_2=j_2 by sitting it in boiling liquid x_3=f_1 at temperature x_4=f_2 and pressure x_5=f_3

febmlijukpa

lujvo
x_1=ju_1 is poaching/cooks/prepares food-for-eating x_2=j_2 by sitting it in poaching liquid/court bouillon x_3=m_1=f_1 at temperature x_4=f_2 and pressure x_5=f_3.
See also: simmer (={febjbijukpa}), court bouillon (={likrkorbojo}/{febmliseljukpa}).

febvi

gismu
-feb-
x_1 boils/evaporates at temperature x_2 and pressure x_3.
Roil (= {febjicla}). See also {dunja}, {lunsa}, {runme}.

fe'e

cmavo
FEhE
mark space interval distributive aspects; labels interval tense modifiers as location-oriented.

fe'eba'o

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
location event contour tense: perfective in space; beyond the place of ...

fe'eca'o

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
location event contour tense: continuative in space; throughout the place of ...

fe'eco'a

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
location event contour tense: initiative in space; on this edge of ...

fe'eco'i

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
location event contour tense: achievative in space; at the point of ...

fe'emo'u

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
location event contour tense: completive in space; at the far end of ...

fe'enau

cmavo-compound
CUhE*
tense: right here; refers to current spatial reference absolutely
*Note: Not currently accepted by grammar parsers.* It may be desirable to separate the spatial and time senses of the word {nau}; this is one proposed solution. Alternative: {bu'u} {nau'u}. See {zva'ati}, {ca'abna}

fe'enoroi

cmavo-compound
ROI*
location tense interval modifier: never in space; objectively quantified tense.

fe'epu'o

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
location event contour tense: anticipative in space; up to the edge of ...

fe'eroroi

cmavo-compound
ROI*
location tense interval modifier: always in space; objectively quantified tense.

fe'eza'o

cmavo-compound
ZAhO*
location event contour tense: superfective in space; continuing too far beyond ...

fegba'u

lujvo
b_1=f_1 roars/snarls/growls angrily atterance b_2 at f_2 because of f_3 (action/state/property).
Cf. {fengu}, {bacru}, {capsidba'u}, {fe'ucmo}.

fegli

experimental gismu
x_1 is ugly to x_2 in aspect x_3
See {melbi}.

fegmli

lujvo
m_1=f_1 is irritated/[mildly angry] at f_2 for f_3 (action/state/property).
Cf. {fengu}, {milxe}.

fegmliba'u

lujvo
m_1=f_1=b_1 grumbles with sound b_2 at f_2 because of f_3 (action/state/property).
jvajvo definition; Gismu deep structure is "milxe le ka fengu kei gi'e bacru"

fegri'a

lujvo
r_1 (event) angers f_1.
Cf. {fengu}, {rinka}

fegycau

lujvo
f_1=c_1 is without anger/mild/meek regarding f_2 for f_3 (action/state/property).

fei

cmavo
PA2
digit/number: hex digit B (decimal 11) [eleven].
Experimental rafsi: -fel-

fe'i

cmavo
VUhU1
n-ary mathematical operator: divided by; division operator; [(((a / b) / c) / ...)].
see also {dilcu}, {pi'i}

fei'i

experimental cmavo
VUhU
mekso variable arity (at most ternary) operator: number of prime divisors of number A, counting with or without multiplicity according to the value B (1 or 0 respectively), in structure C
A may be a number in a generalized sense: anything living in a ring with primes. Units are not considered to be prime factors. B toggles the type of counting: If B=0, then the prime factors are counted without multiplicity (they are counted only uniquely, ignoring their exponents); if B=1, then multiple factors of the same prime are counted (the exponents of the prime factors are added together); no other option for the value of B is currently defined; B might have contextual/cultural/conventional defaults but the contextless default value is B=1. C specifies in which (algebraic) structure primehood/factoring is being considered/performed; it need not be specified if the context is clear.

fei'u

experimental cmavo
KE
Prefix division by following unit selbri
Cf. {pi'ai}, {te'ai}, {fi'u}. Essentially attaches "te'ai ni'u pa" to all subsequent unit-selbri in the tanru. E.g. "pi'ai ki'otre fei'u cacra" = "pi'ai ki'otre cacra te'ai ni'u pa" = "kilometers per hour"; "pi'ai mitre fei'u snidu snidu" = meters per second per second. May even be used without pi'ai: "fei'u snidu" = reciprocal of the second / hertz

fekpre

lujvo
x_1 (person) is crazy/mad/frantic by standard x_2

felma'i

lujvo
x_1 is November/eleventh month of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Note: Based on experimental rafsi for {fei} (fel). Use with caution. Alternative: {pavypavma'i}

femti

gismu
-fem-
x_1 is 10^{-15} of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).
See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}

fendi

gismu
-fed-
x_1 (agent) divides/partitions/separates x_2 into sections/parts/ind. x_3 by method/partition x_4.
Also segments. See also {sepli}, {bitmu}, {fatri}, {dilcu}, {katna}, {frinu}.

fengidmo'a

lujvo
m_1 is a sewing pattern of forms m_2 according to structure m_3.

fengrfu

fu'ivla
x_1 FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU at x_2; x_1 expresses extreme rage at x_2 by beginning to say 'fuck'.
See also {zu'erxiolo}.

fengu

gismu
-feg-
-fe'u-
x_1 is angry/mad at x_2 for x_3 (action/state/property).
See also {fanza}, {dunku}.

fenki

gismu
-fek-
x_1 (action/event) is crazy/insane/mad/frantic/in a frenzy (one sense) by standard x_2.
See also {bebna}, {racli}, {xajmi}.

fenpretse

lujvo
z_1 sits in tailor style position/agura/sukhasana on surface z_2.
Sits with the lower legs folded towards the body, crossing each other at the ankle or calf, with both ankles on the floor, sometimes with the feet tucked under the knees or thighs. The position is known in several European languages as tailor style.

fenra

gismu
-fer-
-fe'a-
x_1 is a crack/fissure/pass/cleft/ravine/chasm/[defect/flaw] [shape/form] in x_2.
See also {kevna}, {cfila}, {jinto}.

fenso

gismu
-fen-
-fe'o-
x_1 sews/stitches/sutures materials x_2 (ind./set) together with tool(s) x_3, using filament x_4.
(x_2 if a set must be a complete specification); See also {cilta}, {jivbu}, {jorne}, {nivji}, {pijne}, {lasna}.

fenxeli

fu'ivla
x_1 is a fennel (Foeniculum vulgare, of the parsley family) of variety x_2
Fennel has a sweet, anise-like flavor

fe'o

cmavo
COI
vocative: over and out (end discussion).

fepni

gismu
-fep-
-fei-
x_1 is measured in kopeck/cent money-subunits as x_2 [quantity], in monetary system x_3.
Also pfennig, paisa, sen, fen, dinar, etc.; x_1 is generally a price/cost/value. (additional secondary, tertiary, etc. subunit places may be added as x_4, x_5, x_6, ...); See also {sicni}, {jdini}, {jdima}, {vecnu}, {rupnu}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.

fepri

gismu
x_1 is a/the lung [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: breathing/respiratory apparatus/bellows].
Also (adjective:) x_1 is pulmonary. See also {pambe}, {vasxu}.

fepryfi'e

lujvo
fi_1 is a lungfish/salamanderfish (subclass Dipnoi) of species fi_2.
See also: {fiprne'oceratodu}.

feprykenra

lujvo
x_1=k_1 is a lung cancer [malignant disease] in x_2=k_2=f_2
Cf. {kensle}, {kenri'a}, {kenra}, {fepri}

fepsi'i

lujvo
s_1 is a cent coin issued by s_2 in monetary system f_3.

ferti

gismu
-fre-
x_1 is fertile/conducive for supporting the growth/development of x_2; x_1 is fruitful/prolific.
Also fecund (note that the Lojban covers both potential and actual/realized fertility). See also {vanbi}, {sidju}, {rorci}, {farvi}, {banro}, {cange}.

fertis

cmevla
x_1 is Virgo [constellation/astrological sign].
From {ferti}. The Greeks and Romans associated Virgo with their goddess of wheat, Demeter-Ceres who is the mother of Proserpina-Persephone. For this reason the constellation became associated with fertility (in both Babylonia, Greece and Rome). Alternatively, she was sometimes identified as the virgin goddess Iustitia or Astraea, holding the scales of justice in her hand as the constellation Libra. Since ferti in lojban covers both potential and actual/realized fertility, the original meaning of the constellation have been chosen, but you could probably still interpret the name in both senses (as a deity of fecundity or as a fertile virgin).

fesli'a

lujvo
x_1=f_2=c_1 abandons / forsakes / leaves behind x_2=f_1=c_2
Cf. {festi}, {cliva}, {tolcpa}, {radycru}.

festi

gismu
-fes-
x_1(s) is/are waste product(s) [left to waste] by x_2 (event/activity).
Also shit, crap; agentive wasting (= {fesygau}, {fesyzu'e}). See also {xaksu}, {kalci}, {pinca}.

festoknu

lujvo
t_1 is an incinerator for burning waste t_2=f_1.

fesybaktu

lujvo
b_1 is a trash bin/trash can/recycle bin with contents b_2=f_1, made of material b_3.
Cf. {festi}, {baktu}.

fesydakli

lujvo
d_1 is a refuse bag with refuse d_2=f_1, and of material d_3.
Any bag with trash inside counts as trash bag in this context.

fesygau

lujvo
x_1=g_1 [person/agent] leaves waste product/wastes x_2=f_1 by event/activity x_3=f_2=g_2
Made from {festi} + {gasnu}

fetcei

lujvo
c_1 is a goddess (female deity) of people(s)/religion c_2 with dominion over c_3 [sphere].
Cf. {nakcei}, {fetsi}, {cevni}, {lijda}, {krici}, {censa}, {malsi}. Recommended to be used only use when contrasted with {nakcei} or femininity of the deity is to be emphasized/important.

fetcinse

lujvo
c_1 is gynophilous [sexually attracted to women] in situation c_2 by standard c_4.
This word is only about sexual interest in females; other sexual interests are irrelevant. Cf. {nakcinse}, {fetfetcinse}, {mitcinse}, {dutcinse}.

fetfamti

lujvo
x_1 is an aunt of x_2

fetfetcinse

lujvo
c_1=f_1 is female and gynophilous/gay/bisexual in situation c_2 by standard c_4
This word is about female homosexuality and bisexuality. See also {fetcinse}, {naknakcinse}, {mitcinse}, {relcinse}.

fetnalspe

lujvo
f_1=n_1 is an unmarried woman under law/custom/tradition s_3.
Cf. {nalspe}, {naknalspe}, {specfari'i}, {bavyspe}, {pruspe}.

fetpibyta'u

lujvo
x_1=t_1 is panties/knickers/boy shorts (female genital underwear), serving purpose x_2=t_3
Female genitalia/crotch/vulva-covering type of underwear. Needn't be worn by female/woman/girl but garment need be made for female genitalia/pubic region in some manner (see {nakpibyta'u}/{pibyta'u} for male/non-defined counterpart). Cf. {nerta'u}, {taxfrbikini}, {tatyta'u}.

fetpinji

lujvo
p_1 is the clitoris of p_2.
Cf. {fetsi}, {pinji}, {nakpinji}, {vibna}, {vlagi}, {plibu}

fetsi

gismu
-fet-
-fe'i-
x_1 is a female/doe of species x_2 evidencing feminine trait(s) x_3 (ka); x_1 is feminine.
See also {nakni}.

fetso'a

lujvo
x_1 is a gamete of female x_2.
See {nakso'a}

fetspe

lujvo
x_1 is a wife of x_2 (spouse) according to marriage tradition/custom/law x_3.
Cf. {nakspe}, {pruspe}, {bavyspe}, {specfari'i}.

fetydzetru

lujvo
t_1 is a matriarch of people/territory/domain/subjects t_2.
Cf. {nakydzetru}, {nolkantru}.

fetyganti

lujvo
x_1 is an ovary of x_2.
Cf. {sovda}, {gletu}, {gutra}.

fetytricinse

lujvo
x1 is/demonstrates/exhibits sexual orientation toward females in situation x2 by standard x3
In a gender binary, this word covers half of each heterosexuality and homosexuality. It is not strict (in other words, bisexuals are both male- and female-attracted). Could be useful for transexuals with a definite preference, as well. See also: {naktricinse}

fe'u

cmavo
FEhU
elidable terminator: end nonce conversion of selbri to modal; usually elidable.

fe'ucmo

lujvo
c_1=f_1 growls/snarls/roars c2 [non-linguistic utterence] in anger at f_2 for f_3 (action/state/property).
Cf. {fengu}, {cmoni}, {fegba'u}, {capsidba'u}.

fi

cmavo
FA
sumti place tag: tag 3rd sumti place.

fi'a

cmavo
FA
sumti place tag: place structure number/tag question.

fiakre

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a fiacre, a small hackney carriage
See {marce}

fickanpe

lujvo
x_2 (property) is satisfied by a number different from that expected by x_1 with likelihood x_3
See also {kanpe}, {zmakanpe}, {meckanpe}, {dunkanpe}.

ficpei

lujvo
x_1=p_1 thinks that x_2=f_1 differs from/is distinct from/contrasts with/is unlike x_3=f_2 in property/dimension/quality x_4=f_3; x_1 distinguishes between x_2 and x_3 because of differing property/dimension/quality x_4.
Use {su'ai} for distinguishing among more than two things.

ficybi'o

lujvo
b_1 becomes different/changes/transforms from f_2 in property/dimension/quantity f_3 under conditions b_3.
Cf. {frica}, {binxo}.

ficysi'u

lujvo
s_1 (set) differs/are distinct from/contrasts with/are unlike each other in property/dimension/quantity f_3.

fi'e

cmavo
BAI
finti modal, 1st place (creator) created by ...

fi'ecti

lujvo
c_1 is a fish-eater of fish species f_2.
Cf. {finpe}, {citka}, {re'ucti}, {stagycti}.

fiesta

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a fiesta
See {sipna}, {spano}, {itlo}, {xelso}

figre

gismu
-fig-
x_1 is a fig [fruit/tree] of species/strain x_2.
See also {grute}.

fi'i

cmavo
COI
vocative: hospitality - inhospitality; you are welcome/ make yourself at home.

fi'i'e

experimental cmavo
COI
Welcome to

fi'ikca

fu'ivla
x_1 takes a fika [social institution]/coffee break together with x_2 consuming food/beverage x_3.
From the swedish word "fika". Both "fika" and "fi'ikca" are also derived from the word for coffee in respectively language (kaffi respectively {ckafi}). fi'ikca describes the event where you socialize with others, perhaps over a cup of coffee. In a swedish context x2 might often be friends or fellow workers, and x3 usually is coffee/squash/(tea) together with a cinnamon roll, cookie, cake, a sandwich etc. But fi'ikca could also be used in a more universal, cultural neutral sense. See also coffeehouse/coffee bar (={kafybarja}), making coffee (={kafpra}).

fi'inai

cmavo-compound
COI*
vocative: hospitality - inhospitality.

fikcku

lujvo
cu_1=cf_1 is a fictional book about plot/theme/subject cf_1 by author cu_3=cf_3 for audience cu_4 preserved in medium cu_5.
Cf. {lisycku}, {ctucku}, {tadycku}, {ckusro}, {cesysku}.

fikrfantasi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a fictional work of fantasy about plot/theme/subject x_2 by author x_3.

filcina

fu'ivla
x_1 is a fern of family/genus/species x_2.

filgau

lujvo
g_1 [person/agent] causes f_1 to be easy for f_2 under condition(s) f_3.
Cf. {frili}, {gasnu}, {filri'a}, {sutygau}, {sutri'a}.

filmau

lujvo
z_1=f_1 (action) is easier than z_2 (action) for x_3=f_2 (agent) by amount z_4 under conditions x_5=f_3.

filnale

fu'ivla
x_1 is the finale/final/last part leading up to completion of x_2

filri'a

lujvo
r_1 [event/state] causes f_1 to be easy for f_2 under condition(s) f_3.
Cf. {frili}, {rinka}, {filgau}, {sutri'a}, {sutygau}.

filsampu

lujvo
s_1=f_1 is simple/easy in property s_2 for f_2 under conditions f_3
See also similar in meaning {frili}, {sampu}

filselga'e

lujvo
g_2=f_1 is apparent to g_1 via perceptual/cognitive faculty g_3.
x3 includes reason or critical thinking skills as well as discrete biological organs such as eyes or ears. Cf. {frili}, {sapselga'e}, {sampu}, {klina}.

filseljmi

lujvo
f_1=sj_1 (du'u) is an easy to understand/clear fact/truth to f_2=sj_2 about subject sj_3 under conditions f_4.
Not jvajvo, but there exist essentially no useful jvajvo definitions for this lujvo.

filseltro

lujvo
x1=j2 is meek/[easily controlled by] x2=f2=j1 in activity x3=j3 under conditions x4=f3

filsmu

lujvo
s_1 is easily understood/interpreted as the meaning of s_2 by (agent) s_3=f_2 under conditions f_3.
From {frili}+{smuni}. The x_1 of {frili} is subsumed into the overall sense of the word. See also: {filseljmi}, {klina}.

filso

gismu
-fis-
x_1 reflects Palestinian culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
See also {jordo}, {xebro}.

filsofiia

fu'ivla
x_1 is philosophy about/of sub-field x_2

filsofo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a philosopher

filsofu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a philosopher

filta'a

lujvo
t_1=f_2 speaks fluently to t_2 about subject t_3 in language t_4 under conditions f_3.
Cf. {frili}, {tavla}.

finfriti

lujvo
fr_1=fi_1 dedicates invention/creation/composition/work fr_2=fi_2 to fr_3 with conditions fr_4.

finkai

lujvo
c_1 is characterized by creativity; c_1 is creative/inventive (one sense).
Cf. {finti}, {ckaji}.

finpe

gismu
-fip-
-fi'e-
x_1 is a fish of species x_2 [metaphorical extension to sharks, non-fish aquatic vertebrates].
See also {danlu}.

finprbri'enomiru

fu'ivla
f_1 is an elephantfish (genus Brienomyrus) of species f_2.

finprbulengeromiru

fu'ivla
f_1 is an elephantfish (genus Boulengeromyrus) of species f_2.
It occurs only in the Ivindo River and the Ntem River basins of Gabon and Cameroon in Africa.

finprcifomiru

fu'ivla
f_1 is an elephantfish/Zambezi parrotfish (genus Cyphomyrus) of species f_2.

finprcitala

fu'ivla
f_1 is a featherback/knifefish (genus Chitala) of species f_2.

finprfikodurusi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a leafy/Glauert's sea( )dragon/member of fish genus Physodurus, of species x_2
Not: seahorse, weedy sea( )dragon, ribboned pipefish/formerly-designated ribboned sea( )dragon. See also: {finpe}, {finprsinxnatfidai}, {finprsinxnatfinai}, {finprfilopteriksi}, {finprxali'iktfisi}, {finprxipokampusi}.

finprfilopteriksi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a weedy sea( )dragon/common sea( )dragon/member of fish genus Phyllopterix of species x_2
Not: seahorse, leafy sea( )dragon, ribboned pipefish/formerly-designated ribboned sea( )dragon. See also: {finpe}, {finprsinxnatfidai}, {finprsinxnatfinai}, {finprfikodurusi}, {finprxali'iktfisi}, {finprxipokampusi}.

finprgimnarku

fu'ivla
f_1 is a aba/aba aba/frankfish/freshwater rat-tail/poisson-cheval/African knifefish (genus Gymnarchus) of species f_2.
Gymnarchus niloticus is an electric fish, and the only species in the genus Gymnarchus.

finprkampilomormiru

fu'ivla
f_1 is an elephantfish (genus Campylomormyrus) of species f_2.

finprkiprinu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a carp (genus Cyprinus) of species x_2
See also {finpe}

finprnotopteru

fu'ivla
f_1 is a bronze featherback (genus Notopterus) of species f_2.
This fish is popular in Laos, Indonesia and in Thailand as food.

finprpapirokranu

fu'ivla
f_1 is a knifefish (genus Papyrocranus) of species f_2.

finprplekoglosu

fu'ivla
x_1 is an Ayu fish (genus Plecoglossus) of species x_2

finprporake

fu'ivla
x_1 is an electric eel of breed x_2

finprsinxnatfidai

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a member of fish family Syngnathidae of lower taxon/taxa x_2

finprsinxnatfinai

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a sea( )dragon/member of fish subfamily Syngnathinae of lower taxon/taxa x_2
Includes weedy and leafy genera of seadragons, as well as genus Haliichthys (the ribboned pipefish (previously named "the ribboned sea dragon)). See also: {finpe}, {finprsinxnatfidai}, {finprfilopteriksi}, {finprfikodurusi}, {finprxali'iktfisi}, {finprxipokampusi}.

finprtruto

fu'ivla
x_1 is a trout of species/breed x_2

finprvandeli

fu'ivla
x_1 is a candirú of species/variety x_2.
syn. {kandiru}, {pincyfi'e}; see also {latfi'e}

finprxenomistu

fu'ivla
f_1 is an African knifefish (genus Xenomystus) of species f_2.

finprxipoglosu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a halibut of species x_2.
syn. {polgosu}; see also {flundero}, {cucyzbefi'e}, {mlafi'e}

finprxipokampusi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a seahorse (strictly, a member of genus Hippocampus) of species x_2
In particular, seadragons are not members of genus Hippocampus.

finti

gismu
-fin-
-fi'i-
x_1 invents/creates/composes/authors x_2 for function/purpose x_3 from existing elements/ideas x_4.
x_1 is creative/inventive. See also cmavo list {fi'e}, {ciska}, {pemci}, {zbasu}, {larcu}, specific works of authorship, {prosa}, {skina}.

fi'o

cmavo
FIhO
convert selbri to nonce modal/sumti tag.

fi'oi

experimental cmavo
FIhOI
Right-scoping adverbial clause: encloses a bridi and turns it into an adverbial term; the antecedent (ke'a) of the enclosed bridi stands for the outer bridi {lo su'u no'a ku} (the bridi in which this fi'oi term appears), including all the other adverbial terms (tags...) within this bridi located on the right of this fi'oi term (rightward scope).
Terminator: fi'au.

fiorso

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is an aspect of / a part of The Force connecting / within x_2
No attempt at good fu'ivla making was harmed in the creation of this word.

fi'ortu'a

lujvo
f_1=t_1 is Africa.
from {friko} {tumla}. See also {zdotu'a}, {rontu'a}, {tcotu'a}, {sralytu'a}, {bemtu'a}, {ziptu'a}

fi'orxanto

lujvo
x_1 is an African elephant (genus Loxodonta) of species/breed x_2.
For example, x2 could be the African bush elephant or the smaller African forest elephant. See also: {xanto}, {loksodonta} (syn.), {zdoxanto}.

fi'orxruki

lujvo
xr_1 is a guineafowl of species/breed xr_2

fipcange

lujvo
c_1 is a fish farm at c_2, farmed by c_3, raising/producing fish species x_4=f_2.

fipfepri

lujvo
fi_1 is a gill of fish fe_2=fi_1 of species x_3=fi_2.
See also {fipybirka}, {fipyrebla} for other fish-body related words.

lujvo
x_1 fishes for fish species x_2.
see also {finpe}, {genxu}, {xlura}

fipma'i

lujvo
x_1 is March of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Cf. {cibmasti}, {kanbyma'i}, {nanca}.

fiprtetrapleurodo

f_1 is a Mexican (brook) lamprey (genus Tetrapleurodon) of species f_2.

fiprtraktoste

fu'ivla
f_1 is a gar/garpike (genus Atractosteus) of species f_2.
Three species: Alligator gar (A. spatula), Cuban gar (A. tristoechus), Tropical gar (A. tropicus).

fiprxuso

fu'ivla
f_1 is a Kaluga or Beluga sturgeon (genus Huso) of species f_2.

fipybirka

lujvo

Cf. {fipyrebla}, {fipfepri}, {limna'i}.

fipygundi

lujvo
g_1 is a/the fisheries industry/sector producing fish products g_2 from fish species f_2 by process g_3
Cf. {finpe}, {gundi}, {nunjacycrepu}. Omit f1.

fipyrebla

lujvo
x_1 is a tail with tailed-fish x_2.

firbo'u

lujvo
b_1=f_1 is a facial skeleton/splanchnocranium/viscerocranium of b_3=f_2

firca

experimental gismu
x_1 flirts with x_2 by doing x_3
See {cinse}, {pamta'a}, {cinjikca}, {mletritra}, {gletu}

fircku

lujvo
x_1 pertains to Facebook in aspect x_2.
Place structure parallels that of {kibro}.

firenzes

cmevla
Florence
Italian: Firenze [fiˈrɛntse]

firfra

lujvo
x1=fl2=fr1 has look/[facial expression] x2=fl1=fr2 to stimulus x3=fr3 under condition x4=fr4

firgai

lujvo
g_1 is a mask covering the face of g_2=f_2.

firkre

lujvo
k_1 is the beard/moustace/facial hair of f_2=k_2.

firti'oxra

lujvo
p_1 is a silhouette of f_1 made by p_3 in medium p_4.

fisli

experimental gismu
x_1 is physical/actual/pertains to physics in aspect x_2 (ka) of type x_3 by standard/in metaphysics x_4
Perhaps includes (but would not be limited to): material, bodily, tangible. x1 need not be a substance/matter; spacetime, physical quantities (such as energy), virtual particles, and even the rules of physics and some mathematical theorems could be considered to be physical. See also: {jikfi}, {termu'e}, {termu'eske}, {mairza'i}, {tifmu'eza'i}, {dacti}, {marji}, {xanri}, {fatci}, {menli}, {cinmo}, {cmaci}.

fislytsa

lujvo
x_1 (force) is physically strong in aspect x_2 by standard x_3
{fisli}, {tsali}. Specifically refers to the physical aspect of {tsali}. Syn. {jikfytsa}

fitytoltu'i

lujvo
x_1 rejects x_2 (offer, suggestion, proposal) from x_3.

fitytu'i

lujvo
x_1 accepts x_2 (an offer/suggestion) from x_3.
Cf. {friti}, {tugni}, {cpazau}, {radji'i}, {zarcpa}.

fi'u

cmavo
PA3
digit/number: fraction slash; default "/n" => 1/n, "n/" => n/1, or "/" alone => golden ratio.
See also {fe'i}, {frinu}

fi'ure

cmavo-compound
PA*
half.
synonym {pimu}; see also {xadba}

fi'urgau

lujvo
g_1 [person/agent] confuses c_1 (event/state) for c_2 [observer] due to [confusing] property c_3 (ka).

fizbu

experimental gismu
x_1 is excited/feels excitement about x_2 (event/property)
See {ue'i}, {entuzi}

flacau

lujvo
c_1=f_3 [lacks law]/[is lawless with regard to] law(s) f_1 specifying f_2 (state/event) under conditions f_4 by lawgiver(s) f_5; c_1=f_3 is lawless.
Cf. {flalu}, {claxu}.

flacfatrugri

lujvo
g_1=t_1 is the Lower House/House of Representatives/House of Commons for territory t_2 with members g_3=f_5.
Cf. {flalu}, {cfari}, {turni}, {girzu}, {flazautrugri}, {truci'e}, {zuktruci'e}, {flatruci'e}, {pairtruci'e}, {vajraifla}.

flaci

experimental gismu
x_1 flashes

flalu

gismu
-fla-
x_1 is a law specifying x_2 (state/event) for community x_3 under conditions x_4 by lawgiver(s) x_5.
x_1 is a legality; x_2 is legal/licit/legalized/a legality (= {selfla} for reordered places). See also {javni}, {ritli}, {zekri}, {pulji}, {tinbe}.

flama'u

lujvo
x_1 is a legal adult, according to law x_2
See {kralyma'u}, {fuzma'u}

flamingo

lujvo
x_1 is a flamingo (Phoenicopterus roseus) of variety x_2

flanaltinbe

lujvo
t_1 is an outlaw not following the law t_2 made by t_3.

flani

gismu
x_1 is a flute/pipe/fife/recorder [flute-like/air-reed musical instrument].
See also {zgike}.

flanrdizi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a dizi.
Cf. {flani}, {pinflani}, {zgica'a}.

flapaizda

lujvo
z_1 is a judicial court administering lawsuit p_2=f_2 for community f_3.
Cf. {zdani}, {pajni}, {flalu}.

flapo'e

lujvo
p_1 legally owns / is the legal owner of p_2 according to law p_3=f_1.
Specific to ownership according to some law, does not neccessarily imply possession (={ra'erpo'e}). Note that {ponse} is broader.

flapro

lujvo
fa_1 rebels against/opposes law fl_1, which specifies fl_2 (state/event) for community fl_3 under conditions fl_4 by lawgiver(s) fl_5.

flari'a

lujvo
r_1=f_5 enacts r_2=f_1 (law/legislation/treaties/act) for community f_3 under condition r_3=f_4.
x_1 is usually a national parliament.

flaselgu'e

lujvo
g_2 is a/are citizen(s) of country g_1 according to law f_1 specifying f_2 (state/event) for community f_3.
From {flalu}, {gugde}. Cf. {flaxa'u}.

flatruci'e

lujvo
c_1=t_1=f_5 is the legislative branch of the government of people/territory/domain/subjects t_2.
Cf. {flalu}, {turni}, {ciste}, {truci'e}, {zuktruci'e}, {pairtruci'e}, {flacfatrugri}, {flazautrugri}, {vajraifla}.

flaume

fu'ivla
x_1 is a plum of variety x_2.
see also {persika}, {rutrprunu}

flaxa'u

lujvo
x_1 is a/are legal resident(s) of location/country x_2 according to law f_1 specifying f_2 (state/event) for community f_3.
From {flalu}, {xabju}. Cf. {flaselgu'e}.

flazautrugri

lujvo
g_1=t_1 is the Upper House/Senate/House of Lords for territory t_2 with members g_3=f_5=z_3.
Cf. {flalu}, {zanru}, {turni}, {girzu}, {flacfatrugri}, {truci'e}, {zuktruci'e}, {flatruci'e}, {pairtruci'e}, {vajraifla}.

fleca'e

lujvo
x_1 washes x_2 away and is a current/flow/river of/in x_3.
See also {flecu} {catke}.

flecarvi

lujvo
c_1 pours/intensely rains to c_2 from c_3.

flecu

gismu
-fle-
x_1 is a current/flow/river of/in x_2 flowing in direction to/towards x_3 from direction/source x_4.
[x_1 is a stream of x_2; x_2 is a fluid Gas or liquid. (= {selfle} for reordered places); x_1 flushes toward x_3; flush (= {caifle}, {sukfle})]; See also {rirxe}, {senta} where no directionality is implied, {rinci}, {xampo}, {dikca}, {sakci}, {gapci}, {litki}, {ciblu}.

flese

experimental gismu
x_1 is philosophy about/of sub-field x_2, characterized by ideas/methodology x_3
See {saske}, {filsofiia}. Proposed rafsi: -les- ; see {lespre}, {lespei}

fletola

fu'ivla
x_1 (property of x_3) is the grammar of language x_2 for elidible construct x_3 that is assumed to fill its place even if elided
See also {gretera}, {gerna}

fletrogusmi'i

lujvo
x_1 is a traffic light
See also {klafle}

fletu'u

lujvo
x_1=t_1 is a pipe/tube/hose carrying fluid x_2=f_2=t_3 towards x_3=f_3 from x_4=f_4 (direction/source)
Fluid is any flowable matter (gas, liquid, slurry, powder etc.). Cf. {jaurflevau}, {datnyfle}, {blutu'u}, {tubnu}, {pambe}, {litki}, {gapci}, {bumru}, {danmo}, {purmo}, {pulce}, {sligu}.

fliba

gismu
-fli-
x_1 fails at doing x_2 (state/event); x_1 is a failure at its role in x_2.
Baffled (= {pesfli}, {jmifli}, {dafspufli}, {menfli}, among other senses); also x_2 ceases/does not complete/fails to continue due to failure on the part of x_1. See also {cfila}, {snada}, {srera}, {troci}, {sisti}, {ranji}, {denpa}, {bebna}, {zunti}.

flira

gismu
-fir-
x_1 is a/the face [head/body-part] of x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is facial.
See also {sefta}, {stedu}, {crane}, {mebri}.

flixru

lujvo
x_1 bounces x_2 back to x_3 from x_4 because of failure x_5.

flizu'e

lujvo
x_1=z_1=f_1 does x_2=z_2 to achieve goal x_3=z_3=f_2 which x_1 fails to achieve.

flubisli

lujvo
b_1=f_1 is an iceberg floating on f_2 (water, sea etc.).

flulimna

lujvo
l_1=f_1 (agent) swims on liquid l_2=f_2.
Cf. {fulta}, {limna}.

flundero

fu'ivla
x_1 is a flounder of species x_2.
Cf. {mlafi'e}.

fo

cmavo
FA
sumti place tag: tag 4th sumti place.

fo'a

cmavo
-fo'a-
KOhA4
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #6 (specified by goi).

fo'e

cmavo
-fo'e-
KOhA4
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #7 (specified by goi).

foi

cmavo
FOI
terminator: end composite lerfu; never elidable.

fo'i

cmavo
-fo'i-
KOhA4
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #8 (specified by goi).

foi'e

experimental cmavo
FOIhE
GOI attachment modifier: allows a cmavo of selma'o GOI (which must follow immediately) to be attached to a selbri
This word must (ignoring quotes, etc.) be preceded by a selbri (to which it immediately attaches, even in sumti) and must be followed by a member of selma'o GOI (ignoring erasure, etc.). All other semantics and syntax of the GOI construct remains the same, it just applies to the selbri immediately prior to this word, rather than a sumti. See also: {po'oi}.

foinkana'o

fu'ivla
x_1 represents/pertains to Canaan/Phoenician culture in property/aspect x_2

foldi

gismu
-flo-
-foi-
x_1 is a field [shape/form] of material x_2; x_1 is a broad uniform expanse of x_2.
Also woods (= {ricfoi}), lawn/meadow (= {sasfoi}), brush (= {spafoi}, {cicyspafoi}). See also {purdi}, {cange}.

foldota

x_1 is a pangolin of species/breed x_2.
Cf. {mabru}, {manti}, {mudyctijalra}.

'ti forse lo neftoni be li pa' - 'this has a force of 1 Newton'. See also {neftoni}

{klavile} is a more generic term

frafi'a

lujvo
x_1 is interactive fiction about x_2

fragari

fu'ivla
x_1 is a strawberry of species/breed x_2.
Cf. {frambesi}, {grute}, {jbari}, {rozgu}.

fraksino

fu'ivla
x_1 is an ash of species/variety x_2.

fraktali

fu'ivla
x_1 is a fractal with properties x_2
Fractal is a geometric figure that repeats itself under several levels of magnification, and that shows self-similarity on all scales. See also {pixra}, {cartu}, {panra}, {ckilu}

frambesi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a blackberry/raspberry/bramble of species x_2.
Cf. {fragari}, {grute}, {jbari}, {rozgu}.

frangia

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a fringe

frangula

fu'ivla
x_1 is a buckthorn of species/variety x_2.

fraso

gismu
-fas-
x_1 reflects French/Gallic culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2.
See also {ropno}.

frati

gismu
-fra-
x_1 reacts/responds/answers with action x_2 to stimulus x_3 under conditions x_4; x_1 is responsive.
x_3 stimulates x_1 into reaction x_2, x_3 stimulates reaction x_2 (= {terfra} for place reordering); attempt to stimulate, prod (= {terfratoi}, {tunterfratoi}). See also {preti}, {danfu}, {spuda}, {cpedu}, {tarti}.

fraxu

gismu
-fax-
x_1 forgives x_2 for event/state/activity x_3.
See also {dunda}, {curmi}, {zungi}.

fregau

lujvo
g_1 (person/agent) fertilises g_2=f_1 for supporting the growth/development of x_3=f_2.

fretaimlunra

x1 pertains to the Fertile Crescent region/geography/nationality/culture/history in property/aspect x2

frica

gismu
-fic-
x_1 differs/is distinct from/contrasts with/is unlike x_2 in property/dimension/quantity x_3.
Also other-than (less common meaning). See also {ranxi}, {drata}, {dunli}, {simsa}, {vrici}.

fricau

lujvo
x_1=l_1=c_1 misses out on experience x_2=l_2.

frigau

lujvo
x_1 makes x_2 undergo experience x_3; x_1 treats x_2 in manner x_3.

frikadeli

x_1 is a boiled meatball (meal; a ball of minced or ground meat, boiled) consisting of x_2
{polpeta} is a more generic term. See also {tefteli}, {sanmi}, {rectu}

frikasi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a fricassee, pieces of chicken or other meat stewed in gravy with e.g. carrots and onions and served with noodles or dumplings

x_1 reflects African culture/nationality/geography in aspect x_2.
See also {ropno}, {xazdo}.

From {friko} {tumla}. See also {zdotu'a}, {rontu'a}, {tcotu'a}, {sralytu'a}, {bemtu'a}, {ziptu'a}

frikyxasli

lujvo
f_1=x_1 is an African wild ass [Equus africanus] of subspecies/breed x_2.

frili

gismu
-fil-
x_1 (action) is easy/simple/facile for x_2 (agent) under conditions x_3; x_2 does x_1 freely/easily.
See also {nandu}, {sampu}, {zifre}.

frimo'i

lujvo
x_1 remembers experience x_2 (li'i)
Synonymous with {vedli}. See also {lifri}, {morji}.

frinu

gismu
x_1 is a fraction, with numerator x_2, denominator x_3 (x_2/x_3).
See also {parbi}, {dilcu}, {mekso}, {fendi}, {fi'u}.

frinyna'u

lujvo
n_1 is a rational/fractional number.
{frinu} {namcu}. See also {tolfrinyna'u}, {xarna'u}, {tolxarna'u}, {mrena'u}, {lujna'u}

frisefa

fu'ivla
x_1 experiencing x_2 is prevented by x_3; x_1 misses (one sense) x_2
See {lifri}, {fanta}

friti

gismu
-fit-
x_1 offers/proffers x_2 [offering] to x_3 with conditions x_4.
(x_4 may be nu canja, nu pleji, etc.; an unconditional offering has the 'condition' of acceptance); x_2 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posfriti}, {posyselfriti} for unambiguous semantics). See also {canja}, {dunda}, {rinsa}, {vecnu}, {jdima}, {cnemu}, {pleji}, {vitke}.

frufengalu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a bandersnatch of species x_2

frufra

lujvo
fru_1=fra_1 frowns/grimaces at/in reaction to fra_3.

frumu

gismu
-fru-
x_1 frowns/grimaces (facial expression).
x_1 frowns/grimaces at/in reaction to x_2 (= {frufra}). See also {cmila}, {cisma}.

fu

cmavo
FA
sumti place tag: tag 5th sumti place.

fu'a

cmavo
FUhA
reverse Polish mathematical expression (mex) operator flag.

fu'a'ai

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: first Foias' constant; the unique value of x_1 such that x_n -> ∞ as n -> ∞ for x_{n+1} = (1 + (1/( x_n )))^n; such x_1 = 1.187…
See also: {fu'a'au}

fu'a'au

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: second Foias constant; the value x for which (1/x)(1 + (1/x))^x=1 is true; ≈ 2.293…
See also: {fu'a'ai}

fu'au

experimental cmavo
UI3
discursive: luckily - not pertaining to luck - unluckily.
Expresses fortune/misfortune of the speaker. Use {dai} to express fortune/misfortune of the listener. See also {funca}.

fu'e

cmavo
FUhE
begin indicator long scope.

fu'ei

experimental cmavo
FUhE
begin within-context quote.
Terminated by {fu'o}. Quoted text need not be grammatical on its own, but must be grammatical in context with the surrounding text.

fu'ei'a

experimental cmavo
UI
discursive: indicate a change in speaker to fo'a; used generally in quotations.
Considered to have sa'a attached to it by default. Using sa'anai would cancel that effect. Used to quote dialogues.

fu'ei'e

experimental cmavo
UI
discursive: indicate a change in speaker to fo'e; used generally in quotations.
Considered to have sa'a attached to it by default. Using sa'anai would cancel that effect. Used to quote dialogues.

fu'ei'i

experimental cmavo
UI
discursive: indicate a change in speaker to fo'i; used generally in quotations.
Considered to have sa'a attached to it by default. Using sa'anai would cancel that effect. Used to quote dialogues.

fu'ei'o

experimental cmavo
UI
discursive: indicate a change in speaker to fo'o; used generally in quotations.
Considered to have sa'a attached to it by default. Using sa'anai would cancel that effect. Used to quote dialogues.

fu'ei'u

experimental cmavo
UI
discursive: indicate a change in speaker to fo'u; used generally in quotations.
Considered to have sa'a attached to it by default. Using sa'anai would cancel that effect. Used to quote dialogues.

fu'esku

lujvo
c_1 blames/holds responsible/accuses f_1 for action/state f_2 from authority f_3 to audience c_3 with expression medium c_4.
Cf. {i'anai}.

fu'i

cmavo
UI5
attitudinal modifier: easy - difficult.
See also {frili}.

fu'inai

cmavo-compound
UI*5
attitudinal modifier: easy - difficult.

fu'ivla

lujvo
x_1=v_1=f_1 is a loanword meaning x_2=v_2 in language x_3=v_3, based on word x_4=f_2 in language x_5.
Historically also used to describe words in the Lojban morphological class allocated for use by {vonfu'ivla}; that sense is now deprecated in favor of {zi'evla}. See also {pavyfu'ivla}, {relfu'ivla}, {cibyfu'ivla}, {vonfu'ivla}, {zi'evla}, {le'avla}.

fukpi

gismu
-fuk-
-fu'i-
x_1 is a copy/replica/duplicate/clone of x_2 in form/medium x_3 made by method x_4 (event).
See also {krefu}, {rapli}, {gidva}.; Borrowing (={fu'ivla}).

fukpu'i

lujvo
f_4=p_1 pastes (during editing) f_2=p_2 from f_3.
Cf. {fukpi}, {punji}, {fukra'e}, {vicra'e}.

fukra'e

lujvo
f_4=r_1 copies (during editing) f_2=r_2 from f_3.
Cf. {fukpi}, {ralte}, {vicra'e}, {fukpu'i}.

fuksnacpi

lujvo
c_1=s_2 is a mockingbird of species c_2 which produces sound s_1 that is a copy of f_2.
Cf. {fukpi}, {sance}, {cipni}.

fukygau

lujvo
g_1 (agent) creates copy f_1 of f_2 in form/medium f_3 by method f_4 (event).
See also: {fukpi}, {gasnu}.

fukyvlarafsi

lujvo
r_1 is the rafsi prefix used in type-3 fu'ivla v_1=f_1, rafsi based on word r_2.
“rafsi prefix” is a term specific to Lojban and refers to the initial part of a type-3 fu'ivla which is a rafsi. x_2 is the word in which the rafsi is used, x_3 is the word from which the rafsi has been derived. See also: {cibyfu'ivla}, {fu'ivla}, {rafsi}.

fukyzifpo'e

lujvo
f_1=z_1=p_1 holds the copyright for copying f_2=p_2 under law p_3.
"Copyright" itself might be "si'o fukzifypo'e". If you are actually translating something with a copyright notice, you should leave the notice in the original language.

fulreto

fu'ivla
x_1 is a ferret (Mustela putorius furo) of the breed x_2
See {ermine}, {mutsteila}

fulta

gismu
-ful-
-flu-
x_1 (passive) floats on/in fluid (gas/liquid) x_2; x_1 is buoyant.
See also {limna}, {bloti}, {sakli}.

fultapla

lujvo
t_1=f_1 is a raft of material t_2 shape t_3 floating on f_2.
Cf. {bloti}, {greblo}.

funca

gismu
-fun-
-fu'a-
x_1 (event/property) is determined by the luck/fortune of x_2; (note mabla/zabna not implied).
See also {cunso}, {mabla}, {zabna}.

funduki

fu'ivla
x_1 is a hazel (nut/tree) of species x_2

funjdi

lujvo
j_1 decides/makes a decision j_2 (du'u) about j_3, whose outcome is determined by luck.
Cf. {funca}, {jdice}.

funtiio

fu'ivla
x_1 (plural of ordered pairs) is an exhaustive set (possibly infinite) of inputs/outputs defining a unary function which yields result x_3 when given input x_2; x_1(x_2) = x_3
"f(x) = z" == "fy funtiio xy fi zy". "lo ro se {zilbri} be lo ka ce'u {sumji} ce'u li pa" is a way to extract the input/output set of the relation "f(x) = x−1", so that you can use it as funtiio's x1. Using a la-name for referring to a function is also an option, for example "la .fankcyn. cu funtiio li re li ci". See also {fancu}, {fancuka}.

fu'o

cmavo
FUhO
end indicator long scope; terminates scope of all active indicators.

furfipsanso

lujvo
sa_1 is fish sauce for use with sa_2, containing ingredients including sa_3.
Cf. {kukfusra}, {tsapi}, {silna}, {sobysanso}.

furfuru

fu'ivla
x_1 is dandruff in/on x_2 caused by x_3.

furjargasta

lujvo
x_1=g1=j1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains stainless steel
see also: {fusra}, {jdari}, {gasta}

furso'epesxu

lujvo
f_1=p_1 is fermented bean paste of soybeans s_1=p_2.
Fermented bean paste is a category of fermented foods typically made from ground soybeans, which are indigenous to the cuisines of East and Southeast Asia, such as miso.

furtifa

fu'ivla
x_1 rusts
Shortening of {furtirfarvi}.

furtirfarvi

lujvo
x_1 rusts

furtirse

lujvo
t_1=f_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of rust.
Cf. {fusra}, {tirse}.

fusra

gismu
-fur-
x_1 rots/decays/ferments with decay/fermentation agent x_2; x_1 is rotten/decayed/fermented.
See also {birje}, {vanju}, {vifne}.

fu'u

cmavo
VUhU0
n-ary mathematical operator: elliptical/unspecified mathematical expression (mex) operator.

fuzma'u

lujvo
x_1 is old enough to have responsibility x_2, according to standard x_3
See {flama'u}, {kralyma'u}

fuzme

gismu
-fuz-
-fu'e-
x_1 is responsible/accountable for x_2 (action/resulting state) to judge/authority x_3.
See also {bilga}.

fuzrai

lujvo
t_1=f1 is a director/trustee on the board of directors/trustees of f_2.
Cf. {traji}, {fuzme}, {fuzraikamni}, {kagnytruralju}, {kagnyja'a}.

fuzraikamni
