Cf. {kinli}, {grana}, {rerga'a}.

kilga'axa'i

lujvo
x_1=xa_1=g_1=k_1 is a lance/spear/javelin/pointed-rod weapon for use against x_2=xa_2 by x_3=xa_3 of material x_4=g_2.
{kinli} {grana} {xarci}; this lujvo structure is from {noralujv}. The author of this definition is uncertain that {jesxa'i} would not be a better lujvo for the purpose.

kilpunli

lujvo
x_1 is a spine or thorn protruding from x_2
See {kinli}, {punli}.

kilto

gismu
-ki'o-
x_1 is a thousand [1000; 10^3] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).
See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}, {minli}

kinda

experimental gismu
x_1 is kinda like x_2 in property x_3
This is a joke word. Its main use is in the tanru {kinda} {sorta}

kindi'u

lujvo
d_1 is a movie theater / cinema (building) showing movies/films s_1.
See also: {skina} (movie).

kinjipu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a thorn on x_2

kinkaju

fu'ivla
x_1 is a kinkajou (Potos flavus) of species/subspecies x_2
See {arxokuna}

kinli

gismu
-kil-
x_1 is sharp/keen at locus x_2.
See also {balre}, {dakfu}, {jesni}.

kinmoi

lujvo
x_1 is the x_2 (number)-th episode in broadcast series x_3

kinpau

lujvo
x_1=s_1=p_1 is an episode about x_2=s_2 [plot/subject] by filmmaker x_3=s_3 for audience x_4=s_4, as a part of series x_5=p_2
The x_2 place always describes an episode, but can therefore be used transitively to describe the series x_5. This is not necessarily a television series and can refer to an episodic film series as well.

kinpei

lujvo
p_1=s_3=s_4 thinks about subject p_2=s_2 by imagining s_1 which is like an imaginary movie about that subject.

kinpoisle

lujvo
x_1 is an individual program in radio or television series x_2
See also {kinmoi}

kinrxanime

fu'ivla
x_1 is an anime about x_2 [plot/theme/subject/activity], filmmaker x_3, for audience x_4.
Cf. {skina}.

kinsle

lujvo
x_1=s_1 is a frame from motion picture x_2=k_1 about x_3=k_2 [plot/theme/subject/activity]
(skina x3, x4 omitted for lack of usefulness). See also {skina} for some useful lujvo you can tanru-ize this with -- e.g. "selxraci'a skina" -> 'frame of drawn animation', {selci}

kinzga

lujvo
x_1=z_1 watches movie/film/audio-video x_2=z_2=s_1 about subject x_3=s_2 by filmmaker x_4=s_3 intended for audience x_5=s_4 by sensory means x_6=z_3 under conditions x_7=z_4
{velskina} is less appropriate because it isn't true that the entire intended audience of a film will watch it, not to mention that it is possible to watch films of which one is not a part of the intended audience. See also {skina}, {zgana}.

ki'o

cmavo
PA3
digit/number: number comma; thousands.

ki'odje

lujvo
d1 is d2 full kilodays (thousand day unit) in duration (default is 1 kiloday) by standard d3
For use with metric dating system.

ki'ogra

lujvo
g_1 is g_2 kilograms in mass by standard g_3.

ki'oi

experimental cmavo
BAI
se kibzva modal, 1st place: at website/Internet resource...
Alternative to the common metaphoric use of {bu'u}. See {kibzva}, {kibystu}, {kibro}

ki'orbaitni

fu'ivla
x_1 is measured in x_2 (default 1) kilobytes (10^3 bytes)
See {kilto}, {baitni}, {kirbibaitni}, {ki'orbitni}. // Series: {ki'orbaitni} {megbaitni} {gigbaitni} {tetybaitni} {petybaitni} {xexybaitni} {zepybaitni} {gotybaitni}

ki'orbi

fu'ivla
x_1 is 1024 (2^10) of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default units)
Informal combining form: kirbi-. See {kirbibitni}, {kirbibaitni}, {kilto}. // Series: {ki'orbi} {me'orbi} {gi'orbi} {te'orbi} {pe'orbi} {xe'orbi} {ze'orbi} {go'orbi}

ki'orbitni

lujvo
x_1 is measured in x_2 (default 1) kilobits (10^3 bits)
See {kilto}, {bitni}, {kirbibitni}, {ki'orbaitni}. // Series: {ki'orbitni} {megbitni} {gigbitni} {tetybitni} {petybitni} {xexybitni} {zepybitni} {gotybitni}

ki'orbivysamsle

lujvo
se1 is (close to) a thousand of eight indivisible, most basic computer subunits of computer se2; se1 is a kilobyte
In binary a kilobyte is actually 1024 bytes, but we can round off for brevity, and to parallel the metric units.

ki'orna'a

lujvo
n1 is n2 millennia (1000 years) in duration (default is 1 millennium) by standard n3.
"Millennium" not limited to decimal equivalent of "1000".

ki'otre

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 kilometres long in direction x_3 by standard x_4.
Cf. {gusminli}, {darno}.

kirbibaitni

fu'ivla
x_1 is measured in x_2 (default 1) kibibytes (2^10 bytes)
See {ki'orbi}, {baitni}, {ki'orbaitni}, {kirbibitni}. // Series: {kirbibaitni} {merbibaitni} {girbibaitni} {terbibaitni} {perbibaitni} {xerbibaitni} {zerbibaitni} {gorbibaitni}

kirbibitni

fu'ivla
x_1 is measured in x_2 (default 1) kibibits (2^10 bits)
See {ki'orbi}, {bitni}, {ki'orbitni}, {kirbibaitni}. // Series: {kirbibitni} {merbibitni} {girbibitni} {terbibitni} {perbibitni} {xerbibitni} {zerbibitni} {gorbibitni}

kircaiu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a shark of species x_2
See also {finpe}, {xamsi}

kirsku

lujvo
x_1 thanks/gives thanks to x_2 for x_3 (property) via medium x_4
See also {ckire}.

kisru'u

lujvo
r_1 is measured in pakistani rupee (₨; PKR) as r_2 (quantity), in the Algerian monetary system r_3.

kisto

gismu
-kis-
x_1 reflects Pakistani/Pashto culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2.
See also {xurdo}.

kisybau

lujvo
k_1=b_1 is the Pakistani Urdu language used by b_2 to communicate b_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote)
from {kisto} {bangu} c.f. {xurbau}.

kisyglibau

lujvo
k_1=g_1=b_1 is the Pakistani English language used by b_2 to express/communicate b_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).
Cf. {kisto}, {glico}, {bangu}, {glibau}, {bangenugu}, {kisybau}

kisygu'e

lujvo
k_1=g_1 is Pakistan.
Cf. {kisto}, {gugde}, {gugdepuku}. The 'national' language of Pakistan is {xurbau}.

kitselzba

lujvo
x_1 is pottery made by x_2 of clay x_3.
see also {staku}

kitybli

lujvo
b_1 is a clay-based building brick of composition k_2, surfaces/sides s_4.
Cf. {kliti}, {bliku}.

kitybo'i

lujvo
b_1 is a clay bottle/jar/urn/flask/closable container made of clay for b2_2 with lid b_4.

kityzba

lujvo
x_1 is a potter who makes x_2 out of clay x_3.
see also {kitselzba}, {staku}

ki'u

cmavo
BAI
krinu modal, 1st place (justified by) justifiably; because of reason ...

ki'u ma

cmavo-compound
BAI*
sumti question asking for a rational explanation/justification; why?.

ki'unai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
na'e krinu modal, 1st place; regardless of

klacpe

lujvo
c_1 calls/summons c_3=k_1 to location k_2 in manner/form c_4.
Cf. {cpedu}.

klafle

lujvo
x_1 is a flux/traffic of pedestrians/vehicles x_2 going to x_3 from x_4
See also {flecu}

klagau

lujvo
x_1 brings x_2 to x_3
See {klama}, {gasnu}, {bevri}, {benji}

klagi'a

lujvo
x_1 leads/guides x_2 to x_3 from x_4 via route x_5
{klama} {gidva}

klaje'i

lujvo
j_1=k_1 follows j_2 to destination k_2 from origin k_3 via route k_4 by means k_5.
Cf. {klama}, {jersi}.

klaji

gismu
-laj-
x_1 is a street/avenue/lane/drive/cul-de-sac/way/alley/[road] at x_2 accessing x_3.
Also corridor; not typically a route between points, but offers access to sites along it. See also {naxle}, {panka}, {pluta}, {dargu}.

klakla

lujvo
x_1 go and return to x_2 from x_3 via x_4 by using x_5
it means "x1 go to x2 from x3, and then x1 go to x3 from x2".

klaktno

obsolete fu'ivla
x1 pertains to Clactonian technological industry/culture/know-how of period and location (specifics) x2 in properties x3.

klaku

gismu
-kak-
x_1 weeps/cries tears x_2 about/for reason x_3 (event/state).
See also {badri}, {krixa}.

klama

gismu
-kla-
x_1 comes/goes to destination x_2 from origin x_3 via route x_4 using means/vehicle x_5.
Also travels, journeys, moves, leaves to ... from ...; x_1 is a traveller; (x_4 as a set includes points at least sufficient to constrain the route relevantly). See also {cadzu}, {bajra}, {marce}, {vofli}, {litru}, {muvdu}, {cpare}, cmavo list {ka'a}, {pluta}, {bevri}, {farlu}, {limna}, {vitke}.

klamau

lujvo
z_1, more than z_2, goes to k_2 from k_3 via k_4 by means of k_5.
Mentioned in example 12.91 (cll 1.1).

klamburi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a pun on x_2 and x_3 (meanings of a word or similar words)

klami'e

lujvo
m_1 summons m_2=k_1 to k_2 from k_3 via route k_4.
Cf. {klama}, {minde}, {klacpe}.

klamu'o

lujvo
x_1=k_1=m_1 arrives at x_2=k_2 from x_3=k_3 by route x_4=k_4 with transportation means x_5=k_5 by completion standard x_6=m_3
cf. {klama}, {mulno}.

klani

gismu
-lai-
x_1 is a quantity quantified/measured/enumerated by x_2 (quantifier) on scale x_3 (si'o).
Also count. See also cmavo list {la'u}, {namcu}.

klanrbeli

fu'ivla
x_1 measures x_2 bels on scale x_3 (si'o).
One bel is equal to 10 decibels. Cf. {klani}, {sance}, {cladu}.

klanrdjuli

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 joule(s) of energy (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {djaule}, {klanrniut,ni}, {klanrxuati}.

klanrfaradi

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 farad(s) of capacitance (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {terdikca}, {xampo}.

klanrniut,ni

obsolete fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 newton (s) of force (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {niutni}, {ki'orgratretrefrinynidysnidu}.

klanrpaskali

fu'ivla
x_1 is x_2 pascal(s) of pressure (default is 1) by standard x_3.
Cf. {klanrniut,ni}.

klanrtesla

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 tesla(s) of magnetic field B (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {maksi}.

klanrvolta

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 volt(s) of electromotive force (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {xampo}, {klanrxomi}, {klanrxuati}, {klanrdjuli}, {terdikca}.

klanrxenri

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 henry/henries of inductance (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {enri}, {klanrvolta}, {xampo}.

klanrxertsi

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 hertz of frequency (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {ertso}, {klani}

klanrxomi

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 ohm(s) of electrical impedance/resistance (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {omso}, {xampo}, {klanrvolta}, {klanrxuati}, {klanrzimenzi}.

klanrxuati

obsolete fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 watt(s) of power (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Deprecated since the prohibition on consonants followed by glides; see {uatno}. Cf. {klanrdjuli}, {klanrvolta}, {xampo}.

klanrzimenzi

fu'ivla
g_1 is g_2 siemens of electrical conductance (default is 1) by standard g_3.
{klanrxomi}, {klanrvolta}, {xampo}.

klapri

lujvo
p_1 is a track on p_2

klasazri

lujvo
x_1=s_1=k_1 drives x_2=s_2=k_5 to x_3=k_2 from x_4=k_3 via route x_5=k_4
Used to specify agentive operation of the transportation vehicle, as opposed to simply being carried by it. See also {sazri}, {klama}, {ma'ekla}

klasiko

fu'ivla
x_1 is (a) classic in/of genre/type x_2 in aspects/features x_3 by standard/judgment of x_4
Generally considered to be transcendent, great, exceptionally good in overall quality, artistic and expressive, and (capable of) enduring.

klasta

lujvo
x_1 keeps going, with destination x_2

klasti

lujvo
x_1 stops going/halts

klatcu

lujvo
x_1 needs to go to location x_2 for purpose/action x_3
See {klama}, {nitcu}, {zvatcu}, {bilga}, {cliva}, {ei}

klaunji

fu'ivla
x_1 is blackseed/nigella of species/variety x_2

klavikorda

fu'ivla
x_1 is a harpsichord
See also {pipna}

klavile

fu'ivla
x_1 is a piano/fortepiano
{pipno} is a more generic term

klavire

fu'ivla
x_1 is a clavier (harpsichord, clavichord, fortepiano)
{pipno} is a more generic term

klecmi

lujvo
x_1 is a member of class / category x_2 (mass / plurality), within supergroup x_3, with defining quality x_4
See {klesi}, {cmima}, {kleinzu}

kleinzu

fu'ivla
x_1 (mass / plurality) is a class / category / subgroup / subset including members x_2, with defining property x_3 (ka), within superset x_4 (mass)
See {klesi}, {gunma}, {lanzu}. Suggested morphemes: -klei-, -leiu-

klenilbra

lujvo
x_1 is the measure of set x_2 by measure x_3

klesi

gismu
-kle-
-lei-
x_1 (mass/si'o) is a class/category/subgroup/subset within x_2 with defining property x_3 (ka).
Also taxon, type, kind, classification, species, genus, family, order, phylum. See also cmavo list {le'a}, {cmima}, {jutsi}, {ciste}, {girzu}, {lanzu}, {vrici}.

klesnregio

obsolete fu'ivla
k_1 is a domain (biology) [taxonomic rank] within Tree of Life k_2 with defining property k_3 (ka)
From latin "regio" (=domain).

klesnregnu

fu'ivla
k_1 is a kingdom (biology) [taxonomic rank] within domain k_2 with defining property k_3 (ka)
From latin "regnum" (=kingdom).

klesrcinse

fu'ivla
x_1 in activity/state x_2 exhibits gender/sex x_3 (ka) by standard x_4 according to judge x_5; x_5 genders x_1 as x_3.
See also {cinse}, {fetsi}, {nakni}, {nanla}, {nanmu}, {ninmu}, {nixli}. x4 could be gender identity, gender presentation, social role, legal sex, chromosomal sex, anatomical sex, etc.

klesrfilu

fu'ivla
k_1 is a phylum (biology) [taxonomic rank] within kingdom k_2 with defining property k_3 (ka).

klesrklasi

fu'ivla
k_1 is a class (biology) [taxonomic rank] within phylum k_2 with defining property k_3 (ka)
From latin "classis" (=class).

kli'iki

fu'ivla
x_1 clicks on x_2, causing x_3 (nu).
Specifically refers to the act of selection within a computer device, and is agnostic as to the form of the device. cf. {samxa'e}, {xanyuidje}, {klikmuga}, {klikeco'a}, {klikeru'i}, {klikemo'u}

klikeco'a

fu'ivla
x_1 grabs (starts click-drag action) x_2 from locus x_3
See {kli'iki}, {co'a}, {klikmuga}, {klikeru'i}, {klikemo'u}

klikeia

fu'ivla
x_1 clicks (press and release) button/switch x_2
See also {cuxna}, {batke}, {danre}, {kliki}

klikemo'u

fu'ivla
x_1 drops (completes click-drag action) x_2 at locus x_3
See {kli'iki}, {mo'u}, {klikmuga}, {klikeco'a}, {klikeru'i}

klikenu'o

fu'ivla
x_1 hovers (move computer cursor over without clicking) over locus x_2
See {kli'iki}, {klikeco'a}, {klikeru'i}, {klikemo'u}, {klikmuga}, {xanyuidje}

klikeru'i

fu'ivla
x_1 holds (continues click-drag action) x_2 over locus x_3
See {kli'iki}, {ru'i}, {klikmuga}, {klikeco'a}, {klikemo'u}

kliki

experimental gismu
x_1 (text, sound) is a click sound
See {sa'ei}, {mosra}

klikmuga

fu'ivla
x_1 drags (computer term) x_2 to x_3 from x_4
See {kli'iki}, {muvgau}, {klikeco'a}, {klikeru'i}, {klikemo'u}

klina

gismu
-kli-
x_1 (object/medium) is clear/transparent/without obstacle to in-the-clear x_2 [transmission].
Also lucid; x_2 remains apparent/lucid/clear (figurative use for 'understandable' is discouraged, better expressed as = {filseljmi} or {filsmu}). (cf. {kandi}, {zunti} - {nalzu'i} is better for 'unhindered')

klirnastati

fu'ivla
k_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of astatine (At).

klirnbromi

fu'ivla
k_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of bromine (Fl).

klirnflori

fu'ivla
k_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of fluorine (Fl).

klirniodi

obsolete fu'ivla
k_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of iodine (I).

kliru

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of halogen of type x_2 [chlorine, fluorine, iodine, etc.].
Also bromine; default chlorine. See also {xukmi}.

klisodva

lujvo
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of a clear/transparent carbonated beverage/soda of sweet flavor, of brand x_2.
Not any carbonated beverage, but one which is transparent and with sweet flavor, like Sprite (=sprait), 7-up, Sockerdricka (=a soft drink that is consumed in Sweden) or similar. Another flavor may be added and expressed as a tanru, as long as the combination doesn't differ too much from the characteristics of klisodva.

kliti

gismu
-kit-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of clay [moist, clammy dirt] of composition including x_2.
See also {dertu}, {pesxu}, {staku}.

klivlynd

cmevla
Cleveland

klombia

obsolete fu'ivla
p_1 reflects Colombian culture/nationality/geography/dialect in aspect p_2

kloviano

obsolete fu'ivla
x1 pertains to Clovis/Llano Paleoamerican (North American) lithic technological industry/culture/know-how/people of period and location (specifics) x2 in properties x3

kluce'u

lujvo
c_1 is a society of c_2=k_2 with cultural aspects k_1.
Cf. {cecmu}, {kulnu}, {jikca}, {kulnu}.

klulei

lujvo
x_1=ku_1=kl_1 is a cultural subset within a larger culture x_2=kl_2 with defining property x_3=ku_2=kl_3.
See also: {klesi}, {kulnu}

klupau

lujvo
x_1 is a meme of culture x_2
See {kulnu} {pagbu}

klupe

gismu
-lup-
-lu'e-
x_1 is a screw [fastener] for purpose x_2, threads [pitch, material] x_3, frame [size, material] x_4.
Also bolt. See also {korcu}, {sarlu}, {tutci}.

klura'a

lujvo
s1 pertains to culture of s2=k2
Cultural gismu replacement lujvo for cultures: From gismu {kulnu} and {srana}

kluske

lujvo
s_1 is social anthropology.
Cf. {kulnu}, {saske}, {jikske}

kluza

gismu
-luz-
x_1 (obj.) is loose/bloused/not tight on x_2 (obj.) at locus x_3.
See also {tagji}, {trati}, {rinju}.

kluzei

lujvo
z_1 is a taboo in culture z_2=k_1.

ko

cmavo
KOhA3
pro-sumti: you (imperative); make it true for you, the listener.

ko'a

cmavo
KOhA4
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #1 (specified by goi).

ko'au

experimental cmavo
BAI
kosmu modal, 1st place with purpose...
See {seko'au}, {kosmu}, {tezu'e}, {tepi'o}, {tefi'e}, {ki'u}

kobli

gismu
-kob-
-ko'i-
x_1 is a quantity of cabbage/lettuce/leafy vegetable of species/strain x_2.
See also {stagi}.

koblrolerakeia

fu'ivla
x1 is cauliflower of strain x2

koblrsinapi

fu'ivla
x_1 is mustard of species/variety x_2.
especially mustard greens; see also {spatrsinapi}, {tsijrsinapi}, {sansrmustardo}

kobrkrisantemu

fu'ivla
k_1 is a quantity of garland chrysantemum/chop suey green/crown daisy (Chrysantemum coronarium) of strain/cultivar k_2.

kobrlaktuka

fu'ivla
k_1 is a quantity of lettuce (genus Lactuca) of strain/cultivar k_2.

kobrsonku

fu'ivla
k_1 is a quantity of hare lettuce/raraki of species/strain x2.

kobrtaraksaku

fu'ivla
s_1 is a quantity of dandelion leaves (genus Taraxacum) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

kobysalta

lujvo
s_1 (mass) is a quantity of green/garden salad [food] with ingredients/components including k_1=s_2 (mostly fresh leafy vegetables).

ko'e

cmavo
KOhA4
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #2 (specified by goi).

kognato

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cognate of x_2
See {valsi}, {lengua}

kogno

experimental gismu
x_1 (entity) is cognitive in that it allows knowing x_2 (proposition)
See also {facki}, {djuno}.

koi

cmavo
BAI
korbi modal, 1st place (bordered by) bounded by ...

ko'i

cmavo
KOhA4
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #3 (specified by goi).

koidru

lujvo
k_1 is an overhanging portion of roof d_1=k_2, which is a roof of d_2.
See also: {korbi}, {drudi}.

koi'e

experimental cmavo
TOIhE
UI-cmavo parenthesis/separator: start grouping
This word is intended to "separate" cmavo in a UI-clause; it can separate the UI-cmavo a {toi'e} parenthetical will attach to. For example, in (iuro'o toi'e uinai), (uinai) would attach to (iuro'o), while in (iu koi'e ro'o toi'e uinai), (uinai) would attach only to (ro'o). /It can also override the normal "priority order" of how attitudinal-modifiers like {ro'a} and {dai} affect each other; this order is currently ill-defined, however. /Elidable terminator: {toi'o}

koinde

fu'ivla
x_1 orders/commands/exhorts/pleads/hopes/suggests to x_2 to be/do x_3 (property)
Predicate version of {ko'oi}. See also, {ko}

koinka

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cognac distilled from grapes x_2.
Cf. {xalka}, {jikru}, {vanjyjikru}, {vanju}. For brandies without an AOC designation use {vanjyjikru}.

koinside

fu'ivla
x_1 (event) coincides with x_2 in x_3 (property); x_1 (event) is a coincidence, an event that might have been arranged although it was really accidental
x_3 can describe x_1 and x_2 happening at the same time/place etc.

koi'o

experimental cmavo
PA5
quaternion k
Works like {ka'o} (as a comma) and is isomorphic to it. See also: {ka'o}, {kai'o}, {kei'o}, {kau'o}.

koizva

lujvo
z_1 is at an edge/margin/border/curb/boundary of k_2 next-to/bordering-on k_3.

kojna

gismu
-koj-
-ko'a-
x_1 is a corner/point/at-least-3-dimensional [solid] angle [shape/form] in/on x_2, of material x_3.
Also apex; a corner exists on three dimensions but need not be limited to points; it suggests a discontinuity in slope in some direction; i.e. in some planar cross-section. See also {jipno}, {konju}, {bliku}, {fanmo}, {jganu}, {krasi}.

kokain

cmevla
cocaine

kokaKOlys

cmevla
Coca-Cola.

kokcinela

fu'ivla
x_1 is a ladybug/ladybird/lady beetle of genus/species x_2.
see {cakcinki}, {spacivla}

kokso

experimental gismu
x_1 is a coconut of variety/cultivar x_2
See also {cidja}, {rutrkoko}

koksypalma

lujvo
x_1 is a coco palm tree of species x_2
Cf. {kokso}, {palma}, {tricu}

koksytricu

lujvo
x_1 is a coco palm tree of species x_2
Cf. {koksypalma}, {kokso}, {tricu}

kokteili

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cocktail containing x_2
See also {jisra}, {barja}

kolbasa

fu'ivla
x_1 is a sausage made of x_2.
Not necessarily with a gut skin; see also {tisycanti}.

kolcna

lujvo
c_1 is a coal shovel [a shovel for coal].

KOLkatas

cmevla
Kolkata

kolmba

fu'ivla
x_1 is a pigeon/dove of genus/species x_2.
more general than {tcacpi}

kolme

gismu
-kol-
-ko'e-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of coal/peat/anthracite/bitumen from source x_2.
See also {tabno}, {tarla}.

kolonel

cmevla
colonel

komcu

gismu
-kom-
x_1 is a comb [many-needled shape] of material x_2 with tines/needles x_3.
See also {julne}, {forca}, {burcu}.

komka'a

lujvo
ko_1=ka_1 is a saw [many-bladed tool] cutting/splitting/dividing ka_2 into pieces ka_3
See also {komcu}, {katna}, {carka'a}

kompadi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a CD/compact disc storing information/with content x_2

kompaso

fu'ivla
x_1 is a navigational compass

kompata

fu'ivla
x_1 is compact in property x_2 (ka)

kompli

lujvo
x_1 combs x_2

kompote

fu'ivla
x_1 is a fruit tea made of x_2
can be made out of either fresh or stewed fruits. See also {grute}, {tcati}

konceto

fu'ivla
x_1 is concerto number x_2 in key x_3 composed by x_4 performed by/at x_5( event).
Cf. {zgike}, {nolzgi}, {konceto zei pagbu}, {pipnrpaino zei konceto}, {jgitrviolino zei konceto}, {simfoni}, {zgifi'i}.

konceto zei pagbu

zei-lujvo
p_1 is a movement of concerto for solo instruments k_2, number k_3 in key k_4 composed by k_5.
Cf. {konceto}, {pagbu}, {zgike}, {nolzgi}, {simfoni}.

kondomo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a condom of x_2 size for x_3 sex and x_4 material

konfabu

fu'ivla
x_1 (group) confabs, confabulates, talk socially about x_2 without intentionally exchanging much information
See also {casnu}, {jikca}

konfeti

fu'ivla
x_1 is confetti

konfuzi

fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to the Confucist culture/religion/ethos in aspect x_2

konjaku

fu'ivla
x_1 is konjac of species/variety x_2.
see also {samcrtaro}, {samcu}

konju

gismu
-kon-
-ko'u-
x_1 is a cone [shape/form] of material x_2 with vertex x_3.
Also ellipse, ellipsoid (= {konclupa}). See also {jesni}, {djine}, {sovda}, {kojna}, {jganu}.

konkatena

fu'ivla
x_1 (sequence) is the concatenation of sequences x_2 and x_3 (and x_4...)
See also {porsi}. Operator/connective: {joi'i}

konku'u

lujvo
c_1=k_1 is a spruce (genus Picea) of species/strain c_2 with cones c_3 with vertex k_3

konservatoria

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a conservatoire

konsonanta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a consonant sound
Also {zunsna}

konsula

fu'ivla
x_1 is a consul

kontinenta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a continent

kontribute

fu'ivla
x_1 contributes with x_2 to x_3
See also {dunda}

konvoke

fu'ivla
x_1 convokes, convenes a meeting x_2 (event)

ko'o

cmavo
KOhA4
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #4 (specified by goi).

ko'oi

experimental cmavo
UI6
discursive: imperative/hortative
``{ko}'' is a short form of ''{do} {ko'oi}''; broader term than {au}, {a'o}, {e'o}, {e'u}, {e'a}, {ei}; {minde}, {cpedu}, {curmi}, {pacna}, {stidi}, {djica}, {bilga}

ko'otli

fu'ivla
x_1 is a coyote of subspecies/breed x_2.
Cf. {gerku}, {labno}, {lorxu}, {tcakali}.

korbi

gismu
-kor-
-koi-
x_1 is an edge/margin/border/curb/boundary of x_2 next-to/bordering-on x_3.
See also cmavo list {koi}, {greku}, {mlana}, {jimte}, {ctebi}, {bartu}.

korbipe

fu'ivla
x_1 is the interface (mutually shared boundary) between entities x_2 (plural) allowing interaction x_3 between them

korcu

gismu
-kro-
(adjective:) x_1 is bent/crooked/not straight or direct/[twisted]/folded.
See also {cinje}, {klupe}, {kruvi}, {polje}, {sarlu}, {sirji}, {bargu}, {genxu}.

korfaipletomino

fu'ivla
x1 is a non-polyplet polyform/polyomino/polyabolo/polyiamond (etc.) composed of parts/'tile' polytope x2 arranged in (finite) unified shape/pattern x3 (in which the entirety of sides of polytopes are shared or are not shared at all) in ambient space x4 and subject to rules/restrictions/conditions x5 (implicitly includes the condition of whole sides being shared)
The hyper-edges of the 'tile' polytopes must be shared entirely or not at all with at least one other distinct such 'tile' polytope (should it exist); they cannot be touching only at the corners- the most touch adjacently along the entirety of a side/edge/face/hyper-edge. This obviously restricts which polytopes can be arranged meaningfully in a valid arrangement/pattern (and thus restricts those patterns). See also: {pletomino}

korgretro

lujvo
t_1 controls g_1=t_2 who crosses g_2=k_1 to g_3=k_2 from g_4=k_2.
see also {natmi}, {pagre}, {jaspu}

korka

gismu
-kok-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of cork/bark from tree/species x_2; [material].
See also {tricu}, {calku}, {skapi}, {stagi}.

korpora

fu'ivla
x_1 is a corpus of/a large collection of texts x_2.
Additional future place structures might be how the material is processed (annotations) and information about how the data was collected.

korporalo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a corporal

korsari

fu'ivla
x_1 is a pirate, corsair
See {bloti}, {zekri}

korsenta

lujvo
s_1=k_1 is a cortex (outermost layer) of structure s_3=k_2.
x2 may be an organ, a cell, a plant, or a rock. Cf. {skapi}, {pilka}, {sefta}.

korvo

experimental gismu
s_1 is a crow/raven of species s_2.
See {cipnrkorvo} for a non-experimental version of this word.

korzeti

fu'ivla
x_1 is corzetti (a handmade pasta shape originating from Liguria, Italy) imprinted with pattern/family crest x_2 using corzetti stamp x_3

kosmu

experimental gismu
x_1 (abstraction) is a purpose/use of x_2 (object or event), attributed by x_3
Place structure has been inverted from the original version to match {krinu}. Syn. {erpi}. See {ko'au}, {terpli}, {terzu'e}, {terfi'i}

kosmycau

lujvo
x_1 is pointless / futile / useless according to x_2
Syn. {nonselkosmu}

kosmyka'u

lujvo
x_1 (abstraction) is a use-case / expected usage scenario of x_2 (object/event)
From {kosmu} + {kantu}. See also {pilno}, {vanbi}

kosmyvrici

lujvo
x_1 has many/diverse purposes, including purpose x_2 (abstraction)
{kosmu}, {vrici}

kosta

gismu
-kos-
x_1 is a coat/jacket/sweater/cloak/[cape/shawl/pullover] [extra outer garment] of material x_2.
See also {pastu}, {sunla}, {taxfu}.

kotledona

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cotyledon of seed x_2 of plant x_3.

kotleta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cutlet

kotybakni

lujvo
b_1 is highland cattle/kyloe of variety/breed b_2.

kotygu'e

lujvo
g_1 is Scotland (country).
Cf. {ritygu'e}, {gligu'e}.

kotyjikryckafi

lujvo
c_1 is a quantity of Gaelic/Irish/Highland coffee with Scotch whisky/Irish whiskey j_1=s_1.
See also: liqueur coffee (={jikryckafi}), Whisky coffee (={ckafruiski}).

ko'u

cmavo
KOhA4
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #5 (specified by goi).

krafamtei

lujvo
x_1 is the duration of x_2.
See also {ze'a}, {ze'e}, {ze'i}, {ze'o}, {ditcu}, {faurtei}

kraga'igau

lujvo
gas_1 resets/changes gal_1 to its original value/content.
Cf. {krasi}, {galfi}, {gasnu}, {ninga'igau}.

kraice

fu'ivla
x_1 is loyal / faithful to x_2 (person, institution, or custom)
See {stace}, {traide}, {lacy'inda}

kraislr

cmevla
Chrysler

krakene

fu'ivla
x_1 is a kraken of species x_2
See also {luska}

krakeni

fu'ivla
x_1 is a kraken (mythological sea creature) of type/mythology x_2

krakoziabra

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 (text) is a krakozyabry, mojibake, illegible, corrupt symbol or text, usually caused by mismatched encoding
See also {iunkoda}, {aski}, {lertermifra}

krali

experimental gismu
x_1 (NU) is a legal/moral entitlement of x_2 (individual/mass) by standard x_3. x_2 is a legal person.
Normative principles, variously construed as legal, social, or moral freedoms or entitlements. {rarkrali} for "natural rights and {flakrali} for "legal rights"; {xuskrali} for "claim rights" and {zifkrali} for "liberty rights"; {srakrali} for "positive rights" and {ri'urkrali} for "negative rights"; {sepkrali} for "individual rights" and {gumkrali} for "group rights"; {selcemkrali} for "civil rights" and {seljeckrali} for "political rights"; {jiknykrali} for "economic rights", {jikykrali} for "social rights", and {klukrali} for "cultural rights"; {remkrali} for "human rights" and {dalkrali} for "animal rights"; perhaps {kralyxai} for "violate". Cf. {selfla}, {selzi'e}, {terzi'e}, {selzau}, {selpikta}.

kralyma'u

lujvo
x_1 is old enough to be entitled to x_2 (abstraction), according to x_3
See {flama'u}, {fuzma'u}

kralyxaigle

lujvo
x_1=g_1 sexually violates/harms/rapes/violates the sexual rights of victim x_2=g_2=xai_2=k_2, violation by sexual activity (sex used as a weapon/means of harm), in property x_3=xai_3 (ka) by resulting in injury x_4=xai_4 (state), violating right x_5=k_1 (event) which is morally/legally guaranteed but actually violated under standards x_6=k_3.
Violated right k_1 (event) may be implied by x4. The harm/violation must be by sexual activity (what one would consider {gletu}) and must be sexual in nature. Need not be violent. Harm may not be physical or even psychological/mental/emotional; it need only be a 'harm to one's rights' (in other words, a violation of loi {krali}). {krali} is an experimental gismu. The mutual symmetry of gle1 and gle2 is lost/broken by the harmer-victim relationship enforced by this word (and, specifically, xai1 and xai2=k2). See also: {glexai}, {xaigle}, {vilgle}, {glevlile}, {glevilxaigau}, {glekrali}, {glecu'akrali}, {glekralyxai}, {kralyxai}.

krambola

fu'ivla
x_1 is a starfruit/carambola of variety x_2.

kramu

gismu
x_1 is x_2 local area unit(s) [non-metric] (default 1) by standard x_3, x_4 subunits.
(additional subunit places may be added as x_5, x_6, ...); See also {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}.

krasi

gismu
-kra-
x_1 (site/event) is a source/start/beginning/origin of x_2 (object/event/process).
Also root (figurative sense); (adjective:) x_1 is initial. See also {fanmo}, cmavo list {ra'i}, {sabji}, {cfari}, {jipno}, {traji}, {kojna}, {genja}, {jicmu}, {sitna}, {jinto}.

krastu

lujvo
s_1=k_1 is the origin of s_2=k_2.
Cf. {terkla}, {famstu}.

krataigo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a hawthorn of species/variety x_2.

krati

gismu
-ka'i-
x_1 represents/is an agent/proxy/stands-in for [absent] x_2 in matter(s)/function(s) x_3.
Also: on behalf of. See also cmavo list {ka'i}, {jansu}, {catni}, {vipsi}, {pulji}.

krauna

fu'ivla
x_1 is a crown, currency issued the crown (regal power)
often has a crown displayed (headdress). Includes former British coins worth 5 shillings, various currencies known by similar names in their native languages, such as the 'koruna', 'kruna', 'krone'.

krebasti

lujvo
b_1 is wig/toupee/mirkin worn by k_2 on body location k_3.
Cf. {kerfa}, {basti}, {runkre}.

krebru

lujvo
b_1 is a hair brush with bristles b_2 for hair k_1.

krebu'u

lujvo
b_1 is an amount of velvet/velour/towelling/tufted cloth of type/material b_2.

krecau

lujvo
x_1 (body or body part) is hairless
See also {sedykrecau}.

krefu

gismu
-ref-
-ke'u-
x_1 (event) is the x_3'rd recurrence/repetition of x_2 (abstract); x_2 happens again in [form] x_1.
Also case, another, instance, different, other, time, occasion. See also {fukpi}, {rapli}, {cafne}, {fasnu}, {xruti}.

kreivi

fu'ivla
x_1 (entity) sits in a squatting position, heraldic sejant position like or as an animal with all legs touching the floor
Cats and dogs "sit" mostly in such position. Not usual for humans.

krekalsa

lujvo
ka_1=ke_2 has disheveled/tousled hair
from {kerfa} {kalsa}

krelu'i

lujvo
x_1 washes x_2's hair, removing x_3 with shampoo x_4.

kre'ole

fu'ivla
x_1 is reflects/pertains to creole language/culture x_2 in aspect x_3, which has influences/history/origin/ancestry x_4
A Creole language must be a stable, full-fledged language that originated with the mixture of at least two superstrate languages (x4) and with a native population of speakers (x2; must be their first language). A Creole person can be similar (a unique and local descendent of partially foreign ancestry) or a native-born with foreign ancestry. Should probably be avoided for naming of Creole wiki mark-up.

kreplini

lujvo
x_1 is a comet orbiting around x_2 with characteristics x_3, orbital parameters x_4, and coma/tail x_5
See also {bisycmaplini}, where x5 is the ice.

kresi'e

lujvo
s_1 is dandruff on the head of k_2.
Cf. {kerfa}, {snime}.

krevelylu'i

lujvo
x_1 is a shampoo for washing x_2's hair, removing x_3, used by x_4.

kreveta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a shrimp of species x_2

krevi'u

lujvo
x_1=v_1 shaves/[removes hair] x_2=k_1=v_2 from x_3=k_2=v_3
Applies to any form of hair removal, not necessarily with a blade.

kricetu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a hamster of variety x_2
See {danlu}

krici

gismu
-kri-
x_1 believes [regardless of evidence/proof] belief/creed x_2 (du'u) is true/assumed about subject x_3.
"without evidence" refers to objective external evidence; also gives credence, has conviction. See also {jinvi}, {djuno}, {censa}, {cevni}, {lijda}, {makfa}, {malsi}, {senpi}, {birti}.

kriketi

fu'ivla
x_1 plays cricket against x_2 in competition x_3 for prize/title x_4.
Cf. {ga'arboijvi}, {krokete}, {kelcrkroke}.

kriketinai

fu'ivla
x_1 is a hamster/member of rodent subfamily Cricetinae of sub-taxon/genus/species/type/breed x_2
See also: {ratcu}

krilacri

lujvo
x_1 has faith (strong trust) in x_2 to do/bring about x_3
See {krici}, {lacri}

krilami

fu'ivla
x_1 is a krill of genus/species x_2

krili

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of crystal of composition x_2 in form/arrangement x_3.
x_2: composition including x_2, which need not be complete specification. See also {jemna}, {bisli}.

krilogji

lujvo
l_1 [rules/methods] is a doxastic logic for deducing/concluding/inferring/reasoning to/about l_2 (du'u).

krilrkartso

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quartz crystal of composition x_2 in form/arrangement x_3.
Cf. {kunrkartso}, {krili}.

krilrkuartso

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a quartz crystal of composition x_2 in form/arrangement x_3.
This is an obsolete fu'ivla. Please use {krilrkartso}.

krilui

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 (mass) is a quantity of krill/okiami of composition x_2
This word is not intended for discussion of individuals or of species. Not necessarily (but possibly is) food. This word conseptualizes krill as a type or mass, not as actual individual animals. For the latter, see: {e'urfausiace'a}, {krilami}.

Krim

cmevla
Crimea

krimtauri

x_1 reflects Crimean territory/geography/culture/histoury/language/nationality in aspect x_2; x_1 is Crimean
See also: {kyrym}

gismu
-rin-
-ki'u-
x_1 (event/state) is a reason/justification/explanation for/causing/permitting x_2 (event/state).
See also {ciksi}, {rinka}, {nibli}, {mukti}, se {jalge}, te {zukte}, cmavo list {ki'u}, {bapli}.

kriofla

x_1 is a clove bud/tree of species/variety x_2.
see also {cifxrula}, {baljypau}

krirmsa

fu'ivla
x1 is the holiday of Christmas

kritcica

lujvo
x_1 deceives x_2 into believing [implied falsehood] x_3 (du'u) about x_4
See {krici}, {tcica}

krivelmikce

lujvo
x_1=m_4=k_3 is a placebo [substance with no pharmacological effect] which patient x_2=m_2=k_1 believes/expects to cure ailment x_3=m_3, placebo given by doctor/nurse x_4=m_1.

krixa

gismu
-kix-
-ki'a-
x_1 cries out/yells/howls sound x_2; x_1 is a crier.
See also {klaku}, {bacru}.

krobi'o

lujvo
b_1=k_1 bends under conditions b_3.
Cf. {korcu}, {binxo}, {krosa'i}, {bolbi'o}, {krori'a}.

krodenmikce

lujvo
m_1 is an orthodontist treating patient m_2 with orthodontics m_3 .
cf. {denmikce}, {densrumikce}.

krogarna

lujvo
k_1=g_1 is bow/arc supporting/restraining g_2, of material g_3.

krokete

fu'ivla
x_1 plays croquet against x_2 in competition x_3 for prize/title x_4.
Cf. {kelcrkroke}, {kroke}, {kriketi}, {ga'arboijvi}, {bolci}, {mruli}.

krokinole

fu'ivla
x_1 is Crokinole (board game).

krokodilo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a crocodile (family Crocodylidae) of breed x_2

krokuta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a spotted hyena (Crocuta crocuta)

kro'oke

fu'ivla
x_1 croquets x_2's ball.
Cf. {kelcrkroke}, {krokete}, {bolci}, {mruli}.

krori'a

lujvo
r_1 (event/state) bends/flexes k_1 under conditions r_3.
Cf. {korcu}, {rinka}, {krobi'o}.

krorinsa

lujvo
r_1=k_1 curtseys in front of r_2.
Cf. {korcu}, {rinsa}, {krosa'i}.

krosa'i

lujvo
s_1=k_1 bows/takes a bow on surface s_2 supported by limbs/supports s_3.
Cf. {korcu}, {sanli}, {krorinsa}, {sa'orgau}, {dzibi'o}, {demtse}.

krosolutrei

fu'ivla
x1 pertains to Solutrean technological industry/culture/know-how of period and location (specifics) x2 in properties x3

krotofaga

fu'ivla
x_1 is an ani of species x_2.
see also {cipnrkuku}

krtis

cmevla
Curtis
Perhaps unfortunately, the stress of the Lojbanized name falls on the final syllable ("tis"); this version enunciates the /t/, rather than reducing it to a tap.

kruca

gismu
-kuc-
x_1 intersects/crosses/traverses x_2 at locus x_3.
See also {cripu}, {ragve}.

kruji

gismu
-ruj-
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of cream/emulsion/puree [consistency] of composition x_2.
[x_2: composition including x_2, which need not be complete specification]]; See also {ladru}, {matne}.

krumami

fu'ivla
x_1 has an umami taste to observer x_2.
See {titla}, {kukte}, {tasta}, {smaka}, {rectu}

kruvi

gismu
-ruv-
-kru-
x_1 is a curve/turn/bend in x_2, at locus x_3, and defined by set of points/properties x_4.
(adjective:) x_1 is curved; (x_4 as a set of points is sufficiently specified to identify the relevant properties of the bend). See also {korcu}, {bargu}, {genxu}, {linji}, {sirji}.

ku

cmavo
KU
elidable terminator: end description, modal, or negator sumti; often elidable.

ku'a

cmavo
-kuz-
JOI
non-logical connective: intersection of sets.

kuadragesim

obsolete cmevla
Lent

ku'adranta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quadrant, one of the four sections made by dividing an area with two perpendicular lines)

kuadril

obsolete cmevla
quadrille (dance)

kuaidzi

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a pair of chopsticks for doing x_2 (event)
Chinese 筷子. See {cinza}

ku'antora

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantifier over predicate / with domain x_2

kuardicka'u

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is measures equal to/is a quantum negative electric charge [-e/3; electric charge of a down quark] in electric charge, under signum convention x_2 (default: proton has positive charge)
The number is negative. Approximately equal to: -5.34058(86)*10^{-20} coulombs. Attention: the standard English unit is positive (opposite of this Lojbanic version). See also {ocnerta}, {dikca}, {eldicka'u}

kuargo

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a cottage cheese/curd cheese/quark

kuarka

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a quark with flavor x_2.
Cf. {kantu}, {guska'u}, {lektoni}.

ku'arka

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quark with flavor x_2
Proposed names for "flavors": up (=lo {zai'e} {gapru}), down (=lo {zai'e} {cnita}), strange (=lo {zai'e} {cizra}), charm (=lo {zai'e} {melbi}), top (=lo {zai'e} {galtu}), bottom (=lo {zai'e} {dizlo}). Antiquark (= {tolku'arka}/{dutyku'arka}), virtual/sea quark (= {zasyku'arka})

ku'arkydicka'u

lujvo
x_1 is measures equal to/is a quantum negative electric charge [-e/3; electric charge of a down quark] in electric charge, under signum convention x_2 (default: proton has positive charge)
The number is negative. Approximately equal to: -5.34058(86)*10^{-20} coulombs. Attention: the standard English unit is positive (opposite of this Lojbanic version). See also {ocnerta}, {dikca}, {eldicka'u}; synonymous with {kuardicka'u}, which is now, on morphological grounds, less well-loved by the BPFK. This word is morphologically interpreted as a lujvo at this time.

ku'au

experimental cmavo
KUhAU
elidable terminator: end of LOhOI construct

ku'au'a

experimental cmavo
VUhU
mekso (n+1)-ary operator: q-analog converter - the ath analog of b (quoted operator) applied to operands c, d, ...
Quote operator b with {mau'au} (and terminate it). The result is the q-analog of that operator (defined according to context if necessary), where q=a, which is then applied to operands of b in order (as defined for b).

kubli

gismu
-kub-
x_1 is a cube/regular polyhedron/polygon of dimensions x_2 (def. 3), surfaces/sides x_3 (def. 6).
(cf. {kurfa} - needed for 'cube', {bliku} for a physical object; {tanbo}, {tapla}, {tarmi})

kubybli

lujvo
b_1=k_1 is a regular polyhedron [3-dimensional] consisting of material b_2 with surfaces/sides b_3=k_3.
b_3=k_3 sides/surfaces should include number, size, and shape. See also: {blikubli}, {bliku}, {kubli}.

kuckla

lujvo
kl_1=ku_1 (goer) crosses ku_2 at point kl_4=ku_3 to reach (destination) kl_2 using vehicle kl_5

kuclanli

lujvo
l_1 cross examines l_2.
Cf. {kruca}, {lanli}, {retsku}.

kucli

gismu
x_1 is curious/wonders about/is interested in/[inquisitive about] x_2 (object/abstract).
Inquisitive (= {retkucli}). See also {manci}, {sisku}, se {cinri}.

kuctai

lujvo
x_1 is a cross/crucifix (shape, form)
See {kruca}, {tarmi}

kucycuk

cmevla
tic-tac-toe

kucyga'a

lujvo
x_1 is a cross made of x_2.

kucyga'asni

lujvo
x_1 is a crucifix.
See also {kucyga'a}

kucysimgau

lujvo
g_1 folds/crosses/intertwines s_1(set).
Cf. {kruca}, {simxu}, {gasnu}.

kucyvla

lujvo
x_1=v_1=k_1 is a word/quotation crossing other words/quotations, meaning/defined by x_2=v_2, located at x_3=k_3
Across -> {pinta}, down -> {sraji}, crossword puzzle -> "kucyvla se {namkei}". Example: "12 across: what you like -> beautiful" is "zo melbi cu kucyvla lu da poi do nelci li'u li pare poi pinta". x_1 may be a non grammatical quotation.

ku'e

cmavo
KUhE
elidable terminator: end mathematical (mex) forethought (Polish) expression; often elidable.

kuflenku

lujvo
x_1 is comfortably cold/cool to x_2
See {lenku}, {kufra}, {tolkuflenku}, {kufygla}

kufra

gismu
-kuf-
x_1 feels comfort/is comfortable with conditions/environmental property(ies) x_2.
See also {cinmo}.

kufygau

lujvo
x_1 makes x_2 comfortable about x_3 (event)
See {drijdikygau}

kufygla

lujvo
x_1 is comfortably warm to x_2
See {glare}, {kufra}, {tolkufygla}

ku'i

cmavo
UI3b
discursive: however/but/in contrast.
See also {karbi}, {dukti}, {nalpanra}.

ku'inai

cmavo-compound
UI*3b
discursive: in accordance with it; as expected
Used in order to draw conclusions in accordance with those statements which were said/uttered previously, as opposed to {ku'i} - 'in contrast'

kuinke

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Seri culture/language in aspect x_2

kujmikce

lujvo
m_1 is a nurse to/nurses m_2.
Cf. {kurji}, {mikce}.

kujyjai

lujvo
j_1=k_1 nurses/holds with care j_2=k_2 (object/event/person) with/in j_3 (part of j1).
Cf. {kurji}, {jgari}.

kukfusra

lujvo
f_1=k_1 is fermented with fermenting agent f_2, tasty to observer x_3=k_2.
Cf. {jurme}, {fomymledi}, {mledi}, {birje}, {vanju}, {nanba}, {cirla}, {ladru}, {sobysanso}, {furfipsanso}.

kukpanku'u

lujvo
x_1 is a thuja/arborvitae (genus Thuja) of species/strain x_2 with cones x_3.
See also {ku'urtuja}.

kukrai

lujvo
x1=k1=t1 is most delicious of set x2=t4 to observer x3=k2

kukselzba

lujvo
z_2=k_1 is something made by z_1 out of z_3 that is pleasing/delightful to sense k_2.
Cf. {kukte}, {zbasu}.

kukselzbasu

lujvo
z_2=k_1 is something made by z_1 out of z_3 that is pleasing/delightful to sense k_2.
Cf. {kukte}, {zbasu}, {kukselzba}.

kukte

gismu
-kuk-
x_1 is delicious/tasty/delightful to observer/sense x_2 [person, or sensory activity].
x_1 is a delicacy. See also {gusta}, {ralci}, {vrusi}, {cpina}.

kulcitsi

lujvo
ci_1 is a term/semester with interval ci_2 of year ci_3 for school ck_1.
x2 may be formed with "bi'o". Cf. {citsi}, {ckule}.

kuldi'u

lujvo
d_1 is a building housing school c_1 teaching subject c_3 to audience c_4.

kulgu'a

lujvo
x_1=g_1 works on x_2=g_2 with goal/purpose x_3=g_3 which is associated to school x_4=c_1 at x_5=c_2 teaching subject(s) x_6=c_3 to audience/community x_7=c_4 (of which x_1 is a part) operated by x_8=c_5
The x2 could be homework, c.f. {zdakemkulgu'a}.

kulmu'o

lujvo
x_1=c_4=m_1 graduates/completes coursework from x_2=c_1 at location x_3=c_2 in subject matter x_4=c_3, by the standards of the administration x_5=c_5=m_3
This is really a dropped SE of velkulmu'o. m2 is the implied "property of learning at c2 subject matter c3 from school c1"

kulnrfarsi

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Persian/Farsi culture in aspect x_2.

kulnrfarsi zei lolgai

zei-lujvo
g_1 is a Persian rug for covering floor g_2=l_1 of x_3=l_2.
Cf. {kulnrfarsi}, {lolgai}.

kulnrlietuva

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Lithuanian culture in aspect x_2.

kulnrnorge

fu'ivla
x_1 is Norwegian/pertains to Norwegian culture in aspect x_2.

kulnrnorgo

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Norwegian culture in aspect x_2.

kulnrsfe'enska

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Swedish culture in aspect x_2.

kulnrtai

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Thai culture in aspect x_2.

kulnrturkie

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is Turkish/pertains to Turkish culture in aspect x_2.
Cf. {kulnrturko}, {bangrturkie}, {tu'urki}.

kulnrturko

fu'ivla
x_1 is Turkic/pertains to Turkic culture in aspect x_2
c.f. {kulnrturkie}

kulnrxirani

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Iranian culture in aspect x_2.
See also Iranian Farsi language (={bangrxirani}).

kulnu

gismu
-klu-
x_1 [mass of ideas, customs, skills, arts] is culture of nation/ethos x_2 (mass); x_1 is ethnic.
(note that x_2 is NOT individual; culture is what is shared among people and is not an individual trait). See also cmavo list {ka'u}, cmavo list {ku'u}, {natmi}, {cecmu}.

kulpikta

lujvo
p_1 is a diploma entitling p_2 to entitlement/privilege p_3 (event/state) from school/institute/academy x_4=c_1 teaching subject(s) x_5=c_3.

kumbartu

lujvo
b_1 is outside of room b_2=k_1.

kumfa

gismu
-kum-
-ku'a-
x_1 is a room of/in structure x_2 surrounded by partitions/walls/ceiling/floor x_3 (mass/jo'u).
Also chamber. See also {bitmu}, {canlu}, {zdani}.

kumte

gismu
x_1 is a camel/llama/alpaca/vicuna/dromedary of species/breed x_2.
Llama (= {tcokumte}), Bactrian camel (= {zdokumte}); Arabian camel/dromedary (= {rabykumte}). See also {sunla}, {kanla}, {xirma}, {xasli}.

kumtrguanako

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a guanaco of breed x_2.
Cf. {kumte}, {tcokumte}, {kumtrvalpaka}, {kumtrlama}, {kumtrvikunia}.

kumtrlama

fu'ivla
x_1 is a llama of breed x_2.
Cf. {kumte}, {tcokumte}, {kumtrvalpaka}, {kumtrvikunia}, {kumtrguanako}.

fu'ivla
x_1 is an alpaca of breed x_2.
Cf. {kumte}, {tcokumte}, {kumtrvikunia}, {kumtrlama}, {kumtrguanako}.

kumtrvikunia

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a vicuna of breed x_2.
Cf. {kumte}, {tcokumte}, {kumtrvalpaka}, {kumtrlama}, {kumtrguanako}.

kumyzda

lujvo
z_1=k_1 is an apartment for z_2 in structure k_2.
A complete domicile occupying only part of a building. Cf. {zdani}, {selxa'u}.

kungundi

lujvo
g_1 is a/the metals and mining industry/sector producing/mining g_2=k_1 of type/metal k_2 from location k_3 by process g_3
From {kunra}, {gundi}.

kunkakpa

lujvo
x_1=ka_1 (agent) mines material/ore x_2=ku_1=ka_2 of type x_3=ku_2 from mine/source x_4=ku_3=ka_3 using tool x_5=ka_4.
Used in Theodore Reed's translation of A Princess of Mars.

kunra

gismu
-kun-
x_1 is/contains/is made from a mineral/ore of type/metal x_2 mined from location/lode/mine x_3.
See also {jinme}, {bisli}, {rokci}, {jemna}.

kunrkartso

fu'ivla
x_1 is/contains/is made from quartz mined from location/mine x_2.
Cf. {krilrkartso}, {kunra}.

kunrkripto

fu'ivla
k_1 is/contains/is made from cryptonite (fictional mineral/ore) of radioactive element k_2 from location/lode/mine k_3.
A fictional material from the Superman mythos.

kunrkuartso

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is/contains/is made from quartz mined from location/mine x_2.
This is an obsolete fu'ivla. Please use {kunrkartso}.

kunrlazuli

fu'ivla
x_1 is/contains/is made from lapis lazuli of type/grade x_2 mined from location x_3.

kunrmarmaro

fu'ivla
x_1 is/contains/is made from marble of type x_2 mined from location x_3.

kunrxalabastre

fu'ivla
x_1 is/contains/is made from alabaster of type x_2 mined from location x_3.

kunske

lujvo
s_1=t_1 is mineralogy [science about minerals] based on methodology s_3.
kunra2, kunra3 and saske2 subsumed. See also {derske}.

kunti

gismu
-kut-
x_1 [container] is empty/vacant of x_2 [material]; x_1 is hollow.
Also vacuum (= kunti be roda/so'ada). See also {culno}, {tisna}, {claxu}, {canlu}, {kevna}, {setca}.

ku'o

cmavo
KUhO
elidable terminator: end NOI relative clause; always elidable, but preferred in complex clauses.

ku'oi'u

experimental cmavo
KUhOIhU
closing bracket/terminator for mekso expression interpretation modifiers
Acts as closing for {boi'au}, {boi'ai}, {boi'oi}.

kurbana

fu'ivla
x_1 is a sacrifice
See {catra} {se} {friti}, {daspo}

kurblikubli

lujvo
kub_1=b_1=kur_1 is a cube/regular polyhedron [3-dimensional shape/form], defined by set of vertices kur_2, surfaces/sides kub_3=b_3.
Synonym: {xavblikubli}. See also hypercube (={kurkubli})

kurfa

gismu
-kur-
x_1 is a right-angled shape/form defined by set of vertices x_2, dimensions x_3 (default 2).
Also rectangle, square, rectilinear; square (= {kubykurfa}, {pitkubykurfa}), cube (= {kurkubli}), rectangle (= {clakurfa}), rhombus/diamond (= {sa'orkurfa}, {sa'orpitkubli}). See also {bliku}, {kubli}, {tapla}, {salpo}, {tarmi}.

kurgete

fu'ivla
x_1 is a courgette, zucchini of species x_2
See {guzme}, {tsukini}

kurjga

lujvo
j_1=k_1 is a right-angle [2-dimensional shape/form] from vertex j_2=k_2 subtended by lateral [segment] j_3.

kurji

gismu
-kuj-
-ku'i-
x_1 takes-care-of/looks after/attends to/provides for/is caretaker for x_2 (object/event/person).
Also tends, cares for, keeps; x_1 is a keeper/custodian of x_2. See also {jundi}, {cinri}, {prami}, {raktu}, {zgana}.

kurjipyjolmijmo'a

lujvo
x1 is a quincunx/quincuncial arrangement/pattern formed from objects x2 according to rule/quadralateral x3 (contextless default: essentially square upon an essentially flat surface)
Need not be "points"/"dots", but objects that are so arranged will typically be considered to be essentially similar and pointlike.

kurki

gismu
x_1 is bitter/acrid/sharply disagreeable to observer/sense x_2.
See also {titla}, {slari}.

kurkubli

lujvo
kub_1=kur_1 is a hypercube/right-angled/orthogonal regular polyhedron/polygon/polytope defined by set of vertices kur_2, of dimensions kur_3=kub_2, surfaces/sides kub_3.
See also: cube (={kurblikubli}/{xavblikubli}).

lujvo

x2 might be a set of colors, with x3 specifying their arrangement

kurtse

lujvo
z_1 sits in pike position/staff position/dandasana on surface z_2.
The upper-body should be extending upward, and the back should be completely perpendicular to the ground (as though sitting against a wall).

Also continues. See also {ranji}, {renvi}, {tcena}, {bancu}, {cripu}, {ragve}, {vorme}, {canko}, {bitmu}, {sirji}, {jbini}, {jimte}, {preja}.

kutlerpoi

lujvo

May be understood as '{me'o} {lo'o}'. See also {kunti}, {lerpoi}, {kutpoi}, {kutysetmima}, {kutyuenzi}, {kutydza}, {zai'o}.

kutpoi

lujvo

See {kunti}, {porsi}, {kutysetmima}, {kutlerpoi}, {kutyuenzi}, {kutydza}, {zai'o}

lujvo

kutydza

See {gunma}, {kutysetmima}, {kutpoi}, {kutlerpoi}, {kutyuenzi}, {kutydza}, {zai'o}, {tu'oi}

lujvo

Synonymous with {sezni'i}. See also {kunti}, {jetnu}.

lujvo

{lo} {kutyuenzi} = {lu li'u}. See also {kunti}, {uenzi}, {kutpoi}, {kutysetmima}, {kutlerpoi}, {kutydza}, {zai'o}

The genus Cupressus is one of several genera within the family Cupressaceae that have the common name cypress.

ky

cmavo
BY2
letteral for k.

ky.bu
