kyrym

cmevla
Crimea

la

cmavo
LA
name descriptor: the one(s) called ... ; takes name or selbri description.

la'a

cmavo
UI3
discursive: probability - improbability.
See also {lakne}.

la'acu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*5
discursive: probability - possibility - improbability.

la'ai

experimental cmavo
LOhU
otherwise lojbanic name, ending in a vowel; multiple names delimited by pauses.
Can be used to quote name(s) ending in consonants as well. See also {lai'e} of LAhE, {la'au} of LU and {la'o} of ZOI for naming cmavo.

la'anai

cmavo-compound
UI*3
discursive: probability - improbability.

la'au

experimental cmavo
LU
start grammatical name quotation; the quoted text is an identifier and must be grammatical on its own.
Used to make more complex names where simple {la} doesn't apply, e.g. some book/song titles. Artibrary non-lojban text can be quoted with {la'o}. See also {lai'e} of LAhE, {la'ai} of LOhU and {la'o} of ZOI for naming cmavo.

labdjasluni

lujvo
s_1 is a white onion (Allium cepa) of variety/strain s_2.
See also common onion (={djasluni}).

labjvezirspa

lujvo
x_1 is a snowflake (genus Leucojum) of species/strain x_2.

labmau

lujvo
z_1 is/are whiter than z_2 by amount z_4.
Mentioned in §4.6 (cll 1.1).

labnanba

lujvo
n_1 is white bread made from grains n_2.
Cf. {burnanba}, {jinynanba}, {jintitnanba}, {cmananba}.

labno

gismu
x_1 is a wolf/lupine of species/breed x_2.
See also {gerku}.

labybi'o

lujvo
bi_1 turns pale/white under condition bi_3.
Cf. {blabi}, {binxo}.

labyblu

lujvo
c_1 is lymph of animal c_2.
Cf. {blufle}, {blutu'u}.

labyblusle

lujvo
x_1 is a white blood cell of the blood/pus x_2 of animal x_3.

labyfi'e

lujvo
f_1=b_1 is a whitefish of genus/species f_2.
Cf. {blabi}, {finpe}, {merlanu}.

labyxu'e

lujvo
x_1 is rose.
Cf. {blabi}, {xunre}, {xunblabi}.

labzilska

lujvo
x_1 is the abstract color white
The gismu {blabi} refers to objects which are white, but not the color white itself. This lujvo serves the latter purpose. See also {skari} {zilska}

lacni

experimental gismu
x_1 is an eyewear used/worn by x_2 serving purpose x_3.
It is a frame worn in front of the eyes and bears or does not bear transparent/semi-transparent/non-transparent shields for visual correction, eye protection, fashion, or entertainment. The shields are not necessarily lenses. Cf. {le'otci} or {le'orlacni} for a corrective type, which may include {tidlacni} for reading glasses and {xrelacni} for bifocal and trifocal glasses; {badlacni} for a protective type, which may include {srulacni} for goggles and {solylacni} for sunglasses; {jadlacni} for fashion glasses, which may include {rekmeclacni} for rimless glasses and solylacni; {mincimdylacni} for 3D glasses.

lacpu

gismu
-lap-
-cpu-
x_1 pulls/tugs/draws/drags x_2 by handle/at locus x_3.
Gravity (= ka {maicpu}, {maircpukai}). See also {catke}, {sakci}, {cokcu}.

lacri

gismu
-lac-
x_1 relies/depends/counts on/trusts x_2 to bring about/ensure/maintain x_3 (event/state).
See also {minde}, {nitcu}, {tinbe}.

lactergu'e

lujvo
l_1=g_3 is a dependent territory relying on the sovereignty of l_2 (state).
Examples are British Virgin Islands, Netherlands Antilles, and American Samoa. Cf. {gugde}, {zifyje'a}.

lacy'inda

lujvo
x_1 is trustworthy to x_2 to bring about/ensure/maintain x_3
See {lacri}, {inda}, {krilacri}

ladjvestagycti

lujvo
c_1 is an lacto-vegetarian eating vegetable(s) and drinking milk.
See also (ethical) vegan (={nardalprapli}), dietary vegan (={stagycti}), ovo-vegetarian (={sovjvestagycti}), herbivore (={spacti}).

ladlabrulspa

lujvo
x_1 is a snowdrop (genus Galanthus) of species/strain x_2.
Snowdrop; Greek gála "milk", ánthos "flower".

ladru

gismu
-lad-
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of milk from source x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is lactic/dairy.
See also {lanbi}, {mabru}, {tatru}, {cirla}, {kruji}.

ladyckafi

lujvo
x_1=c_1 is a quantity of coffee [beverage] with dairy [or similar] product/of type/composition x_2=l_2.
See also: black coffee (={xekckafi}), light/white coffee [with cold dairy product] (={lekladryckafi}), café au lait/latte [drink with heated dairy product] (={glaladyckafi}), drinking chocolate (={caklyladru}).

ladycpa

lujvo
x_1 milks x_2

ladycpani'u

lujvo
x_1 is a milkmaid

ladykruji

lujvo
k_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of cream [dairy product] of composition/from milk k_2=l_1.

ladypu'o

lujvo
p_1 is a quantity of powdered milk made from milk p_2=l_1.
Cf. {ladru}, {purmo}.

la'e

cmavo
LAhE
the referent of (indirect pointer); uses the referent of a sumti as the desired sumti.

la'e'au

experimental cmavo
LAhE
the specific referent of [following sumti] defined/specified by the grammar
The grammar in question can itself be specified by metalinguistic tags that apply to the utterance; if not explicitly specified, then a cultural assumption/default is applied. This word is useful for distinguishing between, for example, differentiating between something that the speaker happens to call "PEMDAS" and the order of operations PEMDAS (which, presumably, could be included in the grammar as a special word that influences mekso interpretation); likewise for a font that happens to be called ".{mekrot}." ("math blackboard bold") and the one that definitely refers to the set of characters used for, among other purposes, set notation.

la'edi'u

cmavo-compound
KOhA*
pro-sumti: the referent of the last utterance; the state described: "IT was fun".

la'ei

experimental cmavo
LA
combines LA with DOI
used to address someone in the 2nd person by name and use that as a sumti at the same time, that is: {do} {doi} {la} {broda} is equivalent to la'ei {broda}

la'erji'i

lujvo
x_1 expects x_2 on grounds x_3.
See also {bavykri}, {uenai}

la'erlai

lujvo
x_1 has probability/likelihood x_2 of occurring under conditions x_3.
See also {zilpa'a}, {cu'o}

lafmi'i

lujvo
x_1=l_1=m_1 is an elevator/lift.
Derived from {lafti} {minji}. Extra places dropped since an empty and/or stationary elevator is still an elevator. To operate an elevator, see {pilno}, {gasnu}, or {klama}.

lafmuvgau

lujvo
Agent x_1 lifts/raises/carries x_2 to x_3 from x_4, lifting at locus x_5

lafti

gismu
-laf-
x_1 (force) lifts/applies raising/supporting force to x_2 at locus x_3 in gravity well x_4.
(x_1 may be an abstract); verb lift/raise/elevate (= {lafmuvgau}). See also {farlu}, {plipe}.

lagyfe'a

lujvo
f_1 is a/the pudental cleft/cleft of Venus/vulvar slit[rima pudendi; part of the vulva] of v_2=f_2.

lagypunli

lujvo
p_1 is a/the mons pubis/mons veneris of v_2.

lai

cmavo
LA
name descriptor: the mass of individual(s) named ... ; takes name or selbri description.

la'i

cmavo
LA
name descriptor: the set of those named ... ; takes name or selbri description.

lai'e

experimental cmavo
LAhE
Named reference. It converts a sumti into another sumti. The converted sumti points to the referent the name of which is the referent of the unconverted sumti.
``lai'e ko'a''=``zo'e noi se cmene ko'a''. {lai'e} is a cmavo of LAhE, and followed by any sumti including ``lo se du'u BRIDI'', ``zo...'', ``lu...li'u'', ``lo'u...le'u'' or ``zoi...'', used with an elidable terminater {lu'u}. For example, ``lai'e lo se du'u ti brife doi la betis'' refers to something the name of which is a text in a language that means ``ti brife doi la betis'', while ``la'e lo se du'u ti brife doi la betis'' refers to the same as ``lo du'u ti brife doi la betis''. The syntax of sumti following {lai'e} is analysed by the parser, while the syntax of strings following {la'ai} or {la'o} is ignored. In the cases that {lai'e} is followed by {lu}, {lo'u} or {zoi}, the referent is the same as that of sumti formed by {la'au}, {la'ai} or {la'o} respectively: ``lai'e lu ti brife doi la betis li'u (lu'u)''=``la'au ti brife doi la betis li'u''; ``lai'e lo'u se ly van beti le'u (lu'u)''=``la'ai se ly van beti le'u''; ``lai'e zoi zoi C'est le vent, Betty zoi (lu'u)''=``la'o zoi C'est le vent, Betty zoi''. See also {la'e}, {la}, {la'o}, {la'ai}, {la'au}; {lu'u}; {cmene}.

lai'i

experimental cmavo
UI2
evidential: I experience - I deny experiencing
See {lifri}, {kai'e}, {vei'i}. Split from {ba'a} so that it can be properly negated with {nai} or questioned with {pei}

lairka'e

lujvo
x_1 is quantifiable by quantifier x_2 on scale x_3.

lairsume

fu'ivla
x_1 is exactly x_2 (number) of the arguments x_3, x_4, x_5, etc.
x_2 is the number of arguments; each argument may contain more than one object, but x_2 is only concerned with the number of arguments. See {menrece}

la'irze'a

lujvo
z_1=l_1 gets closer to l_2 in property l_3 by amount z_3.
Cf. {lamji}, {zenba}, {jbize'a}, {jbibi'o}.

lajdansu

lujvo
d_1 (individual, mass) street dances to accompaniment/music/rhythm d_2.
Street dance refers to dance styles—regardless of country of origin—that evolved outside of dance studios in any available open space.

lajme'e

lujvo
c_1 (quoted word(s)) is a street/road name/odonym of street/avenue/lane/drive/cul-de-sac/way/alley/[road] c_2=l_1 to/used-by namer/name-user c_3 (person).
s2 and s3 are omitted. A street name or odonym is an identifying name given to a street. The street name usually forms part of the address (though addresses in some parts of the world make no reference to street names).See also {stucme}, {klaji}, {stuzi}, {cmene}.

lajre'e

lujvo
x_1 is a trolley (train that runs on streets) of cars x_2 on rails x_3 propelled by x_4.
from {klaji} {trene}

lakne

gismu
-la'e-
x_1 (event/state/property) is probable/likely under conditions x_2.
See also {cumki}, {jinzi}, {kampu}, {tcaci}, {cunso}, {cafne}, {fadni}, {cnano}.

lakpinsi

lujvo
p_1 is a crayon made from wax p_2=l_1, held together by p_3.
p_2=l_1 does not neccessarily need to be the only material.

lakrkamfora

fu'ivla
x_1 is quantity of camphor from source x_2.

lakrkomifora

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of myrrh (an aromatic oleoresin) from tree x_2 (genus Commiphora).

lakse

gismu
-lak-
x_1 is quantity of wax [substance especially soft/moldable when warm] from source x_2.
Also paraffin. See also {bifce}, {ranti}, {bidju}.

laktergu'i

lujvo
g_3=l_1 is a candle/wax light with wax source l_2.
Cf. {fagytergu'i}, {dictergu'i}.

laldo

experimental gismu
x_1 is old/aged [relatively long in elapsed duration] by standard x_2
(= {tolci'o}) See {citno}, {slabu}

lalxu

gismu
-la'u-
x_1 is a lake/lagoon/pool at site/within land mass x_2.
See also {daplu}, {djacu}, {rirxe}, {xamsi}, {zbani}.

lamgrute

lujvo
g_1 is an accessory fruit of g_2

lamji

gismu
-lam-
-la'i-
x_1 is adjacent/beside/next to/in contact with x_2 in property/sequence x_3 in direction x_4.
Also touching, contiguous, against. See also {zvati}, {cpana}, {jibni}, {diklo}, {stuzi}, {bartu}, {jbini}.

lampagre

lujvo
p_1=l_1 passes by p_2 to p_3 from p_4 by l_2.
Cf. {lamji}, {pagre}.

lampru

lujvo
l_1=p_1 is recent, immediately preceding l_2=p_2.
Cf. {purci}.

lanbi

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of protein/albumin of type x_2 composed of amino acids (sequence/jo'u) x_3 .
See also {ladru}, {sovda}.

lanceta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a lancet

lanci

gismu
x_1 is a flag/banner/standard of/symbolizing x_2 with pattern(s) x_3 on material x_4.
See also {gugde}, {jecta}.

landa

experimental gismu
x_1 is the ISO-named country of people x_2 with ISO-name x_1, according to rule/specification x_3
See also: {gugde}, {jviso}.

landegmei

lujvo
m_1 is a mass of set m_2 with an even number of members m_3
see also {xirdegmei}

landegna'u

lujvo
x_1 is an even number (integer divisible by 2)
Metaphor taken from {landegmei}. See {xirdegna'u}, {dilcymu'o}

lange'u

lujvo
g_1 is a/are sheepdog(s) of species/breed g_2 controlling sheeps l_1.
Mentioned in §12.14 (cll 1.1).

lanjanbe

lujvo
j_1 is a sheep bell producing sound j_2.
Cf. {lanme}, {janbe}.

lanka

gismu
x_1 is a basket with contents x_2, woven from material x_3.
See also {vasru}, {baktu}.

lanku'i

lujvo
k_1 is a shepher/sheepherder/takes-care-of/attends to//is caretaker for sheep k_2=d_1.
See also herder (={dalku'i}).

lankurji

lujvo
k_1 is a shepherd looking after sheep of species/breed l_2 of flock l_3.
Cf. {lanme}, {kurji}.

lanli

gismu
-lal-
x_1 analyzes/examines-in-detail x_2 by method/technique/system x_3 [process/activity].
See also {catlu}, {zgana}, {jarco}, {pensi}, {pinka}.

lanma'i

lujvo
x_1 is April of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Cf. {vonmasti}, {kanbyma'i}, {nanca}.

lanme

gismu
-lan-
x_1 is a sheep/[lamb/ewe/ram] of species/breed x_2 of flock x_3.
See also {kanba}, {sunla}.

lanpanzi

lujvo
p_1 is a lamb of species/breed l_2
from {lanme} {panzi}

lante

gismu
x_1 is a can/tightly sealed/pre-sealed container for perishable contents x_2, made of x_3.
See also {botpi}, {baktu}, {tinci}.

lantro

lujvo
x_1 shepherds flock x_2 composed of sheep x_3
This word is in Jbovlaste based on its use in CLL

lanxe

gismu
-lax-
x_1 is in balance/equilibrium under forces x_2 (mass).
(cf. {midju}, {nutli}; {fapro} for balancing/opposing forces, {nutli})

lanzu

gismu
-laz-
x_1 (mass) is a family with members including x_2 bonded/tied/joined according to standard x_3.
Also clan, tribe; x_2 is in x_1, a member of x_1 ({selylanzu} for reordered places); relative (= {lazmi'u} - xy mintu y'y leka cmima da poi lanzu). See also {natmi}, {cmima}, {girzu}, {jutsi}, {klesi}.

la'o

cmavo
ZOI
delimited non-Lojban name; the resulting quote sumti is treated as a name.

la'oi

experimental cmavo
ZOhOI
single-word non-Lojban name; quotes a single non-Lojban word delimited by pauses and treats it as a name
See also {la'o}, {zo'oi}.

la'onru'u

lujvo
r_1 is measured in sestertius/sesterce as r_2 (quantity), in the Roman monetary system r_3.

la'orko'i

lujvo
l_1=k_1 is a quantity of romaine/cos lettuce (Lactuca sativa L. var. longifolia) of strain/cultivar k_2.

la'ornacle'u

lujvo
le_1 is a Roman numeral representing le_3=n_1.

la'ornai

lujvo
x_1 is the Roman nation made up of people x_2
se la'ornai means the Roman people. The term refers to the ancient Romans, not to modern-day residents of the Italian capital, or small Wisconsin town.

la'orxi'o

lujvo
x_1=l_1 is Roman Catholic in aspect x_2=l_2.
Cf. {xriso}, {latmo}, {glixi'o}, {patxi'o}, {sunxi'o}, {lijda}.

larcu

gismu
-lar-
x_1 (process) is an art [creative application] of craft/skill x_2 (idea/activity).
(adjective:) x_1 is artistic. See also {finti}, {zbasu}, {stati}.

lardai

lujvo
x_1 is a work of art created by an application of craft/skill x_2.
See also {larcu}, {dacti}.

larfi'i

lujvo
f_1 is an artist creating work of art f_2=l_1 in medium l_2 for purpose f_3 from elements/ideas f_4 .

larmuzga

lujvo
m_1 is a gallery exhibiting m_2 at location m_3.

larpra

lujvo
x_1 is-an-artist/produces x_2 by artistic application of skill/craft x_3.
See also {larcu}, {cupra}

larseku

fu'ivla
x_1 is a creative work (prose / poem / film / play / etc.) about x_2 (plot / theme / subject / activity), by author/artist x_3, for audience x_4
Generalization of {prosa}, {pemci}, {skina}, {draci}, {lisri}. See {larcu}

lartodektu

fu'ivla
l_1 is a widow spider of species l_2.
cf. {malminiata}, {jukni}

larva

experimental gismu
x_1 is an organism x_2 at its larva stage of development
See also {sovda}, {altrici}, {inmago}

laryrakpra

lujvo
c_1 sculpts/carves c_2=l_1 from s_2 using tool s_1
implied c3 is "lo nu jai gau {sraku} s2 fai s1" implied l2 would likewise be "lo si'o nu jai gau {sraku} s2 fai s1"

lasna

gismu
-la'a-
x_1 (agent) fastens/connects/attaches/binds/lashes x_2 to x_3 with fastener x_4.
No implication that result is considered a single object; although x_2 and x_3 may be reversible, x_3 may be used for the substrate, the fixed/larger object to which x_2 becomes attached. See also {jorne}, {fenso}, {jgena}, {batke}, {dinko}, {kansa}.

lastu

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of brass [copper/zinc alloy] of composition including x_2.
(adjective:) x_1 is brazen). See also {jinme}, {ransu}, {tunka}.

la su'oda

cmavo-compound
name: "Someone", aka "the god of lazy people", used when the speaker is pushing responsibility to someone else unspecified
Synonymous to la .{samyuan}. Also {la dzapre}.

lasybo'i

lujvo
b_1 is a plastic bottle/jar/urn/flask/closable container made of plastic for b2_2 with lid b_4.

lasydakli

lujvo
d_1=s_1 is a plastic sack/bag with contents d_2.

latcmo

lujvo
x_1=c_1=m_1 meows expressing x_2=c_3.
Cf. {mlatu}, {cmoni}, {latpukcmo}.

latcribe

lujvo
x_1 is a panda of genus/species x_2.
syn. {ci'onmau}

latfekspa

lujvo
x_1 is catnip of species x_2.

latfi'e

lujvo
x_1 is a catfish of genus/species x_2.

latfrotrikusi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a false-empid/bird (possibly flycatcher) of genus Lathrotriccus, belonging to subtaxon/species/breed/variety x_2

latmnroma

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Roman culture/nation/geography/language/histoury in asect x_2 prior to any divisions. x_1 pertains to the Roman city/city-state/kingdom/Republic/Empire (prior to division).
From a Roman citizen's point of view, emphasizes and centres on Rome (the city) itself - if applied to something outside of nearby Italy, such usage would always connote a directed relationship with Rome/Italy; modern usage is perhaps slightly freer. Culturally and in many ways socially, economically, etc., Eastern and Western Rome were quite intricately related and interconnected- and similar- at first; usage of this word within a context of the divisions would emphasize its umbrella/general scope (possibly for the sake of contrast as much as for displaying similarity or treating everyone with equal footing/care/at once). See also: {latmo}, {latmrbizanto}, {latmrstici}, {latmrfriko}, {xelso}, {kartapuno}

latmo

gismu
-la'o-
x_1 reflects Latin/Roman/Romance culture/empire/language in aspect x_2.
See also {ropno}, {fraso}, {spano}, {xispo}, {itlo}, {gomsi}.

latmrbizanto

fu'ivla
x1 reflects Byzantine Roman/Eastern Roman culture/nationality/geography in aspect x2

latmrfriko

fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to/reflects the culture/geography/society of the Roman province of Africa in aspect x_2
See also: {latmo}, {latmnroma}, {kartapuno}

latmrlatino

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects/pertains to Latin culture (pre-Roman people/Latini) in property x_2

latmrstici

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Western Roman culture/nation/geography/language/histoury in asect x_2
See also: {latmo}, {latmrbizanto}, {latmnroma}, {latmrfriko}.

latna

gismu
x_1 is a lotus, plant/flower/herb of species/strain x_2 symbolizing x_3 to culture/religion x_4.
See also {budjo}, {censa}, {lijda}, {spati}.

latpukcmo

lujvo
b_1=p_2 purrs, expressing pleasure at p_1 (event/state).
Cf. {mlatu}, {pluka}, {cmoni}, {latcmo}.

latrbirmani

fu'ivla
x_1 is a Birman cat with characteristics (colour etc)/[of breed] x_2.

latrnorgo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a Norwegian Forest Cat with characteristics/of breed x_2.

latrtai

fu'ivla
x_1 is a Siamese cat with characteristics (colour etc)/[of breed] x_2.

latydja

lujvo
c_1 is cat food for cats c_2=m_1.
See also pet food (={dalpe'odja}).

lau

cmavo
LAU
2-word letteral/shift: punctuation mark or special symbol follows.

la'u

cmavo
BAI
klani modal, 1st place (amount) quantifying ...; being a quantity of ...

lauble

lujvo
r_1=c_1 sounds quiet/weak at observation point c_2 by standard c_3=t_3.
Cf. {cladu}, {ruble}, {smaji}, {cmato'a}.

laucmo

lujvo
x1=cl2=cm1 roars x2=cl1, expressing x3=cm3

lauDZIS

cmevla
Laotze (also known as “Laozi”)

lau'e

experimental cmavo
KOhA2
pronoun: the referent of the following utterance
Equivalent to {la'e} {di'e}, by analogy with {lau'u}

la'u ma

cmavo-compound
BAI*
sumti question asking for a quantity; how many?.

laurmi'a

lujvo
x_1=cm_1=cl_1 loudly laughs; loud at observation point x_2=cm_2 by standard x_3=cm_3. x_1=cm_1=cl_1 is literally laughing out loudly.

laus

cmevla
Laos.
Under some interpretations of the morphology rules, not a valid word.

la'uske

lujvo
x_1=s_1 (mass of facts) is limnology based on methology x_2=s_3.

lausku

lujvo
cu_1=cl_1 shouts cu_2 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience cu_3 via expressive medium cu_4, loudly by standard x_5=cl_3.
Cf. {laurba'u}, {smasku}, {smaba'u}.

lau'u

experimental cmavo
KOhA2
pronoun: the referent of the last utterance
Equivalent to {la'edi'u} or {lo} {su'u} {go'i}; compounds considered common enough in usage statistics to deserve a shortening.

laxma'i

lujvo
x_1 is October of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Cf. {pavnonmasti}, {kanbyma'i}, {nanca}.

laxygau

lujvo
g_1 balances l_1 with force l_2.
Cf. {lanxe}, {gasnu}.

lazmi'u

lujvo
x_1 is a family relative of x_2
See {lanzu}, {mintu}

lazni

gismu
x_1 (person) is lazy/avoiding work/effort concerning action x_2.
See also {nejni}, {vreta}, {gunka}.

laznynavni

lujvo
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of argon (Ar).
See also {lazni}, {navni}; {ratni}.

lazycange

lujvo
c_1 is a family farm/ranch at c_2, farmed by family c_3=l_1 (mass), raising, producing c_4.

lazypa'i

lujvo
x_1 feels familial/kinship love [storge] toward x_2

lazyzda

lujvo
z_1 is the home of family members z_2=l_2.
Cf. {lanzu}, {zdani}.

lazyzukykei

lujvo
k_1 (agent) plays house.
A child's play to emulate parents.

le

cmavo
LE
non-veridical descriptor: the one(s) described as ...

le'a

cmavo
BAI
klesi modal, 1st place (scalar set) in/of category ...

le'ai

experimental cmavo
LEhAI
replace recent mistakenly uttered text
The {lo'ai} ... {sa'ai} ... {le'ai} replacement construct asks the listener to replace the text after {lo'ai} with the text after {sa'ai}. The order {sa'ai} ... {lo'ai} ... {le'ai} is also allowed, and either or both parts can be omitted and thus left up to context. When both parts are omitted, the word {le'ai} on its own indicates that a mistake was made while leaving all the details up to context. It is also possible to attach SAI to a le'ai construct: le'ai {dai} (or le'ai {da'oi} ko'a) indicates that someone else made a mistake; le'ai {pei} asks whether someone else made a mistake; and {sai}, {ru'e} and {cu'i} can be used to indicate the importance of the substitution. Furthermore, le'ai {nai} can be used to explicitly deny mistakes instead of acknowledging them (compare "sic").

le'au

experimental cmavo
SEI
Start property which sets the meaning of {le} in the surrounding text.

le'avla

lujvo
v_1 is a loanword meaning v_2 in language v_3 based on foreign-language word l_2.
Old, deprecated synonym for {fu'ivla}. Could be considered an {u'ivla}.

le'axru

lujvo
xr_1=l_1 takes back xr_2=l_2 from xr_4=l_3.
Cf. {lebna}, {xruti}, {xrube'i}, {xrucpa}.

lebna

gismu
-leb-
-le'a-
x_1 takes/gets/gains/obtains/seizes/[removes] x_2 (object/property) from x_3 (possessor).
Also confiscate, appropriate. Acquire with volition such that x_1 gains possession; x_3 is possessor and not merely source, alienation is implied. (cf. {punji}, {cpacu} where volition or previous possession is not necessarily implied, {vimcu} for alienation where x_1 need not gain possession, {canci}, {cliva})

lecyde'i

lujvo
d_1 is a/the wisdom tooth of d_2
See also {ka'arde'i}, {gerde'i}, {crazalde'i}, {zalde'i}.

lecydo'i

lujvo
d_1=l_1 is the afternoon of day d_2 at location d_3.

ledgrute

lujvo
g_1 is a mushroom of species g_2.

ledo

cmavo-compound
LE*
possessive/associative descriptor: the one(s) described as, of yours.

ledycilta

lujvo
x_1 is a mycelium of x_2
See also {mledi}, {cilta}

le'e

cmavo
-lem-
LE
non-veridical descriptor: the stereotype of those described as ...

le'elkai

fu'ivla
x_1 is/are the thing(s) described/named with property x_2 by the speaker, who thinks this is contextually enough information for the listener to understand what are x_1's referent(s)
This predicate is intended to be the predicate equivalent of {le} (or at least to one of the interpretations thereof), so that «lo le'elkai be lo ka broda» is equivalent to «le broda». See also {le}, {lemkai}.

le go'i

cmavo-compound
KOhA*
description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_1 of the previous bridi.

lei

cmavo
LE
non-veridical descriptor: the mass of individual(s) described as ...

le'i

cmavo
LE
non-veridical descriptor: the set of those described as ..., treated as a set.

leicmi

lujvo
x_1 is a member of class / category x_2 (mass / plurality), within supergroup x_3, with defining quality x_4
See {klesi}, {cmima}, {kleinzu}

lei'e

experimental cmavo
LE
anaphoric mass gadri: start a description of a mass/group/constituency mentioned earlier in the text/conversation, viewed as a whole
Part of the "gadganzu proposal" for the article system.

lei'i

experimental cmavo
LE
demonstrative mass gadri; start a definite description that refers to a mass/group/constituency in the shared frame-of-reference, viewed as a whole
Part of the "gadganzu proposal" for the article system.

le'ipli

lujvo
pi_1=pl_1 employs pi_2=pl_3 for a payment/compensation/salary/wage/reward of pl_2 for the provision of goods/services pi_3=pl_4.
From: {pleji}, {pilno}. Cf. {seljibri}.

leiske

lujvo
s_1 is the taxonomy of s_2=k_2 based on methodology s_3.
x2 may be subjects of biology, semantics, economics, military science, safety science, etc. Cf. {jutske}, {klesi}.

le jaica

cmavo-compound
LE*
description: marks description extracting the time tense place of the description bridi.

le jaigau

cmavo-compound
LE*
description: marks description extracting the agentive place of the description selbri.

le jaivi

cmavo-compound
LE*
description: marks description extracting the location place of the description bridi.

lejbai

lujvo
x_1=p_1 bribes x_3=p_3 with x_2=p_2 into doing x_4=p_4.

lejykarda

lujvo
x_1=k_1 is a payment card with cardholder x_2=p_1 for usage x_3=p_4, accepted by payee/merchant x_4=p_3
Non-differentiated cards used for payment, with or without payment account/financial institute association. See debit card ({baxydinkarda}), credit/charge card ({jitseldejykarda}/{detseldejykarda}) and stored-value card ({vamveile'ikarda}). Cf. {maksriveikarda}, {lejykardymi'i}, {banxa}, {pleji}, {jdini}.

lejykardymi'i

lujvo
x_1=m_1 is a payment card reader for use/function x_2=m_2, accepting card x_3=k_1
Machines accepting payment cards ({lejykarda}), e.g. ATMs and terminals at point of sale/checkout. Cf. {maksrikardymi'i}, {lejykarda}, {baxydinkarda}, {jitseldejykarda}, {detseldejykarda}, {vamveile'ikarda}, {banxa}, {jdini}.

lekladryckafi

lujvo
c_1=x_1 is a quantity of white/light/(regular) coffee with cold dairy [or similar] product/creamer/whitener la_1=le_1, addition cold by standard le_2.
See also: coffee with milk (={ladyckafi}), cream (={ladykruji}), soy milk (={sobjau}).

lekmi'i

lujvo
m_1 is a fridge/air conditioner for cooling x_2=l_1.
Cf. {dujmi'i}, {dujyku'a}, {lenku}, {kelvo}, {dunja}, {varmuvmi'i}.

leko'a

cmavo-compound
LE*
possessive/associative descriptor: the one(s) described as, of it-1's.

leksiko

fu'ivla
x_1 is the lexicon/vocabulary of language x_2
See also {leksikosle}, {vlaste}, {bangu}

leksikosle

fu'ivla
x_1 is a lexical unit of language x_2
See also {leksiko}, {valsi}.

lektoni

fu'ivla
x_1 is an electron in quantum state x_2
Cf. {protoni}, {nurtoni}, {xumsle}, {dicka'u}, {guska'u}, {kuarka}.

lektu'a

lujvo
t_1=l_1 is tundra at location t_2, cold by standard l_2
See also {lenku}, {tumla}

lelxe

experimental gismu
x_1 is a lily [Lilium] of species/strain x_2
cf. {rozgu}. lel- is short rafsi

lemi

cmavo-compound
LE*
possessive/associative descriptor: the one(s) described as, of mine.

lemkai

lujvo
x_1 is a stereotypical representative of property x_2

lenga

experimental gismu
x_1 is a speakable language used by persons x_2
A narrower term than {bangu}, is limited to speakable, usable in dialogues languages used by persons ({lo} {prenu}). Doesn't include languages with information transferred one-way (languages of road signs), doesn't include computer programming languages that are not speakable between two persons.

lenguua

fu'ivla
x_1 is a language used by x_2 to express x_3 (du'u, not quote)
A narrower term than {bangu}, doesn't denote dialects. Distinction between {bankle} ('dialect') and {lenguua} ('language') can be defined by linguistic research or politics. See also {tance}, {cusku}, {ve} {tavla}, {jargone}, {valsi}, {gerna}, {jufra}, {natmi}, {slaka}

lenjo

gismu
-len-
-le'o-
x_1 is a lens/glass [focussing shape/form] focussing x_2 to focus/foci x_3 by means/material x_4.
(adjective:) x_1 is optical; focussing may be optical or otherwise, hence x_2 which may be light, sound, X-ray, etc., default is light/optical lens; ka is refraction. See also {kacma}, {minra}.

lenku

gismu
-lek-
x_1 is cold/cool by standard x_2.
See also {glare}, {bisli}.

lenu

cmavo-compound
LE*
specific event descriptor: contraction of {le nu} and identical in meaning.
Added because beginners often search for {lenu} without realizing that it is the same as {le} {nu} and getting confused.

le'o

cmavo
UI5
attitudinal modifier: aggressive - passive - defensive.
See also {gunta}, {bandu}.

le'ocu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*5
attitudinal modifier: aggressive - passive - defensive.

le'onai

cmavo-compound
UI*5
attitudinal modifier: aggressive - passive - defensive.

le'onmo

fu'ivla
x_1 feels/is aggressive/hostile/antagonistic towards x_2
A brivla form of the attitudinal {le'o}. Similar to {gunta}, but different in that a {gunta} is actively attacking the {selgunta}, but a {le'onmo} simply feels the emotions associated with {gunta}ing. Additionally, {no'e} {le'onmo} means "passive", and {to'e} {le'onmo} means "defensive".

le'otci

lujvo
t_1 is a monocle/pair of (eye)glasses/spectacles for observational activity t_2.
Cf. {lenjo}, {tutci}, {barkalyle'o}, {vistci}.

lepsauru

fu'ivla
x_1 is a lepidosaur (scaled lizard)

lerbasysre

lujvo
s_1 makes a typo, typing/writing letter l_1=b_1 in place of l_1=b_2 in word b_3 by standard s_4
The standard place covers cases of different spelling conventions in other languages and possibly other dialects of Lojban. For example, 'colour' is a typo is American English, but correct in British English.

lerci

gismu
-lec-
x_1 (event) is late by standard x_2.
See also {clira}.

lercu'aca'a

lujvo
ca_1 is a keyboard for entering letters/symbols l_1=cu_2.
Cf. {batkyci'a}.

lercu'aca'aci'aci'e

lujvo
x_1=ciste_1 is a keyboard layout used by x_2=ciska_1 to enter letters/symbols x_3=lerfu_1=ciska_2=cuxna_2.

lerfi'ubu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a slash punctuation mark

lerfu

gismu
-ler-
-le'u-
x_1 (la'e zo BY/word-bu) is a letter/digit/symbol in alphabet/character-set x_2 representing x_3.
Also x_1 glyph, rune, character (also me'o BY/word-bu), x_2 symbol set; (adjective:) x_1 is alphabetic/symbolic; "letteral" used by analogy with "numeral"; sinxa is the more generic symbol. See also {mifra}, {namcu}, {sinxa}, {pandi}.

lerkoma

fu'ivla
x_1 is a comma punctuation mark

lerldjamo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a jamo in syllable x_2 in writing system x_3 (default Hangul)

lerpavmoivla

lujvo
l_1 (quoted letteral) is the first letter of the word v_1.
Only a single letter(al) is allowed for l_1. Both the letteral and the word must be quoted. See also: {lerfu}, {pa}, {moi}, {valsi}, {leryrolmoivla}.

lerpinsle

lujvo
s_1=p_1 is a line in the text s_2.
Cf. {vlali'i}, {lerseltcidu}.

lerpoi

lujvo
p_1 is a character string (sequence of letterals) in alphabet/character-set l_2 representing l_3

lerpoijaspu

lujvo
j_1=p_1 (zoi-quote/character sequence) is a password/passphrase issued to j_2 by issuer/authority j_3, allowing activity j_4.
Cf. {lerpoi}, {jaspu}.

lerseltcidu

lujvo
t_2 is a text in medium t_3 with character set l_2.

lertcitydetri

lujvo
x_1 is the letteral-tagged timestamp of event/state/duration x_2, at timezone location x_3, by calendar x_4
Refers to http://mw.lojban.org/index.php?title=loi_lerfu_tcita_detri. See {detri}, {tcika}, {temjudri}, {de'i}, {ti'u}, {te'i}

lertermifra

lujvo
m_3 is a character encoding for bytes m_2 with symbols/font m_1.
Cf. {lerfu}, {mifra}, {skami}.

lervla

lujvo
v_1 is a word which stands for the letter/digit/symbol v_2=l_1 in language v_3.
Also called “letteral” when referring to Lojban. See also: {lerfu}, {valsi}.

leryrolmoivla

lujvo
l_1 (quoted letteral) is the last letter of the word v_1.
Only a single letter(al) is allowed for l_1. Both the letteral and the word must be quoted. See also: {lerfu}, {ro}, {moi}, {valsi}, {lerpavmoivla}.

le sego'i

cmavo-compound
KOhA*
description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_2 of the previous bridi.

lespei

lujvo
x_1 philosophizes / thinks about philosophy x_2 about subfield x_3

lespre

lujvo
x_1 is a philosopher, espousing philosophy x_2 about subfield x_3
See {flese}, {prenu}, {skepre}

lesrplatono

fu'ivla
x_1 is Platonic/a Platonistic ideal/philosophy about topic x_2 characterized by thoughts/ideals x_3 and methodology x_4, according to thinker/user/standard x_5
See also: {flese} (an experimental gismu with short rafsi -les- (not yet officially accepted))

lesrxapsurdie

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 (notion) is Absurd/is characterized by an Absurd nature in aspect x_2, belonging to school of philosophy/type of Absurdism x_3, according to standards/methodology/classification/claim x_4
{flese} is an experimental gismu and the short rafsi -les- is not officially assigned. For the term "Absurdism" itself, consider: te lesrxapsurdie. The Absurd in this case is that associated with, for example, Albert Camus and other philosophers.

leta

cmavo-compound
LE*
possessive/associative descriptor: nearby demonstrative possessive; cannot use for 'THAT ...'.

le tego'i

cmavo-compound
KOhA*
description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_3 of the previous bridi.

leti

cmavo-compound
LE*
possessive/associative descriptor: immediate demonstrative possessive; cannot use for 'THIS ...'.

letu

cmavo-compound
LE*
possessive/associative descriptor: distant demonstrative possessive.

le'u

cmavo
LEhU
end quote of questionable or out-of-context text; not elidable.

leva

cmavo-compound
LE*
located descriptor: descriptive that-there (non-demonstrative).

le vego'i

cmavo-compound
KOhA*
description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_4 of the previous bridi.

levi

cmavo-compound
LE*
located descriptor: descriptive this-here (non-demonstrative).

levu

cmavo-compound
LE*
located descriptor: descriptive that-yonder (non-demonstrative).

le xego'i

cmavo-compound
KOhA*
description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_5 of the previous bridi.

li

cmavo
LI
the number/evaluated expression; convert number/operand/evaluated math expression to sumti.

li'a

cmavo
UI3
discursive: clearly - obscurely.
See also {klina}.

li'ai

experimental cmavo
LI
unevaluated mekso as name.
Where "la broda brode" is to "la'e lu broda brode" as "li'ai by cy" is to "la'e me'o by cy". See also {li}, {me'o}, {la}, {la'e}.

li'anai

cmavo-compound
UI*3
discursive: clearly - obscurely.

liante

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a liana, a climbing woody vine

li'armi

fu'ivla
x_1 (du'u - fact/truth) is obvious / clear / self-evident to x_2
See {li'a}, {gasfrili}, {jmifrili}, {filseljmi}, {filsmu}

li'au

experimental cmavo
LIhAU
terminator of selma'o LUhEI
See also {lu'ei}, {li'u} and {me'u}.

li'avro

lujvo
v_1 is an exit out of c_2.
Cf. {cliva}, {vorme}, {vrogai}

libjo

gismu
-lib-
x_1 reflects Libyan culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
See also {friko}, {xrabo}, {muslo}.

libru'u

lujvo
r_1 is measured in libyan dinar (دينارLYD) as r_2 (quantity), in the Libyan monetary system r_3.

lidne

gismu
-li'e-
x_1 precedes/leads x_2 in sequence x_3; x_1 is former/preceding/previous; x_2 is latter/following.
Also x_1 before, forerunner; leading, as in 'leading indicators'; x_2 after, trailing (= {selyli'e} for reordered places). See also cmavo list {li'e}, {balvi}, {ralju}, {rebla}, {purci} for time sequence, {jersi}, {porsi}, {jatna}, {farna}.

lidvilti'a

lujvo
t_1=v_1 is a thunderstorm at place/region t_2
Cf. {lindi}, {vlile}, {tcima}.

lidvru

lujvo
s_1 is thunderous to s_2.
Cf. {lindi}, {savru}.

lidysna

lujvo
x_1 is a sound with emit sound-lightning x_2.

li'e

cmavo
BAI
lidne modal, 1st place preceded by ...; non-time sequencing.

li'ei

experimental cmavo
LIhEI
arbitrary character string or irregular number
Accepts any arbitrary string of BY, bu-letterals, PA. Elidable terminator: {lo'o}. See {li'ai}, {me'o}, {mo'e}, {li}. [Tentative proposal: {li'ei} = {li} {pe'o} {joi'i} / {me'o} {pe'o} {joi'i}]

li'enrafsi

lujvo
x_1=r_1=l_1 is a prefix for word/concept x_2=r_2=l_2, form/properties x_3=r_3, language x_4=r_4
Cf. {selyli'erafsi}, {rafsi}, {valsi}, {lujvo}, {pagbu}

li'erla'i

lujvo
li_1=la_1 immediately precedes li_2=la_2 in sequence li_3=la_3.

LIEtuvas

obsolete cmevla
Lithuania.

lietuvos

obsolete cmevla
Lithuania.

lifri

gismu
-lif-
-fri-
x_1 [person/passive/state] undergoes/experiences x_2 (event/experience); x_2 happens to x_1.
Also has/have (of events/experiences); (adjective:) x_1 is empirical; suggests passive undergoing but does not exclude active (per zukte) intent; a deserved experience: reward or punishment (= {jernyfri}, {zanjernyfri}, {maljernyfri}). See also cmavo list {ri'i}, {jmive}, {fasnu}, {renvi}.

ligyfebvi

lujvo
x_1=f_1=s_2 sublimates/evaporates from the solid state at temperature x_2=f_2=s_3 with vapor pressure x_3=f_3.
From {sligu} {febvi}; refers to a direct change of the state of matter from solid to gaseous. Cf. {gacydunja}

li'i

cmavo
-liz-
NU
abstractor: experience abstractor; x_1 is x_2's experience of [bridi] (participant or observer).

li'i'e

experimental cmavo
BAI
lisri modal, 1st place: in/belonging to/of/from story...
Of a character, location, event, etc.; something which exists in the universe of the story.

li'imdu

fu'ivla
x_1 (li'i) is the subjective conscious experience of x_2 (nu or ka-of-x_3), as experienced by x_3
Brivla form of {li'i}. See {lifri}, {vedli}, {li'i}, {nundumu}, {du'umdu}, {su'umdu}, {zilkai}, {ganseti}

li'imfri

fu'ivla
x_1 consciously experiences x_2 (nu/ka)
See {li'imdu}, {lifri}, {li'i}

li'imse'i

fu'ivla
x_1 is the consciousness of x_2
See {li'imdu}, {li'imfri}, {sevzi}, {ruxse'i}

li'i ze'ei ka

cmavo-compound
NU*
abstractor: experience of being: x_1 is x_2's experience of being [bridi] (property of x_2; with {ce'u} referring to x_2's position)
= {li'imdu} {be} {lo} {ka}. See {li'i}, {ze'ei}, {li'i ze'ei nu}

li'i ze'ei nu

cmavo-compound
NU*
abstractor: experience of event: x_1 is x_2's experience of observing or participating in [bridi] (event)
= {li'imdu} {be} {lo} {nu}. See {li'i}, {ze'ei}, {li'i ze'ei ka}

lijda

gismu
-jda-
x_1 is a religion of believers including x_2 sharing common beliefs/practices/tenets including x_3.
Also mythos, creed, traditional beliefs, x_2 people(s), adherents; (adjective:) x_1, x_2, x_3 are religious/ecclesiastic in nature; x_2 is a believer in/of x_1, an adherent/follower of x_1 (= {seljda} for reordered places); x_2 is a practitioner of x_3 (= {selterjda} for reordered places); x_3 is a tenet/belief/ritual/creed of x_1/x_2 (= {terjda} for reordered places); priest/clerical (= {jdaca'i}, {jdaka'i}, {jdaja'a}); organized church/religion (= {be'ejda}); congregation (= {jdabe'e}, {jdagri}). See also {budjo}, {censa}, {cevni}, {crida}, {dadjo}, {jegvo}, {krici}, {latna}, {malsi}, {marde}, {muslo}, {pruxi}, {ranmi}, {ritli}, {xriso}, {zekri}.

lijdrba'a,i

fu'ivla
l_1 is the Bahai religion with beliefs/practices/tenets including l_3

lijdrdjaina

fu'ivla
l_1 is the Jain religion with beliefs/practices/tenets including l_3

lijgri

lujvo
g_1 is a row (group) showing common property (ka) g_2 due to set g_3 linked by relations g_4.
Cf. {lerpinsle}, {depypoi}.

lijnilcla

lujvo
x_1=n_1 is the length of line x_2=l_1=c_1 defined by set of points x_3=l_2 in measurement system x_4=n_2=c_3
Lines are 1D, so clani2 is derived. Cf. {lutnilcla}

lijypanra

lujvo
The lines l_1=p_1 and l_1=p_2 are parallel, according to geometry p_4.

likcri

lujvo
x_1=c_1 leaks liquid x_2=c_2=l_1 at locus x_3=c_3, liquid composition x_4=l_2.

likpu'i

lujvo
x_1=p_1 (agent) anoints/rubs/greases/pours onto/applies/lubricate/baptises x_3=p_3 with liquid/semi-liquid/oil/cream/ointment x_2=p_2=l_1.

likro'i

lujvo
x_1=r_1=l_1 is a quantity of lava/magma [liquid rock] of composition including x_2=r_2=l_2 from location x_3=r_3 under conditions x_4=l_3.
No distinction on whether it has erupted yet.

likrtcigaso

fu'ivla
x_1 is gasoline of grade x_2 with additives x_3.
See also: {litki}

likygau

lujvo
g_1 (agent) causes l_1 to be a quantity of liquid of composition l_2 under conditions l_3.
Example 12.72 (cll 1.1).

likyri'a

lujvo
r_1 causes l_1 to be a quantity of liquid of composition l_2 under conditions l_3.
Example 12.74 (cll 1.1).

lilgundi

lujvo
g_1 is a/the energy industry/sector producing fuel/energy source g_2=l_1 for powering l_2 based on process g_3
From {livla}, {gundi}.

lilmudri

lujvo
m_1=l_1 is a quantity of firewood/fuel wood from tree(s) of type/species m_2, for powering l_2.

lilneia

fu'ivla
x_1 is Linnaean in aspect x_2 (ka).

lilneia zei cmene

zei-lujvo
x_1 is the Linnaean name of x_2

lilrkerozine

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of kerosene (fuel) for powering x_2.
Cf. {livla}

limfa

experimental gismu
x_1 is a lymph of body x_2
See also {ciblu}

limla'u

lujvo
la_1 is a pool where li_1 swims in fluid li_2.
Cf. {limna}, {lalxu}.

limna

gismu
-lim-
x_1 (agent) swims in fluid x_2.
See also {djacu}, {fulta}, {klama}, {litru}.

limna'i

lujvo
n_1 is a flipper [body-part] of n_2.
Cf. {limna}, {nalci}, {fipybirka}.

limxone

fu'ivla
x_1 is a lemon of species/variety x_2

lince

experimental gismu
x_1 is a lynx of species x_2

lindar

cmevla
Lindar Kelleigh Greenwood
First name Lojbanised. A member of the Lojban central community.

lindari

fu'ivla
x_1 measures x_2 lindars in social context x_3.
The lindar is a measure of social inappropriatenes. One Lindar roughly equals the average social inappropriateness of {lindar} (a Lojban central community member). One centiLindar = Mentally laughing at something childish / lavatoriously humorous. Five centiLindars = Chuckling out loud at something when it isn't appropriate (i.e. "I'll be working under you for the duration of this project."). One Lindar = Doing something completely socially inappropriate. One and a half lds. = Being offensive enough to get in trouble and / or get reprimanded. Two lds. = Sufficient to get punched in the face on the spot. Three lds. = Sufficient to get stabbed. Four lds. = Sufficient to be a target of assassination.

lindi

gismu
-lid-
x_1 is lightning/electrical arc/thunderbolt striking at/extending to x_2 from x_3.
Also thunder (= {lidysna}). See also {dikca}.

linga

experimental gismu
x_1 is the ISO-named language of people x_2 with ISO-name x_1, according to rule/specification x_3
gismu version of {lingua}. See also: {jviso}, {lengua}, {bangu}.

linga'axa'i

lujvo
x_1 is a nunchaku.
A Japanese weapon consisting of two wooden sticks connected by a chain; also spelled ``nunchuku''

lingote

fu'ivla
x_1 is an ingot of x_2; x_1 is a a solid block of more or less pure x_2
often but not necessarily bricklike in shape and trapezoidal in cross-section, often the result of pouring out and cooling molten metal, often immediately after smelting from raw ore or alloying from constituents. See also {bliku}, {runme}, {jinme}

lingua

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is the ISO-named language of people x_2 with ISO-name x_1
See {lengua}, {bangu}

linji

gismu
-lij-
-li'i-
x_1 is a line/among lines [1-dimensional shape/form] defined by set of points x_2.
Ray/vector ({farli'i} or {porli'i}). See also {kruvi}, {sirji}, {jganu}, {kantu}, {mokca}.

linlani

fu'ivla
x_1 is a lily-of-the-valley / may-lily (Convallaria) of species/strain x_2

linsi

gismu
-lin-
x_1 is a length of chain/links of material x_2 with link properties x_3.
See also {skori}.

linto

gismu
-li'o-
x_1 is light in mass/weight by standard x_2.
(cf. junta, tilju; se xalbo, kandi for metaphor)

lintoca

fu'ivla
x_1 drizzles to/on x_2 from x_3
See also {carvi}, {linto}, {bratuca}.

li'o

cmavo
UI3a
discursive: omitted text (quoted material).

li'oi

experimental cmavo
UI3a
marks word/construct as being optional, i.e. the bridi would still be both grammatical AND reflect the speakers opinion/intention would the marked construct be left out
{coi} {fu'e} {li'oi} {la} {fu'o} {selpa'i} would semantically expand to {coi} {la} {selpa'i} and {coi} {selpa'i} meaning that both a person named {selpa'i} and a beloved one is being greeted (both being the same person).

li'orkliru

lujvo
x_1 is fluorine.

li'orklirysilna

lujvo
s_1 is a fluoride of s_3.
see also {li'orklirytau}

li'orklirytau

lujvo
t_1 is a fluoride of t_3.
See also {li'orklirysilna}.

liptila

fu'ivla
x_1 is a linden of species x_2

lirgli

lujvo
g_1 is Old English/pertains to Old English-speaking culture in aspect g_2, early by standard x_3=c_2.

lirmau

lujvo
x_1 is earlier than x_2 by amount of time x_3.
cf. lecmau, temci

liryrai

lujvo
c_1=t_1 is the earliest among set / range t_4.

liryraixa'u

lujvo
lr_1=xa_1 is / are the earliest person(s) to dwell/live/reside/abide at/inhabit/be a resident of location/habitat/nest/home/abode xa_2 among set / range lr_2.
Made from {liryrai} + {xabju}.

lisne'i

lujvo
n_1 is in character (actions or speech to be interpreted as part of a story/role-playing game)
out of character: {lisybartu}

lisnuntoi

lujvo
n_1 is a drafting by author l_3=t_1 of story l_1=t_2 using method t_3.

lisri

gismu
-lis-
x_1 is a story/tale/yarn/narrative about plot/subject/moral x_2 by storyteller x_3 to audience x_4.
Also legend; a narrative need not be fictional; x_2 may be merely a convention rather than a subject; also x_3 tells/recounts story/tale x_1 about x_2 to x_4 (= {selterlisri} for place reordering); note that the storyteller need not be the author. See also {ranmi}, {cfika}, {skicu}, {prosa}, {pemci}.

liste

gismu
-ste-
x_1 (physical object) is a list/catalog/register of sequence/set x_2 in order x_3 in medium x_4.
Also roll, log. (x_2 is completely specified); (cf. {porsi}, {girzu}, {cmima} for mental objects wherein order is of varying importance; some manifested order is intrinsic to a physical list, but the specific order may be incidental and not intentional/purposeful)

lisxra

lujvo
x_1=p_1 is a comic strip about plot/subject/moral x_2=l_2 illustrated by x_3=p_3 with story written by x_4=l_3.
Cf. {lisri}, {pixra}.

lisybartu

lujvo
b_1 is out of character (actions or speech not to be interpreted as part of a story/role-playing game)
in character: {lisne'i}

lisycku

lujvo
c_1 is a story book containing story/tale/yarn/narrative c_2=l_2 by book author c_3 for book’s audience c_4 preserved in medium c_5.
A book is called a “story book” in this context if it contains at least one story (c_2=l_1). Cf. {fikcku}.

litce

gismu
-lic-
x_1 is x_2 liter(s) [metric unit] in volume (default is 1) by standard x_3.
See also {merli}, {grake}, {mitre}, {dekpu}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

litcreka

lujvo
cr_1 is a dress shirt of material cr_2, potentially formal by standard cl_3.
A shirt with a collar, a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the hem, and sleeves with cuffs; normally made from woven cloth, and are often accompanied by a jacket and tie, for example with a suit or formalwear, but can be worn also more casually without. Cf. {creka}.

litkauo

fu'ivla
x_1 is an African wild dog (Lycaon pictus) of species/breed x_2
See {labno}, {gerku}

litki

gismu
-lik-
x_1 is liquid/fluid, of composition/material including x_2, under conditions x_3.
Conditions include temperature and pressure. See also {cilmo}, {djacu}, {lumci}, {runta}, {pambe}, {sudga}, {gapci}, {sligu}, {flecu}, {jduli}.

litru

gismu
-li'u-
x_1 travels/journeys/goes/moves via route x_2 using means/vehicle x_3; x_1 is a traveller.
(x_2 as a set includes points at least sufficient to constrain the route relevantly); See also {bajra}, {cadzu}, {cpare}, {tcana}, {klama}, {cliva}, {pluta}, {limna}, {muvdu}.

litxendo

lujvo
xe_1=c_1 is gracious to xe_2 in matter xe_3=c_2.
{xendo}, {clite}.

litytce

lujvo
m_1 is very/extremely polite/courteous/civil in matter c_2 according to standard/custom c_3.
Cf. {clite}, {mutce}.

li'u

cmavo
LIhU
elidable terminator: end grammatical quotation; seldom elidable except at end of text.

liunko

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a lynx (Felis lynx)
See {mlatu}

livbai

lujvo
b_1 expels c_1 from c_2; b_1 throws c_1 out of c_2.
Cf. {cliva}, {bapli}, {livgau}.

livga

gismu
x_1 is a/the liver [body-part] of x_2.
See also {rango}, {betfu}.

livgau

lujvo
g_1 causes c_1 to leave c_2 via route c_3.
Cf. {cliva}, {gasnu}, {livbai}.

livla

gismu
-lil-
x_1 is a fuel/energy-source for powering x_2.
See also {nejni}, {xaksu}, {jelca}.

lixtci

lujvo
x_1 is a plough/plow for ploughing/plowing x_2 propelled by x_3

lizdu'o

lujvo
x_1 is the subjective conscious experience of being x_2; x_1 is what it's like to be x_2
See {li'i}, {li'imdu}, {du}, {kamcedu}, {dumdu'o}

lo

cmavo
LE
descriptor: the one, which (is / does) ... / those, which (are / do) ...
Terminated with {ku}. Under the xorlo reform, {lo} converts a selbri to a sumti in a generic way. In particular, lo broda = {zo'e} noi broda.

lo'a

cmavo
BY1
shift letterals to Lojban (Roman) alphabet.

lo'ai

experimental cmavo
LOhAI
start quote of recent mistakenly uttered text to be replaced
See {le'ai}.

lo'e

cmavo
-lom-
LE
veridical descriptor: the typical one(s) who really is(are) ...

logji

gismu
-loj-
x_1 [rules/methods] is a logic for deducing/concluding/inferring/reasoning to/about x_2 (du'u).
Also (adjective:) x_1, x_2 are logical. See also {nibli}.

loglo

experimental gismu
x_1 pertains to Loglan language/culture in aspect x_2

loglytuan

obsolete cmevla
Loglan-worker.

loi

cmavo
LE
veridical descriptor: the mass of individual(s) that is(are) ...

lo'i

cmavo
LE
veridical descriptor: the set of those that really are ..., treated as a set.

loibru

lujvo
b_1 is a broom for purpose b_2 (event) with bristles b_3.
From {loldi}, {burcu}.

loi'e

experimental cmavo
LE
generalized mass gadri; start a description of a generalization of some mass/group/constituency viewed as a whole
Part of the "gadganzu proposal" for the article system. http://mw.lojban.org/papri/zipcpi:_Yet_another_gadri_article

loi'i

experimental cmavo
LE
essentialist mass gadri; start a description of an essential characterization of some mass/group/constituency viewed as a whole
Part of the "gadganzu proposal" for the article system.

loisli

lujvo
l_1=s_1 undergoes an earthquake/an event of the ground shaking of magnitude x_2.
not necessarily earthquake, could be due to bomb explosion etc. too.

lojbab

cmevla
Bob LeChevalier.
Bob LeChevalier is one of the Original Lojbanists.

lojban

cmevla
Lojban.
Cf. {banjubu'o}.

lojbangirz

cmevla
Logical Language Group (LLG)
See also {lojbangirzu}

lojbangirzu

lujvo
x_1 is the Logical Language Group (LLG).
See also {lojbangirz}. Lowest scoring form is {lojbaugri}.

lojban zei simsa

zei-lujvo
s_1 is similar/parallel to Lojban in property s_3 (ka).
Syn. {jbobausmi}. Cf. {lojban}, {simsa}.

lojbau

lujvo
b_1 is the loglan/Loglan/logic language used by community b_2 to express ideas b_3.
Cf. {bangu}, {runbau}, {lojbo}, {lojban}

lojbaugri

lujvo
x_1 is the Logical Language Group (LLG).
See also {lojbangirz}, {lojbangirzu}.

lojbo

gismu
-lob-
-jbo-
x_1 reflects [Loglandic]/Lojbanic language/culture/nationality/community in aspect x_2.
Pre-Lojban forms of Loglan (= {dzejbo}). See also {bangu}, {logji}.

lojvro

lujvo
v_1 is a logic gate with inputs [pins] v_2 and output [pins] v_3 in circuit/system v_4.
See also: NOT gate ({jifkemlojvro}), OR gate ({kaxykemlojvro}), AND gate ({vlinykemlojvro}).

lojycpa

lujvo
x_1 infers/concludes/draws conclusion x_2 from premise x_3 based on logic/reasoning x_4.
Cf. {logji}, {cpacu}, {famsku}, {ni'i}, {ja'o}, {nibji'i}, {jivbi'o}.

lojysarxe

lujvo
x_1 is harmonious with logical philosophy/thought in aspect x_2 (ka); x_1 is logical (one sense)
English "illogical" typically either means {to'e} {lojysarxe} or {tolracli}. See {logji}, {sarxe}, {jbosarxe}, {racli}.

loksodonta

See also: {xanto}, {xantrelefa}

lolbu'u

lujvo
x_1 is a carpet

loldi

gismu
-lol-
-loi-
x_1 is a floor/bottom/ground of x_2.
Floor/level/story of a building/edifice (= {setloi}, {dijysenta}). See also {bitmu}, {drudi}, {dertu}, {dizlo}, {cnita}, {zbepi}, {sarji}, {serti}.

lolgai

lujvo
g_1 is floor covering/flooring/carpet/rug for covering floor g_2=l_1 of x_3=l_2.
Cf. {buklolgai}.

lolni'a

Cf. {lolni'apu'i}, {derse'a}.

lujvo

lolni'apu'i

lujvo
p_1 (agent) buries/puts underground p_2=c_1 under surface x_3=c_2=l_1 of x_4=l_2.
Cf. {lolni'a}, {derse'a}.

lolnitku'a

lujvo
x_1 is a cellar/basement in building x_2

lolro'iboi

lujvo

lomkai

lujvo
x_1 is a typical representative of property x_2

lonu

cmavo-compound
LE*
event descriptor: contraction of {lo nu} and identical in meaning.
Added because beginners often search for {lonu} without realizing that it is the same as {lo} {nu} and getting confused.

lo'o

cmavo
LOhO
elidable terminator: end math express.(mex) sumti; end mex-to-sumti conversion; usually elidable.

lo'oi

experimental cmavo
LOhOI
Description clause: create a sumti from the enclosed bridi, describing the referent of the created sumti as filling the bridi place filled with {ke'a}.
Notes: Full-bridi equivalent of {lo}. Terminator: {ku'au}.

See {lorxu}

loroda

KOhA*
all the things (in our universe of discourse)

lorvera

fu'ivla

gismu

-lo'u-

losanjylys

cmevla
Los Angeles

losupan

cmevla
Lojban
See also {jbobau}

lo'u

cmavo
LOhU
start questionable/out-of-context quote; text should be Lojban words, but needn't be grammatical.
Terminated by {le'u}.

lu

cmavo
LU
start grammatical quotation; quoted text should be grammatical on its own.

lu'a

cmavo
LAhE
the members of the set/components of the mass; converts another description type to individuals.

lu'au

experimental cmavo
LAhE
Bridi to text conversion
Essentially equivalent to {se} in the context of a {se} {du'u}. Inverse of {du'au}; however note that this is not single-valued, while {du'au} (provided context) is single-valued. Hence "lu'au du'au" is a useful idiom for constructing a text which has the same basic meaning as another text but is not necessarily the same text.

lubno

gismu
-lu'o-
x_1 reflects Lebanese culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
See also {xrabo}.

lu'e

cmavo
LAhE
the symbol for (indirect discourse); uses the symbol/word(s) for a sumti as the desired sumti.

lu'ei

experimental cmavo
LUhEI
convert a grammatical quotation to a tanru unit; x_1 expresses/says the quoted text for audience x_2 via expressive medium x_3.
The terminator is {li'au}. It is neither grammatical nor logical that a fragment and a sentence are connected by a sentence conjunction like ``.i je'' or ``.i ba bo''. However, such an expression is common among non-Lojban texts. Selma'o {lu'ei} forms a tanru unit, and helps us to translate such an expression without losing logical aspect of Lojban. It is also useful in writing scenarios. See also {li'au}, {lu} and {me}. Example 1: lu'ei ki'u lo nu la'e di'u na se tarti mi'a noi cinfo ku'o lo tamsmi sei spuda li'au .i ba bo la cinfo fau lo nu banli plipe cu cecla vofli pagre lo vacri gi'e snura zvabi'o lo ragve (cited and modified from ``lo se manci te makfa pe la .oz.'' translated by la selpa'i.) Example 2: ko'a lu'ei u'i doi .maman. ko viska .i ta dasni cizra li'au i ko'e lu'ei .oi ko na degja'o .i ko smaji li'au

lu'erfu

fu'ivla
x_1 (quote) is a text/word/sequence wherein the characters/phonemes are taken over alphabet x_2 (set)
For formal language analysis. In mathematical writing, this relationship is sometimes written as "/"; the set of all x1 (where x2 is specified) is x2* (where "*" is the Kleene star); then x1 is an element/member of x2*, and the letters of x1 are elements/members of x2. While each letter in x1 must be an element of x2, there can be elements of x2 that do not appear in x1.

lu'erma

fu'ivla
x_1 (letteral) is a letter that occurs in word x_2 (text); x2 contains an occurrence of x1 as a digit/term in a sequence
See also: {lu'erfu} (for words over an alphabet), {lerfu} (for letters/digits/terms/elements/members of an alphabet; for completely formal usage (without any meaning), use: se {zilterle'u})

lu'i

cmavo
LAhE
the set with members; converts another description type to a set of the members.

lujna'u

lujvo
x_1 is a complex number.
{pluja} {namcu}. See also {xarna'u}; {tolxarna'u}, {mrena'u}; {ka'o}

lujrinsku

lujvo
x_1=c_1 (person) justifies/expresses justification x_2=k_2 for x_3=p_1's complicated-ness in aspect x_4=p_2 to audience x_5=c_3 via expressive medium x_6=c_4.
cf. {pluja}, {sampu}, {krinu}, {rinka}, {nibli}, {gasnu}, {cusku}, {tavla}, {casnu}, {skicu}.

lujvo

gismu
-luv-
-jvo-
x_1 (text) is a compound predicate word with meaning x_2 and arguments x_3 built from metaphor x_4.
See also {stura}, {cmavo}, {gismu}, {rafsi}, {smuni}.

lujyki'u

lujvo
x_1=k_1 (abstract) justifies x_2=p_1's complicated-ness in aspect x_3=p_2.
cf. {pluja}, {krinu}, {sampu}.

luksi

experimental gismu
x_1 is electric [adjective] producing electric field x_2.
Proposed rafsi -luk-. See also {maksi}, {dikca}.

lu li'u

cmavo-compound
empty (grammatical) string/text/utterance
Not: empty word, empty symbol. See also: {zoi'ai'e}.

lumbrinki

fu'ivla
x_1 is an earthworm of species x_2.
Cf. {curnu}, {dertu}, {carvi}.

lumci

gismu
-lum-
-lu'i-
x_1 (agent) washes/cleanses x_2 of soil/contaminant x_3 in/with cleaning material(s) x_4.
Agentless washing/cleansing (= {cuvbi'o}, {jisybi'o}). See also {djacu}, {jinru}, {litki}, {zbabu}, {jinsa}, {curve}.

lumku'a

lujvo
x_1=k_1 is a bathroom, in which x_2=l_1 washes x_3=l_2 (self/other(s)/body part), in home/building/structure x_4=k_2 surrounded by partitions/walls/ceiling/floor x_5=k_3 (mass/jo'u)
A room with a sink technically qualifies, but this is more like a room with a bath or shower as well. What most Americans call a "bathroom". For a room specifically for urination or defecation, see {vimku'a}.

lumpatxu

lujvo
p_1 is a wash tub/bath tub, for l_1 to wash p_2=l_2, made of material p_3.

lumtansi

lujvo
t_1 is a sink, for l_1 to wash t_2=l_2, made of material t_3

lunbe

gismu
-lub-
x_1 is bare/naked/nude; x_1 is without cover/clothes/[protection].
See also {taxfu}, {bandu}.

lunmes

cmevla
x_1 is Aries [astronomical constellation/astrological sign].
From lanme (=sheep/[lamb/ewe/ram];lojban) and lu (=sheep;sumerogram). This constellation has been known as the ram/sheep since babylonian times, and later become the leading sign of the zodiac (7th century BCE). In Hellenistic astrology, the constellation of Aries is associated with the golden ram of Greek mythology that rescued Phrixos.

lunra

gismu
-lur-
x_1 is Earth's moon (default); x_1 is a major natural satellite/moon of planet x_2.
See also {plini}, {solri}, {terdi}, {mluni}.

lunsa

gismu
-lus-
x_1 condenses/liquefies on/into x_2 at temperature x_3, pressure x_4; x_1 is dew/condensate on x_2.
See also {cilmo}, {dunja}, {febvi}, {runme}, {bumru}.

lu'o

cmavo
LAhE
the mass composed of; converts another description type to a mass composed of the members.

luodna

lutnilcla

lujvo

Paths are 1D, so clani2 is derived. Cf. {lijnilcla}

mabla

gismu
-mal-
x_1 is execrable/deplorable/wretched/shitty/awful/rotten/miserable/contemptible/crappy/inferior/low-quality in property x_2 by standard x_3; x_1 stinks/sucks in aspect x_2 according to x_3.
Bloody (British sense), fucking, shit, goddamn. See also {zabna}, {xlali}, {palci}, {dapma}, {funca}, {ganti}, {ganxo}, {gletu}, {gutra}, {kalci}, {pinca}, {pinji}, {plibu}, {vibna}, {vlagi}, {zargu}.

fu'ivla

Syn. {mutsteila}. See {ermine}, {fulreto}, {mabru}

x_1 is a mustelid (member of the Mustelidae family)

Cf. {mustlei}, {ermine}.

madni'i

lujvo

madRID

cmevla

madyctulisri

lujvo
x_1 is a fable [teaching moral lesson x_2].

madyske

lujvo
s_1 (mass of facts) is the study of conduct-governing standards s_2=m_1 based on methodology s_3.
Major branches of ethics include "meta-ethics" ({ckaji zei madyske}), "normative ethics" ({bilga zei madyske}), "applied ethics" ({pilno zei madyske}), "moral psychology" ({menli zei madyske}), and "descriptive ethics" ({skicu zei madyske}). Cf. {saske}.

madysku

lujvo
c_1=m_2 moralizes expressing c_2 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) to audience c_3 via expressive medium c_4 using/based on ethics/morals/moral standards/ethical standards m_1
from {marde} {cusku} c.f. {bitygau} {dragau}

marji modal, 1st place material in object/substance ...

ma'ekla

ma'erlilvau

lujvo
v_1 is a gas tank/fuel container containing fuel l_1, of vehicle m_1.

ma'erlo

x_1 is maerl of genus/species x_2

ma'ersazyjaspu

lujvo

ma'erselkei

lujvo

ma'estro

mafcre

lujvo
c_1=m_3 is a wizard/sorcerer of m_1=c_1, which is magical to m_2, with standard of sorcery c_3.
Cf. {makfa}, {certu}

mafnenlai

lujvo

cf. {makfa} {nejni} {klani}

magdaro

fu'ivla
x_1 is Hungarian in aspect x_2

magmiltre

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 millimeters of mercury by standard x_3.
synonym {torceli}

magyxre

lujvo
x_1 is an amalgam of composition including x_2.

mai

cmavo
MAI
utterance ordinal suffix; converts a number to an ordinal, such as an item or paragraph number.

ma'i

cmavo
BAI
manri modal, 1st place (by standard 2) in reference frame ...

mai'e'e

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: Meissel-Mertens constant M ≈ 0.2614972128476427837554268386086958590516…
The limiting difference of the harmonic series summed over only the positive prime natural numbers less than or equal to n and the natural logarithm of the natural logarithm of n, as n -> ∞.

mai'i

experimental cmavo
KOhA7
pro-sumti: the universal argument/value; syntactically-contextually and type-permitted maximally generic in its typing
It is a pro-sumti with a universal reference set (restricted to syntactically-demanded/appropriate type). Probably semantically maximally and generally elliptical/generic. Typing can be restricted by (possibly metalinguistic) restriction. See also: {zai'o} (pro-sumti; empty), {gai'o} (pro-bridi; empty), {cei'i} (pro-bridi; universal), {ctaipe}. Proposed by: lai .az. .e lai .krtisfranks.

mai'o

experimental cmavo
LI2
turns number into pro-sumti: the abstraction described by the utterance denoted by that number and {mai}
E.g. {mai'o pa} refers to the events or statements described earlier with {pamai}. Use {lu'e} to refer to the text. See {goi'e}, {mai}

ma'irdeidetri

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the date/day notation of the month of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{masti} zei {djedi} zei {detri}. As default, the number x_1 is counted from the first day of the month. See {de'i'o} for BAI. See also {detke'u}.

ma'irdetri

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the month notation of the date of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{masti} zei {detri}. As default, the number x_1 is counted from the first month of the year. See {de'i'i} for BAI. See also {detke'u}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei}, {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

ma'irjefydetri

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the week notation of the month of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{masti} zei {jeftu} zei {detri}. As default, the number x_1 is counted from the first week of the month. See also {detke'u}.

mairka'u

lujvo
k_1 is an elementary fermion [quark or lepton]/matter particle/smallest measurable increment of matter/property/activity k_2=m_1.

mairza'i

lujvo
z_1 physically exists/is a physical reality for z_2 under metaphysicsz_3.

maisru

lujvo
x_1=s_1=m_1 is the material environment/surrounding material (i.e. gaseous/liquid atmosphere, vacuum, etc.) enclosing x_2=s_2 in direction(s)/dimensions(s)/plane x_3=s_3=m_3, of type/composition including x_4=m_2.
A vacuum is arguably not 'material', but the word is much more convenient if that is included. Also, vacuum is never completely empty. See also {marji}, {sruri}, {gapci}, {litki}, {kunti}, {sakci}, {kensa}.

mai'u

experimental cmavo
VUhU
unary mekso operator: signum function
Maps any positive number to 1; maps any negative number to -1. All other properties are purely by convention (including its behavior at 0 and in the complex plane). It should probably not be generalized to include the Levi-Civita symbol or other "sign" functions.

majga

experimental gismu
x_1 (number/quantity; contextless default: li ma'u .a li no) is the (rest/inertial) mass of x_2 (object) in units x_3
See also: {grake}, {junta}, {nonmajga}.

majrsto

fu'ivla
x1 is a physically-required conserved quantity/invariant in a closed/isolated system such that it is associated with symmetry x2, applicable under conditions/in universe/metaphysics/mathematical formulation/theorem x3
x2 is a symmetry in the laws of physics inherent to universe x3, producing conservation law/conserved quantity x1 (by mathematical formulation x3).

makas

cmevla
Mecca

makcu

gismu
-ma'u-
x_1 is mature/ripe/fully-grown/adult in development-quality x_2 (ka).
See also {cifnu}, {ninmu}, {verba}, {banro}, {farvi}, {nanmu}.

makcubi

fu'ivla
x_1 is an adolescent
See also {makcu}.

makcubi zei xotli

zei-lujvo
x_1 is a youth hostel
See also {xotli}, {makcubi}.

makfa

gismu
-maf-
x_1 is magic/supernatural/sorcery/witchcraft/wizardry to x_2, performed by person/force/deity x_3.
See also {krici}, {manci}.

makfartci

lujvo
x_1 is a compass with magnet x_2.
see also {maksi}, {terfarnilfrica}, {cukyxratci}

makintoc

cmevla
name: Macintosh (computer)
See {skami}, {la plise}

makpapi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a poppy of species x_2

maksi

gismu
-mak-
x_1 is magnetic [adjective] producing magnetic field x_2.
See also {dikca}, {trina}, {xlura}.

makslikacma

lujvo
x_1 is an MRI (magnetic resonance imaging) machine.
Also sometimes called an NMR (nuclear magnetic resonance).

maksrikardymi'i

lujvo
x_1=m_1 is a magnetic stripe card reader for use/function x_2=m_2, accepting card x_3=k_1
General reader of cards with magnetic stripes ({maksriveikarda}). For payment card reader see {lejykardymi'i}). Cf. {kardyckiku}.

maksriveikarda

lujvo
x_1=k_1 is a magnetic stripe card storing x_2=v_2 (data/facts/du'u) about x_3=v_3 (object/event)
Read by a magnetic card reader ({maksrikardymi'i}). Cf. {vreji}, {datni}, {makyvelvei}, {cukmakyvelvei}, {srimakyvelvei}, {cukmirvelvei}, {kardyckiku}.

maktcaxe

lujvo
x_1 is magnetism (charge; possibly current) in/on x_2 of polarity/quantity x_3 (default: south)
Uses experimental gismu {tcaxe}. The possible connotation of a current is for symmetry with {dikca} but is arguably not denotationally implied by {tcaxe}. The south polarity is treated as positive; this is counter to typical electromagnetic convention, but follows from the default of {dikca} to be negative.

makyvelvei

lujvo
v_4=m_1 is a magnetic storage medium storing v_2 (data/facts/du'u) about v_3 (object/event) in file(s) v_1.
Cf. {vreji}, {datni}, {skami}, {cukmakyvelvei}, {srimakyvelvei}

malceisni

lujvo
s_1 is an idol/a sign/symbol representing god/demon/property (perjorative sense) s_2 to observer s_3.
In the Bible the gods and their images were first conceived of as identical; but in later times a distinction was drawn between the god and the image.

maldimna

lujvo
x_1 is a curse / bad fate upon x_2 ; x_2 is cursed / accursed.
See {dimna}, {mabla}, {dapma}

maldja

lujvo
c_1 is junk food for c_2.

malfadni

lujvo
f_1=m_1 is vulgar/uncouth in property f_2=m_2 (ka) among members f_3 (set).
Cf. {mabla}, {fadni}, {tolba'i}.

malfu'a

lujvo
f_1=m_2 (event/property) is determined by the bad luck/fortune of f_2.
Cf. {mabla}, {funca}, {malselfu'a}, {zanfu'a}.

malfu'e

lujvo
x_1 is to blame / blamed / responsible (negative sense) for x_2 (event/action), according to x_3

malfunpa'a

lujvo
x_1 wishes that misfortune x_2 (property of x_3) happens to x_3

malfuzypai

lujvo
x_1 blames x_2 for x_3 (event/action)
See {i'anai}, {fuzgau} // = {to'ai} {malfu'e}

malgaci

fu'ivla
x_1 is Malagasy in aspect x_2.

malgli

lujvo
g_1=m_1 is an anglicism (in Lojban), inappropriate according to m_3.
Refers to any kind of reliance upon English in a Lojban expression, but is most common for calques. Is sometimes even extended to cover reliance upon cultural assumptions. “malglico” is a much more common form. See {malglixlu}.

malglikslu

fu'ivla
x_1 is an especially inappropriate anglicism made by x_2, inappropriate according to x_3
This is an {u'ivla}, made by applying a {malglixlu}-type pronunciation to {malglixlu}.

malglixlu

lujvo
x_1=m_1=g_1=xl_3 is an inappropriate anglicism made by x_2=xl_2, inappropriate according to x_3=m_3
Refers to any kind of inappropriate reliance upon English in a Lojban (or non-English language) expression, but is most common for calques. Is sometimes even extended to cover reliance upon cultural assumptions. This lujvo is made to have more-specific rafsi-connotations than the historical lujvo-term "malglico" (under {malgli}), and to avoid possible clashing with the common lujvo construction of "malbroda" meaning "d**ned broda / broda in a bad way". The xl_2 place is also useful, allowing (mi se malglixlu) and (di'u malglixlu mi)

malku'i

lujvo
x_1 abuses/mistreats x_2
See {kurji}, {malpli}

malmakfa

lujvo
mak_1 is black magic to mak_2, performed by person/force/deity mak_3.
Cf. {mabla}, {makfa}, {lijda}, {palci}

malminiata

obsolete fu'ivla
m_1 is a black widow spider of variety m_2.
cf. {lartodektu}

malmi'o

lujvo
x_1 is infamous/notorious among community/persons x_2.
Cf. {mabla}, {misno}

malmliselgu'i

lujvo
ma_1=mi_1=g_2 is ill-lit with light g_1 from light source g_3.
Cf. {gusni}, {mabla}, {milxe}

malmys

cmevla
Malmö
Malmö, in the southernmost province of Scania, is the third most populous city in Sweden.

malne'u

lujvo
n_1 (agent) punishes n_2 [recipient] for atypical n_3 (event/property) with punishment/penalty/demerit n_4. It’s a interpreted as a punishment according m_3.
See also {sfane'u}, {mabla}, {cnemu}.

malpli

lujvo
x_1 abuses/misuses x_2 for purpose x_3
See {pilno}, {malku'i}

malsamtci

lujvo
x_1 is [malware/malicious software/computer virus] for purpose x_2 on computer(s) including x_3
See also: {xlakemsamtci}.

malselfu'a

lujvo
f_2 is unlucky/unfortunate in f_1=m_2 (event/property).
Cf. {mabla}, {funca}, {zanselfu'a}.

malselja'e

lujvo
x_1 (nu) is counter-productive yielding/has negative outcome/result x_2

malsi

gismu
-mas-
x_1 is a temple/church/sanctuary/synagogue/shrine of religion x_2 at location/serving area x_3.
x_2 may be event of form (... worships/pays/respect to ...), hence (metaphorically extending to) monument (= {mojmalsi}, {si'armalsi}). See also {cevni}, {krici}, {lijda}, {ritli}.

malsno

lujvo
mas_1 is sluggish at doing/being/bringing about mas_2 (event/state) according to mab_3.
Cf. {masno}

malterkesri

lujvo
x_1 discriminates against (holds a negative stereotype of) x_2, assigning stereotype x_3
See {kesri}, {mabla}

malvari

fu'ivla
x_1 is malaria
Etymologically from mal+{vacri}, paralleling the Italian etymology "mala aria".

malvi'e

lujvo
x_1 is unwelcome by x_2 to place/event x_3.
See also {fi'inai}; {zanvi'e}

malvla

lujvo
x_1 is a "bad word" / swear-word meaning x_2 in language x_3

mam

cmevla
Mom/Mum
The rafsi for {mamta} used as a familiar name. See also {paf}, {bes}, {tix}, {bun}, {mes}.

mambakni

lujvo
m_1=b_1 is a cow [an adult female bovine] of variety/breed b_2 that has had calf/calves m_2

mambyl

cmevla
name: Mumble (voice chat software)
{brivycme} variants: {la mliba'u}, {la mumble}

mamcme

lujvo

See also: patronymic (={pafcme}).

mamgle

lujvo
g_1 has sex/copulates with the mother of g_2=m_2.

mamjipci

lujvo

mampa'u

lujvo
x_1 is a maternal grandfather of x_2.

mamta

gismu
-mam-
x_1 is a mother of x_2; x_1 bears/mothers/acts maternally toward x_2; [not necessarily biological].

mamymamta

lujvo

manbi'o

lujvo

Cf. {gusybi'o}.

mandala

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mandala

mandarina

fu'ivla

mandioka

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is manioc of species/variety x_2.
syn. {samcrkasava}; see also {samcu}

manfo

gismu
x_1 (object/event) is uniform/homogeneous in property x_2 (ka).
See also {prane}, {curve}, {ranji}, {vitno}, {stodi}, {dikni}, {sampu}, {traji}.

manfybli

lujvo
b_1=m_1 is an ingot [uniformly shaped block] of material b_2 with surfaces/sides b_3.

manfyta'u

lujvo
t_1=m_1 is livery/[a uniform] for wearing by t_2 for purpose t_3.
Cf. {manfo}, {taxfu}.

mango

experimental gismu
x_1 is a mango [fruit] of species/variety x_2.
{rutrmango} is the non-experimental synonym of “mango”. {ricrmango} for “mango tree”.

manjetu

fu'ivla
The ([x_1]+2)nd (li) sumti of this predicate satisfies the predicate x_2 (ka).
This brivla is intended for answering complex multiple choice questions, and has an infinite number of sumti slots. The value of X1 is the X1st sumti following X2.

manku

gismu
-man-
x_1 is dark/lacking in illumination.
(cf. {blabi}, {gusni}, {ctino}; use {kandi} or {xekri} with colors, {ctino})

manri

gismu
-mar-
x_1 is a frame of reference/standard for observing/measuring/determining x_2, with/by rules x_3.
(x_1 may be object or si'o idea); See also cmavo list {ma'i}, {ckilu}, {merli}, {pajni}, {cimde}, {jdice}, {marde}.

mansa

gismu
x_1 satisfies evaluator x_2 in property (ka)/state x_3.
See also {pajni}.

mansygei

lujvo
g_1=m_2 is contently happy about/with m_1 with regard to g_2=m_3 (event/state).
Cf. {mansa}, {gleki}, {camgei}, {nalra'ugei}.

mansytcu

lujvo
n_1 needs n_2 to be satisfied for reason x_3.
n_2 must be a physical object, not an event; for that, use {djica}. See also: {mansa}, {nitcu}

manti

gismu
x_1 is an ant of species/breed x_2.
See also {cinki}, {jalra}.

mantygapci

lujvo
x_1 is carbon monoxide.
cf. {mantyslami}

mantyjalra

lujvo
j_1 is a termite of species j_2.

mantymamta

lujvo

Cf. {manti}, {mamta}

mantyslami

lujvo
x_1 is formic acid.
see also {mantygapci}

mantyzda

lujvo
z_1 is an anthill of ants z_2=m_1.
Cf. {manti}, {zdani}

manze'a

lujvo
z_1 becomes darker/darkens by amount z_3.
Cf. {manku}, {zenba}

ma'o

cmavo
MAhO
convert letteral string or other mathematical expression (mex) operand to mex operator.

ma'o'e

experimental cmavo
VUhU
mathematical operator: vague/elliptical/general/generic operator
Arity is context-dependent. Properties and structure are context-dependent or vague. See also: {xo'e}, {zi'a'o}. Preferred over {ma'e'o}.

ma'oi

experimental cmavo
ZO
selma'o quote; quotes a word (a cmavo) and uses it to name a selma'o.
Example: ma'oi coi is equivalent to COI. See also {ra'oi}.

ma'oste

lujvo
x_1=l_1 is a list of structure words x_2=l_2=c_1 of class(es) x_5=c_2 of language x_6=c_3 in order x_3=l_3 in medium x_4=l_4.
Cf. {cmavo}, {liste}, {vlaste}, {vlacku}, {gimste}, {jvoste}

mapku

gismu
-map-
x_1 is a cap/hat/crown/helmet/piece of headgear [head-top garment] of material x_2.
See also {taxfu}, {stedu}, {drudi}.

mapni

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of cotton [type of fabric/material].
See also {bukpu}.

mapra

experimental gismu
x_1 is a quantity of fluff of composition/structure/characterization/substance x_2; x_1 is fluffy/airy/soft/fuzzy in texture
Visual and tactile. Most likely is malleable, but this word has no such implications inherently; porousness or foaminess is likewise not implied. Might also include "cushiony", "cotton-like", "wool-like"; a fractal nature might be present. For fuzziness: not necessarily hairy or furry, but must be soft; not bristly (which implies stiffness and hardness). See also: {ranti}, {rufsu}, {xutla}, {panje}, {dilnu}, {mapni}, {sunla}, {fonmo}, {jduli}, {pesxu}, {marji}.

maprtrilbi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a trilby / trilby hat of material x_2.
Cf. {mapku}.

maprultricu

lujvo
x_1 is eucalyptus of species/variety x_2.

maprysakta

lujvo
x_1 = s_1 = m_1 is a quantity of fluffy-sugar/cotton candy/candy floss/fairy floss from source x_2 = s_2 and composition x_3 = s_3 = m_2
Caution: {mapra} is an experimental gismu

mapti

gismu
-mat-
x_1 fits/matches/suits/is compatible/appropriate/corresponds to/with x_2 in property/aspect x_3.
See also {satci}, {tugni}, {sarxe}, {drani}, {tarmi}, {ckini}, {mintu}.

mapypre

lujvo
p_1 is a hatter/millner /[hat maker] selling/making hats of material m_2.
Cf. {mapku}, {prenu}.

mapyzipcpi

lujvo
x_1 is a crested penguin (gen. Eudyptes) of type/species x_2
See {zipcpi}, {matkarozipcpi}

marbela

fu'ivla
x_1 is dodder of species/variety x_2 parasitic on x_3.

marbi

gismu
-mra-
x_1 is a shelter/haven/refuge/retreat/harbor for/protecting x_2 from danger/threat x_3.
See also {bandu}, {ckape}, {snura}, {drudi}, {sepli}, {bitmu}, {gacri}.

marce

gismu
-ma'e-
x_1 is a vehicle/mode of transport carrying x_2 in/on surface/medium x_3, propelled by x_4.
See also {klama}, {matra}, {bevri}, {bloti}, {carce}, {karce}, {sabnu}, {skiji}.

marde

gismu
-mad-
x_1 are the ethics/morals/moral standards/ethical standards of x_2 (ind./mass) about situation x_3.
x_1 will (typically) be an abstract, a rule or rules of behavior; also principles; also conscience (= {sezmarde}). See also {palci}, {vrude}, {lijda}, {manri}, {javni}, {tarti}, {zekri}.

mardeji

fu'ivla
x_1 judges/rates/opines x_2 [abstraction] to have morality score x_3 [number; default: 1] in respect/according to standard/judged according to or in system x_4; x_1 believes in (the (im)morality of) x_2
Beware sumti-raising in x2. x3 should be a real number between -1 and 1 (inclusive); x3=1 is perfectly good/moral/virtuous, x3=0 is neutral, and x3=-1 is completely immoral/despicable.

mardikca

lujvo
d_1 is positive electric charge in d_2.
Cf. {dikca}, {manri}, {dutydikca}

mardurudra

fu'ivla
x_1 is a specific kind of bad weather characterized by large dark rain clouds that block out most of the daylight, large, cold rain drops and an overall dark, uncomfortable and unsettling atmosphere, optionally accompanied by icy wind, such that a change in the weather conditions would be a relief to anyone present, both physically and emotionally.
This is an original concept. See also {manku}, {tcima}, {carvi}, {bratuca}, {brife}, {lenku}, {kufra}, {rivbi}, {dunku}, {tcini}, {cinmo}, {dilnu}.

margosa

fu'ivla
x_1 is neem/margosa/azedarac of species/variety x_2.
See also {zdiraxa}, {andiroba}. "Azedarach" and variants have referred to both this tree and the {zdiraxa}.

margu

gismu
-mag-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/made of mercury/quicksilver; [metaphor: fluid metal; temperature].
See also {jinme}.

marji

gismu
-maj-
-mai-
x_1 is material/stuff/matter of type/composition including x_2 in shape/form x_3.
Also (adjective:) x_1 is physical (one sense)/material. See also {morna}, {mucti}, {nejni}, {tarmi}, {dacti}.

markai

lujvo
x_1 qualifies as / counts as being x_2 (ka) by standard x_3
See {manri}, {ckaji}, {kairpai}

markitane

fu'ivla
x_1 is a sutler

markuja

fu'ivla

marmaro

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains marble from location x_2.
A type-3 synonym of this word is {rokrmarmaro}.

x_1 is a marmelade made of x_2
Also {grute} {pesxu}

fu'ivla

Cf. {marna}, {bukpu}

marnyjoitankysigja

lujvo

lujvo
