Cf. {marna}, {vasxu}. See also {damva'u}, {tankyva'u}, {sigva'u}.

marsipane

fu'ivla
x_1 is/contains marzipan of type/brand x_2
Cf. {titspi}, {smela}.

martio

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is March in year x_2 on calendar x_3
See also: {djanua}, {februa}, {prilio}, {madjio}, {djunio}, {djulio}.

marxa

gismu
-max-
x_1 [force] mashes/crushes/squashes/smashes x_2 into pulp/mash/crumbs/deformed mass x_3.
See also {daspo}, {pesxu}, {zalvi}, {bapli}.

masKUAS

obsolete cmevla
Moscow
Cf. {moskov}. Lojbanized pronunciations of the Russian capital are: 'masKVA'(Russian, but KV combination is invalid in lojban), 'mosiKY' (Chinese Mandarin; there is no 'v' in Chinese and 'f' is unusual except at the beginning of a word) and 'mosko' or 'moskau' in English.

masnbi

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the eighth month/August of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnbi = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {bi}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masnci

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the third month/March of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnci = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {ci}. See also {ci}, {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masndau

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the tenth month/October of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masndau = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {dau}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masnfei

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the eleventh month/November of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnfei = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {fei}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masngai

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the twelfth month/December of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masngai = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {gai}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masnjau

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the thirteenth month/Undecimber of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnjau = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {jau}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masnmu

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the fifth month/May of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnmu = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {mu}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masno

gismu
-sno-
x_1 is slow/sluggish at doing/being/bringing about x_2 (event/state).
See also {sutra}.

masnpa

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the first month/January of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnpa = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {pa}. ex.) lo nu ti noi xrula cu preja cu masnpa ro nanca la gregoris (These flowers bloom in January every year in system Gregorian.) / mi'a vitke fi lo tersla noi masnpa (We will attend a party on January.) See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masnre

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the second month/February of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnre = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {re}. The Stage-4 fu'ivla form should be maslre, but it is avoided for easiness of pronunciation. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masnrei

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the fourteenth month/Duodecimber of a year x_2 in system x_3.
The same meaning as {masnxei}. The Stage-4 fu'ivla form should be maslrei, but it is avoided for easiness of pronunciation. lo masnrei = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {rei}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnvai}.

masnso

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the ninth month/September of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnso = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {so}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masnvai

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the fifteenth month of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnvai = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {vai}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}.

masnvo

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the fourth month/April of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnvo = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {vo}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masnxa

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the sixth month/June of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnxa = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {xa}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masnxei

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the fourteenth month/Duodecimber of a year x_2 in system x_3.
The same meaning as {masnrei}. lo masnxei = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {xei}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnvai}.

masnze

fu'ivla
x_1 (event/state) is in the seventh month/July of a year x_2 in system x_3.
lo masnze = lo se {ma'irdetri} be li {ze}. See also {detri}, {detke'u}, {masti}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei} or {masnxei}, {masnvai}.

masrbasilika

fu'ivla
m_1 is a basilica [church] for purpose m_2.
See also basilica [architectural] (={dijrbasilika}).

masti

gismu
-ma'i-
x_1 is x_2 months in duration (default is 1 month) by month standard x_3.
This month (= {cabma'i}); next month (= {bavla'ima'i}); last month (= {prula'ima'i}). See also {detri}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {nanca}.

masyce'u

lujvo
c_1 is a parish of parishioners c_2.

matci

gismu
x_1 is a mat/pad/mattress/pallet [flat, soft, dense form] of material x_2.
Also mattress = ({kicymatci}). See also {kicne}, {tapla}, {karda}, {ckana}.

matkarozipcpi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a macaroni penguin (Eudyptes chrysolophus) of type x_2
See {zipcpi}

matli

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of linen/flax [type of fabric/material].
See also {bukpu}.

matlydakli

lujvo
d_1=m_1 is a sack/bag with contents d_2, made from linen/flax [material].

matlyspa

lujvo
x_1 is flax of species/variety x_2.
see also {matli}, {matlytsi}

matlytsi

lujvo
x_1 is flaxseed/linseed produced by plant x_2, capable of growing into x_3.
see also {matli}, {matlyspa}

matmau

lujvo
x_1 is more appropriate than x_2 to x_3 in property x_4
See also {mapti}, {zmadu}

matne

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains butter/oleo/margarine/shortening from source x_2.
(adjective:) x_1 is buttery; an edible fat, solid but spreadable at normal temperatures; dairy butter (= {ladmatne}). See also {grasu}, {kruji}.

matnrmiristika

fu'ivla
x_1 is a is a quantity of nutmeg butter from source x_2.
See also nutmeg tree (={ricrmiristika}), nutmeg seed (={tsirmiristika}).

matnyxrula

lujvo
x_1 is a/the buttercup flower of plant/species x_2.
Cf. {matne}, {xrula}, {xrulnranunkulu}.

matpai

lujvo
p_1 approves m_1 for m_2 in property aspect m_3.
Cf. {mapti}, {pajni}, {zanru}

matra

gismu
x_1 is a motor/engine, driving/propelling/providing power to x_2.
See also {marce}, {minji}, {carce}.

matrydagma'e

lujvo
mar_1 is a motor/road vehicle for carrying mar_2 on road d_1=mar_3, propelled by mar_4, with motor/engine mat_1.
See also {matryxilma'e}.

matsi'uma'i

lujvo
x_1 is June of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Cf. {xavmasti}, {kanbyma'i}, {nanca}.

matybi'o

lujvo
b_1 becomes fitting with m_2 in property/aspect m_3.
Cf. {mapti}, {binxo}

matygau

lujvo
x_1=g_1 makes x_2=m_1 match/fit/be compatible with x_3=m_2 in property/aspect x_4=m_3.

mau

cmavo
BAI
zmadu modal, 1st place (a greater) exceeded by ... ; usually a sumti modifier.

ma'u

cmavo
PA3
digit/number: plus sign; positive number; default any positive.

mau'au

experimental cmavo
MAUhAU
mekso: conversion of operator/function to operand
Must be followed by a function (meaning "f", not "f(x)" (which is a number)) or operator (such as "+"). Treats it formally and syntactically as a number so that it can be operated upon, such as by {se'au} or by a functional/operator (technical sense). Terminated by {zai'ai}; the pair essentially act as mathematical quotation marks. Also works on connectives and {kei'i}. Expressions may be complicated (such as with SE, NA, NAI, etc. modifying the string); perhaps one may even find a use for quoting relations (such as equality or element-hood) and/or some brivla or other cmavo. See also: {kei'au}.

maudji

lujvo
d_1 prefers d_1=m_1 (event/state) to m_2 for purpose d_3 by amount/excess z_4.
Cf. {zmadu}, {djica}, {zmanei}

ma'udzau

fu'ivla
x_1 upvotes / "likes" / "+1"s x_2 in system x_3
Refers to systems (chiefly on the Internet) that keep a running tally of approval-votes, and sometimes disapproval-votes as well. See {ni'udzau}, {adzau}, {co'udzau}, {nildzau}

mau'e

experimental cmavo
MAUhE
UI conversion start quote; converts grammatical Lojban text to cmavo of selma'o UI
Internal text/utterance must be grammatical and Lojbanic; output is some unspecified emotion relating to/specific to/associated with the referent of quoted text. The construct as a whole operates/behaves as UI. See also: {mau'o}.

mau'i

experimental cmavo
CAI2
attitudinal: stronger intensity attitudinal relativizer
Specifies a stronger intensity - relative to any previously specified intensity of the same UI/cmavo. CAI2 after CAI specifies an absolute intensity - but the CAI2 specifies the relative shift from the regular value. CAI after CAI2 specifies an relative value - and the CAI denotes the relative amount interval size. See also {me'ai}, {dau'i}, {sai}

mau'o

experimental cmavo
MAUhO
UI conversion end quote (elidable terminator); converts grammatical Lojban text to cmavo of selma'o UI
Internal text/utterance must be grammatical and Lojbanic; output is some unspecified emotion relating to/specific to/associated with the referent of quoted text. The construct as a whole operates/behaves as UI. See also: {mau'e}.

ma'urbixlanka

lujvo
x_1 is a/the chrysalis/pupa/pupal stage of x_2

ma'urcu'e

lujvo
c_1 is a college at c_2 teaching subject c_3 to audience c_4=m_1 operated by c_5.
An institution for adult education at a basic or intermediate level (teaching those of any age). Cf. {ckule}, {balcu'e}.

ma'urnakybakni

lujvo
b_1=n_1=m_1 is a bull [adult male cattle/beef-producer/bovine] of species/breed b_2.

ma'urnau

lujvo
n_1=m_1 is a man/men (adult); x1 is a male humanoid, adult in development-quality m_2 (ka).

ma'urni'u

lujvo
n_1=m_1 is a woman/women (adult); x1 is a female humanoid, adult in development-quality m_2 (ka).

mau'u

experimental cmavo
UI1
savoring/focusing and attempting to retain feelings of strong satisfaction - trying to escape intense dissatisfaction
'Mmm...'

mau'ucmo

fu'ivla
x_1 purrs/moans in pleasure/satisfaction with sound x_2
See {mau'u}, {cmoni}, {pluka}, {murmura}

mau'ufri

fu'ivla
x_1 (entity) savors x_2 (event/experience); x_1 lingers on and enjoys x_2 completely
See {mau'u}, {zanfri}, {lifri}

ma'u zei ionti

zei-lujvo
x_1 is an cation of radical/(atom of element)x_2 with x_3 charges.
Cf. {ionti}, {ni'u zei ionti}, {lektoni}, {xumsle}.

mavji

gismu
-mav-
x_1 is a quantity of oats [grain] of species/strain x_2.
See also {gurni}.

mavypesxu

lujvo
p_1 is a quantity of oatmeal/porridge made from oat species p_2=m_2
(m1 is subsumed in definitional part) see {mavji},{pesxu} see also {mavystasu}

mavystasu

lujvo
x1=s1 is porridge of type x2=m2

maxri

gismu
-xri-
x_1 is a quantity of wheat [grain] of species/strain x_2.
See also {gurni}.

maxrnspelta

fu'ivla
x_1 is (a quantity of) spelt (scientific name: “Triticum aestivum subsp. spelta”).

maxtriksi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a matrix (mathematical object/number/operator) representing (object/information) x_2 with properties x_3
This definition refers to the object, not the representation. A given maxtriksi is not changed by a chance of base no matter how its appearance does, and two maxtriksi are not the same, even if they are represented in equivalent forms in some bases (or even the same one).

maxydzu

lujvo
c_1=m_1 stomps on surface c_2 using limbs c_3 crushing m_2 into pulp mass m_3.
Cf. {marxa}, {cadzu}.

maxyvru

lujvo
s_1 is a crash (sound) produced by m_1 smashing into m_2.
Cf. {marxa}, {savru}

me

cmavo
ME
convert sumti to selbri/tanru element; x_1 is specific to [sumti] in aspect x_2.

me'a

cmavo
BAI
mleca modal, 1st place (a lesser) undercut by ... ; usually a sumti modifier.

me'ai

experimental cmavo
CAI2
attitudinal: weaker intensity attitudinal relativizer
Specifies a weaker intensity - relative to any previously specified intensity of the same UI/cmavo. See also {mau'i}, {dau'i}, {ru'e}

me'andi

fu'ivla
x_1 is henna of species/variety x_2.
see also {larcu}, {cinta}

me'au

experimental cmavo
ME
Convert abstract predicate sumti back to predicate
Has an inverse: {me'ei}. Essentially synonymous with {ckaji}. Differences: ckaji2 is unary whereas the me'au-predicate can have any arity; me'au is in ME.

mebmla

lujvo
ml_1 is a temple belonging to me_2
from {mebri} {mlana}

mebri

gismu
-meb-
x_1 is a/the brow/forehead [projecting flat/smooth head/body-part] of x_2.
See also {stedu}, {flira}.

mebybo'u

lujvo
b_1=m_1 is a/the frontal bone [os frontale] performing function b_2 in body of b_3=m_2
See also {mebri} and {bongu}.

meckanpe

lujvo
x_1 underestimates the value satisfying x_2 (ka/ni) by amount x_3, underestimated with likelihood x_4; x_2 (property) is satisfied by a number greater by amount x_3 than that expected by x_1 with likelihood x_4
See also {kanpe}, {zmakanpe}, {dunkanpe}, {fickanpe}.

mecmlerai

lujvo
me_1=t_1 is least beautiful among set/range t_3 to m_2 in aspect me_3 (ka) by aesthetic standard me_4.
Cf. {mleca}, {melbi}, {traji}, {mlerai}, {mlemau}, {mleme'a}.

mecna'u

lujvo
m_1=n_1 is a negative number relative to origo m_2.
Cf. {ni'u}, {nonmecna'u}, {fatna'u}, {zmana'u}.

mecrai

lujvo
m_1=t_1 is the least of m_2=t_4 in property m_3 (ka/ni) by amount m_4.
Cf. {mleca}, {traji}

mecraizmana'u

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the supremum of set x_2 under (partial) ordering x_3
x2 must be a set; although it is standard (and lazy) mathematical practice to speak of "the supremum of a function" (including sequences) in some domain or to constrain the supremum with respect to certain variables in some way, all of these features can and ought to be constraints defining the set of which the supremum is taken; in Lojban, no leeway is given toward such sloppiness. See also: {zmaraimecna'u}, {nacyzmarai}.

mecroi

lujvo
x_1 happens less often than x_2 in interval x_3
{mleca} {roi}

mectolmlerai

lujvo
me_1=t_1 is least ugly among set/range t_3 to me_2 in aspect me_3 (ka) by aesthetic standard me_4.
Cf. {mleca}, {melbi}, {traji}, {tolmlerai}, {tolmlemau}, {tolmleme'a}.

mectolnei

lujvo
x_1 dislikes x_2 less than x_3; x_1 would rather have x_2 than x_3
Similar to {zmanei}, but implies choosing the lesser of two evils. See {mleca}, {tolnei}

mecybrarai

lujvo
t_1=b_1 is the smallest/[ least big] among set/range t_4 in property/dimension(s) b_2 (ka).
Cf. {mleca}, {barda}, {cmarai}, {bramau}, {brarai}, {brame'a}.

mecycmarai

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is the biggest/[ least small] among set/range t_4 in property/dimension(s) c_2 (ka).
Cf. {mleca}, {cmalu}, {traji}, {brarai}, {cmarai}, {cmamau}, {cmame'a}.

mecyjavdu'i

lujvo
x_1 is less than or equal to x_2 in property/quantity x_3 by amount x_4.
See also {su'e}

mecyxagrai

lujvo
t_1=x_1 is the worst among set/range t_4 for x_2 by standard x_3.
Cf. {mleca}, {xamgu}, {traji}, {xagme'a}, {xauzma}, {xagrai}, {xlarai}.

mecyxlarai

lujvo
m_1=x_1 is the best/[least bad] among set/range t_4 for x_2 by standard x_3.
Cf. {mleca}, {xlali}, {traji}, {xagrai}, {xlamau}, {xlarai}, {xlame'a}, {zanrai}.

medlara

fu'ivla
x_1 is a medlar fruit (Mespilus germanica) of type x_2
See {grute}

medomoi

cmavo-compound
x_1 is yours among x_2 by rule/relationship x_3; x_1 is your x_2 by rule/relationship x_3.

me'e

cmavo
BAI
cmene modal, 1st place (requires quote) with name ...; so-called ...

me'ei

experimental cmavo
LE
Article for abstract predicate sumti. Turns a selbri into an abstraction with all open places filled by {ce'u}.
Has an inverse: {me'au}

me'ei'o

experimental cmavo
VUhU
mekso n-ary operator: interleave sequences
Given the ordered input of m sequences a_i wherein the jth term is a_(i,j), the output is a sequence z with the nth term z_n = a_(n % m, 1 + (n - n % m)/m), where "n % m" is the remainder of division/modulus of n by m.

me'e ma

cmavo-compound
BAI*
sumti question asking for a name; who?; requires quoted name as an answer.

megbivysamsle

lujvo
se1 is (close to) a million of eight indivisible, most basic computer subunits of computer se2; se1 is a megabyte
In binary a megabyte is actually 1 048 576 bytes, but we can round off for brevity, and to parallel the metric units.

megdje

lujvo
d1 is d2 full megadays (million day unit) in duration (default is 1 megaday) by standard d3
For use with metric dating system.

megdo

gismu
-meg-
x_1 is a million [10^6] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).
See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}

megygra

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 tonne(s) [metric unit] in mass (default is 1) by standard x_3.
Cf. {megdo}, {grake}.

mei

cmavo
-mem-
-mei-
MOI
convert number to cardinality selbri; x_1 is the mass formed from set x_2 whose n member(s) are x_3.
[x_1 is a mass with N components x_3 composing set x_2; x_2 is an n-tuple (x_2 is completely specified) (= {selmei} for reordered places); x_1 forms an n-some; x_3 (not necessarily a complete enumeration) are among the members of x_2]; See also {cmima}, {gunma}, cmavo list {moi}.

me'i

cmavo
PA3
digit/number: less than.

mei'e

experimental cmavo
Accepts any number of sumti and turns them into a selbri-unit that means "x_1 is among the referents of these sumti".
See {me}, {menre}, {cmima}. Elidable terminator: {mei'o}

mei'o

experimental cmavo
MEIhO
Elidable terminator for selma'o MEIhE (which turns any number of sumti into a selbri-unit)
Needed to close a MEIhE expression to resume adding sumti to the parent bridi.

meiris

cmevla
Mary

meirmoi

lujvo
x_1=moi_1 is the x_2-th element out of x_3 elements from set x_4=moi_2=mei_2.
x_3 is the total number of elements in set x_3. Cf. {mei}, {moi}.

me'ispe

lujvo
s_1 is a sister's spouse of m_2 under law/custom/tradition/system/convention sp_3.
Omit x_4=s_2=m_1. Cf. {speni}, {bunspe}, {tubyspe}.

meizma

lujvo
x_1 is more numerous than x_2; x_1 has a greater cardinality than x_2
Synonymous with {sormei}. See also {mei}, {memkai}, {zmadu}, {dubmau}.

mejgu'e

lujvo
x_1 is the Malaysia country, for people x_2
Syn. {gugdemuje}. See {meljo}, {gugde}

mejru'u

lujvo
r_1 is measured in malaysian ringgit (MYR) as r_2 (quantity), in the Algerian monetary system r_3.

mekfancu

lujvo
x_1 is an operator/mathematical function/single-valued mapping from domain x_2 to range x_3 defined by mathematical expression/rule x_4.

mekna'u

lujvo
x_1 is the value of expression x_2 in base/convention x_3.
See also {ju'u}

mekrot

cmevla
(font) blackboard bold, mathbb, so-called double-struck type
Used in conjunction with «ce'a». Especially used for important sets and fields.

mekso

gismu
-mek-
-me'o-
x_1 [quantifier/expression] is a mathematical expression interpreted under rules/convention x_2.
See also {cmaci}, {dilcu}, {fancu}, {frinu}, {jalge}, {namcu}, {parbi}, {pilji}.

meksu'i

lujvo
x_1 is an operand of operator x_2 filling place x_3 under rules/convention x_4.

melbi

gismu
-mel-
-mle-
x_1 is beautiful/pleasant to x_2 in aspect x_3 (ka) by aesthetic standard x_4.
Also handsome, pretty, gorgeous, cute, comely, graceful. See also {pluka}, {xamgu}.

meljo

gismu
-mej-
x_1 reflects Malaysian/Malay culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2.
See also {baxso}, {bindo}.

melmi

experimental gismu
x_1 is a honey produced by x_2

melplin

cmevla
Name: Saturn
A {jvocmevo} meaning "{melbi} {plini}", or "beautiful planet". Named so because [https://youtu.be/E8GNde5nCSg?t[EQUALS SIGN]10m27s]. See also {xavyplin} {remsol} {stoplin} {vidyplin} {remted} {remlur} {xunplin} {balplin}.

melpsita

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a budgerigar (Melopsittacus undulatus) of breed x_2.
Cf. {bajriga}, {cipni}, {sralo}.

memimoi

cmavo-compound
x_1 is mine among x_2 by rule/relationship x_3; x_1 is my x_2 by rule/relationship x_3.

memjdika

lujvo
x_1 decreases in number by amount x_2
See also {memyze'a}

memkai

lujvo
x_1 is/are x_2 (li) in number, and are among x_3
This definition is based on the BPFK definition of {mei}. See also {mei}.

memlai

lujvo
x_1 numbers/adds up to/consists of x_2 (number) counting by units x_3; x_1 are x_2 in number.
See {mei}, {klani}. Syn. {zilkancu}

memymau

lujvo
x_1 is/are more in number than x_2

memyme'a

lujvo
x_1 is/are fewer in number than x_2

memyze'a

lujvo
x_1 increases in number by amount x_2
See also {memjdika}

mencre

lujvo
c_1=m_2 (person) is intelligent/smart by standard c_3.
Cf. {menli}, {certu}, {bebna}, {pensi}, {crexalbo}

mencti

lujvo
c_1 reads/watches/listens to/mentally consumes c_2.

menfau

lujvo
f_1=m_1 (event) is a mental event that happens/occurs/takes place in a/the mind of m_2; x1 is an incident/happening/occurrence of thought/dream/feeling/realization or any other mental activity .

menkini

fu'ivla
x_1 are the result of mapping x_2 using function x_3 (2-ary ka)
The first and second places of x_3 correspond respectively to the first and second places of menkini. See also {menre}, {ckini}

menli

gismu
-men-
x_1 is a mind/intellect/psyche/mentality/[consciousness] of body x_2.
(adjective:) x_1 is mental/psychological/a mental phenomenon; multiple personalities (= so'i {menli}). See also {besna}, {morji}, {mucti}, {pensi}, {sanji}, {xanri}, {sevzi}, {xadni}.

menmikce

lujvo
m_1 is a psychologist/psychiatrist/counsellor/mental health practitioner of client m_2 treating ailment m_3 with treatment m_4.
Cf. {menli}, {mikce}, {menske}, {jikske}

menmuvgau

lujvo
g_1=me_1 telekinetically / with its mind moves mu_1 to destination/receiver mu_2 [away] from origin mu_3 over path/route mu_4
Made from {menli}+{muvgau}. {menli}2 dropped on account of irrelevancy. See also {gasnu}, {klama}, {litru}, {makfa}, {menli}, {muvdu}.

menre

experimental gismu
x_1 is/are among the referent(s) of x_2
See also {me}.

menrece

fu'ivla
x_1 is among x_2, x_3, x_4, etc.
See {menre}, {me}, {porsice}, {setmice}, {gunmace}

menryjinvi

lujvo
x_1 considers/opines x_2 to be among x_3
See also {menre}, {jinvi}, {kancu}.

menseigau

lujvo
x_1 distinguishes / differentiates / discriminates between x_2 and x_3
Neutral sense of "discriminate". See {terdrata}, {ficpei}

menseigauka'e

lujvo
x_1=k_1 is able to distinguish between x_2=ms_1 and x_3=ms_2 under conditions x_4=k_3

menseika'e

lujvo
x_1=k_1 is able to distinguish between x_2=ms_1 and x_3=ms_2 under conditions x_4=k_3

mensi

gismu
-mes-
-me'i-
x_1 is a sister of/sororal to x_2 by bond/tie/standard/parent(s) x_3; [not necessarily biological].
See also {bruna}, {tunba}, {tamne}, {famti}.

menske

lujvo
s_1 (mass of facts) is mental science/psychology about subject matter s_2 based on methodology s_3.
Cf. {menli}, {saske}, {bi'armenske}, {menmikce}.

mensku

lujvo
x1=m2=c1 thinks/[mentally says to oneself] x2=c2 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept)

mentapiperita

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of peppermint of species/strain x_2

mentu

gismu
-met-
-me'u-
x_1 is x_2 minutes in duration (default is 1 minute) by standard x_3.
See also {junla}, {cacra}, {snidu}, {tcika}.

menynunda'a

lujvo
n_1 is psychological warfare on the part of d_1.

menytcaci

lujvo
t_1 is the psychological disposition of t_2=m_2.
Cf. {tcaci}, {seltra}, {selzu'e}, {selpre}.

me'o

cmavo
LI
the mathematical expression (unevaluated); convert unevaluated mathematical expression to sumti.

me'oi

experimental cmavo
MEhOI
non-Lojban brivla
Quick way to borrow foreign words into Lojban. Also known as "stage-0 fu'ivla". Equivalent to {me'au} {la'e} {zo'oi}. See {mu'oi}.

merbau

lujvo
m_1=b_1 is the American English language used by b_2 to express/communicate b_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).
Cf. {ritybau}, {gliglibau}, {glibau}, {bangenugu}, {bangu}, {merko}, {glico},

merfei

lujvo
f_1 is worth f_2=m_1 US cents.
Cf. {fepni}, {merko}, {jdini}

merfiti

fu'ivla
x_1 is a skunk of genus/species x_2.
Cf. {ckankua}, {cribe}, {prokioni}, {mabru}.

mergu'e

lujvo
m_1=g_1 is the United States of America.
Cf. {merko}, {gugde}, {gugde'usu}.

merja'a

lujvo
m_1=j_1 is a president of the United States of America.
Cf. {merko}, {jatna}, {nolraitru}

merje'a

lujvo
j_1=m_1 is the United State of America as a state.
A U.S. state, or any part of a federation is referred to as {gugypau}. Cf. {merko}, {jecta}, {bemro}.

merkadno

lujvo
m_1=k_1 reflects angloamerican culture/nationality/geography/language in aspect m_1=k_1.
Pertaining to the United States and Canada. Cf. {merko}, {kadno}, {bemro}, {bemjoitco}

merklu

lujvo
k_1=m_1 is US culture.
Cf. {merko}, {kulnu}, {bemro}, {steito}

merko

gismu
-mer-
x_1 pertains to USA/American culture/nationality/dialect in aspect x_2.
See also {brito}, {bemro}, {ketco}, {xispo}, {glico}.

merlanu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a whiting of species x_2.
Cf. {finpe}, {merluci}, {finprgado}, {sperlanu}, {labyfi'e}.

merli

gismu
-mre-
x_1 (agent) measures/evaluates x_2 [quantity] as x_3 units on scale x_4 (si'o), with accuracy x_5.
See also {kancu}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {bunda}, {ckilu}, {gradu}, {satci}, {centi}, {cimde}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {kramu}, {litce}, {manri}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

mermaide

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mermaid
See also {remna}, {finpe}

mernmafine

fu'ivla
x_1 is an American muffin.
See also {ritrmafine}.

merpati

fu'ivla
x_1 is a pigeon, dove (family Columbidae) of taxon x_2
See also {cipni}

merpe'ajitstic

cmevla
American frontier/Wild West/Old West
From {merko}+{preja}+{jimte}+{stici}= US expanding border to the west.

mertru

lujvo
t_1 is a government of the United States of America.
Cf. {merko}, {turni}, {merja'a}

meryru'u

lujvo
r_1=m_1 is r_2 US dollars.
Cf. {merko}, {rupnu}, {jdini}, {merfei}

mes

cmevla
Sister
Cf. {mensi}, {bun}, {mam}, {paf}, {bes}, {tix}.

metfo

experimental gismu
x_1 (bridi) is a metaphor/figurative expression having literal meaning x_2
See {sidysmu}, {tanru}, {pevna}, {pe'a}, {ve} {lujvo}, {cimjvo}

metfora

fu'ivla
x_1 is a metaphor representing x_2 in aspect x_3

metnidytcika

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the second/second notation of the minute, of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{cacra} zei {mentu} zei {tcika}. As default, the number x_1 is counted from the first second of the minute. See {ti'u'i} for BAI. ex.) li voxa cu metnidytcika lo nu samymri ti mi kei u'y ty cy (This was e-mailed to me at 46 seconds past the minute UTC.)

metxani

fu'ivla
x_1 is some methane/CH4/marsh gas/natural gas
See {gapci}

me'u

cmavo
MEhU
elidable terminator: end sumti that was converted to selbri; usually elidable.

mexno

gismu
-mex-
x_1 reflects Mexican culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
See also {xispo}, {bemro}, {spano}.

mexri'osanso

lujvo
s_1 is a mexican salsa verde [sauce] for use with s_2, containing ingredient(s) including s_3.

mexru'u

lujvo
r_1 is measured in mexican peso (MXN) as r_2 (quantity), in the Mexican monetary system r_3.

mexybau

lujvo
m_1=b_1 is the Mexican Spanish language used by b_2 to express/communicate b_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).
from {mexno} {bangu} c.f. {sanbau}.

mexygu'e

lujvo
m_1=g_1 is Mexico
Cf. {mexno}, {gugde}, {gugdemuxu}.

mexyxeksanso

lujvo
s_1 is a mexican salsa negra [sauce] for use with s_2, containing ingredient(s) including s_3.

mi

cmavo
-mib-
KOhA3
pro-sumti: me/we the speaker(s)/author(s); identified by self-vocative.

mi'a

cmavo
KOhA3
pro-sumti: me/we the speaker(s)/author(s) & others unspecified, but not you, the listener.

mi'afra

lujvo
f_1 laughs at f_3 under conditions f_4.
Cf. {cisma}, {mlimi'a}.

mi'ai

experimental cmavo
KOhA3
we; several people including one of the speakers; I (the speaker) and at least one another person (even if that person is one of the speakers too)
English "we". {mi'a}, {mi'o} and {ma'a} are more specific cases of {mi'ai}.

mi'amli

lujvo
m_1=c_1 titters/chuckles/giggles.
Synonym to {mlimi'a}. Cf. {cmila}, {milxe}.

mi'anma

fu'ivla
x_1 is Burmese in aspect x_2.

mi'arckasu

lujvo
cm_1=ck_1 (mockingly) laughs at ck_2 about ck_3 (property/event).
See also: {mi'afra} (to laugh at something, not neccessarily mockingly), {cisma}, {ckasu}.

mi'arpe'u

lujvo
p_1 (agent) tickles p_2 with p_3 (a locus on p_1 or an instrument) at p_4 (a locus on p_2).
Cf. {mlisa'e}, {tikpa}.

mi'arta'i

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is tired/hurting/in stitches from laughing; t_1=c_1 laughs so hard it hurts.
Typical pain loci include the cheeks and abdomen. Some may also cry. Cf. {cortu}, {klaku}.

mi'asna

lujvo
s_1 is laughter emitted by s_2=c_1
c.f. {cmila}, {sance}.

mibmanri

lujvo
x_1 is a first-person perspective (frame of reference), observing x_2, with rules x_3
See {mi}, {manri}, {mibma'o}

mibma'o

lujvo
c_1 is a first person pronoun in language c_4.
Cf. {mi}, {mi'a}, {ma'a}, {mi'e}, {cmavo}, {donma'o}, {sevzi}, {se'a}, {se'i}, {se'o}.

mibmlu

lujvo
x_1 simlu x_2 mi

mibykla

lujvo
x1=k1 comes to me from x2=k3 via route x3=k4 by means x4=k5

mibypre

lujvo
m_1=p_1 is me.
Used instead of {mi} when a brivla is needed.

mic

cmevla
Doctor
Cf. {mikce}.

micka'agau

lujvo
m_1=g_1 uses surgical implement k_1 to operate on organ(s) k_2 of patient m_2, as a treatment for ailment m_3.
Cf. {mikce}, {katna}

micka'aku'a

lujvo
k_1 is an operating theatre in which to perform surgery m_4.
Cf. {mikce}, {kumfa}, {micka'agau}, {spita}

micydi'u

lujvo
d_1 is a clinic/surgery/practice with doctor(s) m_1.
Cf. {mikce}, {dinju}, {spita}

micynimre

lujvo
x_1 is a citron (Citrus medica) of type x_2
See {nimre}, {mikce}

micyske

lujvo
x_1=s_1 (mass of facts) is medical science based on methology x_2=s_3.

micyxu'i

lujvo
x_1 is an instance/dose/quantity of medication/medicine/drug x_2 for treating ailment m_3.
Cf. {mikce}, {xukmi}.

midju

gismu
-mij-
x_1 is in/at the middle/center/midpoint/[is a focus] of x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is central.
See also {lanxe}, {jbini}, {nutli}, {snuji}, {milxe}, {denmi}, {ralju}.

midnoi

lujvo
n_1 is an instruction for n_2=m_3 (event/state) to occur, issued by n_3=m_1 for intended recipient n_4=m_2.
Cf. {minde}, {notci}

midvla

lujvo
v_1 is a command word/keyword ordering v_2=m_3 (event/state) in language v_3.
Cf. {minde}, {valsi}

mi'e

cmavo
COI
self vocative: self-introduction - denial of identity; identifies speaker.

mi'ecpe

lujvo
m_1=c_1 demands/exacts c_2=m_3 of c_3=m_2, with manner/form of demand c_4.
Cf. {minde}, {cpedu}, {pikci}, {preti}, {ca'icpe}, {camcpe}.

mi'enai

cmavo-compound
COI*
self vocative: self-introduction - denial of identity; denies identity of speaker.

mi'erxanpli

lujvo
m_1=x_2=p_1 commands/orders to m_2 using hand (gesture) x_1=p_2 to do/bring about m_3.
Example 12.84 (cll 1.1).

mi'esku

lujvo
x_1=m_1=c_1 expresses/states command x_2=c_2 to recipient(s) x_3=m_2=c_3 via expressive medium x_4=c_4.
m_3 of {minde} (the desired result) is presumably cointained in he expression of the command. x_1 commands x_3 with expression x_2.

mifnrotpaci

fu'ivla
x_1 (text) is the ROT-13-encoded form of x_2 (text).
Synonymous to {rotpaci}.

mifra

gismu
-mif-
x_1 is encoded/cipher text of plain-text x_2 by code/coding system x_3; x_1 is in code; x_3 is a code.
Code (= {termifra}). See also {mipri}, {lerfu}, {sinxa}.

mifsle

lujvo
s_1 is a block of cipher m_3
A block of ciphertext. See also {selmifsle}. m3 is not necessarily a block cipher; it could be a byte stream cipher, in which case s1 is a byte. Also, codon; see {mivmifsle}.

mi'i

cmavo
BIhI
non-logical interval connective: ordered components: ... center, ... range surrounding center.

mi'inkri

fu'ivla
x_1 believes in superstition x_2 (du'u) about subject x_3
See {krici}

mi'ircelxa'i

lujvo
x_1=c_1 is a machine gun for use against x_2 by x_3, launching projectile c_2 propelled by c_3.
Cf. {minji}, {cecla}, {xarci}, {xumjimcelxa'i}, {xilcelxa'i}, {clacelxa'i}, {celgunta}.

mi'ircikre

lujvo
c_1 repairs/mends/fixes/maintains c_2 for use m_2=c_3
from {minji} {cikre}

mi'irlarfi'a

lujvo
c_1 is technology-oriented science fiction about plot/theme/subject c_2 by author c_3, based on technology l_1.
Cf. {mi'irlarcu}, {skefi'a}, {minji}, {larcu}, {cfika}

mi'irsmidansu

lujvo
d_1 (individual, mass) performs robot dance/dances like a machine to accompaniment/music/rhythm d_2.

mi'ispi

lujvo
s_1 is a piece of machine m_1=s_2.
Cf. {minji}, {spisa}

mijdi'esirji

lujvo
x_1 is a radius of shape x_2
See {mijgresirji}, {midju}, {dirce}, {sirji}

mijdorsai

lujvo
x_1 is a meal with meal dish x_2.

mijgresirji

lujvo
x_1 is a diameter between x_2 and x_3 of x_4.

mijyselpevysmacu

lujvo
x_1 is the middle mouse button of computer mouse x_2.
See also: {prityselpevysmacu}, {zulselpevysmacu}.

mijyzva

lujvo
x_1 is located in the middle of x_2

mikce

gismu
-mic-
x_1 doctors/treats/nurses/[cures]/is physician/midwife to x_2 for ailment x_3 by treatment/cure x_4.
Also medic; (adjective:) x_1, x_4 is medical; x_2 is a patient of x_1 (= selmikce for reordered places) ; x_2 is treated by x_1 person/x_4 treatment/method; successfully cure transitive (= {sadmikce}, {sadvelmikce}), intransitive (= sadyselmikce, ka'orbi'o to not imply an external agent/process, though the x_1 and x_4 of mikce may be self/internal); treatment (= {velmikce}). See also {bilma}, {kanro}, {spita}.

mikri

gismu
-mik-
x_1 is a millionth [10^{-6}] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).
See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}

miksini

fu'ivla
m_1 is a hagfish of species m_2.

miksnidu

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 microseconds in duration.
{mikri} {snidu}; the default x_2 is 1

mikybontoknu

lujvo
x_1 is a microwave oven for cooking x_2.
Microwave ovens use electromagnetic waves of ~2.45 GHz frequency.

mikydje

lujvo
d1 is d2 full microdays (millionth of a day unit) in duration (default is 1 microday) by standard d3
For use with metric time system.

mikygra

lujvo
g_1 is g_2 micrograms in mass (default is 1) by standard g_3.
Cf. {mikri}, {grake}

mildje

lujvo
d1 is d2 full milidays (thousandth of a day unit) in duration (default is 1 miliday) by standard d3; d1 is a metric minute.
For use with metric time system.

milgra

lujvo
g1 is g2 milligrams in mass by standard g3

milis zei sucyskami

zei-lujvo
sk_1 is a Mealy machine for purpose sk_2.
See {sucyskami}.

milsnidu

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 milliseconds in duration.
{milti} {snidu}; the default x_2 is 1

milti

gismu
-mil-
x_1 is a thousandth [1/1000; 10^{-3}] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).
See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}

miltre

lujvo
mit_1=mil_1 is mit_2=mil_1 (one by default) millimeter(s) in length measured in direction mit_3 by standard mit_4.

miltymitre

lujvo
mit_1=mil_1 is mit_2=mil_1 (one by default) millimeter(s) in length
See {milti}, {mitre}

milxe

gismu
-mli-
x_1 is mild/non-extreme/gentle/middling/somewhat in property x_2 (ka); x_1 is not very x_2.
See also {mutce}, {traji}, {kandi}, {ruble}, {midju}, {nutli}, {ralci}.

milylitce

lujvo
l_1=m_1 is l_2 milliliter(s)/millilitre(s) [metric unit] in volume (default is 1) by standard l_3.
See also: liter (={litce}), tablespoon (={mucydekpu}).

mimpoi

lujvo
x_1 is a sequence of members x_2, x_3, x_4, ... in that order.
The ordering rule is simply the order of the arguments, the unordered set is the set with members x2, x3, x4, ...

minde

gismu
-mid-
-mi'e-
x_1 issues commands/orders to x_2 for result x_3 (event/state) to happen; x_3 is commanded to occur.
[also: x_1 orders/sets/Triggers. x_2 to do/bring about x_3; x_1 is a commander; commanded (= {termi'e})]; See also {lacri}, te {bende}, {jatna}, {ralju}, {jitro}, {turni}, {tinbe}.

minji

gismu
-mi'i-
x_1 is a machine for use/function x_2; [automated apparatus, without direct function control].
Also machinery/mechanism; a machine is initiated/triggered by an agent/force, but thereafter performs its function automatically; if self-directed, (a minji is an) entity (= {zukte}). See also {cabra}, {matra}, {tutci}, {zukte}, {pilno}, {skami}.

minli

gismu
x_1 is x_2 (default 1) long local distance unit(s) [non-metric], x_3 subunits, standard x_4.
(additional subunit places may be added as x_5, x_6, ...); See also {mitre}, {kilto}, {clani}, {ganra}, {condi}, {rotsu}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.

minra

gismu
-mir-
x_1 reflects/mirrors/echoes x_2 [object/radiation] to observer/point x_3 as x_4; x_2 bounces on x_1.
Also: x_1 is a mirror/reflector. x_2 may be light, lu'e of an imaged object; x_4 may be image or echo or the same as x_2 if physical object; x_3 may be a path for a bounced object; ka is reflection. See also {catlu}, {viska}, {lenjo}, {pensi}.

minsiiu

fu'ivla
x_1 seeks/searches/looks for something that has the same identity as x_2 among x_3
Syn. {mitysisku}. See {zvasiiu}

minstreli

fu'ivla
x_1 is a minstrel

mintu

gismu
-mit-
-mi'u-
x_1 is the same/identical thing as x_2 by standard x_3; (x_1 and x_2 interchangeable).
(cf. {panra}, {satci}, {mapti}, {simsa}, {drata}, {dunli}, cmavo list {du} - which has no standard place, {simxu})

mi'o

cmavo
KOhA3
pro-sumti: me/we the speaker(s)/author(s) & you the listener(s).

mi'oi

experimental cmavo
KOhA3
inclusive we; includes the speaker (I) and the listener (you), but may or may not include others
May mean {mi'o} or {ma'a}, but never {mi'a}. Also see {mi'ai}.

mipnavni

lujvo
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of krypton (Kr).
See also {mipri}, {navni}; {ratni}

mipri

gismu
-mip-
x_1 keeps x_2 secret/hidden from x_3 by method x_4; x_2 is a secret; x_1 hides/conceals x_2.
Intransitive hidden/secret, without an agent (= {selcri} or {nalterju'o}); secret (= {selmipri}). See also {stace}, {mifra}, {sivni}, {djuno}, {cirko}, {jarco}.

mipstu

lujvo
s_1 (place) hides m_2=s_2 from m_3 by method m_4; s_1 is a hiding place.
Cf. {mipri}, {stuzi}

miptera

fu'ivla
x_1 is a bug of species x_2.
see also {cinki}, {ckacinki}, {moptera}, {miptinytci}, {cfila}, {fanza}

miptinytci

lujvo
tu_1=m_2 is a bug used by ti_1=m_1 to listen to ti_2 without mi_3 being aware.
see also {cfila}, {miptera}, {fanza}

mipypro

lujvo
f_1=m_1 secretly opposes f_2=m_3 regarding f_3 (abstract) with secrecy method m_4.
Cf. {mipri}, {fapro}

mipypu'i

lujvo
x_1=p_1=m_1 hides/conceals x_2=p_2 from x_4=m_3 on/at surface/locus x_3=p_3=m_1, the location being kept secret by method x_5=m_4.

mipyzga

lujvo
z_1 spies/snoops on z_2 using senses/means z_3 under conditions z_4.

mipyzgakemsamtci

lujvo
t_1=z_1 is a spyware installed on computer(s) including s_1 which spies on z_2 (victim(s)) under conditions z_4.
See also: {mipyzga}, {ke} and {samtci}.

mircai

lujvo
x_1 glitters/sparkles/glares, reflecting x_2 to observer x_3.

mirjanli

lujvo
j_1=m_2=m_4 bounces off j_2=m_1 to point m_3.
Cf. {janli}, {minra}.

mirlanxe

lujvo
l_1 is symmetrical about axis m_1.

mirli

gismu
x_1 is a deer/elk/moose/[hart/stag/doe] of species/breed x_2.
See also {mabru}, {danlu}.

mirlyxarju

lujvo
xa_1 is a babirusa of species xa_2
not to be confused with {xajmirli}

mirsarxe

lujvo
s_1 is symmetrical about axis m_1.

mirsi'o

lujvo
s_1=m_4 is a notion of s_2=m_2 to cognizer s_3=m_3.
A mental reflection of real objects and phenomena in their essential features and relations. Cf. {sidbo}, {selpei}, {selga'e}, {tarmi}.

mirsna

lujvo
s_1=m_4 is an echo of sound m_2=s_2, reflected by m_1 and heard by m_3.

mirtci

lujvo
x_1 is a mirror
See also {minra}.

mirtilo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a blueberry/bog bilberry/whortleberry/evergreen bilberry/(Subgenus Vaccinium) of species/variety x_2
For genus Vaccinium use {bakyjba}

miskai

lujvo
x_1 is famous/well known for being/having property x_2 (ka) among x_3 (mass).
{ckaji}1 and {misno}1 subsumed into {miskai}1. {ckaji}2 subsumed into {miskai}2. {misno}2 subsumed into {miskai}3.

misno

gismu
-mis-
-mi'o-
x_1 (person/object/event) is famous/renowned/is a celebrity among community of persons x_2 (mass).
Also celebrated/well-known; (derogative meanings:) notorious/infamous (= {malmi'o}; these could also be expressed using the referenced words). See also se {sinma}, {banli}.

mispre

lujvo
x_1 is a celebrity / famous person, renowned among community/persons x_2

misro

gismu
x_1 reflects Egyptian culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
See also {friko}, {muslo}, {xrabo}.

misrybau

lujvo
m_1=b_1 is the Egyptian Arabic language used by b_2 to express/communicate b_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).
Cf. {misro}, {bangu}, {rabybau}, {bangaru'a}, {bangarubu}.

misryfrinu

lujvo
x_1 is an Egyptian fraction with denominators x_2, x_3, ...
see also {porfrinu}

misrygu'e

lujvo
x_1 is Egypt.
Cf. {misro}, {gugde}, {gugde'egu}.

misrylatna

lujvo
l_1=n_2 is an Egyptian lotus/water lily (genus Nymphaea) [plant/flower/herb] of strain/cultivar l_2 , symbolizing l_3 to culture/religion l_4.

misryle'u

lujvo
x_1 is an Egyptian character in writing system x_2 (hieroglyphic/hieratic/demotic) meaning x_3.

misryple

lujvo
x_1 is papyrus from source x_2.
see also {misryplespa}, {pelji}

misryplespa

lujvo
x_1 is a papyrus plant of variety x_2.
see also {misryple}, {stagrleoxari}

misygautoi

lujvo
x_1 promotes / publicizes / advertises x_2 (object or idea) to community x_3; x_1 tries to make x_2 famous to x_3
Note: English metonymically uses "sell" for this concept, but {vecnu} refers to the act of exchange, not advertising or promoting. See {misno}, {gasnu}, {troci}

misyselsi'a

lujvo
m_1=s_2 is glorified by s_1.
Cf. {sinma}, {censa}.

misyselsku

lujvo
x_1 is a saying, well-known/renowned among people x_2

mitcinpa'i

lujvo
x_1 is homosexual/gay/lesbian;.

mitcinse

lujvo
c_1 is homosexual/bisexual in situation c_2 by standard c_4.
For strict homosexuality, see {pavmitcinse}. Cf. {relcinse}, {dutcinse}, {nakcinse}, {fetcinse}.

mitcmepre

lujvo
x_1 (person) is a/the namesake of x_2 (person).

mitfa'e

lujvo
m_1=f_1 is palindromic by standard m_3.
Cf. {valsi}, {mirsarxe}.

mitfa'i

lujvo
x_1 discovers that x_2 is identical to x_3 by standard x_4; x1 discovers x_2's identity

mitmlu

lujvo
s_1=m_1 seems to be the same as m_2 by standard m_3 to observer s_3 under conditions s_4.
Cf. {simlu}, {mitmlu}.

mitmo'a

lujvo
mo_1=mi_1 follows the same pattern as mi_2 with respect to forms/events mo_2 arranged according to structure mo_3.
Cf. {mintu}, {morna}

mitre

gismu
-tre-
x_1 is x_2 meter(s) [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction x_3 by standard x_4.
See also {kilto}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {gutci}, {litce}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {minli}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

mitsmuvla

lujvo
v_1=m_1 is a synonym of m_2 by standard m_3 in language v_3.
Cf. {mintu}, {smuni}, {valsi}, {smuske}

mitsnavla

lujvo
x_1 is a homophone to x_2, and means x_3 in language x_4
{mintu} {sance} {valsi}

mitxondrio

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a mitochondrion of cell x_2 of organism x_3

mityjutcti

lujvo
m_1=j_1=c_1 cannibalizes c_2. m_1=j_1=c_1 is a cannibal.

mitysisku

lujvo
x_1 seeks/searches/looks for something that has the same identity as x_2 among x_3
"X mitysisku Y" = "X sisku lo ka ce'u mintu Y". See also {sisku}

mi'u

cmavo
UI3b
discursive: ditto.
See also {mintu}.

mivdalmuzga

lujvo
x_1=m_1 is a zoo at x_3=m_3 with animals x_2=m_2=j_1=d_1.
Cf. {jmive}, {danlu}, {muzga}

mivgau

lujvo
g_1 reincarnates/resurrects j_1 by standard j_2.
Cf. {jmive}, {gasnu}

mivjdu

lujvo
jd_1=jm_1 is a jelly fish.
Cf. {jmive}, {jduli}, {finpe}.

mivmro

lujvo
m1 is alive after being dead/ceasing to be alive; m1 is a zombie.

mivmu'e

lujvo
m_1 is nature/the world of living things m_2=j_1, defined by rules m_3.
Cf. {jmive}, {munje}

mivmu'i

lujvo
x_1=m_1 is a life-goal of x_3=m_3=j_1 motivating x_2=m_2 .
Cf. {jmive}, {mukti}

mivnalsti

lujvo
j_1=s_2 is immortal by standard j_2.
See also {jmive}, {sisti}, {na'e}.

mivrlge

fu'ivla
j_1 is/are (a) alga/algae [organism].
Algae are a very large and diverse group of simple, typically autotrophic organisms, ranging from unicellular to multicellular forms. Most are photosynthetic and "simple" because they lack the many distinct cell and organ types found in land plants. The largest and most complex marine forms are called seaweeds (={jauspa}).

mivru'e

lujvo
p_1 is the life of j_1 through stages p_4.
This focuses on the process of x2's life as a succession of stages (childhood, chrysalis, etc.), while {nunji'e} more generally denotes the event of x2 being alive without a default terbri to specify the stages x2 goes through during that event.

mivylivla

lujvo
l_1 is adenosine triphosphate (ATP) transporting energy within organism l_2=j_1.

mivypuvgu'ibi'o

lujvo
x_1=p_1 is a photosynthesis process in which light (energy) and other substances x_2=g_1=b_1 converts into substances/chemical energy x_3=b_2 under conditions x_4=b_3 in plant/organism x_5=j_1, proceeding in stages x_6=p_2.

mivyselkra

lujvo
x_1 is organic, originating in living organism x_2.
See also {tabyselcmu}, {rarvelcange}.

mivyselna'a

lujvo
n_2 (number) is the age (in years) of living thing j_1, alive by standard j_2, with year standard n_3.

mivyske

lujvo
s_1 is biology/Life Science based on methodology s_2.
Cf. {mrodalmuzga}.

mivyslebi'u

lujvo
b_1 is a cell wall separating cell j_1=s_1=b_2 from extracellular environment b_3.
Not to be confused with cell membran.

mivyslerango

lujvo
r_1 is an organelle of r_2=s_1=j_1 performing function r_3.
See also {ji'esle} and {rango}.

mivyslerebla

lujvo
r_1 is/are (a) flagellum/flagella [organelle] of cell j_1=s_1.
See also biological cell (={ji'esle}).

mivyvelvicyvauro'i

lujvo
x_1=r_1=vau_1 is a rock cobtaining trace/remnant/fossil x_2=vic_4=vau_2 of biological entity/organism x_2=j_1=vic_3, with rock composition x_4=r_2 and from location x_5=r_3; x_2 is the fossilized trace of organism x_3 preserved in rock x1
Fossil x2 need not be a body (part), just a trace of an organism (scat, trail/footprint, etc.). Containment need not be total. The fossil container is necessarily a fossil rock (see {mivyvelvicyvau} for generalization to any container). The remnant can be "fresh", so long as it is found in rock. See also: {rokybixmivborvelvi'u} for not "fresh"/petrified/fossilized remains.

mivyxu'i

lujvo
xu_1 is an instance of chemical substance xu_2 derived from biological source j_1.
Cf. {xukmi}.

mixre

gismu
-mix-
-xre-
x_1 (mass) is a mixture/blend/colloid/commingling with ingredients including x_2.
x_2 mingles/mixes/blends into x_1; x_2 is in x_1, an ingredient/part/component/element of x_1 (= {selxre} for reordered places). See also {salta}, te {runta}, {stasu}, {jicla}, {sanso}.

mlafi'e

lujvo
f_1 is a flatfish of family/genus/species f_2, swimming with side m_1 upward.
Cf. {finpe}, {polgosu}, {flundero}, {platesa}.

mlajukma'i

lujvo
x_1 is July of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Cf. {zelmasti}, {kanbyma'i}, {nanca}.

mlakla

lujvo
x_1=k_1=m_4 dodges/sidesteps/skirts x_2=m_2 from x_3=k_3 by route x_4=k_4 by means of transportation x_5=k_5.
The lateral frame of reference is that of the one who sidesteps. Cf. {mlana}, {klama}, {koizva}.

mlaluka

fu'ivla
x_1 is a paperbark/tea tree of species/variety x_2.

mlana

gismu
-mla-
x_1 is to the side of/lateral to x_2 and facing x_3 from point of view/in-frame-of-reference x_4.
(cf. {crane}, {trixe}, {pritu}, {zunle} which differ in that the direction of facing is the front and not the lateral side. The x_4 of mlana may be either the front, or back side of x_2, {korbi})

mlaparsince

lujvo
s_1=c_1 is a sidewinder of subspecies/type s_2

mlapau

lujvo
m_1=p_1 is the side of / is a part and on the side of m_2=p_2 and is facing m_3 from point of view/in-frame-of-reference m_4.
Made from {mlana} + {pagbu}.

mlaselfa'a

lujvo
f_2 is sideways from f_3=m_2 .
x_3=f_1, the exact direction, is unspecified. Cf. {mlana}, {farna}.

mlatnipa

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cat-intoxicating catnip of variety x_2; x_1 is a catnip of species Nepeta cataria or Nepeta grandiflora or other species that cause pheromone-based intoxication among cats
See {mlatu}, {vindu}

mlatrmiau

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 mews / meows
See {cmoni}, {mlatu}

mlatu

gismu
-lat-
x_1 is a cat/[puss/pussy/kitten] [feline animal] of species/breed x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is feline.
See also {cinfo}, {tirxu}, {gerku}.

mlauca

fu'ivla
x_1 mentions or alludes to x_2 while talking to x_3
Compare {tavla}, {casnu}, {cusku}, {smusku}, {larseku}

mlaxelbo'a

lujvo
m_1 is a sideband of signal b_1=m_2.

mleba'i

lujvo
m_1=b_1 is splendid/glorious/magnificent to m_2 in aspect m_3 (ka) by aesthetic standard m_4, and by greatness standard b_4.

mleca

gismu
-mec-
-me'a-
x_1 is less than x_2 in property/quantity x_3 (ka/ni) by amount x_4.
Also negative (= {nonme'a}). See also cmavo list {me'a}, cmavo list {su'o}, {jdika}, {zmadu}, {traji}.

mledi

gismu
-led-
x_1 is a mold/fungus/mushrooms/truffles of species/strain x_2 parasitic/growing on x_3.
See also {clika}.

mlegaumai

lujvo
ma_1=g_1 is a cosmetic/makeup for beautifying me_1 in aspect me_3, made up of material ma_2 in form ma_3
me2, me4 dropped. g2 is lo nu me1 melbi zi'o me3

mlejgi

lujvo
j_1 is vain.
Cf. {melbi}, {jgira}

mlemau

lujvo
z_1=m_1 is more beautiful than z_2 to m_2 in aspect m_3 (ka) by amount z_4.
Cf. {melbi}, {zmadu}, {mlerai}, {mecmlerai}, {mleme'a}.

mleme'a

lujvo
ml_1=me_1 is less beautiful than ml_2 to me_2 in aspect me_3 (ka) by amount ml_4.
Cf. {melbi}, {mleca}, {mlemau}, {mlerai}, {mecmlerai}.

mlenicygau

lujvo
g_1 grooms/spruces up c_1=m_1 in property/aspect c_2=m_3.
Cf. {melbi}, {cnici}, {gasnu}, {jisygau}, {lumci}.

mlerai

lujvo
m_1=t_1 is most beautiful among set/range t_3 to m_2 in aspect m_3 (ka) by aesthetic standard m_4.
Cf. {melbi}, {traji}, {mlemau}, {mecmlerai}, {mleme'a}.

mleselza'u

lujvo
z_2 is a callipygian/person with beautiful buttocks m_1=z_2, beautiful to m_2 according to aesthetic standard m_4.
The term comes from the Greek kallipygos, (first used for the Venus Kallipygos) which literally means "beautiful buttocks".

mlesrasu

lujvo
x_1 is a blade/expanse of agave (genus Agave) of species/strain x_2.
Agave (latin. = noble, handsome).

mletritra

lujvo
ta_1=tr_1=m_1 is coquettish/flirtatious with tr_2=m_2 in aspect m_3
from {melbi} {trina} {tarti}

mliba'u

lujvo
x_1=m_1=b_1 whispers/mumbles/murmurs/coos utterance x_2=b_2; x_1=m_1=b_1 speaks softly.
Cf. {milxe}, {bacru}, {smasku}, {laurblesku}.

mlibdena

fu'ivla
x_1 is molybdenum.

mlibi'e

lujvo
b_1=m_1 is breeze/zephyr from direction b_2 with speed b_3.
Cf. {milxe}, {brife}

mlibra

lujvo
b_1=m_1 is somewhat big in dimension b_2 by standard b_3.
Cf. {milxe}, {barda}

mliburna

lujvo
b_1 is mildly embarrassed/disconcerted about/under conditions b_2 (abstraction).
Cf. {milxe}, {burna}

mlifanza

lujvo
f_1 (event) slightly annoys/irritates/bothers/distracts f_2.

mlifegba'u

lujvo
m_1=f_1=b_1 grumbles with sound b_2 at f_2 because of f_3 (action/state/property).
jvajvo definition; Gismu deep structure is "milxe gi'e fengu gi'e bacru"

mligla

lujvo
g_1=m_1 is warm by standard g_2.
Cf. {glare}.

mlilenku

lujvo
l_1=m_1 is cool (mildly cold) by standard l_2.
Cf. {lenku}.

mlimi'a

lujvo
c_1=m_1 titters/chuckles/giggles.
Synonym to {mi'amli}. Cf. {cisma}, {mi'afra}, {mlimi'afra}.

mliri'a

lujvo
r_1 (event/state) mildens/allays/alleviates effect r_2 (event/state) under conditions r_3.
Cf. {mliri'agau} for a person as x_1.

mlisa'e

lujvo
s_1 (agent) pets/gently strokes s_2 with s_3.
Cf. {pencu}, {mi'arpe'u}, {tikpa}, {tunta}.

mlongena

fu'ivla
x_1 is eggplant of variety x_2.
see also {patlu}, {tamca}, {kapsiku}, {labnyjba}

mlosazri

lujvo
x1=s1 is a miller of mill x2=m1=s2 performing function x3=m2=s3

mludata

fu'ivla
x_1 and x_2 are not indistinguishable from each other, they do not seem to share all their properties (disregarding location and identity), as perceived by observer x_3
This is about observable appearance/properties, as in "this box is not the same as that one" (they're not indistinguishable). See also {mlumitu}, {drata}.

mlujvenarkai

lujvo
c_1=s_1 seems to have property/properties c_2=s_2 to observer s_3 under conditions s_4 but it actually does not have that property / these properties.
Cf. {simlu}, {ckaji}.

mlumitu

fu'ivla
x_1 and x_2 are indistinguishable from each other, they seem to share all their properties except maybe their location and identity, as perceived by observer x_3
This is not {mitmlu}, which means "x1 and x2 seem to be the same individual(s)". This is rather about observable appearance/properties, as in "this box is the same as that one" (they're indistinguishable). See also {mludata}, {mintu}.

mluni

gismu
-lun-
x_1 is a satellite/moon orbiting x_2 with characteristics x_3, orbital parameters x_4.
See also {plini}, {solri}, {lunra}.

mo

cmavo
GOhA
pro-bridi: bridi/selbri/brivla question.

mo'a

cmavo
-mob-
PA4
digit/number: too few; subjective.

mo'aroi

cmavo-compound
ROI*
tense interval modifier: too few times; objective tense; defaults as time tense.

mobdu'a

lujvo
d_1 is stingy about giving d_2 to d_3.
Cf. {mo'a}, {dunda}.

mocfau

lujvo
x_1 is a point-event

mocle'u

lujvo
x_1 is a period (punctuation mark)
See also {depybu'i}, {denpa bu}.

modzi zei bangu

zei-lujvo
x_1 is an emoji language used by x_2
See also {corci}, {modzi}, {pixra}

mo'e

cmavo
MOhE
convert sumti to mex operand; sample use in story arithmetic: [3 apples] + [3 apples] = what.

mogle

experimental gismu
x_1 is a Muggle/an outsider/a foreigner/uninitiated to group/community x_2 (default {jbopre})

moi

cmavo
-mom-
-moi-
MOI
convert number to ordinal selbri; x_1 is (n)th member of set x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

mo'i

cmavo
-mov-
MOhI
mark motions in space-time.

mo'ibe'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: northwardly; to the north directional space motion.

mo'ibu'u

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: moving to coincide directional space motion.

mo'ica'u

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: forward directional space motion.

mo'icli

lujvo
c_1=m_1 memorizes/commits to memory c_2=m_2 (du'u) about subject c_3=m_3 from source c_4 (obj./event) by method c_5 (event/process))
This word is different from {cilre} in that it doesn't include actual understanding of the memorized data but merely the storage of it in one's memory.

mo'icri

lujvo
x_1 forgets x_2; x_1 loses remembrance of x_2
See also {mo'ifli}, {tolmo'i}, {morji}.

mo'idu'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: eastwardly; to the east directional space motion.

mo'idu'oi

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: clockwisely; to the clockwise angular-directional space motion.
See also: {mo'izu'au}

mo'ifa'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: arriving at; arriving at a point directional space motion.

mo'ifli

lujvo
f_1=m_1 fails at doing f_2 due to memory failure.
Can mean "forget to". {tolmo'i} for "forget a memory".

mo'iga'u

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: upwardly; upwards directional space motion.

moi'i

experimental cmavo
UI2
evidential: I remember - I don't remember (fact ; that/whether something is true)
Differs from {vei'i} or {ba'anai} on being based on recollection of facts, not an experience. {moi'i} is to {morji} what {vei'i}/{ba'anai} is to {vedli}. Also see {moi'icu'i}

moi'icu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*2
evidential: if I remember correctly...
Used to indicate uncertainty of memory. See {moi'i}, {ju'ocu'i}

mo'ine'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: approximating; moving around the neighborhood of ... space motion.

mo'ine'i

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: moving into directional space motion.

mo'ine'u

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: southwardly; to the south directional space motion.

mo'ini'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: downwardly; downwards directional space motion.

moi'o

experimental cmavo
MOI
x_1 is the PA-th date/time of unit x_2 (si'o) counting from x_3 (default: now) by calendar x_4
x_3 is the reference point in time (PA = {no}). The splicing method depends on x_4. For example, at 14:03 on 2014-11-14, the 0th day (x_2 = lo si'o {djedi}) from now is 11-14, the 0th century from now is the 21st century, the 0th month (x_2 = lo si'o {masti}) is November, the 0th afternoon is this afternoon (x_2 = lo si'o {donri}), the 0th night (x_2 = lo si'o {nicte}) refers to nothing (because this time-point is not in night).

moi'oi

experimental cmavo
LE
interrogative mass gadri: "which group of..."; viewed and counted as a group

mo'ipa'o

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: passing through directional space motion.

mo'ire'o

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: along; along a path directional space motion.

mo'iri'u

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: rightwardly; to the right directional space motion.

mo'iru'u

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: orbiting; surrounding/annular directional space motion.

mo'isro

lujvo
s_1 is a memory/storage/anamnesis containing facts/data/recollection s_2=m_2 within medium/substrate/containment s_3, said facts related to subject m_3.
Cf. {morji}, {sorcu}, {mojrango}.

mo'isti

lujvo
s_1=m_1 forgets fact/memory m_2 about subject m_3.
Cf. {morji}, {sisti}, {tolmo'i}.

mo'ite'e

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: moving along the border directional space motion.

mo'iti'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: rearwardsly; rearwards directional space motion.

mo'ito'o

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: moving away from a point directional space motion.

mo'ivu'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: westwardly; to the west directional space motion.

mo'ize'o

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: outwardsly; outward directional space motion.

mo'izo'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: passing by a site directional space motion.

mo'izo'i

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: approaching directional space motion.

mo'izu'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: leftwardsly; to the left directional space motion.

mo'izu'au

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space motion tense: counterclockwisely; to the counterclockwise angular-directional space motion.
See also: {mo'idu'oi}

mojgau

lujvo
g_1 reminds m_1 of facts m_2 about m_3.
Cf. {morji}, {mojgaunoi}, {mojri'a}.

mojgaunoi

lujvo
x_1=n_1 is a message reminding facts x_2=m_2 about x_3=m_3=n_2 from author x_4=n_3=g_1 to intended audience x_5=n_4=m_1.
Cf. {selmojnoi}, {mojgau}, {notci'a}, {gasnu}, {notci}.

mojmau

lujvo
z_1 has a better memory than z_2 with regards to facts m_2 about subject m_3 by amount/excess z_4.

mojrango

lujvo
r_1 is the memory faculty of body/species r_2.
Cf. {morji}, {rango}, {mo'isro}.

mojri'a

lujvo
r_1 (event) reminds m_1 of facts m_2 about subject m_3 under conditions r_3.
Cf. {morji}, {rinka}, {mojgau}.

mojrinfli

lujvo
x_1 (agent) forgets to do x_2 (ka); x_1 fails to do x_2 due to forgetting
See {tolmo'i}, {fliba}, {krinu}

mojypei

lujvo
p_1=m_1 remembers/thinks back/reminisces about p_2=m_3, recalling facts m_2.
Cf. {morji}, {pensi}.

mojysi'o

lujvo
x_1 (du'u) is a memory in the mind of x_2
Unlike {selmo'i} this includes memories that are not currently being thought about.

mojysu'a

lujvo
s_1 is a structure of parts s_2 as a monument/memorial to m_3.
Cf. {mrostu}.

mokca

gismu
-moc-
x_1 is a point/instant/moment [0-dimensional shape/form] in/on/at time/place x_2.
x_1 is dimensionless. See also {jipno}, {jganu}, {linji}, {stuzi}, {tcika}.

moklu

gismu
-mol-
-mo'u-
x_1 is a/the mouth/oral cavity [body-part] of x_2; (metaphor: entrance/intake for consumption).
(adjective:) x_1 is oral. See also {ctebi}, {denci}, {tance}.

molctebi

lujvo
c_1 is the lip/are the lips of mouth c_2=m_1 of [body] c_3=m_2.

moldadyko'u

lujvo
x_1=d_1=k_1 is the uvula of body m_2.
Used in phonological jargon. cf. {zunsna}

moldruji'o

lujvo
j_1=d_1=m_1 is a/the (palatine) uvula [body-part] of m_2.
See also {ranmoldru}, {jipno}.

molgai

lujvo
g_1 is a muzzle on m_2
from {moklu} {gacri}

molgapru

lujvo
g_1 is the palate of m_2.
Cf. {moklu}.

molgle

lujvo
g_1=m_2 performs oral sex on g_2.
Cf. {gletu}, {vibgle}, {gaxygle}. le gletu is taken as the 'active' partner.

molja'u

lujvo
m_1=j_1 is the mandible of arthropod m_2=j_2
This is a mandible of a insect/other arthropod. This is not to be confused with the mandible of vertrabrates which is {xedja} or {dzixe'a}

molki

gismu
-mlo-
x_1 is a mill/foundry/industrial plant/[assembly line] performing process x_2.
(unlike fanri,) need not produce a product; grain mill (= {grumlo}), grinding mill (= {zalmlo}, {zalmlotci}, {zalmloca'a}). See also {gasta}, {gurni}, {tirse}, {fanri}, {zalvi}.

molku'o

lujvo
m_1=s_1 is a philtrum (infranasal depression) of m_2=s_2.
Cf. {skuro}, {moklu}, {nazbi}, {flira}.

molmla

lujvo
x_1 is the cheek of x_2 (person/animal)

molmlabo'u

lujvo
b_1 is a/the cheekbone/malar bone/zygomatic bone (os parietale) performing function b_2 in body of b_3.

molro

gismu
-mo'o-
x_1 is x_2 mole(s) [metric unit] in substance (default is 1) by standard x_3.
See also {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

molselpu'u

lujvo
x_1=s_2 is saliva/sput/sputum/spittle of x_2=s_1.
Cf. {kalselvi'i}.

moltenva'u

lujvo
x_1=v_1 yawns/[breathes while stretching mouth]
Cf. {vasxu}, {moklu}, {tcena}, {sipfru}, {ta'irva'u}.

moltu'u

lujvo
t_1 is a mouthpiece/embouchure of material t_2 conveying fluid t_3.
Cf. {tubnu}, {zgica'a}.

molylitki

lujvo
x_1 is saliva of organism x_2

momkai

lujvo
x_1 is the x_2-th member of set x_3 ordered by rule x_4

momlai

lujvo
x_1 is the x_2nd member of set x_3 ordered by rule x_4 .

momvelru'e

lujvo

see also {moi}, {momkai}, {pruce}

monfu'i

lujvo
f_1 is an emulation/imitation of f_2 in medium f_3, emulated by method f_4 and exhibiting pattern m_1.
Cf. {morna}, {fukpi}, {monfu'igau}.

monfu'igau

lujvo
x_1=g_1 (agent) emulates x_3=f_2 resulting in emulation/imitation x_2=f_1 in medium x_4=f_3 by method x_5=f_4 exhibiting pattern x_6=m_1.
Cf. {monfu'i}.

monre'alo

fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to Montreal culture/language/people/geography in aspect x_2.
Without any qualifiers, refers to the city in North America.

monsuta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a monster
Probably, the only word borrowed from toki pona to Lojban

mo'o

cmavo
MAI
higher-order utterance ordinal suffix; converts a number to ordinal, usually a section/chapter.

mo'oi

experimental cmavo
LE
interrogative gadri: "which"
Roughly equivalent to {ma} {noi}, but doesn't start a new bridi.

morbil

cmevla
measles

morfina

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of morphine (drug/medication)
See {crofanta}, {micyxu'i}

morgana

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mirage/Fata Morgana

morji

gismu
-moj-
-mo'i-
x_1 remembers/recalls/recollects fact(s)/memory x_2 (du'u) about subject x_3.
See also cmavo list {ba'anai}, {menli}, {pensi}, {sanji}, {djuno}, {notci}.

morjuti

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mnemonic for remembering x_2 (du'u)
See {morji}, {sidju}, {tutci}, {morna}

morko

gismu
-mor-
x_1 reflects Moroccan culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
See also {friko}, {xrabo}, {muslo}.

morna

gismu
-mon-
-mo'a-
x_1 is/reflects/represents a pattern of forms/events x_2 arranged according to structure x_3.
[x_3 is a model for x_1 (= {termontai}, or the more abstract = {termonsi'o}); image (= {gusmo'a}, {nenmo'a}, {dairmo'a}, {selylenmo'a}, {selmirmo'a}, {velmirmo'a}, but also all of these -tai instead of -mo'a for the ideal)]; See also {ciste}, {ganzu}, {marji}, {slilu}, {stura}, {tarmi}, {boxna}, {cimde}, {gidva}, {jimpe}, {rilti}.

mors

cmevla
Morse; Morse code, telegraphy.

morsi

gismu
-mro-

moskov

cmevla
Moscow
Cf. {masKUAS}.

mosra

gismu
-mos-
x_1 is friction [force opposing motion] due to contact/rubbing between x_2 and x_3; (fe) x_2 rubs x_3.
Also x_2 scrubs/wipes/brushes (against) x_3 (= {seltermosra}); non-agentive rub (= {termosra}). See also {sakli}, {sraku}, {jabre}, {satre}, {guska}, {pencu}, {spali}.

mosriksna

lujvo
x_1 is a friction sound, made by x_2 rubbing against x_3

mosrnmu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a physical interface of contact with coefficient of friction x_2 under conditions/of type x_3 on scale/by standard x_4

mosycpu

lujvo
l_1 drags/hauls l_2=m_2 by handle/at locus l_3 along surface m_3.
Cf. {mosra}, {lacpu}.

mosyjgita

lujvo
j_1 is a bowed string instrument using bow m_2.
Cf. {mosra}, {jgita}, {jgitrviolino}, {jgitrxu}.

mosysna

lujvo
s_1 is a fricative consonant with place of articulation m_2=m_3 and phonation x_3
cf. {zunsna}

mosyvi'u

lujvo
v_1=m_2 rubs off v_2 from v_3=m_3 leaving remainder v_4.
Cf. {mosra}, {vimcu}.

mo'u

cmavo
ZAhO
interval event contour: at the natural ending point of ...; completive | >|<.

mradi'u

lujvo
d_1=m_1 is a castle/fortress/fort/citadel [defensive building/edifice] for protecting/sheltering m_2 from danger/threat m_3.

mraigo

fu'ivla
m_1 is Welsh in aspect m_2.

mraji

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of rye [grain] of species/strain x_2.
See also {gurni}.

mrajymledi

lujvo
ml_1 is ergot of species ml_2.
A fungus that grows on rye and other cereals; it contains the alkaloid ergotamine, which has hallucinogenic effects on humans and animals, and from which {LSD!en} is synthesized.

mrena'u

lujvo
n_1 is a real number.
Cf. {namcu}, {mulna'u}, {xarna'u}.

mrenilglamlu

lujvo
x_1 (temperature units) is the measured apparent temperature (humidex, wind chill) of x_2 (location) by standard x_3
x_1 is typically {jacke'o} or {falrenai}. x_3 is the system or equation used to correspond apparent temperature to regular temperature units (e.g. Canadian humidex, or AccuWeather RealFeel). Also see {merli}, {glare}, {simlu}, {lenku}, {varcilmo}, {brife}

mreske

lujvo
s_1 is metrology based on methodology s_3.

mribriju

lujvo
x_1=b_1 is a post office of post clerk x_2=b_2 at location x_3=b_3 for mailing system x_4=m_5.
See also {mrilu}, {briju}.

mriiaucmo

fu'ivla
x_1 meows with sound x_2
See {cmoni}, {mlatu}. Onomatopoeic synonym to {latcmo}.

mrilu

gismu
-mri-
x_1 mails/posts [transfer via intermediary service] x_2 to recipient address x_3 from mailbox/post office/sender address x_4 by carrier/network/system x_5.
Also x_4 post office, mailbox. (cf. {benji} In which the medium need not be a 3rd party service/system, and x_2 need not consist of discrete units. {notci}, {xatra}, {tcana})

mripre

lujvo
x_1 is a postal-worker/postman/mailman for carrier network/system x_2

mriste

lujvo
l_1 is a mailing list with subscribers/recipients l_2=m_3.
Cf. {mrilu}, ve {cusku}

mrocarce

lujvo
c_1 is a hearse for carrying c_2, propelled by c_3
{mrori'i}

mrocticpi

lujvo
cip_1=cit_1 is a vulture of species cip_2.
Cf. {morsi}, {citka}, {cipni}.

mrodalmuzga

lujvo
mu_1 is a natural history museum for preserving [and possibly exhibiting] animals of kind mu_2=d_2=mo_1 at location mu_3.
Cf. {mivdalmuzga}, {ji'eske}.

mrodimna

lujvo
x_1 is mortal/subject to death.
See also {morsi}, {dimna}, {mroka'e}

mrodri

lujvo
b_1 mourns/grieves over the death of m_1

mrofoi

lujvo
f_1 is a cemetery/graveyard/burial ground for dead person(s)/animal(s) m_1.
Cf. {morsi}, {mrobi'o}, {derse'a}.

mroka'e

lujvo
m_1=k_1 is mortal/capable of dying under conditions k_3.
Used in Theodore Reed's translation of "A Princess of Mars".

mroke'a

lujvo
k_1 is a grave in ground k_2 for m_1.
Cf. {morsi}, {mrostu}, {mrofoi}, {derse'a}.

mromakfa

lujvo
x_1=m_1 is death magic/necromancy as observed by x_2=m_2, performed by person/force/deity x_3=m_3.
cf. {morsi} {makfa}

mrori'a

lujvo
x_1 is the cause of x_2's death under conditions x_3; x_1 kills x_2.
Non-agentive variant of {catra}

mrospe

lujvo
x1=s1 is widowed from x2=m1=s2 by law/convention x3=s3
See also: {speni}, {nu'ospe}, {spesti}

mrostu

lujvo
s_1 is the grave/tomb of m_1=s_2.
Cf. {morsi}, {mrofoi}, {derse'a}.

mrotolkakpa

lujvo
k_1 buries/inters corpse/[entomb] k_2=m_1 at grave/cemetery/[mausoleum/crypt] k_3
k4 dropped because of little use in this application.

mrovau

lujvo
v_1 is a coffin containing v_2=m_1.
Cf. {morsi}, {mrostu}, {mrofoi}.

mroxadni

lujvo
x_1 is the corpse / dead body of x_2
{morsi}, {xadni}

mrubo'u

lujvo
x_1 is the hammer/malleus in ear x_2 in body x_3

mruli

gismu
-mru-
x_1 [tool] is a hammer for/hammers x_2 [target] consisting of weight/head x_3 propelled by x_4.
See also {tutci}.

mrupi'o

lujvo
p_1 is a piano/clavichord.
Specifically, a keyboard instrument that (physically) produces sound by means of hammers striking strings, as opposed to a harpsichord. See also: {balpi'o}, {sa'irpi'o}, {tu'urpi'o}, {cpupi'o}, {runpi'o}, {dicpi'o}

mu

cmavo
-mum-
PA1
digit/number: 5 (digit) [five].

mu'a

cmavo
UI3
discursive: for example - omitting - end examples.
See also {mupli}.

mu'acu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*3
discursive: for example - omitting - end examples.

mu'ai

experimental cmavo
BAI
munje modal: 1st place; in universe...
May be {lo} {fatci}, or a universe-of-discourse, real or imagined. See {munje}, {li'i'e}, {xanri}, {da'inri}, {mu'ei}, {enzasti}, {enfasnu}, {va'o}, {ci'e}

mu'ai'au

experimental cmavo
VUhU
mathematical/logical/mekso ternary operator: μ (mu) operator: outputs the most extreme extended-natural number that satisfies relationship/predicate A, where extremeness is bounded by B and of a version determined by C; error output is -1
A is a proposition; it will be a function of at least one variable. The output of this function will cause A to evaluate to true if plugged in as the primary (first) argument of A, except in the Error Case that is described later. C can only be -1 or 1; if C = 1, then extremeness here is defined as "least"; if C = -1, then extremeness here is defined as "greatest". If C = 1, then B is an upperbound; if C = -1, then B is a lowerbound. The contextless default value of C is 1. The contextless default value of B is sgn(C)*infinity (countable, in a sense). The output may be equal to B. The output belongs to the set of all positive integers united with the set of 0 and sgn(C)*infinity. Error Case: If no such number exists, the output is -1. Use A in order to restrict outputs from being pathological for your purposes. Example: Let C = 1 and suppose that there exists a number that satisfies A and is one of the following values: 0, a positive integer, (countable) infinity. Then the output of this function (id est: μ(A, B, 1); where "μ" represents the mu operator) is the least such number that is less than or equal to B. Note that in this example, the contextless default value of B is (countable) infinity.

mu'anai

cmavo-compound
UI*3
discursive: for example - omitting - end examples.

muclai

lujvo
k_1 is k_2 (quantifier, default: one) spoonfuls/scoopfuls in quantity.
Cf. {smuci}, {klani}.

mucti

gismu
-mut-
x_1 is immaterial/not physical/without material form.
See also {marji}, {menli}, {pruxi}, {sidbo}.

mucydekpu

lujvo
d_1 is d_2 (default 1) tablespoon(s)/tablespoonful(s) [volume-unit], standard d_3=m_1 (default 1=15 mL),d_4 dessertspoon(s),d_5 teaspoon(s), d_6 one ml measuring spoon(s).
x3 could be a particular spoon. x3 could also be for example the Australian standard (={lo sralo}; 20 mL) or the unofficial unit of the Apothecaries' system of measures in the 18th century, equal to 4 drams or 1/2 fluid oz. It was more commonly known by the Latin cochleare majus (abbreviated cochl. maj.) or, in Apothecaries' notation, f℥ss or f℥ß.

mucydekpyvau

lujvo
d_1 is/are tablespoon(s) [measuring instrument] containing/holding/enclosing v_2, of volume d_2 (default 1) tablespoon(s)/tablespoonful(s) [volume-unit], standard d_3=m_1 (default 1=15 mL).
Tablespoon (measuring instrument) doesn't need to have the shape/form of a spoon. See also: tablespoon (measuring unit;={mucydekpu}). Containment x2 need not be total.

mucyjoifro

lujvo
x_1 is a spork/combined spoon and fork for use x_2
See also {forca}, {smuci}, {dakfu}

mucyveldekpu

lujvo
d_4 is d_2 (default 1) dessertspoon(s)/dessertspoonful(s)/cochleare medium (dstspn./cochl. med.) [volume-unit], standard d_3=m_1 (default 1 dessertspoon=10 mL),d_1 tablespoon(s),d_5 teaspoon(s), d_6 one ml measuring spoon(s).
As a unit of culinary measure, a level dessertspoon (dstspn.) equals two teaspoons, or 10 milliliters. As a unit of Apothecary measure, the dessert-spoon was an unofficial but widely used unit of fluid measure equal to two fluid drams, or 1⁄4 fluid ounce. (One) Rounded dessertspoon (=lo mucyveldekpu li ji'i ni'u), one heaped dessertspoon (=lo derxi mucydekpu li pa), one level dessertspoon (=lo mucyveldekpu li ji'inai).

mucyveldekpyvau

lujvo
d_1 is/are dessertspoon(s) [measuring instrument] containing/holding/enclosing v_2, of volume d_2 (default 1) dessertspoon(s)/dessertspoonful(s) [volume-unit], standard d_3=m_1 (default 1=10 mL).
Teaspoon (measuring instrument) doesn't need to have the shape/form of a spoon. See also: teaspoon (measuring unit;={mucyveldekpu}). Containment x2 need not be total.

mucyxeldekpu

lujvo
d_5 is d_2 (default 1) teaspoon(s)/teaspoonful(s)/cochleare minus (t., ts., tsp. or tspn./cochl. min.)[volume-unit], standard d_3=m_1 (default 1 teaspoon=5 mL),d_4 dessertspoon(s),d_1 tablespoon(s), d_6 one ml measuring spoon(s).
See also: tablespoon (={mucydekpu}). (One) Rounded teaspoon (=lo mucyveldekpu li ji'i ni'u), one heaped teaspoon (=lo derxi mucydekpu li pa), one level teaspoon (=lo mucyveldekpu li ji'inai).

mucyxeldekpyvau

lujvo
d_1 is/are teaspoon(s) [measuring instrument] containing/holding/enclosing v_2, of volume d_2 (default 1)teaspoon(s)/teaspoonful(s) [volume-unit], standard d_3=m_1 (default 1=5 mL).
Teaspoon (measuring instrument) doesn't need to have the shape/form of a spoon. See also: teaspoon (measuring unit;={mucyxeldekpu}). Containment x2 need not be total.

mudbli

lujvo
x_1 is a block of wood x_2 with surfaces x_3.

mudlanu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a log of wood

mudrbri'a

fu'ivla
m_1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains cocuswood/Jamaican ebony of type m_2.
The best known species to yield cocuswood is Brya ebenus. See also Brya (={ricrbri'a}).

m_1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains redbud wood (genus Cercis) of type m_2.

mudrgimnocladu

fu'ivla
m_1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains Kentucky coffeetree wood (genus Gymnocladus) of type m_2.
The wood is used both by cabinetmakers and carpenters. It has very little sapwood.

mudrguiborti

obsolete fu'ivla
m_1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains African rosewood/bubinga/ovangkol/Congo copal wood (genus Guibourtia) of type m_2.

mudycutci

mudyfagri

Omit x_3=f_2=m_1. Cf. {fagri}, {jelca}, {mudri}.

mudyspa

lujvo

Woody plants are usually either trees (={tricu}), shrubs (={dzitricu}), or lianas.

mudyxultci

t_1 is an adze

mu'e

cmavo
-muf-
NU1
abstractor: achievement (event) abstractor; x_1 is the event-as-a-point/achievement of [bridi].

mu'ei

experimental cmavo
ROI
Converts PA into tense; in [number (usually nonspecific)] possible worlds/alternate histories where [sumti (du'u)] is true
Includes what "may have happened" if the past were different from the actual past. See {ba'oi}

mu'erkraske

lujvo
x_1 is cosmology (in astronomy) based on methodology x_2
Cf. {mu'eske}, {kesyske}, {kensa}, {munje}, {krasi}, {saske}

mu'eske

lujvo
s_1 is cosmology based on methodology s_3.
Cf. {munje}, {saske}, {tarske}, {termu'eske}.

mu'etru

lujvo
t_1 is a lord of universe t_2=m_1.

mufspe

lujvo
