Probably a misnomer for {nunspe}

mugle

experimental gismu
x_1 is a Muggle to/distinctly separate from but of similar breed to (type/community) x_2, reflecting common/Muggle culture x_3; x_1 is not in-the-know about (people/group/culture/knowledge) x_2; x_1 is a Muggle/an outsider/a foreigner/uninitiated to group/community x_2
Not mere stranger: implies a (previous or typical) total lack of knowledge about the existence or awareness of x_2 on the part of x_1. x_1 is a Muggle. x_2 is specialist/foreign/alien/arcane/hidden/wizarding/magic culture (not restrictive: it is just any separate group); x_3 is Muggle/quotidian culture. x_1 lacks the access credentials/knowledge of culture/group x_2 and is a member of culture/group x_3.

mu'i

cmavo
BAI
mukti modal, 1st place because of motive ...

mu'i'ai

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: Hafner-Sarnak-McCurley coprime determinants limiting probability constant; h ≈ 0.3532363719…
The limiting probability of two n×n matrices have determinants that are coprime, as n -> ∞

mu'i ma

cmavo-compound
BAI*
sumti question asking for a motive; why?.

mu'inai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
na'e mukti modal, 1st place; regardless of motive ...
Cf. {na'e}, {mukti}.

mujybukyvro

lujvo
v_1 is a wormhole (physics)

mujyku'e

lujvo
k_1 is universal in domain m_2 defined by rules m_3
from {munje} {kuspe} c.f. {kampu}

mujysamseltcana

lujvo
t_2 is the internet/cyberspace that includes nodes/computers t_1=s_1 whose function/purpose is s_2.
Cf. {munje}, {skami}, {tcana}, {samseltcana}, {kagysamseltcana}, {internet}.

muki'o

cmavo-compound
PA*
number/quantity: 5,000 expressed with comma.

mukti

gismu
-muk-
-mu'i-
x_1 (action/event/state) motivates/is a motive/incentive for action/event x_2, per volition of x_3.
Also; x_3 is motivated to bring about result/goal/objective x_2 by x_1 (= {termu'i} for reordered places); (note that 'under conditions' BAI may apply and be appropriately added to the main predicate level or within the x_2 action level). (cf. cmavo list {mu'i}, {nibli}, te {zukte} - generally better for 'goal', se {jalge}, {krinu}, {rinka}, {ciksi}, {djica}, {xlura})

mulbi'o

lujvo
x_1 is completed in property x_2 according to standard x_3

mulcabna

lujvo
x_1 (event) is after x_2 (event) concludes. x_1 is in the future when x_2 finishes

mulfa'o

lujvo
f_1 is the end/finish/completion of completed thing/process f_2=m_1.

mulfau

lujvo
x_1 (event) completes / reaches its completion

mulgau

lujvo
g_1 makes m_1 complete in property m_2 by standard m_3
Cf. {mulno}, {gasnu}, {tolcfari'i}.

mulgri

lujvo
g_1=m_1 is a complete set showing common property (ka) g_2, complete by standard m_3.
Cf. {mulno}, {girzu}

mulgunma

lujvo
g_1=m_1 is a mass/team/aggregate/whole, together composed solely/completely/wholly of components x2, considered jointly, by standard m_3.
From {mulno} + {gunma}. Just {gunma} with a complete specification of members. m_2 dropped since the property is always "membership in the mass in question". m_3 left in since it seems to do no harm, although its meaning seems a bit unclear here.

muljbi

lujvo
x_1 is almost/nearly done/complete/finished/whole in property x_2 by standard x_3.
See also {so'a}

muljboborbau

lujvo
x_1 is The Complete Lojban Language

mulna'u

lujvo
n_1 is an integer.

mulna'usle

lujvo
s_1=mn_1 is an indivisible / prime number in integer domain s_2.
Made from {mulna'u} + {selci}.;

mulno

gismu
-mul-
-mu'o-
x_1 (event) is complete/done/finished; x_1 (object) has become whole in property x_2 by standard x_3.
Also perfected, entirety; (adverb/adjective:) entire, total, integral, fully, totally, wholly, completely, entirely. See also {fanmo}, {culno}, {pagbu}, {xadba}, {prane}, {jalge}, {sumji}, {munje}, {sisti}, {xadni}.

mulnonmau

lujvo
x_1 is a positive integer
Or "natural number", but unlike {kacna'u}, doesn't include zero. See {mulna'u}, {nonmau}

mulpau

lujvo
x_1 is the entirety of x_2
See also {mulno}, {pagbu}.

mulselylai

lujvo
k_2 is a universal quantifier quantifying quantity m_1=k_1, which is complete/whole by standard m_2 on scale k_3 (si'o).

mulslemijyji'e

lujvo
x_1 is a eukaryote of species x_2.
An eukaryote is an organism whose cells contain complex structures enclosed within membranes. All species of large complex organisms are eukaryotes, including animals (={danlu}), plants (={spati}) and fungi (={mledi}, although most species of eukaryote are protist microorganisms (={jurme}).

multertu'i

lujvo
m_1=t_3 (du'u) is unanimous / based on complete agreement among t_1=t_2.

mumbais

cmevla
Mumbai.

mumbircurnu

lujvo
x_1 is a starfish of species x_2.
Cf. {mu}, {birka}, {curnu}.

mumdei

lujvo
x_1 is a Friday of week x_2 in calendar x_3.
Duration. For date, use {jednmu}.

mumei

cmavo-compound
MOI*
quantifier selbri: convert 5 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the quintet of members x_2.

mumoi

cmavo-compound
MOI*
quantified selbri: convert 5 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is fifth among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

mumplin

cmevla
Jupiter.
Cf. {mumplini}.

mumplini

lujvo
p_1 is the fifth closest planet (default is Jupiter if p2 is the Sun) revolving around p_2 (default is the Sun), with planetary characteristics p_3, orbital parameters p_4.
Cf. {mumplin}, {pavyplini}, {relplini} etc.; see also {terdi}, {solri}, {mluni}, {lunra}, {plinycma}, {tarci'e}.

mumvlabivli'i

lujvo
x_1 is wuyan lüshi with tone pattern x_2, rhyming at locus x_3.
{mu} {valsi} {bi} {linji}; {mumvlavonli'i}, {zelvlavonli'i}, {zelvlabivli'i}

mumvlavonli'i

lujvo

{mu} {valsi} {vo} {linji}; {zelvlavonli'i}, {mumvlabivli'i}, {zelvlabivli'i}

mumymast

cmevla
May.
Cf. {bakma'i}, {mumymasti}.

mumymasti

lujvo
x_1 is May/the fifth month of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Duration. For date, use {masnmu}. Cf. {pavmasti}, {nanca}.

mumymoija'a

lujvo
j_1 has the rank of Colonel/Captain/Group Captain (equivalent of NATO OF-5) in military unit /organization j_2.
Cf. {mu}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {xavmoija'a}, {vonmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

mumymoixandegji

lujvo
xa_1=d_1 is the little finger of hand xa_2=d_2 attached to body d_3.
See also: {xantamji}, {relmoixandegji}, {cibmoixandegji}, {vonmoixandegji}.

munje

gismu
-muj-
-mu'e-
x_1 is a universe/cosmos [complete and ordered entirety] of domain/sphere x_2 defined by rules x_3.
Also world; a universe is a kind of system, one which comprehensively encompasses its domain; e.g. 'universe of discourse', or 'world of birds'; x_3 are the rules/defining principles which distinguish the universe from other universes, or from non-universe. See also {ciste}, {plini}, {kensa}, {mulno}.

muno

cmavo-compound
PA*
number/quantity: 50 [fifty].

munono

cmavo-compound
PA*
number/quantity: 500 [five hundred].

mu'o

cmavo
COI
vocative: over (response OK) - more to come.

mu'oi

experimental cmavo
MUhOI
delimited non-Lojban selbri-unit
Similar to {me'oi} but requires delimiters, to allow quotation of multiple words or words with glottal-stops. In other words, {me'oi}:{mu'oi} :: {zo'oi}:{zoi} :: {la'oi}:{la'o} . Equivalent to {me'au} {la'e} {zoi}.

mu'onai

cmavo-compound
COI*
vocative: over (response OK) - more to come.

mupcpa

lujvo
c_1 takes a sample of c_2=m_2 from source/set c_3=m_3.
Cf. {cpacu}.

mupli

x_1 is an example/sample/specimen/instance/case/illustration of common property(s) x_2 of set x_3.
See also cmavo list {mu'u}, {pixra}.

murmura

fu'ivla
x_1 is a pussycat, kitty, kittycat, a purring home animal treated affectionately, belongs to species x_2
See {mlatu}, {dalpe'o}, {dirba}

murse

gismu
x_1 is the [astronomical] twilight/dawn/dusk/half-light/glimmering of day x_2 at location x_3.
Morning twilight, dawn (= {cermurse}); evening twilight, dusk (= {vacmurse}). See also {cerni}, {kandi}, {vanci}.

mursynalcando

lujvo

See also: matutinal (={cermursynalcando}), vespertine (={vacmursynalcando}).

Also very, pretty, a lot, immoderate/immoderately, intense, quite, extremely. See also {milxe}, {traji}, {banli}, {carmi}, {nutli}.

mutsteila

x_1 is a weasel (genus Mustela) of species/variety x_2.
Syn. {mabmustela}. See {ermine}, {fulreto}

mu'u

cmavo
BAI
mupli modal, 1st place exemplified by ...

muvdandu

lujvo
x1=m1=d1 swings from x2=m3=d2 towards x3=m2

muvdu

gismu
-muv-
-mu'u-
x_1 (object) moves to destination/receiver x_2 [away] from origin x_3 over path/route x_4.
Also mobile (= {comymu'u}, for the non-specific opposite of immobile); after a muvdu, object is alienated from/no longer at origin (unless physically returned there, per litru or slilu); agentive move (= {muvgau}, {muvzu'e}), non-agentive transitive move (= {muvri'a}), self-propelled (= {sezmuvgau}), motion of a part of the object (= {pagmu'u}), having a moving part (= {muvypau}, {muvyselpau}); apparent motion (= {mlumu'u}). (cf. {rinci}, {klama} (which differs in that the means of motion is explicit), {litru}, {cliva}, {fatri}; {dunda}, {benji} for agentive movement that does not necessarily imply alienation from origin, preja for similar movement with no agent implied, {bevri}, {vimcu})

muvgau

lujvo
g_1 moves m_1 to destination m_2 from origin m_3 over path/route m_4.
Cf. {muvdu}, {ca'ermuvgau}.

muvycau

lujvo
x_1 is motionless
See also {zvasto}

muvyselpau

lujvo
x_1 has moving part x_2, which moves to destination x_3 from origin x_4 over path x_5
See also {selpau}, {muvdu}.

muvyslidandu

lujvo
x1=m1=s1=d1 swings from x2=d2 between x3=m2 and x4=m3

muvysutra

lujvo
x_1 is quick to move to destination x_2 away from origin x_3 over path/route x_4
See {muvdu}, {sutra}

muvytciga'a

lujvo
g_1=t_1 is a joystick for steering/manoeuvring object/vehicle m_1=t_2 of material g_2.

muvytcixi'u

lujvo
x_1=t_1 is a steering wheel for steering/manoeuvring object/vehicle m_1=t_2, made of materials/having properties x_3.

muvzva

lujvo
x_1 wanders within an area x_2.
{muvdu} {zvati}

muzga

x_1 is a museum for preserving [and possibly exhibiting] x_2 at location x_3.

{muzga} {kumfa}

my

cmavo
BY2
letteral for m.

na

cmavo
-nar-
NA
bridi contradictory negator; scope is an entire bridi; logically negates in some cmavo compounds.

na.a

cmavo-compound
A*
logical connective: sumti afterthought conditional/only if.

na'a

cmavo
BY1
cancel all letteral shifts.

na'acto

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 centuries in duration by standard x_3.
{nanca} {xecto}; the default x_2 is 1

na'akti

fu'ivla
x_1 is turned off / deactivated / not operational for function x_2
See {akti}, {na'aktigau}

na'aktigau

fu'ivla
x_1 turns off / deactivates x_2
See {akti}, {aktigau}, {ca'arcadgau}

na'arctodetri

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the century notation of the date of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{nanca} zei {xecto} zei {detri}. See {de'i'a} for BAI. See also {na'acto}.

na'ardeidetri

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the date/day notation of the year of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{nanca} zei {djedi} zei {detri}. As default, the number x_1 is counted from the first day of the year. See also {detke'u}.

na'ardetri

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the year notation of the date of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{nanca} zei {detri}. See {de'i'e} for BAI.

na'arjefydetri

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the week notation of the year of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{nanca} zei {jeftu} zei {detri}. As default, the number x_1 is counted from the first week of the year. See also {detke'u}.

na'arkagnoi

lujvo
n_1 is the annual report of company/corporation/organization k_1.
Cf. {nanca}, {kagni}, {notci}, {kagyselpo'e}, {kagyseldejni}, {prali}.

na'asmi

lujvo
x_1 is of the same/similar age as x_2

na'au

experimental cmavo
converts an unevaluated mekso expression into a sumti referencing its evaluated result (if sensible/defined)
For example, would be prefixed to {ke'a} in {xe'au}-NOIhA clauses in order to reference the bracketed (unevaluated, formal) subexpression's evaluated result. In some sense, this word plays inverse of/to {me'o}, but may see less general use since expressions are typically evaluated at the end of mekso utterances. (Thus, this word may find its greatest amount of usage within mekso expressions before they are concluded and evaluated.)

na'a'u

experimental cmavo
PA5
not a number
See also {ci'i}, {xo'e}, {tu'o}.

na'azma

lujvo
x_1 is older than x_2 by x_3 (li) years

nabglaca'a

lujvo
x_1 is a toaster

nabmi

gismu
-nam-
x_1 (event/state) is a problem to/encountered by x_2 in situation/task/inquiry x_3.
Also: x_1 requires consideration by x_2. See also {preti}, {danfu}, {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {jinvi}, {nandu}, {pensi}, {sidbo}, {spuda}, {raktu}.

nabrkruto

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of/contains crouton(s) made from bread(s) x_2.

nabypalne

lujvo
n_1=p_1 is a pizza/pie/sandwich/taco/burrito/pirozhki with topping/ingredients p_2 and bread of type n_2=p_3.
Cf. {djasnuji}, {pitnanba}, {iptsa}, {cidjrpitsa}, {titnanba}, {cidjrburito}, {cidjrtako}.

nabysko

lujvo
x_1 is a quantity of noodles.

nabysle

lujvo
x1=s1 is a crumb of bread x2=n1 from grain x3=n2

nabyspi

lujvo
s_1 is a crumb of bread n_1 made from grains n_2.
Cf. {nanba}, {spisa}.

nabysu'a

lujvo
x1=s1 is a loaf of bread of grains x2=n2

nabzba

lujvo
z_1 bakes bread/cake/pastry z_2=n_1 from ingredients z_3.

nacfa'i

lujvo
x_1=f_1 mathematically(/experimentally?) finds/solves for the value of x_2=f_2
Useful for "find x", etc.. If one treats functions themselves as "numbers" in some contexts (which is perfectly reasonable), this word could also plausibly be used in the sense of, for example, "find the unique function that satisfies [criteria]".

nacle'u

lujvo
l_1 is a numeral in system l_2 representing l_3=n_1.
If not specified l_2 defaults to the Arabic numerals in Western scripts.

nacmecrai

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the least element/minimum of the set (of numbers) x_2 under (partial) ordering x_3
x1 must be a set. If this word is being used as a function (min), common but lazy mathematical practice allows for speaking of "the minimum of a function" (including sequences) or to constrain the minimum with respect to certain variables, but these constraints can and properly ought to be incorporated into the definition of the set of which the minimum is being taken. This word is not limited to purely mathematical usage and the set can be defined loosely (such as in "the minimum legally acceptable wage" wherein the set x2 is understood to be the set of all legally acceptable wages). The minimum x1 must belong to set x2; compare with: {zmaraimecna'u} (infimum). See also: {nacyzmarai}.

nacme'e

lujvo
x_1=n_1=c_1 is a numerical identifier of x_2=c_2, used by x_3=c_3.

nacmei

lujvo
x_1 is a vector of dimension x_2 with coordinates x_3, x_4, x_5, ...
See also {relnacmei}, {cibnacmei}, {pinynacmei}, {rajnacmei}, {nacmemsu'a}

nacmeimei

lujvo
x_1 is an x_2 by x_3 vector array/matrix of vectors x_4, x_5, x_6...
See also {jo'i}, {pi'a}, {sa'i}

nacna'o

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the arithmetic mean of number sequence/set x_2
Synonymous to {sujna'o}. See also {cnano}.

nacnilbra

lujvo
x_1 is the absolute value/norm of x_2.
See also {cu'a}

nacpoiba'u

lujvo
b_1 counts numbers n_1=p_1 out aloud.

nacrei

lujvo
p_1 is a question about a number, asked by p_3 to p_4.

nacyuensni

lujvo
x_1 (quoted text) is the text that stands for the number x_2 in language x_3
See {na'uvla}, {namcu}, {uensni}, {uenzi}

nacyzmarai

lujvo
x_1 (number) is the greatest element/maximum of the set (of numbers) x_2 under (partial) ordering x_3
x1 must be a set. If this word is being used as a function (max), common but lazy mathematical practice allows for speaking of "the maximum of a function" (including sequences) or to constrain the maximum with respect to certain variables, but these constraints can and properly ought to be incorporated into the definition of the set of which the maximum is being taken. This word is not limited to purely mathematical usage and the set can be defined loosely (such as in "the maximum number of people whom I permit to be invited" wherein the set x2 is understood to be the set of the possible acceptable numbers of guests allowed by the speaker). The maximum x1 must belong to set x2; compare with: {mecraizmana'u} (supremum). See also: {nacmecrai}.

nadmau

lujvo
x_1 is more difficult/harder than x_2 for x_3 by amount x_4

nadycai

lujvo
c_1=n_1 is a big problem/crisis for n_2 in situation/task/inquiry n_3.
Cf. {nabmi}, {carmi}.

nadydjukra

lujvo
x_1 is recourse of x_2 to do/achieve difficult situation x_3, which is difficult by standard x_4

na'e

cmavo
-nal-
NAhE
contrary scalar negator: other than ...; not ...; a scale or set is implied.

na'ebo

cmavo-compound
NAhE+BO
negation sumti qualifier: something other than.
Cf. {na'e}, {bo}, {je'abo}, {no'ebo}, {to'ebo}.

na'efa'a

cmavo-compound
FAhA*
space direction: not towards specified point, contrary negation; direction modal.

na'ei

experimental cmavo
NAhE
Contradictory negation of a predicate
The quantifier negation laws can be stated as: naku ro da zo'u da broda .ijo [su'o] da zo'u da na'ei broda, naku [su'o] da zo'u da broda .ijo ro da zo'u da na'ei broda.

na'epu'i

cmavo-compound
CAhA*
modal aspect: has never, and perhaps cannot; other-than-demonstrated-ability.

nafmupli

lujvo
x_1 is a counterexample of property x_2, normally exemplified by set x_3

nafselte'i

lujvo
x_1 is an exception/the only one without property x_2 among x_3
See also {natfe}, {selte'i}, {steci}

nagi'a

cmavo-compound
GIhA*
logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought conditional/only if.

naglatna

lujvo
l_1=n_2 is an Indian lotus/sacred lotus/bean of India (Nelumbo nucifera) [plant/flower/herb], with nuts n_1, of strain/cultivar l_2 , symbolizing l_3 to culture/religion l_4.
The Linnaean binomial Nelumbo nucifera (Gaertn.) is the currently recognized name for this species, which has been classified under the former names, Nelumbium speciosum (Willd.) and Nymphaea nelumbo, among others. See also {latna}.

nago'i

cmavo-compound
GOhA*
selbri: repeats preceding bridi while denying it as false; pro-assign values are unchanged.

nai

cmavo
NAI
attached to cmavo to negate them; various negation-related meanings.

na'i

cmavo
UI3a
discursive: metalinguistic negator.
See also {naldra}, {nalmapti}.

na'icmo

lujvo
c_1=n_2 chirps/makes sound/stridulates c_2 rubbing/chafing together wings [body-part] n_1 expressing c_3 (property)

naijgi

lujvo
j_1=n_2 is a patriot of nation n_1.
Cf. {natmi}, {jgira}, {natpa'i}.

nailon

cmevla
nylon

na'ircmacrida

lujvo
cr_1 is a pixie [tiny, winged mythical humanoid] of mythos/religion cr_2
Cf. {crida}, {torcrida}, {brabracrida}, {clakercrida}, {cmacmacrida}

na'irxi'a

lujvo
x_1 is a pegasus/winged horse.

na'itfa

fu'ivla
x_1 (du'u: proposition or kau-question) cannot be assigned a definite truth-value or answer
Brivla form of {na'i}. i.e. x_1 is something one would answer {na'i} to. Useful sumtcita places include {ni'i} for the logical reasoning for x_1 being na'itfa, and {va'o} for the conditions / contexts where x_1 is na'itfa. See {jo'atnu}

na'itsi

lujvo
x_1 is a samara of x_2 for producing offspring x_3.
see also {a'orne}, {ulmu}

naizgi

lujvo
z_1 is folk music performed at/by z_2 (event), originating in group of people n_2.
Cf. {natmi}, {zgike}, {nolzgi}, {sopselneizgi}, {dja'aza}, {te'ekno}.

naja

cmavo-compound
JA*
logical connective: tanru-internal afterthought conditional/only if.

najdei

lujvo
x_1 is Monday of week x_2 on calendar x_3.
Synonyms: {lurdei}, {pavdei}. See also {xundei}, {peldei}.

najgenja

lujvo
g_1 is a carrot of variety g_2.
See {ka'orta}, {gejrdauko}, {stagi}, {spati}, {genjrdauko}.

najnimre

lujvo
x_1 is an orange of variety x_2.
see also {nimre}, {pelnimre}, {branimre}, {ri'ornimre}, {skorbuti}, {narju}

najnimryjisra

lujvo
j_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of orange juice made from orange/oranges j_2=ni_1.
See also: {najnimre}, {jisra}, {narju}, {nimre}

najycutcpi

lujvo
ci_1=cu_2 is an American robin of variety ci_2
Turdus migratorius. This is not the European robin.

najysmela

lujvo
x_1 is a peach [fruit] of species/variety x_2
Cf. {smela}

najyzilska

lujvo
x_1 is the abstract color orange
The gismu {narju} refers to objects which are orange, but not the color orange itself. This lujvo serves the latter purpose. See also {skari} {zilska}

nakcei

lujvo
c_1 is a god (specifically, male deity) of people(s)/religion c_2 with dominion over c_3 [sphere].
In English, "god" can be either genderless or male (depending on context and contrast), while specifically indicating a female deity by use of the word "goddess". In order to correct this imbalance, Lojban is equipped with {fetcei} and {nakcei} (among other words) for the variously characterized deities, whereas {cevni} makes no implications about the gender of the deity. Cf. {fetcei}, {nakni}, {cevni}, {lijda}, {krici}, {censa}, {malsi}. Recommended to be used only use when contrasted with {fetcei} or masculinity of the deity is to be emphasized/important.

nakcinse

lujvo
c_1 is androphilous [sexually attracted to men] in situation c_2 by standard c_4.
This word is only about sexual interest in males; other sexuals interest are irrelevant. See also {fetcinse}, {naknakcinse}, {mitcinse}, {dutcinse}.

nakfamti

lujvo
x_1 is an uncle of x_2

naknakcinse

lujvo
c_1=f_1 is male and androphilous/gay/bisexual in situation c_2 by standard c_4
This word is about male homosexuality and bisexuality. See also {nakcinse}, {fetfetcinse}, {mitcinse}, {relcinse}.

naknalspe

lujvo
f_1=n_1 is an unmarried man under law/custom/tradition s_3.
Cf. {nalspe}, {naknalspe}, {specfari'i}, {bavyspe}, {pruspe}.

nakni

gismu
-nak-
x_1 is a male/buck of species x_2 evidencing masculine trait(s) x_3 (ka); x_1 is masculine.
See also {fetsi}, {bersa}.

nakpibrkevna

fu'ivla
x_1 [body-part] is the male genital cavity of individual x_2
It belongs to a male (sperm-bearer). It is the "vagina-like" organ into which gynosomes may be inserted during mating; this similarity is due to its role in intercourse (being penetrated), and not due to its role in producing certain gametes or hosting embryos. See also: {vibnrbarpinji}

nakpibyta'u

lujvo
x_1=t_1 is boxer shorts/boxer briefs/briefs/jockstrap (male genital underwear), serving purpose x_2=t_3
Male genitalia/crotch/penis-covering type of underwear. Needn't be worn by male/man/boy but garment need be made for male genitalia/pubic region in some manner (see {fetpibyta'u}/{pibyta'u} for female/non-defined counterpart). Cf. {nerta'u}, {taxfrbikini}, {tatyta'u}.

nakpinji

lujvo
p_1 is a/the penis of p_2=n_1.
Cf. {fetpinji}, {pinji}.

nakso'a

lujvo
x_1 is a gamete of male x_2
See {fetso'a}, {esperma}

nakspe

lujvo
x_1 is a husband of x_2 (spouse) according to marriage law/custom/tradition x_3.

naktricinse

lujvo
x1 is/demonstrates/exhibits sexual orientation toward males in situation x2 by standard x3
In a gender binary, this word covers half of each heterosexuality and homosexuality. It is not strict (in other words, bisexuals are both male- and female-attracted). Could be useful for transexuals with a definite preference, as well. See also: {fetytricinse}

naku

cmavo-compound
NAKU
(adverbial) bridi contradictory negator; "it is not true that...."; negates the bridi as well as any other adverbial or quantifier located on its right.

nakybakni

lujvo
b_1=n_1 is a bull of species/breed b_2.

nakydzetru

lujvo
t_1 is a patriarch of people/territory/domain/subjects t_2.
Cf. {fetydzetru}.

nakykemcinctu

lujvo
x_1 is a male teacher of sexuality to audience x_2.

nalbolbi'o

lujvo
bi_1 unrolls under condition bi_3.
Cf. {na'e}, {bolci}, {binxo}.

nalbrablo

lujvo
ba_1=bl_1 is a non-big boat for carrying bl_2, propelled by bl_3, in property/dimension(s) ba_3 (ka) as compared with standard/norm ba_3.
§12.11 (cll 1.1).

nalbrezu'e

lujvo
x_1 improvises x_2 (ka) for purpose/goal/to end x_3

nalbro

lujvo
b_1=n_1 is gentile.

nalceiju'o

lujvo
d1 does not know if a god(s) exist; d1 is agnostic.

nalceikri

lujvo
k_1 is an atheist.
Cf. {ceikri}, {seljda}, {ceirsenpi}.

nalci

gismu
-na'i-
x_1 is a/the wing [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: lateral supporting surface].
See also {cipni}, {pimlu}, {rebla}.

nalci'i

lujvo
x_1 is uninteresting to x_2.
See also {a'ucu'i}

nalci'o

lujvo
x_1 is senior/older/other than young by standard x_2.
{na'e} {citno}; see also {makcu}, {tolci'o}

nalci'otarbi

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is a fetus with mother t_2 and father t_3.

nalcpavjima

fu'ivla
x_1 is an alicorn (winged unicorn) of type/mythology x_2
See {pavjima}, {na'irxi'a}

nalcre

lujvo
c_1 is lay (non-professional) in event/activity c_2 by standard c_3.
Cf. {certu}.

nalcti

lujvo
c_1 abstains from eating c_2; c_1 fasts.
Cf. {citka}.

naldamtanko

lujvo
t_1 is a quantity of smokeless tobacco/tobacco-based product of/from species/strain t_2
All tobacco and tobacco-based products, but not merely nicotine-based products (e.g. pharmaceutical), not intended for smoking e.g. dipping/chewing/dissolvable tobacco, snuff, snus, tobacco gum, iqmik, naswar, gutka, toombak, shammah, etc. Cf. {tanko}, {danmo}, {sigja}.

naldjica

lujvo
x_1 does not want/desire x_2 (event/state) for purpose x_3.
Cf. {na'e}, {djica}

naldra

lujvo
x_1 is incorrect/not right in property/aspect x_2 (ka) in situation x_3

nalfadni

lujvo
f_1 [member] is uncommon/atypical/unusual in property f_2 (ka) among members of f_3 (set).
Cf. {na'e}, {fadni}, {rirci}.

nalfau

lujvo
x_1 (event) is an event that doesn't happen/occur/take place
See also {fasnu}.

nalgundei

lujvo
x_1=d_1 is a period of x_2=d_2 non-working days/vacation days/holidays for worker x_3=g_1 at job x_4=g_2
Removed djedi_3 as being unneeded.

nalju'i

lujvo
x_1 is inattentive towards/distracted/inadvertent of object/affair x_2.
See also {a'acu'i}

nalju'ikei

lujvo
x_1 fidgets with x_2.

naljundi

lujvo
j_1 is inattentive towards/distracted from object/affair j_2.
Cf. {na'e}, {jundi}.

nalju'o

lujvo
d1 does not knows fact(s) d2 (du'u) about subject d3 by epistemology d4
This is the proper meaning of agnostic: gnostic - knowledge, a - without. The word is not limited to just religion, and does not describe a position of belief, although it can be used in this context: agnostic theism, agnostic atheism, etc.

nalkafxumckafi

lujvo
c_1=x_1 is a quantity of decaffinated coffee/coffee [beverage] without caffeine.
See also decaffeination (=pu'u {kafxumvi'u}), coffee making (={kafpra}).

nalkrilytabno

lujvo
p_2=t_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of amorphous carbon.
See also: diamond (={krilytabno}).

nalmle

lujvo
m_1 is ugly to m_2 in aspect m_3 (ka) by aesthetic standard m_4.
Example 15.71 (cll 1.1).

nalmo'i

lujvo
m_1 forgets fact/memory m_2 about subject m_3.
Cf. {na'e}, {morji}, {tolmo'i}. Assumes that {morji} refers to a state i.e. 'remember'= 'retain in memory'.

nalmosysna

lujvo
s_1 is an approximant consonant with place of articulation m_2=m_3 and phonation x_3.
cf. {zunsna}

nalmu'o

lujvo
x_1 is incomplete/unfinished in property x_2 by standard x_3 .
See also {uonai}

nalna'u

lujvo
n_1 is not a number

nalnimjavnau

lujvo
x_1 is a human who is neither a woman nor a man.
See also: {remrnunmu}, {ninmu}, {nanmu}, {remna}.

nalpro

lujvo
p_1 gives consent/agreement/sanction to p_2 (person/force ind./mass) about p_3 (abstract).
Cf. {na'e}, {fapro}, {tugni}, {ie}, {e'a}.

nalra'u

lujvo
r_1 leaves r_2 alone/in peace.
Cf. {raktu}.

nalra'ugei

lujvo
g_1=r_2 is tranquil/happy about g_2=r_1.
Cf. {na'e}, {raktu}, {gleki}, {mansygei}, {camgei}.

nalreldilcymu'o

lujvo
x_1 is an odd number (integer not divisible by 2).
See also: {reldilcymu'o}, {dilcymu'o}, {re}.

nalremda'u

lujvo
x_1 is a non-human animal of species/taxon x_2
See also {danlu}.

nalre'ucti

lujvo
c_1 does not eat meat c_2=r_1; c_1 is a (lacto-ovo-)vegetarian.
See also (ethical) vegan (={nardalprapli}), dietary vegan (={stagycti}), ovo-vegetarian (={sovjvestagycti}), lacto-vegetarian (={ladjvestagycti}), herbivore (={spacti}).

nalri'i

lujvo
r_1 (NU) is casual, not formal/ceremonial.
Cf. {surla}, {xalbo}, {kalsa}, {cunso}.

nalsa'uslakyskute'a

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is afraid of saying syllable(s) c_2=sl_1 of language sl_2 to c_3 via c_4 because they believe that saying them is not necessary for continuing state/process sa_2 under conditions sa_3

nalselci'i

lujvo
x_1=c_2 is uninterested in x_2=c_1.
Cf. {cinri}, {selci'i}, {norselci'i}, {tolselci'i}, {a'ucu'i}.

nalseljukpa

lujvo
j_2 is uncooked/raw.
Cf. {na'e}, {jukpa}.

nalselna'i

lujvo
x_1 is wingless/has no wings.

nalselnalci

lujvo
x_1 is wingless/has no wings.
Cf. {nalci}, {cipni}

nalselra'u

lujvo
r_2 is calm/untroubled about r_1 with result r_3.
Cf. {na'e}, {raktu}, {nalra'ugei}.

nalselzu'i

lujvo
x_1 (event/state) is unhindered by x_2 (event/state) due to quality x_3 (ka).

nalspe

lujvo
f_1=n_1 is unmarried under law/custom/tradition s_3.
Cf. {fetnalspe}, {naknalspe}, {specfari'i}, {bavyspe}, {pruspe}.

nalstace

lujvo
s_1 is dishonest/disingenuous to s_2 about s_3.
Cf. {stace}, {tcica}.

nalsti

lujvo
s_1 (agent) is relentless/unceasing in activity/process/state s_2.

nalta'acni

lujvo
c_1=t_1 is withdrawn, feeling emotion c_2 about c3=t_3 from t_2.
Cf. {na'e}, {tavla}, {cinmo}.

nalvai

lujvo
x_1 (event/person) is unimportant/insignificant to x_2 (event/person) due to/in aspect x_3; x_2 doesn't care about x_1's x_3-ness.
I found myself saying [{na'e} {vajni}] very often and thus thought that it'd be nice to have a lujvo for it.

nalvaime

fu'ivla
x_1 is any referent of x_2 ; x_2 has a set of referents, but the difference between the members of the set is not important
Shortening of {nalvaimenre}

nalvaimenre

lujvo
x_1 is any referent of x_2 ; x_2 has a set of referents, but the difference between the members of the set is not important
One possible interpretation of {xe'e}. (xe'ere lo mu plise) → (re nalvaimenre be lo mu plise); (xe'ere plise) → (re nalvaimenre be ro plise). See {le'elkai}, {itca}, {menre}. Shortening: {nalvaime}

nalvaxni'ajinru

lujvo
j_1=c_1=v_1 (object/person) is free-diving beneath/below/under from c_2 (object/water surface) in frame of reference c_3, submerged in liquid j_2.

nalvaxni'ajirpre

lujvo
p_1 is a free-diver.

nalxe'u

lujvo
x_1 is unrepentant of x_2.
See also {nalzungi}, {u'ucu'i}

nalzaucru

lujvo
x_1 tolerates x_2 (event) under conditions x_3

nalzungi

lujvo
x_1 is unremorseful of x_2.
See also {nalxe'u}, {u'unai}

nalzva

lujvo
x_1 is absent from x_2.

namcfibonatci

fu'ivla
x_1 is the x_2-th member of the Fibonacci sequence; x_1 = F_{x_2}
0th member = 0, 1st member = 1, 2nd member = 1.

namcixu

fu'ivla
For mo'e x_4 x in x_1 there exist mo'e x_5 y in x_2 such that x me'au x_3 y; for mo'e x_6 y in x_2 there exist mo'e x_7 x in x_1 such that x me'au x_3 y.
Cf. {me'au}, {mo'e}. Somewhat supercedes {rolsixu}, in that {rolsixu} is {namcixu} for x4=x6=li ro, x5=x7=li su'o.

namcrgogolo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a googol [10^100] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default units).

namcrgogolplexu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a googolplex [10^{googol}] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default units).

namcu

gismu
-nac-
-na'u-
x_1 (li) is a number/quantifier/digit/value/figure (noun); refers to the value and not the symbol.
See also {lerfu}, {mekso}, {klani}.

namdakfu

lujvo
d_1 is a bread knife with a blade of material d_3.

namkei

lujvo
x_1=k_1=n_2 [agent] tries to solve puzzle/enigma/riddle/charade x_2=k_2=n_1 in game/contest x_3=n_3

nanba

gismu
-nab-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains bread [leavened or unleavened] made from grains x_2.
See also {gurni}, {panlo}, {toknu}.

nanbe'o

lujvo
x_1 reflects Central American culture/nationality/geography in aspect x_2.
From {snanu}, {bemro}.

nanbrbaklava

fu'ivla
x_1 is baklava

nanbrkrepa

fu'ivla
x_1 is a crêpe of composition x_2.
Refers specifically to thin crepes, excluding pancakes.

nanbrmatsa

fu'ivla
x_1 is a matzo made from grain x_2.
see {fomcau}, {nanba}, {fomymledi}

nanca

gismu
-na'a-
x_1 is x_2 years in duration (default is 1 year) by standard x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is annual.
This year (= {cabna'a}); next year (= {bavlamna'a}); last year (= {prulamna'a}). See also {detri}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}.

nancindu

lujvo
x_1 is a bluff oak (Quercus austrina) of species/strain x_2.

nandu

gismu
-nad-
x_1 is difficult/hard/challenging for x_2 under conditions x_3; x_1 challenges (non-agentive) x_2.
See also {frili}, {nabmi}, {jdari}, {talsa}, {tinsa}.

nanfi'oglibau

lujvo
x_1 is the South African English language used by x_2 to express/communicate x_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).
Cf. {snanu}, {friko}, {glico}, {bangu}, {glibau}, {bangenugu}.

nanfi'ogu'e

lujvo
x_1 is South Africa.
Cf. {snanu}, {friko}, {gugde}, {gugdezu'a}.

nanl

cmevla
Master
Cf. {nanla}, {nix}, {naun}, {nim}.

nanla

gismu
x_1 is a boy/lad [young male person] of age x_2 immature by standard x_3.
Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba). See also {nixli}, {verba}, {nanmu}, {bersa}.

nanlybakni

lujvo
b_1=c_1 is a bullock [young male cattle/beef-producer/bovine], of age n_2 immature/defined as a bullock by standard n_3, of species/breed b_2.

nanmu

gismu
-nau-
x_1 is a man/men; x_1 is a male humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu). See also {ninmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nanla}, {bersa}.

nansicfi'ocinfo

lujvo
z_1=c_1 is a southwest African/Katanga lion [Panthera leo bleyenberghi] of breed c_2.

nansicnansnanu

lujvo
x_1 is south by west of x_2 in reference frame x_3.

nanslovo

lujvo
x_1 is South Slavic/Yugoslavian in aspect x_2.
South Slavic if the aspect is language, else Yugoslavian; see also {slovino}, {bolgaro}, {slovo}, {serbo} (experimental)

nanstici

lujvo
x_1 is southwest of x_2 in frame of reference x_3.

nanstuna

lujvo
x_1 is southeast of x_2 in frame of reference x_3.

nansunfi'ocinfo

lujvo
z_1=c_1 is a southeast African/Transvaal lion [Panthera leo krugeri] of breed c_2.

nansunsunsnanu

lujvo
x_1 is southeast by east of x_2 in frame of reference x_3.

nanvi

gismu
-nav-
x_1 is a billionth/thousand-millionth [10^{-9}] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).
See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}

na'o

cmavo
TAhE
tense interval modifier: characteristically/typically; tense/modal; defaults as time tense.

na'oi

experimental cmavo
CAI
Indicator for moderate or normal attitudinal intensity
Used to indicate the "default" intensity of attitudinals, the intensity that is implied when for example using a bare "ui" (which is in-between "sai" and "ru'e"). Useful mostly together with pei. Derived from cnano.

na'onai

cmavo-compound
TAhE*
tense interval modifier: atypically; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.

narbanzu

lujvo
x_1 (event) is insufficient / is not a sufficient condition for x_2 to happen
See also {banzu}.

narbanzuni

fu'ivla
x_1 is a property satisfied by a number/amount too low for x_2 to happen

narca'acadgau

lujvo
g_1 (agent) turns device/apparatus cab_1=can_1 on.
See also: turn off (={ca'arcadgau}), turned on (={narca'acando}).

narca'acando

lujvo
cab_1=can_1 (device/apparatus) is on / operational.
Cf. {ca'arcando}, {narcando}.

narcando

lujvo
x_1 in motion/active.
A change in position is not implied. “idling” (not moving), is the negation of this: {cando}.

narcu'i

lujvo
x_1 (event/state/property) is impossible under condition x_2

narcumselski

lujvo
x_1=s_1=c_1 (object/event/idea) is impossible to describe under conditions x_2=c_2 to audience x_3=s_3; x_1 is ineffable
Indescribeable because of taboo/incommunicable nature (e.g. qualia). Cf. {narcu'i}.

nardalprapli

lujvo
p_1 is a (ethical) vegan, not using animal products c_2.
See also lacto-ovo-vegetarian (={nalre'ucti}), dietary vegan (={stagycti}), ovo-vegetarian (={sovjvestagycti}), lacto-vegetarian (={ladjvestagycti}), herbivore (={spacti}).

nardigamo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a game of backgammon
See also {kelci}

nardjijevgau

lujvo
x_1 (agent)'s action results in the unintended result x_2
See also {djijevgau}, {gasnu}, {djica}, {snuti}

nardjijvegau

lujvo
x_1 (agent)'s action results in the unintended result x_2
Synonymous with {nardjijevgau}. See also {djijvegau}, {gasnu}, {djica}, {snuti}.

nardukseni

fu'ivla
x_1 is a property satisfied by a number/amount low enough for x_2 to happen

narfau

lujvo
x_1 (event) is an event that doesn't happen/occur/take place

narfaubanzu

lujvo
x_1 (event) is a sufficient condition for x_2 to not happen
See also {banzu}.

narfaucu'i

lujvo
under conditions x_2, it is possible that x_1 (event/state/property) doesn't happen

narfaunarbanzu

lujvo
x_1 (event) is not a sufficient condition for x_2 to not happen
Probably synonymous with "se cumki". See also {banzu}, {cumki}.

narfaunarcu'i

lujvo
under conditions x_2, it is not possible that x_1 (event/state/property) doesn't happen / x_1 necessarily happens

narge

gismu
-nag-
x_1 is a nut [body-part: hard-shelled fruit] from plant/species x_2 with shell x_3 and kernel x_4.
Also x_4 nucleus, center (= {velnarge} for place reordering). See also {grute}, {stagi}, {jbari}, {midju}.

nargile

fu'ivla
x_1 is a nargileh/hookah for smoking x_2.

nargrkaju

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cashew of species x_2.

nargrkaria

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is pecan/hickory of species/variety x_2.

nargrpistaco

fu'ivla
x_1 is a pistachio of species x_2.

narje'u

lujvo
x_1 (du'u) is not true by standard/epistemology/metaphysics x_2
Synonymous to {jitfa} under binary truth value logics; may otherwise have a different meaning (e.g. fuzzy logic).

narjista'u

lujvo
x_1 is dirty laundry worn by x_2 for purpose x_3, dirty with x_4.

narju

gismu
-naj-
x_1 is orange [color adjective].
See also {skari}, {blabi}, {xekri}, {kandi}, {carmi}, {xunre}, {pelxu}, {solji}.

narju'odza

lujvo
x_1 is an unknown value/argument, unknown to x_2
See {djuno}, {kutydza}, {goilka'i}, {co'e}, {zo'e}, {do'e}, {xo'e}, {comco'e}, {zi'o}

narka'e

lujvo
k_1 is unable to do/be/uncapable of doing/being k_2 (event/state) under conditions k_3 (event/state).
Cf. {kakne}.

narkau

lujvo
x_1 (property) is not shared by everything among x_2 (plural)
See also {kampu}, {tolkau}.

narnonsmikemnonsmipi'i

lujvo
x1 is a zero-divisor partnered with element(s) x2 in structure/ring x3, where neither x1 nor x2 is the zero(-like) element in x3
Let structure x3 have commutative group substructure that we name as "additive" and let "0" denote the additive identity thereof in the structure x3. In the set underlying x3 there exist elements x1, x2 ≠ 0 in structure x3 such that x1*x2 = 0 in structure x3; the partnership aforementioned is thusly defined. See also: {nonsmipi'i}.

narpanra

lujvo
p_1 is unique/unequaled/unparalleled/unmatched / the only one of its kind.

narplixau

lujvo
x_1 is useless to agent x_2 by the standard of purpose x_3
See {tolplixau}, {plixau}, {mabla}, {xlali}

narprugastcica

lujvo
x_1 (event) causes jamais-vu to x_2 (person) using sense x_3 under conditions x_4
jai narprugastcica for object x_1; {pu}{nai}, {ganse} {tcica}; {gastcica}, {prugastcica}

narsamjo'e

lujvo
Computer j=1=s_1 is disconnected from [not connected to] computer j_2=s_1 via medium j_3.
Absense of a network connection over x_3. x_3 could be, for example, a cable or network. See also: {samjo'e}.

narsamjongau

lujvo
g_1 (agent) disconnects computer j=1=s_1 from computer j_2=s_1 in medium j_3.
Network connection. x_4 could be, for example, a cable or network. Cf. {narsamjo'e}.

narslutroka'e

lujvo
x_1=k_1=j_1 is unable to move/paralyzed in body-part x_2=k_2=j_2=s_2, under conditions x_3=k_3=j_3
Transient or permanent (but not pseudo-)paralysis (see {sipyjitri'ufri} for sleep paralysis). Cf. {narte'ugaska'e}, {narviska'e}, {nartinka'e}, {narvu'igaska'e}, {narsumnyka'e}, {narka'e}.

narsumnyka'e

lujvo
k_1 is unable to smell/scent (transitive verb) under conditions k_3 (event/state).
See also: {sumnyka'e}.

narte'ugaska'e

lujvo
k_1 (non-experiencer) is unable to feel [sensory stimulus] under conditions k_3 (event/state).
See also: {tegygaska'e}, {tegyga'e}.

nartinbe

lujvo
t_1 disobeys/does not follow the command/rule t_2 made by t_3; (adjective:) t_1 is disobedient.

nartinka'e

lujvo
k_1 is deaf/unable to hear under conditions k_3 (event/state).
See also: {tinka'e}.

nartolkau

lujvo
x_1 (property) is satisfied by at least one thing among x_2 (plural)
See also {suzdza}, {kampu}.

naru'e

cmavo-compound
NA*
weak bridi negation; almost, but not quite.

narviska'e

lujvo
k_1 is blind/unable to see under conditions k_3 (event/state).
See also: {viska'e}.

narvu'igaska'e

lujvo
k_1 (non-experiencer) is unable to taste under conditions k_3 (event/state).
See also: {vusygaska'e}, {vusyga'e}.

naryremda'u

lujvo
d_1=r_1 is an animal of species d_2 and not a human; d_1=r_1 is a non-human animal.
Sometimes, in colloquial usage, the word “animal” is understood to exclude humans. “naryremda'u”, rather than “{danlu}” is the correct translation of it. See also: {na}, {remna}.

natfe

gismu
-naf-
-na'e-
x_1 (du'u) contradicts/denies/refutes/negates x_2 (du'u) under rules/logic x_3.
Also exception (= {nafmupli}); agentive contradict/deny (= {nafxu'a} or {tolxu'a}). See also {nibli}, {tugni}, {zanru}, {xusra}.

natficima

fu'ivla
x_1 is NaNoWriMo/National Novel Writing Month
This is a shortening of {natfikci'ama'i}, similar to how "NaNoWriMo" is a shortening.

natmi

gismu
-nat-
-nai-
x_1 is a nation/ethnic group of peoples x_2; [people sharing a history/culture].
See also {jecta}, {kulnu}, {lanzu}, {gugde}, {bangu}, {cecmu}.

natpa'i

lujvo
p_1 loves/feels strong affectionate devotion towards the nation/ethnic group n_2; p_1 is a patriot/nationalist.
Cf. {natmi}, {prami}, {natpamtrusi'o}, {naijgi}.

natpamtrusi'o

lujvo
s_1 is a nationalist political ideology as applied by t_1=p_1 among/in people/territory/domain t_2 based on the works of thinker s_3
From {natmi}, {prami}, {turni}, {sidbo}. Cf. {natpa'i}, {trudjigri}, {ka'irtrusi'o}, {dzejdasratrusi'o}, {vricykricrutrusi'o}, {fairpaltrusi'o}, {guntrusi'o}, {tsarainaitrusi'o}.

natsi

experimental gismu
x_1 reflects/pertains to Nazi/National Socialistic ideologies in aspect/manner x_2
Connotations are neutral. Cultural and historic ties are loose. For German Nazis (or those who share their ideologies (again, the connotation is neutral and historic ties are loose)), use {dotnatsi}.

nau

cmavo
CUhE
tense: refers to current space/time reference absolutely.

na'u

cmavo
NAhU
convert selbri to mex operator; used to create less-used operators using fu'ivla, lujvo, etc.

nau'atli

fu'ivla
x_1 is Nahuatl in aspect x_2
Includes Pipil (the Pipil autonym, "Nawat", is just their way of pronouncing "Nahuatl", but dropping the 'l' would produce a non-brivla).

na'ujbi

lujvo
x_1 is approximately equal to x_2.

naun

cmevla
Mr./Mister
Cf. {nanmu}, {nix}, {nanl}, {nim}.

naurso'a

lujvo
s_1 is a sperm of man/male humanoid person n_1=s_2.

nau'u

experimental cmavo
KOhA7
what is now; refers to current space/time/situation reference absolutely
sumti equivalent of {nau}

na'uvla

lujvo
x_1 is the word with stands for the number x_2 in language x_3
E.g. Lojban {pa}, {re}, etc., English "one", "two", etc. See {nacyuensni}

navni

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of noble gas of type x_2 [helium/neon/argon/krypton/xenon/radon].
Default neon. See also {xukmi}, {gapci}; {tolfragapci}; {solnavni}, {ninynavni}, {laznynavni}, {mipnavni}, {fangynavni}, {dircynavni}.

navnlrado

fu'ivla
n_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of radon (Rn).

navnrargo

fu'ivla
n_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of Argon (Ar).

navnrkripto

fu'ivla
n_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of Krypton (Kr).

navnrxeno

fu'ivla
n_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of xenon (Xe).

navytre

lujvo
m_1=n_1 is m_2=n_2 nanometer(s) / billionth(s) of a meter [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction m_3=n_3 by standard x_4=m_3.
See also {centre}. Made from {nanvi} + {mitre}.

navzmi

lujvo
z_1 is a nanobot performing function z_2 under conditions z_3.

naxle

gismu
-nax-
-xle-
x_1 is a canal/channel to x_2 from x_3 with route x_4.
x_2/x_3 may be unordered. See also {pluta}, {rirxe}, {klaji}, {dargu}.

nazbi

gismu
-naz-
-zbi-
x_1 is the nose [body-part] of x_2 with nostril(s)/nasal passage(s) x_3; [metaphor: protrusion].
Also (adjective:) nasal. See also {degji}, {panci}, {sumne}, {tance}.

ne

cmavo
GOI
non-restrictive relative phrase marker: which incidentally is associated with ...

ne'a

cmavo
FAhA3
location tense relation/direction; approximating/next to ...

ne'au

experimental cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: devoidness of emotion (neutral by absence of emotion) - overwhelmed by/replete with/overflowing with (seemingly all) emotion
Carries no positive or negative connotations. In some sense, the "empty attitudinal".

nebdadycreka

lujvo
cr_1=d_1 is a halter top of material cr_2.
A subtype of "tube top" ({jancaucreka}), with a single strap around the back of the neck. Suggested shortest fu'ivla form: ebdrka. Cf. {creka}.

nebgunse

lujvo
x_1 is a swan (genus Cygnus) of species/strain x_2

nebjendu

lujvo
j_1 is the axis (cervical vertebra) of c_2

nebnipcreka

lujvo
cr_1=s_1 is a polo-neck garment of material cr_2.
Usually a sweater ({nivycreka}), with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck. Suggested shortest fu'ivla form: epcrka. Cf. {creka}.

nebyka'a

lujvo
k_1 is a guillotine/executioner's axe for beheading k_2.

nebykarli

lujvo
k_1 is a collar/necklace around neck k_2=c_1 and is made of material k_3.
Could refer to collar for pets, or as a decorative thing.

nebyplovoicpi

lujvo
ci_1=cn_2=v_1 is a heron/egret/bittern of species ci_2
Members of family Ardeidae are noted for flying with their necks folded.

nebysrijge

lujvo
j_1 is a necktie made of material d_2 worn by c_2.
Cf. {dadne'ota'u}.

nederland

cmevla
Holland/The Netherlands.

ne'e

experimental cmavo
CAI
polar opposite scalar negator; equivalent to {to'e} but in selma'o CAI
See also {to'e}

neftoni

fu'ivla
x_1 is x_2 newtons of force (default is 1)
See also {jikfi}

nei

cmavo
GOhA
pro-bridi: repeats the current bridi.

ne'i

cmavo
FAhA3
location tense relation/direction; within/inside of/into ...

nei'o

experimental cmavo
KOhA
pro-sumti: this paragraph

neizma

lujvo
x_1=n_1=z_1 likes x_3=n_2 more than x_2=z_2 does, by margin x_4=z_4.
Contrast with {zmanei} for "prefer".

nejni

gismu
-nen-
x_1 is energy of type x_2 in form x_3.
Ray/beam (= {nenli'i}). See also {marji}, {tarmi}, {kantu}, {lazni}, {livla}.

nejnimpetu

fu'ivla
x_1 is the linear-momentum-energy-mass [four-vector] of x_2 in frame of reference x_3
Be careful to define the order and units of the four vector. See also: {nejni}, {impetu}, {ocnerta}, {tcelerita}.

nektara

fu'ivla
x_1 is a flower nectar of organ/plant x_2; x_1 is a liquid secretion that is attractive to pollinators
See {se} {ciblu}, {spasatlitki}, {sakta}, {titla}. Needn't be sweet as some plants pollinated by flies have nectar that tastes of feces. The word {jisra} is for 'nectar' in the sense 'juice'

nelci

gismu
-nel-
-nei-
x_1 is fond of/likes/has a taste for x_2 (object/state).
See also {cinmo}, {djica}, {pluka}, {prami}, {rigni}, {sinma}, {trina}, {xebni}, {cuxna}, {pendo}.

nelcymau

lujvo
z_1, more than z_2, likes n_2 by amount z_4.
Example 12.91 (cll 1.1).

nelrai

lujvo
n_1 is most fond of n_2=t_1 (object/state) from set t_4, due to extreme t_3 (ka; default ka zmadu).
Cf. {nelci}, {traji}, {plicu'a}. Also: n_1 likes/prefers n_2=t_1 the most out of set t_4.

nelti'i

lujvo
s_1=n_1 recommends s_2=n_2 to audience s_3.
Cf. {stidi}.

nencausno

lujvo
x_1=m_1=c_1 is lethargic, slow to do x_2=m_2.

nenri

gismu
-ner-
-ne'i-
x_1 is in/inside/within x_2; x_1 is on the inside/interior of x_2 [totally within the bounds of x_2].
Indicates total containment. (cf. se {vasru} (for containment that need not be total), {jbini}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {sruri}, {senta}, {snuji}, {bartu}, {diklo}, {jibni}, {jinru}, {setca})

nenrxamilto

fu'ivla
x1 is Hamiltonian total energy operator of/corresponding to (sub)system x2 with characteristics x3 under conditions x4

ne'o

cmavo
VUhU3
unary mathematical operator: factorial; a!.

ne'oi

experimental cmavo
VUhU3
unary operator: primorial a#
The product of the first pi(a) prime numbers p_i starting with p_1 = 2, where pi(a) is the (not-greater-than-)prime-counting function. Not strictly monotonically increasing unless a=p_j for positive integers j.

ne'okre

lujvo
x_1 is a mane on x_2

nerbafa

fu'ivla
x_1 is inside out
Shortening of {nerbarfa'e}

nerbarfa'e

lujvo
x_1 is inside out

nerbei

lujvo
x_1 imports x_2 to x_3 from x_4 via x_5 .

nerbi'o

lujvo
x_1=b_1=n_1 enters [becomes inside-of] x_2=n_2 under conditions x_3=b_3
cf. {nenri}, {binxo}.

nercreka

lujvo
c_1 is a singlet/undershirt/vest of material c_2.

nerde

experimental gismu
x_1 is a nerd/geek (demonstrates esoteric intense interests at the cost social acceptance) according to standard/within culture x_2 with nerdy/geeky interests x_3
Modeled on the definition of {mugle}. Some degree of (at least budding) expertise might be implied, but it is not truly necessary. There just has to be a degree of social rejection or isolation and an intense interest about (a) narrow and somewhat obscure subject matter(s). A nerd need not always be socially disconnected, but it should happen at least where x_3 is involved or the interest becomes relevant/apparent. On the other hand, nerdiness/geekiness is also a personality (or a trait thereof), some sense, it never does not apply if it ever applies; but there are contexts wherein certain traits do not really emerge/reveal themselves readily. The intensity of interest in x_3 should be judged to be excessive and abnornal, to the point of social separation, by/relative to x_2.

nerfopi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a lobster of species x_2.
Cf. {xasyjukni}, {cakyjukni}. From linnaean Nephropidae.

nerjelmatra

lujvo
m_1 is an internal combustion engine (ICE) driving/propelling/providing power to x2, in which combusting/burning of j_1 takes place internally.

nerkalri

lujvo
x_1 is an entrance/entry/entryway/inlet/way in to x_2 for x_3 .
See also {nerkla}

nerkla

lujvo
n_1=k_1 enters n_2=k_2 from origin k_3 via route k_4 using means/vehicle k_5.

nerklaji

lujvo
k_1=n_1 is a hallway / indoor street within k_2=n_2 accessing k_3.
Made from {nenri} + {klaji}.

nerpalku

lujvo
x_1 is a pair of underpants

nerta'u

lujvo
x1=t1=n1 is underwear, worn by/on x2=t2, for purpose x3=t3, worn under x4=n2

ne'u

cmavo
FAhA1
location tense relation/direction; south of.

ne'urna

fu'ivla
x_1 is to the south of x_2 according to frame of reference x_3.
Synonymous to {snanu}. See {ne'u}. Set: {be'arna} {du'arna} {ne'urna} {vu'arna}. This set is invented for those who prefer the sumtcita over the gismu, due to all starting with different letters.

ni

cmavo
-nil-
NU
abstractor: quantity/amount abstractor; x_1 is quantity/amount of [bridi] measured on scale x_2.

ni'a

cmavo
FAhA2
location tense relation/direction; downwards/down from ...

ni'a'au

experimental cmavo
GAhUhAU
mekso n-ary operator: append covariant (lower) indices to tensor
Terminated by {te'oi'oi}. Takes ordered input (A, X_1, X_2, …, X_(n-1)), where A is a tensor and X_i is an index with an understood (or elsewhere defined) ordered domain. It appends/assigns X_i to be the ith covariant index of A, which is usually designated as a subscript in the ith position to the right of A. See also: {ga'u'au}. It is probable that Einstein summation notation will be conventionally in effect.

ni'ablo

lujvo
x_1 is a submarine for carrying x_2, propelled by x_3.
Cf. {cnita}, {bloti}, {beiblo}, {preblo}, {jamblo}, {bratcejamblo}, {brajamblo}, {cmajamblo}, {badjamblo}, {vijblo}.

ni'ai

experimental cmavo
NU
x_1 is a number/value such that the abstraction is true, under mathematical system x_2; x_1 binds to ke'a within the abstraction
Essentially a specialized version of {poi'i} for use with predicated mathematical statements (as an alternative to mekso). See also {ke'a}.

ni'au

experimental cmavo
CAI
attitudinal: 'how do you do?'
Chinese style greeting. See also {pei}, {coi}, {a'oi}

nibji'i

lujvo
j_1 concludes that n_1 (du'u) logically implies n_2 under rules n_3.
Cf. {nibli}, {jinvi}, {lojycpa}, {ja'o}.

nibli

gismu
-nib-
-ni'i-
x_1 logically necessitates/entails/implies action/event/state x_2 under rules/logic system x_3.
See also {natfe}, {rinka}, {mukti}, {krinu}, cmavo list {ni'i}, {jalge}, {logji}.

ni bu

bu-letteral
the last sumti having a {ni}-abstraction at its topmost level inside
See also {ka bu}, {nu bu}, {du'u bu}

nibysucyjvo

lujvo
l_1 is an implicit-abstraction lujvo with meaning l_2 and arguments l_3 built from metaphor [tanru] l_4.
The term “implicit-abstraction lujvo” is specific to Lojban and originates from The Lojban Reference Grammar, chapter 12, section 13.

nibyti'i

lujvo
x_1=n_1 (idea/fact/du'u) suggests/intimates that x_2=n_2=s_2 (idea/fact/du'u) is true as it appears to x_3=s_3
From {nibli} {stidi}. Unlike {stidi}, it refers to person's internal logical reasoning about facts, not external suggestion.

nibzilvlina

lujvo
it is not true that and x_1 is true and x_2 is false; if x_1 is true then x_2 is true as well (logical sufficiency)
Similar in meaning to {nibli}, but without causal implication. See also {zilvlina}.

nicfa

experimental gismu
x_1 (vector) is the displacement of x_2 (object/point) relative to x_3 (object/point; contextless default: origin) in coordinate system/frame of reference/as measured by x_4 according to definition/standard/(meta)physics x_5
x1 is (four-)vector-valued; it is a function that maps to a tensor (probably a vector or scalar) to a (four-)vector. Units are handled in x1, which will be a (four-)vector of {mitre} or the like. Time of measurement is just «ca» or the argument of the function(s) in x1, or can be defined instantaneously by x4. Proposed short rafsi: -nif-. See also: {nifkemtemsalri}.

nicpoi

lujvo
x_1 (sequence) is a sorted sequence, ordered by relation x_2 (binary ka), from unordered set/plurality x_3
Same place structure as {porsi}, but specifies that the sequence has been sorted according to some rule. See {cnici}, {porganzu}, {pormei}, {pormoi}

nicte

gismu
-cte-
x_1 is a nighttime of day x_2 at location x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is at night/nocturnal.
Tonight (= {cabycte}); tomorrow night (= {bavlamcte}, even when tonight is still in the future); last night (= {prulamcte}). See also {donri}, {djedi}, {tcika}.

nicygau

lujvo
g_1 (agent) tidies/cleans up/neatens/straightens c_1 in property/quantity c_2 (ka/ni).
Cf. {cnici}, {gasnu}, {ganzu}

ni'e

cmavo
NIhE
convert selbri to mex operand; used to create new non-numerical quantifiers; e.g. "herd" of oxen.

ni'e'ei

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: Niven's greatest-exponent prime factorization constant lim_(n->∞) (avg_n (H)) ≈ 1.705211…
This constant is the greatest exponent appearing in the prime factorization of a positive natural number over the ring integers on average. See also: {ni'e'oi}

niengatu

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is Nheengatu/Tupi/Lingua Geral in aspect x_2.
see also {brazo}, {abniena}

ni'e'oi

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: Niven's smallest-exponent prime factorization constant c = zeta(3/2)/zeta(3) ≈ 2.1732543125195541382370898404…
This constant plays a role in the bounding of the infinite sum of the smallest exponents in the prime factorizations of the positive natural numbers over the ring of integers; specifically, it is the coefficient of the √(n) term; Niven's bound more fully is given by n + c√(n) + o(√(n)). See also: {ni'e'ei}

nifkemtemsalri

lujvo
x_1 (vector) is the differintegral (with respect to time) of order x_2 of the displacement of x_3 (object/point) relative to x_4 (object/point/frame of reference; contextless default: origin) in coordinate system/frame of reference/as measured by x_5 according to definition/standard/(meta)physics x_6, taken with starting point x_7
This word uses two experimental gismu (one with an experimental rafsi): {nicfa} and {salri}. If x2 is positive, then x1 is a time-derivative (velocity, acceleration, jerk, etc. (for whole number values)); if it is negative, then x1 is a time-integral (moments); if it is 0, then x1 is displacement itself. x1 is vector-valued.

nifkemtemsalryke'ecusna

lujvo
x_1 (scalar-valued) is the magnitude of the vector of the differintegral (with respect to time) of order x_2 of the displacement of x_3 (object/point) relative to x_4 (object/point/frame of reference; contextless default: origin) in coordinate system/frame of reference/as measured by x_5 according to definition/standard/(meta)physics x_6, where the differintegral is taken with starting point x_7, in metric/by definition x_8
This word uses three experimental gismu (with one experimental short cmavo for one of these): {nicfa} (-nif-), {salri}, {cusna}.

ni'i

cmavo
BAI
nibli modal, 1st place logically; logically because ...

ni'i ma

cmavo-compound
BAI*
sumti question asking for a logical proof; why?.

ni'inai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
na'e nibli modal, 1st place; regardless of logically sufficient condition ...
Cf. {na'e}, {nibli}.

nikle

gismu
-nik-
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of nickel/other metal resistant to oxidation.
See also {jinme}.

nikyge'u

lujvo
g_1=n_1 is an exaggerated creature/character (such as a dog made of nickel) of origin g_2
{nikle}, {gerku}

nikyjinme

lujvo
n_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of nickel (Ni).
Unlike {nikle}, this brivla is only true for nickel, but it is untrue for other metals resistant to oxidation. See also {jinme}.

nikyjoijimjoibordrokemdicysro

lujvo
s_1 is a nickel–metal hydride battery in containment s_3.
See also {nikyjinme}, {jinme}, {cidro}, {dicysro}.

nilbra

lujvo
x_1 is the size of x_2 in property/dimension x_3 on scale x_4.

nilce

gismu
-ni'e-
x_1 [furniture items] furnishes x_2 [location] serving purpose/function x_3.
See also {ckana}, {jubme}, {sfofa}, {stizu}, {dacru}.

nildenmi

lujvo
x_1 [number] is the local density of x_2 per unit x_3 at locus x_4
Not necessarily (although possible) volumetric mass density. Could be temporal (x_3). Can be applied to number/count; thus, the units may vary and in fact the quantity might even be unitless. In a sense, fluxes are spacial-temporal densities. It is recommended that x_2 be a physical entity/object in some sense (not merely have physical quality/meaning/value); thus, while this word could be applied to many things described with the word "per", it would probably not make much sense to call velocity a temporal displacement density (although in some contexts it might). Notice that "local" implies derivatives.

nildumu

fu'ivla
x_1 (ni) is a quantity
Place structure under discussion; in the mean time, this may be used to refer to the object-type represented by {ni}. See {nundumu}, {du'umdu}, {li'imdu}, {su'umdu}, {sumdaiklei}

nildzau

fu'ivla
x_1 (number) is the vote score of x_2 in upvote/downvote system x_3
Refers to systems (chiefly on the Internet) that keep a running tally of approval-votes, and sometimes disapproval-votes as well. Syn. se {dzaunlai}. See {ma'udzau}, {ni'udzau}, {adzau}

nilga'u

lujvo
x_1 (li) is the altitude of x_2 with respect to x_3 in frame of reference x_4.

nilgla

lujvo
n_1 is the temperature of g_1 measured on scale n_2.
Cf. {glare}, {lenku}, {kelvo}.

nilglatro

lujvo
j1 has control over/harnesses/manages/directs/conducts quantity of air in j3 (Temperature change/regulation).

nilguskli

lujvo
n_1 is the transparency of k_1 (object/medium) measured on scale n_2.
Cf. {guskli}.

nilji'a

lujvo
n_1 is a number of points / score / indication of an attempt to win a competition won by j_1 over opponent(s) j_3 in competition j_4, points measured on scale n_2.
n2 moved to the end due to apparent uselessness. Made from {ni} and {jinga}.

nilji'etei

lujvo
ni_1 is the age of j_1 from time/event t_2 (default: birth) until reference time on scale ni3 (default: [{month}, year]).
See also: {nilnalci'o} and {zatra'i}.

nilkla

lujvo
ni_1 is the amount of k_1's coming/going to k_2 from k_3 via route k_4 by means k_5, measured on scale ni_2.
Example 12.58 (cll 1.1).

nilmulyuidje

lujvo
u_1 is a progress bar showing completeness n_1 of m_1 (event) and is in user interface u_2.
{ni} + {mulno} + {uidje}. Syn. {nilmu'o zei uidje}

nilmu'o zei uidje

zei-lujvo
u_1 is a progress bar showing completeness n_1 of m_1 (event) and is in user interface u_2.
See {uidje}

nilmuvyselbai

lujvo
x_1=n_1 (quantity/amount) is the physical work performed on object x_2=m_1=b_2 (object), due to/applied by x_3=b_1 (force; ka?), in its (x_2's) movement to destination x_4=m_2 [away] from origin x_5=m_3 along(/by/in/on) path/route x_6=m_4
It is not clear that x2 can be an event or manifestation; thus bapli2 loses some of its typing. This word was, essentially, proposed by the official gimste.

nilnalci'o

lujvo
ni_1 is the age [elapsed duration] of c_1 by standard c_2

nilsutra

lujvo
n_1 is the speed / amount of fast-ness measured on scale n_2 of thing / agent s_1 in / at doing / being / bringing about s_2 (event / state).
Cf. {ni}, {sutra}, {kamsutra}.

nilvoksli

lujvo
n_1 is the voicing of/amount of phonation of/state of the vocal folds during speech sound/vocal product x_2 made by instrument/locus/vocalization tool v_1 in individual speaker v_2.
cf. {vokpravelpe'u}

nilxa'ugri

lujvo
n_1 (number) is the population of inhabitant group g_1 in area x_2 measured on scale n_2.
Cf. {xabju}, {cecmu}, {tcadu}, {jarbu}, {nurma}.

nilyla'e

lujvo
x_1 is the probability of x_2 (event)

nilylau

lujvo
n_1 is the (measured/perceived) loudness of c_1 at observation point c_2, measured on scale n_2=c_3.

nilzilcmi

lujvo
n_1 is the cardinality of set c_2.

nilzma

lujvo
x_1 (li) exceeds/is greater than/is numerically larger than x_2 (li) by amount (ni/li) x_3; x_1 = x_2 + x_3
x1, x2, x3 are probably numbers. Ordering is implicit (use {se'o'e} {po'i} or {fi'o} {se'o'e} {poirsi} for explicit specification thereof).

nim

cmevla
Ms.
Cf. {ninmu}, {nix}, {nanl}, {naun}.

nimbau

lujvo
b_1 is Láadan.
A constructed language by Suzette Haden Elgin

nimfaia

fu'ivla
x_1 is a water-lily (Nymphaea) of species/strain x_2

nimre

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of citrus [fruit/tree, etc.] of species/strain x_2.
See also {grute}, {slari}, {slami}, {xukmi}.

nimrnlatifolia

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a Persian lime [fruit/tree etc.] of cultivar x_2.
Member of species Citrus latifolia. Cf. {nimre}.

nimrnlimone

fu'ivla
x_1 is a lemon [fruit/tree etc.] of cultivar x_2.
Member of species Citrus limon. Cf. {nimre}.

nimrnxaurantifolia

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a key lime [fruit/tree, etc.] of cultivar x_2.
Member of Citrus aurantifolia. Cf. {nimre}.

nimryjdu

lujvo
j_1 is a quantity of citrus jelly made from n_1.
Cf. {nimre}, {jduli}.

nimrysmuci

lujvo
s_1 is/are grapefruit spoon/orange spoon [item of cutlery] suitable for eating citrus fruit s_2=n_1 made of material s_3.
An orange spoon (in American English: grapefruit spoon), tapers to a sharp point or teeth, and is used to separate citrus fruits from their membranes.

nimso'a

lujvo
s_1 is an ova/ovum/egg cell of woman/female humanoid person n_1=s_2.

nincu'u

lujvo
cu_1=cn_1 is a new business involving persons cu_2
from {cnino} {cuntu} c.f. {nincu'upre}

nincu'upre

lujvo
p_1 is an intrepreneur involved in business cu_1=cn_1
from {cnino} {cuntu} {prenu} c.f. {cu'upre} {nincu'u}

ninfesyborpli

lujvo
x_1=p_1 recycles x_2=p_2=f_1=c_2 for new purpose x_3=p_3=c_3 from original use x_4=f_2, purpose new by standard x_5=c_4.

ninga'igau

lujvo
gas_1 resets/changes gal_1 to a new value/content.
Cf. {cnino}, {galfi}, {gasnu}, {kraga'igau}.

ningau

lujvo
x_1=g_1=c_2 renovates/renews/updates x_2=c_1, making it new in property x_3=c_3 by standard x_4=c_4.
In a computer context, a tag such as {se} {la'u} or a tanru involving {va'e} can be used to indicate a version number.

ninja

experimental gismu
x_1 is ninja from x_2 (family/place/tribe)

ninmu

gismu
-nim-
-ni'u-
x_1 is a woman/women; x_1 is a female humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu). See also {nanmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nixli}.

ninpre

lujvo
c_1=p_1 is a stranger to c_2 in aspect c_3 by standard c_4
since ninpre in the sense of "novice" seems to be deprecated in favor of nintadni, this seems to be a better definition.

nintadni

lujvo
c_2=t_1 is a beginner in subject c_1=t_2 by standard c_4

ninyna'adetri

lujvo
d_1 is New Year's Day of d_2=n_1=c_1 at location d_3 in calendar d_4.
Cf. {ninyna'anunsla}.

ninyna'anunsla

lujvo
nu_1 is the celebration of the New Year as celebrated by s_1 at the beginning of year na_1=c_1 according to standard na_3; nu_1 is the New Year.
Cf. {ninyna'adetri}.

ninyna'azukpla

lujvo
c_2=z_1=p_1 plans New Year's resolution z_2=p_2 for New Year c_1=n_1=p_3 with goal of resolution z_3 (state/event/process)

ninynavni

lujvo
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of neon (Ne).
See also {cnino}, {navni}; {ratni}.

ni'o

cmavo
NIhO
discursive: paragraph break; introduce new topic.

niotrogla

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a member of insect genus Neotrogla, of species x_2
Species of this genus are noted for their so-called "sex-reversed" organs. See: {vibnrbarpinji}, {nakpibrkevna}.

nipkenka

lujvo
k_1=s_1 is a mud cake made of/containing ingredients k_2, prepared according to method k_3
Cf. {titnanba}, {jupypesxu}, {rutytisna}

nipmapku

lujvo
m_1=s_1 is a beanie hat of material m_2.
Cf. {mapku}.

nipsri

lujvo
d_1=s_1 is an adhesive tape/cellotape/Scotch Tape/duct tape of material d_2, which sticks to s_2.
Cf. {bofsnipa}.

nipypalku

lujvo
p_1=s_1 is a legging of material p_2.
Cf. {palku}.

nirbe'ixu'i

lujvo
x_1 is an instance of neurotransmitter b_2=x_2 that carry messages to neuron/muscle/gland b_3 from transmitter/origin b_4 via nerves/medium n_1=b_5, with purity x_3.

nircadyxu'i

lujvo
xu_1 is an instance of anesthetic blocking impulses from nerve group/system n_1=c_1 of n_2.
Cf. {nirna}, {xukmi}, {cortu}, {ganse}.

nirna

gismu
-nir-
x_1 is a nerve/neuron [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: information/control network connection].
Also (adjective:) x_1 is neural. See also ve {benji}.

nirndendriti

fu'ivla
x_1 is a dendrite of nerve x_2 receiving impulses x_3.

nirnysle

lujvo
x_1 is a neuron

nirsle

lujvo
s_1 is a neuron/nerve cell of nerve n_1=s_2.

nirslerebla

lujvo
r_1 is an axon of neuron/nerve cell s_1=r_2.

nitcu

gismu
-tcu-
x_1 needs/requires/is dependent on/[wants] necessity x_2 for purpose/action/stage of process x_3.
No implication of lack. See also {banzu}, {cidja}, {claxu}, {pindi}, {xebni}, {sarcu}, {lacri}, {djica}, {taske}, {xagji}.

nitkla

lujvo
k_1 descends/goes down to k_2=c_1 from k_3=c_2 via k_4 using means k_5.
Cf. {cnita}, {klama}.

nitmau

lujvo
z_1=c_1 is lower than z_2 beneath c_2 in frame of reference c_3 by amount/excess z_4.
Cf. {cnita}, {zmadu}, {nitrai}.

nitpiki

fu'ivla
x_1 nitpicks / criticizes inconsequential fault/flaw x_2 in x_3 (object or action)
See {cfifa'i}

nitrai

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is the lowest among set/range t_4 beneath c_2 in frame of reference c_3.
Cf. {cnita}, {traji}, {nitmau}.

nitsalpo

lujvo
s_1 dips at an angle of s_2 to reference frame s_3, to beneath c_2.
Cf. {cnita}, {salpo}, {sa'orgau}.

nityjinru

lujvo
j_1=c_1 (object/person) dives beneath/below/under from c_2 (object/water surface) in frame of reference c_3, submerged in liquid j_2 .

nityjirkla

lujvo
k_1=j_1=c_1 dives to destination k_2 from origin k_3 via route k_4 using means/vehicle k_5 in liquid j_2 beneath/under/down from c_2 (object/water surface) in frame of reference c_3.

nityjirma'e

lujvo
m_1 is a diver propulsion vehicle (DPV) carrying m_2=j_1=c_1 (diver/object), propelled by m_4.

nitytse

lujvo
z_1 sits on surface z_2=c_1 that is below c_2 in frame of reference c_3.
Cf. {cnita}, {zutse}, {cfatse}.

ni'u

cmavo
PA3
digit/number: minus sign; negative number); default any negative.

ni'udzau

fu'ivla
x_1 downvotes / "dislikes" / "-1"s x_2 in system x_3
Refers to systems (chiefly on the Internet) that keep a running tally of approval-votes, and sometimes disapproval-votes as well. See {ma'udzau}, {co'udzau}, {adzau}, {nildzau}

ni'utni

fu'ivla
x_1 is x_2 newton (s) of force (default is 1) by standard x_3.
Cf. {ki'orgratretrefrinynidysnidu}.

ni'u zei ionti

zei-lujvo
x_1 is an anion of radical/(atom of element)x_2 with x_3 charges.
Cf. {ionti}, {ma'u zei ionti}, {lektoni}, {xumsle}.

nivji

gismu
-niv-
x_1 (agent) knits x_2 [cloth/object] from yarn/thread x_3.
See also {cilta}, {fenso}, {jivbu}, {pijne}.

nivycreka

lujvo
c_1=n_2 is a sweater of material c_2=n_3.
A knitted jacket or jersey, usually of thick wool. Cf. {creka}, {tafrkardiga}.

nix

cmevla
Miss
Cf. {nixli}, {nanl}, {naun}, {nim}.

nixli

gismu
-nix-
-xli-
x_1 is a girl [young female person] of age x_2 immature by standard x_3.
Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba). See also {nanla}, {verba}, {ninmu}.

no

cmavo
-non-
PA1
digit/number: 0 (digit) [zero].

no'a

cmavo
GOhA
pro-bridi: repeats the bridi in which this one is embedded.

no'ai

experimental cmavo
PA4
digit/number: absolute zero; nothing; there does not exist; ∄
Mathematically equivalent to {no}, but implies lack of negative values, especially on a scale ({va'e}/{va'ei} e.g.). Equivalent to "{rone'e} {no}". Cf. {no'e'u}, {su'o}, {ro}, {su'oi}, {ro'oi}

no'au

experimental cmavo
XOI
Introduces a bridi relative clause, with the scope of {xoi} and the semantics of {noi}
See also {xoi} and {noi}. "ko .{iklki} no'au jalge fa lo nu {kibycpa}" means something close to "do se {koinde} fi lo ka .iklki noi lo nu do ckaji ke'a cu se jalge lo nu kibycpa"

no'au'au

experimental cmavo
VUhU
mathematical/mekso binary operator: the zero/identity-element/(primitive (-))constant operator; outputs the identity-element of structure A (contextless default: the additive group of integers) regardless of the input value of B (except blank or ill-defined values)
According to the contextless default, the (contextless default) output will be identically 0. B can be literally anything imaginable (no specific type is required), so long as B is non-empty (not blank) and is well-defined; if these conditions are satisfied, the identity-element of structure A is output; else, this function is undefined. Notice that in Lojban, a blank must be input explicitly; otherwise {xo'o} will fill the argument implicitly. By skipping arguments in this manner (assuming a known default and using implicit elliptical argument-filling features of Lojban), this operator can be reduced to 0-arity. Note that this operator is different from multiplying by 0. See also: {bai'ei}, {ci'o'au}.

nobli

gismu
-nol-
-no'i-
x_1 is noble/aristocratic/elite/high-born/titled in/under culture/society/standard x_2.
Also upper-class; high/low, upper/lower are poor Lojban metaphors; note x_2 standard applies when the title/nobility is not recognized culture/society wide; this would include self-assumed titles. See also {banli}.

noda

cmavo-compound
KOhA*
logically quantified sumti: nothing at all (unless restricted).

no'e

cmavo
-nor-
-no'e-
NAhE
midpoint scalar negator: neutral point between je'a and to'e; "not really".

no'ebo

cmavo-compound
NAhE+BO
negation sumti qualifier: the neutral form/value of.
Cf. {no'e}, {bo}, {na'ebo}, {je'abo}, {to'ebo}. Midpoint between {je'abo} and {to'ebo}.

no'e'u

experimental cmavo
PA4
digit/number: liminal zero; neither positive nor negative
Mathematically equivalent to {no}, but implies existence of both positive and negative values, especially on a scale ({va'e}/{va'ei} e.g.). Cf. {no'ai}, {no'e}, {ma'u}, {ni'u}

noi

cmavo
NOI
non-restrictive relative clause; attaches subordinate bridi with incidental information.

no'i

cmavo
NIhO
discursive: paragraph break; resume previous topic.

noi'a

experimental cmavo
NOIhA
PA incidental relative clause; attaches to a PA number/numeral/digit with the ke'a referring to that PA number/numeral/digit.
It attaches to the last mentioned PA, which can be only a single digit within a number rather than the entire number itself (if it has digit length greater than one in some base). Thus, beware of grouping. Confer: {poi'a}, {jau'au}. The attachment of this word to the immediately preceding word can be ovverriden by the usage of {xe'au}, which begins bracketing together an utterance/subexpression that will be considered to be the single and whole referent of the clause introduced by this word, wthe utterance of which also finishes the bracket. There is a proposal to expand the attachment of this word to any word spoken in a mekso utterance (rather than only members of selma'o PA), including members of selma'o VUhU, etc.

noi'e

experimental cmavo
NAhE
scalar normative: normal in intensity
{rei'e}:{ru'e}:{milxe} ; {noi'e}:{na'oi}:{cnano} ; {sai'e}:{sai}:{mutce} ; {cai'e}:{cai}:{tcetce}. See http://mw.lojban.org/papri/zipcpi:_scalar_modifiers

noi'i

experimental cmavo
NOIhI
connective modifer/limiter
Used for {ji} and other connective questions. It is preceded by such a connective (question) word and is followed by the set of words or the selma'o name to which the answer is expected/required to belong; the former may be literally a list of cmavo (such as 'zo .{e} ce zo .{a}', meaning that only AND or AND-OR are acceptable responses) or the name of a set of them (such as 'non-logical connectives', 'tanru after-thought connectives', 'symmetric connectives', 'all connectives except .{u}'. etc.). Terminated by {ge'u'i}. For example 'do djica tu'a loi ckafi ji noi'i lu .enai li'u ce lu na .e li'u ge'u'i loi tcati' asks 'Do you want: some coffee, some tea - where your answer can be only the former or the latter?'.

noisku

lujvo
c_1 announces/proclaims c_2 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience c_3=n_4 via expressive medium c_4.
Cf. {notci}, {cusku}.

nol

cmevla
Sir/Madam
Cf. {nobli}, {nilnim}, {nolnaum}.

nolba'i

lujvo
b_1=n_1 is titled with high aristocratic/noble/elite status in/under culture/society b_3=n_2.
Cf. {nobli}, {banli}, {kamba'i}. 'Your Highness' or 'Your Majesty' is {doi nolba'i).

nolboi

lujvo
x_1 is an orb made of b_2 used by n_1.
Cf. {nobli}, {bolci}, {nolga'a}, {trumapku}.

nolga'a

lujvo
g_1 is a sceptre made of g_2 used by n_1.
Cf. {nobli}, {grana}, {nolboi}, {ri'irga'a}, {trumapku}.

noljedai

fu'ivla
x_1 is a Jedi of power / level / rank x_2

nolkansa

lujvo
k_1 is a courtier to sovereign/aristocrat/noble k_2 in culture/country n_2=k_3.
Cf. {nobli}, {kansa}, {nolse'u}, {nolraitru}, {noltronau}, {noltruni'u}, {balnoltru}.

nolmapku

lujvo
m_1 is a crown made of m_2.
Cf. {nobli}, {mapku}, {trumapku}, {nolboi}, {nolga'a}.

nolmle

lujvo
m_1=n_1 is elegant to m_2=n_2.
Cf. {melbi}.

nolnaum

cmevla
Sir
Cf. {nobli}, {nanmu}, {nol}, {nolnim}.

nolnim

cmevla
Madam/Lady
Cf. {nobli}, {ninmu}, {nol}, {nolnaum}.

nolni'u

lujvo
ni_1=no_1 is a lady, considered noble in culture/society/standard no_2.
Cf. {nobli}.

nolraitru

lujvo
t_1=n_1 is a regent/monarch of t_2 by standard n_2.
Cf. {nobli}, {traji}, {turni}, {balnoltru}, {noltruni'u}, {noltrunau}, {noltroni'u}, {noltronau}, {nolse'u}, {nolkansa}, {gugja'a}, {truralju}.

nolraitrututra

lujvo
x1 is a monarchal territory/noble territory/regency (territory)/kingdom (territory)/queendom (territory) of ruler x2
Not the government, subjects, etc., merely the territory. Of what the territory is can be specified, by various means, within x2 (but not as the main sumti thereof).

nolse'u

lujvo
s_1 is a servant of sovereign/aristocrat/noble s_2=n_1 in culture/country n_2 with responsibilities s_3.
Cf. {nobli}, {selfu}, {nolkansa}, {nolraitru}, {balnoltru}.

nolstizu

lujvo
s_1 is a throne/ceremonial chair used by noble/aristocratic/elite/high-born/titled in/under culture/society/standard n_2.
Cf. {nobli}, {stizu}, {trustizu}.

noltronau

lujvo
ni_1=j_1=no_1 is a Duke/Baron/Count/Earl/Marquess/ [titled noble of middle rank] ruling j_2 under culture/standard no_2.
Cf. {nobli}, {jitro}, {nanmu}, {noltroni'u}, {noltruni'u}, {nolraitru}, {balnoltru}.

noltroni'u

lujvo
ni_1=j_1=no_1 is a Duchess/Baroness/Countess/Marchioness/ [titled noble of middle rank] ruling j_2 under culture/standard no_2..
Cf. {nobli}, {jitro}, {ninmu}, {noltronau}, {noltruni'u}, {nolraitru}, {balnoltru}.

noltrube'a

lujvo
x_1 is a prince, son of king/queen x_2 who reigns over x_3
See {noltruti'u}.

noltrufe'i

lujvo
x_1 is a queen/empress reigning over x_2

noltrunau

lujvo
x_1 is the king of x_2 by standard x_3.
see also {noltruni'u}, {nolraitru}

noltruni'u

lujvo
x_1 is the queen of x_2 by standard x_3.
see also {noltrunau}, {nolraitru}

noltruti'u

lujvo
x_1 is a princess, daughter of king/queen x_2 who reigns over x_3

nolzda

lujvo
z_1 is a palace of/for noble person(s) n_1=z_2.
Cf. {badydi'u}.

nolzgi

lujvo
z_1=n_1 the classical music performed at/by z_2 (event) originating in culture n_1.
Cf. {nobli}, {zgike}, {dzeklu}, {ronri'izgi}, {naizgi}, {sopselneizgi}, {dja'aza}, {te'ekno}.

nomo'o

cmavo-compound
MAI*
discursive utterance ordinal: zeroth section/chapter ordinal; foreword.

nonbaizu'e

lujvo
x1=z1 voluntarily does action x2=z2=b2 to achieve goal x3=z3
In the sense: Doing something, when refusing would have no repercussions. Unpaid action not implied.

nonceikri

lujvo
k_1 is an atheist.
Syn. {nalceikri}. Cf. {ceikri}, {seljda}, {ceirsenpi}.

noncinse

lujvo
c_1 is asexual in situation c_2 by standard c_4.
Cf. {no}, {cinse}.

nondei

lujvo
x_1 is a Sunday of week x_2 in calendar x_3.
Duration. For date, use {jedlno}. Sunday is either day seven or day zero, depending on your perspective.

nonjdi

lujvo
x_1 is undecided/makes no decision about x_2.
See also {aicu'i}

nonkansa

lujvo
x_1 is alone/lonely/lonesome in state/condition/enterprise x_2.
Cf. {kansa}, {seicni}.

nonmajga

lujvo
x_1 is massless/is a massless particle
{majga} is an experimental gismu.

nonmau

lujvo
z_1 (number) is greater than 0 by amount z_4 (number); z_1 is a positive number.
See also {nonme'a}, {zmadu}, {no}.

nonme'a

lujvo
m_1 (number) is less than 0 by amount m_4 (number); m_1 is a negative number.
See also: {nonmau}, {mleca}, {no}.

nonpa'a

lujvo
x_1 wishes for x_2 (impossibility or believed impossibility)
Modeled after {sotpa'a}. See {pacna}

nonrefke'udu'e

lujvo
if x_1 never happens again, it would be too soon
The Lojban definition doesn't quite mean what the English one does, but it conveys roughly the same idea. The Lojban definition means something more along the lines of "x1 never happening would mean it happening too many times".

nonroi

lujvo
x_1 never happens in interval x_2. x_1 happens zero times.

nonseka

fu'ivla
x_1 is alone in state/condition/enterprise x_2
A zi'evla based on {nonselkansa}

nonselcei

lujvo
c_2 disbelieves in god/deity c_1 with dominion over c_3; c_2 is an atheist.
Cf. {cevni}, {ceikri}, {nalceikri}, {selcei}, {pavyselcei}, {sorselcei}, {ceirsenpi}.

nonseldi'a

lujvo
x_1 is available for free/without cost to x_2 from provider x_3.

nonselji'u

lujvo
x_1 is invisible from point-of-view x_2.
Synonym: {vincau}. See also {jvinu}.

nonseljmi

lujvo
j_2 (du'u) is a mystery for j_1, the subject being j_3.
Cf. {jimpe}, {mipri}.

nonselkansa

lujvo
x_1 is alone in state/condition/enterprise x_2

nonselkosmu

lujvo
x_1 is pointless / futile / useless according to x_2
See {narplixau}, {kosmu}, {nonselsmu}

nonselra'u

lujvo
x1=r2 is careless

nonselsmu

lujvo
x_1 is nonsense/nonsensical to x_2.
See also {no} {smuni}

nonselsumji

lujvo
x_1 is the additive inverse of x_2.
See also {va'a}

nonseltai

lujvo
x_1 is shapeless/has no shape

nonsku

lujvo
x_1=c_1 is quiet and says nothing to x_2=c_3.

nonsmi

lujvo
